h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 1 aadayo} tena ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ ^a^T1.0001^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire bodhirukkhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho bhagavaa bodhirukkhamuule sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisiidi vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii {vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii (ka0)}. atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anulomapa.tiloma.m manasaakaasi -- ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti -- evametassa ^a^V0.0002^ea^ kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. ``avijjaayatveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho ^a^T1.0002^ea^, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti -- evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho ^a^P1.0002^ea^ hotii''ti.
[03]atha ^a^M0.0002^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa.
[27] aataapino jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] athassa ka"nkhaa vapayanti sabbaa.
[22] yato pajaanaati sahetudhamma''nti..

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 2} atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anulomapa.tiloma.m manasaakaasi -- ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m...pe0... ^a^T1.0003^ea^ evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii...pe0... nirodho hotii''ti.
[03]atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa.
[27] aataapino jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] athassa ka"nkhaa vapayanti sabbaa.
[22] yato khaya.m paccayaana.m avedii''ti..

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 3} atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anulomapa.tiloma.m manasaakaasi -- ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m...pe0... ^a^T1.0004^ea^ evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti...pe0... nirodho hotii''ti.
[03]atha ^a^V0.0003^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa.
[27] aataapino jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] vidhuupaya.m ti.t.thati maarasena.m.
[22] suuriyova {suriyova (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} obhaasayamantalikkha''nti..
[06] bodhikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 4} atha ^a^M0.0003^ea^ kho bhagavaa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa bodhirukkhamuulaa yena ajapaalanigrodho tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ajapaalanigrodhamuule sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisiidi vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. atha kho a~n~nataro hu.mhu"nkajaatiko braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^T1.0005^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m ^a^P1.0003^ea^ etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bho gotama, braahma.no hoti, katame ca pana braahma.nakara.naa {braahma.nakaarakaa (ka0) braahma.nakaraa.naa (?)} dhammaa''ti? atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {netti0 103} yo braahma.no baahitapaapadhammo.
[27] nihu.mhu"nko nikkasaavo yatatto.
[26] vedantaguu vusitabrahmacariyo.
[27] dhammena so brahmavaada.m vadeyya.
[22] yassussadaa natthi kuhi~nci loke''ti..
[06] ajapaalakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 11} atha kho bhagavaa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa ajapaalanigrodhamuulaa ^a^V0.0004^ea^ yena mucalindo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa mucalindamuule sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisiidi vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. tena kho pana samayena mahaa akaalamegho udapaadi, sattaahavaddalikaa siitavaataduddinii. atha kho mucalindo naagaraajaa sakabhavanaa nikkhamitvaa bhagavato kaaya.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa uparimuddhani ^a^T1.0006^ea^ mahanta.m pha.na.m karitvaa a.t.thaasi -- ``maa bhagavanta.m siita.m, maa bhagavanta.m u.nha.m, maa bhagavanta.m .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphasso''ti {...siri.m sapa... (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. atha ^a^M0.0004^ea^ kho mucalindo naagaraajaa sattaahassa accayena viddha.m vigatavalaahaka.m deva.m viditvaa bhagavato kaayaa bhoge vinive.thetvaa sakava.n.na.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa maa.navakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa bhagavato purato a.t.thaasi pa~njaliko bhagavanta.m namassamaano. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {kathaa0 338 kathaavatthupaa.liyampi}``sukho viveko tu.t.thassa, sutadhammassa passato.
[22] abyaapajja.m sukha.m loke, paa.nabhuutesu sa.myamo..
[21] {kathaa0 338 kathaavatthupaa.liyampi}``sukhaa viraagataa loke, kaamaana.m samatikkamo.
[22] asmimaanassa yo vinayo, eta.m ve parama.m sukha''nti..
[06] mucalindakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa mucalindamuulaa yena raajaayatana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaayatanamuule sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisiidi vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. tena kho pana ^a^P1.0004^ea^ samayena tapussa {tapassu (sii0)} bhallikaa vaa.nijaa ukkalaa ta.m desa.m addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. atha kho tapussabhallikaana.m vaa.nijaana.m ^a^T1.0007^ea^ ~naatisaalohitaa devataa tapussabhallike vaa.nije etadavoca -- ``aya.m, maarisaa, bhagavaa raajaayatanamuule viharati pa.thamaabhisambuddho; gacchatha ta.m bhagavanta.m manthena ca madhupi.n.dikaaya ca patimaanetha; ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. atha kho tapussabhallikaa vaa.nijaa mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~nca aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho tapussabhallikaa vaa.nijaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu no, bhante, bhagavaa mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~nca, ya.m amhaaka.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya ^a^V0.0005^ea^ sukhaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``na kho tathaagataa hatthesu pa.tigga.nhanti. kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.tigga.nheyya.m mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~ncaa''ti? atha ^a^M0.0005^ea^ kho cattaaro mahaaraajaano bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya catuddisaa cattaaro selamaye patte bhagavato upanaamesu.m -- ``idha, bhante, bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~ncaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa paccagghe selamaye patte mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~nca, pa.tiggahetvaa paribhu~nji. atha kho tapussabhallikaa vaa.nijaa bhagavanta.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m viditvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m (oniitapattapaa.ni.m viditvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi} etadavocu.m -- ``ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca, upaasake no bhagavaa dhaaretu ^a^T1.0008^ea^ ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti. te ca loke pa.thama.m upaasakaa ahesu.m dvevaacikaa.
[06] raajaayatanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ {aya.m brahmayaacanakathaa dii0 ni0 2.64 aadayo; ma0 ni0 1.281 aadayo; ma0 ni0 2.336 aadayo; sa.m0 ni0 1.172 aadayo} atha kho bhagavaa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa raajaayatanamuulaa yena ajapaalanigrodho tenupasa"nkami. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ajapaalanigrodhamuule viharati. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m ^a^P1.0005^ea^ yadida.m idappaccayataapaaccasamuppaado; idampi kho .thaana.m sududdasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m, so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa''ti. apissu bhagavanta.m imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[21] ``kicchena ^a^T1.0009^ea^ me adhigata.m, hala.m daani pakaasitu.m.
[22] raagadosaparetehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] ``pa.tisotagaami.m ^a^M0.0006^ea^ nipu.na.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa {aava.taa (sii0)}''ti..
[03]itiha ^a^V0.0006^ea^ bhagavato pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m namati, no dhammadesanaaya.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ atha kho brahmuno sahampatissa bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya etadahosi -- ``nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi naama tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa appossukkataaya citta.m namati {namissati (?)}, no dhammadesanaayaa''ti. atha kho brahmaa sahampati -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma.m. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti ^a^T1.0010^ea^, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaana athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] ``paaturahosi magadhesu pubbe.
[27] dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito.
[26] apaapureta.m {avaapureta.m (sii0)} amatassa dvaara.m.
[22] su.nantu dhamma.m vimalenaanubuddha.m..
[21] ``sele yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito.
[27] yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[26] tathuupama.m dhammamaya.m sumedha.
[27] paasaadamaaruyha samantacakkhu.
[21] sokaavati.n.na.m ^a^P1.0006^ea^ janatamapetasoko.
[22] avekkhassu jaatijaraabhibhuuta.m..
[21] ``u.t.thehi ^a^M0.0007^ea^ viira vijitasa"ngaama.
[27] satthavaaha a.na.na {ana.na (ka0)} vicara loke.
[26] desassu {desetu (ka0)} bhagavaa dhamma.m.
[22] a~n~naataaro bhavissantii''ti..

[03]{[ ] sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi, muulapa.n.naasakesu paasaraasisutthe brahmayaacanaa saki.m yeva aagataa} [ eva.m ^a^V0.0007^ea^ vutte bhagavaa brahmaana.m sahampati.m etadavoca -- ``mayhampi kho, brahme, etadahosi -- `adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m idappaccayataapa.ticcasamuppaado; idampi kho .thaana.m sududdasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m, so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa'ti. apissu ma.m, brahme, imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[21] `kicchena me adhigata.m, hala.m daani pakaasitu.m.
[22] raagadosaparetehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] `pa.tisotagaami.m nipu.na.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa'ti..
[03]itiha me, brahme, pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m namati no dhammadesanaayaa''ti.

[03]dutiyampi kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma.m; santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaana athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] ``paaturahosi ^a^M0.0008^ea^ magadhesu pubbe.
[27] dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito.
[26] apaapureta.m amatassa dvaara.m.
[22] su.nantu dhamma.m vimalenaanubuddha.m..
[21] ``sele yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito.
[27] yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[26] tathuupama.m ^a^V0.0008^ea^ dhammamaya.m sumedha.
[27] paasaadamaaruyha samantacakkhu.
[26] sokaavati.n.na.m janatamapetasoko.
[22] avekkhassu jaatijaraabhibhuuta.m..
[21] ``u.t.thehi viira vijitasa"ngaama.
[27] satthavaaha a.na.na vicara loke.
[26] desassu bhagavaa dhamma.m.
[22] a~n~naataaro bhavissantii''ti..

[03]dutiyampi kho bhagavaa brahmaana.m sahampati.m etadavoca -- ``mayhampi kho, brahme, etadahosi -- `adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m idappaccayataapa.ticcasamuppaado; idampi kho .thaana.m sududdasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m, so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa'ti. apissu ma.m, brahme, imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --

[27] dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito.
[26] apaapureta.m amatassa dvaara.m.
[22] su.nantu dhamma.m vimalenaanubuddha.m..
[21] ``sele yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito.
[27] yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[26] tathuupama.m dhammamaya.m sumedha.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0011^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmuno ca ajjhesana.m viditvaa sattesu ca kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokesi. addasaa kho bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini ^a^M0.0010^ea^, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani samodaka.m .thitaani, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udaka.m accuggamma .thitaani {ti.t.thanti (sii0 syaa0)} anupalittaani udakena, evameva.m bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento addasa ^a^V0.0010^ea^ satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye ^a^P1.0007^ea^ mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante; disvaana ^a^T1.0012^ea^ brahmaana.m sahampati.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[21] ``apaarutaa tesa.m amatassa dvaaraa.
[27] ye sotavanto pamu~ncantu saddha.m.
[26] vihi.msasa~n~nii pagu.na.m na bhaasi.m.
[22] dhamma.m pa.niita.m manujesu brahme''ti..
[03]atha kho brahmaa sahampati ``kataavakaaso khomhi bhagavataa dhammadesanaayaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.
[06] brahmayaacanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ {ma0 ni0 1.284 aadayo; ma0 ni0 2.339 aadayo} atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m? ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii''ti? atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aa.laaro kaalaamo pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatiko; ya.mnuunaaha.m aa.laarassa kaalaamassa pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii''ti. atha kho antarahitaa devataa bhagavato aarocesi -- ``sattaahakaala"nkato, bhante, aa.laaro kaalaamo''ti. bhagavatopi kho ~naa.na.m udapaadi -- ``sattaahakaala"nkato aa.laaro ^a^M0.0011^ea^ kaalaamo''ti. atha kho bhagavato ^a^T1.0013^ea^ etadahosi -- ``mahaajaaniyo kho aa.laaro kaalaamo; sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya, khippameva aajaaneyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m? ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii''ti? atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho udako {uddako (sii0 syaa0)} raamaputto pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatiko; ya.mnuunaaha.m udakassa raamaputtassa pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii''ti. atha kho antarahitaa devataa bhagavato aarocesi -- ``abhidosakaala"nkato, bhante, udako raamaputto''ti. bhagavatopi kho ~naa.na.m udapaadi -- ``abhidosakaala"nkato ^a^V0.0011^ea^ udako raamaputto''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``mahaajaaniyo kho udako raamaputto; sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya, khippameva aajaaneyyaa''ti

[03]atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m? ko ima.m dhamma.m ^a^P1.0008^ea^ khippameva aajaanissatii''ti? atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``bahukaaraa kho me pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu, ye ma.m padhaanapahitatta.m upa.t.thahi.msu; ya.mnuunaaha.m pa~ncavaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya''nti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho etarahi pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu viharantii''ti? addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu baaraa.nasiya.m viharante ^a^T1.0014^ea^ isipatane migadaaye. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkaami.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho upako aajiivako bhagavanta.m antaraa ca gaya.m antaraa ca bodhi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanna.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito? ko vaa te satthaa? kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii''ti? eva.m vutte bhagavaa upaka.m aajiivaka.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] {dha0 pa0 353; kathaa0 405} ``sabbaabhibhuu ^a^M0.0012^ea^ sabbaviduuhamasmi,
[27] sabbesu dhammesu anuupalitto.
[26] sabba~njaho ta.nhaakkhaye vimutto,
[22] saya.m abhi~n~naaya kamuddiseyya.m..
[21] {mi0 pa0 4.5.11 milindapa~nhepi; kathaa0 405} ``na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo..
[21] {kathaa0 405 kathaavatthupaa.liyampi} ``aha~nhi arahaa loke, aha.m satthaa anuttaro.
[22] ekomhi sammaasambuddho, siitibhuutosmi nibbuto..
[21] {kathaa0 405 kathaavatthupaa.liyampi}``dhammacakka.m pavattetu.m, gacchaami kaasina.m pura.m.
[22] andhiibhuutasmi.m lokasmi.m, aaha~ncha.m {aaha~n~ni.m (ka0)} amatadundubhi''nti..
[03]yathaa ^a^V0.0012^ea^ kho tva.m, aavuso, pa.tijaanaasi, arahasi anantajinoti.
[21] {kathaa0 405 kathaavatthupaa.liyampi} ``maadisaa ve jinaa honti, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya.m.
[22] jitaa ^a^T1.0015^ea^ me paapakaa dhammaa, tasmaahamupaka {tasmaahamupakaa (sii0)} jino''ti..
[03]eva.m vutte upako aajiivako hupeyyapaavusoti {huveyyapaavuso (sii0) huveyyaavuso (syaa0)} vatvaa siisa.m okampetvaa ummagga.m gahetvaa pakkaami.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii isipatana.m migadaayo, yena pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu kho pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaana a~n~nama~n~na.m katika.m {ida.m pada.m kesuci natthi} sa.n.thapesu.m -- ``aya.m, aavuso, sama.no gotamo aagacchati, baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto ^a^P1.0009^ea^ aavatto baahullaaya. so neva abhivaadetabbo, na paccu.t.thaatabbo, naassa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m; api ca kho aasana.m .thapetabba.m, sace so aaka"nkhissati nisiidissatii''ti. yathaa yathaa kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu upasa"nkamati, tathaa tathaa {tathaa tathaa te (sii0 syaa0)} pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu sakaaya katikaaya sa.n.thaatu.m ^a^M0.0013^ea^. asa.n.thahantaa bhagavanta.m paccuggantvaa eko bhagavato pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, eko aasana.m pa~n~napesi, eko paadodaka.m, eko paadapii.tha.m, eko paadaka.thalika.m upanikkhipi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane; nisajja kho bhagavaa paade pakkhaalesi. apissu {api ca kho (paasaraasisuttha)} bhagavanta.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca samudaacaranti. eva.m vutte bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``maa, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca ^a^T1.0016^ea^ samudaacaratha {samudaacarittha (sii0 syaa0)}. araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho, odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa {yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaanaa (syaa0)} nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa''ti. eva.m vutte pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya {cariyaaya (syaa0)}, taaya pa.tipadaaya, taaya dukkarakaarikaaya nevajjhagaa uttari manussadhammaa {uttarimanussadhamma.m (syaa0 ka0)} alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi, baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya, adhigamissasi uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa''nti? eva.m vutte bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``na, bhikkhave, tathaagato baahulliko, na padhaanavibbhanto, na aavatto baahullaaya; araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami ^a^V0.0013^ea^, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m ^a^T1.0017^ea^ -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.thevadhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa''ti. dutiyampi kho pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m...pe0.... dutiyampi kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca...pe0.... tatiyampi kho pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``taayapi ^a^P1.0010^ea^ kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya, taaya pa.tipadaaya, taaya dukkarakaarikaaya nevajjhagaa uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi, baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto ^a^M0.0014^ea^ aavatto baahullaaya, adhigamissasi uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa''nti? eva.m vutte bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``abhijaanaatha me no tumhe, bhikkhave, ito pubbe evaruupa.m pabhaavitameta''nti {bhaasitametanti (sii0 syaa0 ka0) .tiikaayo oloketabbaa}? ``noheta.m, bhante''. araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho, odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.mbrahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.thevadhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaati. asakkhi kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m. atha kho pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m sussuusi.msu, sota.m odahi.msu, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapesu.m.
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]``{sa.m0 ni0 5.1081 aadayo} dveme, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0018^ea^, antaa pabbajitena na sevitabbaa. katame dve {ida.m padadvaya.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi}? yo caaya.m kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogo hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, yo caaya.m attakilamathaanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasa.mhito. ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``ida.m ^a^V0.0014^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m. jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, byaadhipi dukkho, mara.nampi dukkha.m, appiyehi sampayogo ^a^T1.0019^ea^ dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. sa.mkhittena, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa ^a^M0.0015^ea^ {pa~ncupaadaanakhandhaapi (ka)} dukkhaa. ``ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m {ettha ``ida.m dukkha.m ariyasaccanti aadiisu dukkhasamudayo dukkhanirodhoti vattabbe dukkhasamudaya.m dukkhanirodhanti li"ngavipallaaso tato''ti pa.tisambhidaamagga.t.thakathaaya.m vutta.m. visuddhimagga.tiikaaya.m pana uppaado bhayantipaa.thava.n.nanaaya.m ``satipi dvinna.m padaana.m samaanaadhikara.nabhaave li"ngabhedo gahito, yathaa dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca''nti vutta.m. tesu dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca''nti sakali"ngikapaa.tho ``dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca''nti paa.liyaa sameti.} ariyasacca.m -- yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (ka0)} nandiiraagasahagataa {nandiraagasahagataa (sii0 syaa0)} tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa.

[03]``ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m -- yo tassaa yeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho, caago, pa.tinissaggo, mutti, anaalayo. ``ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m -- ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``ida.m ^a^P1.0011^ea^ dukkha.m ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi ^a^T1.0020^ea^, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pari~n~neyyanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pari~n~naatanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03]``ida.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m pahaatabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m pahiinanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03]``ida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko ^a^M0.0016^ea^ udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m sacchikaatabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m ^a^V0.0015^ea^ kho panida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m sacchikatanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03]``ida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m bhaavetabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m bhaavitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m ^a^T1.0021^ea^ udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``yaavakiiva~nca me, bhikkhave, imesu catuusu ariyasaccesu eva.m tipariva.t.ta.m dvaadasaakaara.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m na suvisuddha.m ahosi, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catuusu ariyasaccesu eva.m tipariva.t.ta.m dvaadasaakaara.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m suvisuddha.m ahosi, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti {abhisambuddho (sii0 syaa0)} pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa attamanaa pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti {idamavoca...pe0... abhinanduntivaakya.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi}.

[03]imasmi~nca ^a^T1.0022^ea^ pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane aayasmato ko.n.da~n~nassa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ pavattite ^a^M0.0017^ea^ ca pana bhagavataa dhammacakke, bhummaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- ``eta.m bhagavataa baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye ^a^P1.0012^ea^ anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m, appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. bhummaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa caatumahaaraajikaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m...pe0... caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa taavati.msaa devaa...pe0... yaamaa devaa...pe0... tusitaa devaa...pe0... nimmaanaratii ^a^V0.0016^ea^ devaa...pe0... paranimmitavasavattii devaa...pe0... brahmakaayikaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- ``eta.m bhagavataa baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. itiha, tena kha.nena, tena layena {tena layenaati padadvaya.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi} tena muhuttena yaava brahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchi. aya~nca dasasahassilokadhaatu sa.mkampi sampakampi sampavedhi ^a^T1.0023^ea^; appamaa.no ca u.laaro obhaaso loke paaturahosi, atikkamma devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. atha kho bhagavaa ima.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``a~n~naasi vata, bho ko.n.da~n~no, a~n~naasi vata bho ko.n.da~n~no''ti. iti hida.m aayasmato ko.n.da~n~nassa `a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no' tveva naama.m ahosi.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, cara brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tassa aayasmato upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa tadavasese bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadi anusaasi. atha kho aayasmato ca vappassa aayasmato ca bhaddiyassa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadiyamaanaana.m anusaasiyamaanaana.m viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti.

[03]te ^a^M0.0018^ea^ di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane ^a^T1.0024^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha ^a^P1.0013^ea^ brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa tadavasese bhikkhuu niihaarabhatto dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadi anusaasi. ya.m tayo bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa aaharanti, tena chabbaggo yaapeti. atha kho aayasmato ca mahaanaamassa aayasmato ca assajissa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya ovadiyamaanaana.m anusaasiyamaanaana.m viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti ^a^V0.0017^ea^. te di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] {sa.m0 ni0 3.59 aadayo} ``ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa. ruupa~nca hida.m, bhikkhave, attaa abhavissa, nayida.m ruupa.m aabaadhaaya sa.mvatteyya, labbhetha ca ruupe -- `eva.m me ruupa.m ^a^T1.0025^ea^ hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii'ti. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupa.m anattaa, tasmaa ruupa.m aabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ca labbhati ruupe -- `eva.m me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii'ti. vedanaa, anattaa. vedanaa ca hida.m, bhikkhave, attaa abhavissa, nayida.m vedanaa aabaadhaaya sa.mvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanaaya -- `eva.m me vedanaa hotu, eva.m me vedanaa maa ahosii'ti. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, vedanaa anattaa, tasmaa vedanaa aabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ca labbhati vedanaaya -- `eva.m me vedanaa hotu, eva.m me vedanaa maa ahosii'ti. sa~n~naa, anattaa. sa~n~naa ca hida.m, bhikkhave, attaa abhavissa, nayida.m sa~n~naa aabaadhaaya sa.mvatteyya, labbhetha ^a^M0.0019^ea^ ca sa~n~naaya -- `eva.m me sa~n~naa hotu, eva.m me sa~n~naa maa ahosii'ti. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa anattaa, tasmaa sa~n~naa aabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ca labbhati sa~n~naaya -- `eva.m me sa~n~naa hotu, eva.m me sa~n~naa maa ahosii'ti. sa"nkhaaraa, anattaa. sa"nkhaaraa ca hida.m, bhikkhave, attaa abhavissa.msu, nayida.m {nayime (ka0)} sa"nkhaaraa aabaadhaaya sa.mvatteyyu.m, labbhetha ca sa"nkhaaresu -- `eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa hontu, eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa maa ahesu'nti. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, tasmaa sa"nkhaaraa aabaadhaaya sa.mvattanti, na ca labbhati sa"nkhaaresu -- `eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa hontu, eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa maa ahesu'nti. vi~n~naa.na.m, anattaa. vi~n~naa.na~nca hida.m ^a^T1.0026^ea^, bhikkhave, attaa abhavissa, nayida.m vi~n~naa.na.m aabaadhaaya sa.mvatteyya ^a^P1.0014^ea^, labbhetha ca vi~n~naa.ne -- `eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m hotu, eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m maa ahosii'ti. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa, tasmaa vi~n~naa.na.m aabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ca labbhati vi~n~naa.ne -- `eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m hotu, eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m maa ahosii'ti.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaati? anicca.m, bhante ^a^V0.0018^ea^. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati? dukkha.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati? no heta.m, bhante. vedanaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaati? aniccaa, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati? dukkha.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati? no heta.m, bhante. sa~n~naa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaati? aniccaa, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati? dukkha.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati? no heta.m, bhante. sa"nkhaaraa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaati? aniccaa, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati? dukkha.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m ^a^T1.0027^ea^ vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati? no heta.m, bhante. vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaati? anicca.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaati? dukkha.m, bhante. ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaati? no heta.m, bhante.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha ^a^M0.0020^ea^, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure {ya.m duure vaa (syaa0)} santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m -- neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaati -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, sabbaa vedanaa -- neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaati -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci sa~n~naa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, sabbaa sa~n~naa -- neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaati -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa ^a^T1.0028^ea^ vaa pa.niitaa vaa ye duure santike vaa, sabbe sa"nkhaaraa -- neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaati -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m -- neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaati -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^V0.0019^ea^ passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati; nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti {abhinandu.m (syaa0)}. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane pa~ncavaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu. tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto honti.
[06] pa~ncavaggiyakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0015^ea^ ^a^M0.0021^ea^ kho pana samayena baaraa.nasiya.m yaso naama kulaputto se.t.thiputto sukhumaalo hoti. tassa tayo paasaadaa honti -- eko ^a^T1.0029^ea^ hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko. so vassike paasaade cattaaro maase {vassike paasaade vassike cattaaro maase (sii0)} nippurisehi tuuriyehi paricaarayamaano na he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohati. atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitassa sama"ngiibhuutassa paricaarayamaanassa pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0)} niddaa okkami, parijanassapi niddaa okkami, sabbarattiyo ca telapadiipo jhaayati. atha kho yaso kulaputto pa.tikacceva pabujjhitvaa addasa saka.m parijana.m supanta.m -- a~n~nissaa kacche vii.na.m, a~n~nissaa ka.n.the mudi"nga.m, a~n~nissaa kacche aa.lambara.m, a~n~na.m vikesika.m, a~n~na.m vikkhe.lika.m, a~n~naa vippalapantiyo, hatthappatta.m susaana.m ma~n~ne. disvaanassa aadiinavo paaturahosi, nibbidaaya citta.m sa.n.thaasi. atha kho yaso kulaputto udaana.m udaanesi -- ``upadduta.m vata bho, upassa.t.tha.m vata bho''ti.

[03]atha kho yaso kulaputto suva.n.napaadukaayo aarohitvaa yena nivesanadvaara.m tenupasa"nkami. amanussaa dvaara.m vivari.msu -- maa yasassa kulaputtassa koci antaraayamakaasi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaati ^a^T1.0030^ea^. atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvaara.m tenupasa"nkami. amanussaa dvaara.m ^a^V0.0020^ea^ vivari.msu -- maa yasassa kulaputtassa koci antaraayamakaasi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaati. atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatana.m migadaayo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ajjhokaase ca"nkamati. addasaa kho bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana ca"nkamaa orohitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato aviduure udaana.m udaanesi -- ``upadduta.m vata bho, upassa.t.tha.m vata bho''ti. atha kho bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m kho, yasa, anupadduta.m, ida.m anupassa.t.tha.m. ehi yasa, nisiida, dhamma.m te desessaamii''ti. atha kho yaso kulaputto -- ida.m kira anupadduta.m ^a^M0.0022^ea^, ida.m anupassa.t.thanti ha.t.tho udaggo suva.n.napaadukaahi orohitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi ^a^P1.0016^ea^ yasa.m kulaputta.m kallacitta.m, muducitta.m, viniivara.nacitta.m, udaggacitta.m, pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0031^ea^ naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa maataa paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa yasa.m kulaputta.m apassantii yena se.t.thi gahapati tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``putto te, gahapati, yaso na dissatii''ti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati catuddisaa assaduute uyyojetvaa saama.myeva yena isipatana.m migadaayo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho se.t.thi gahapati suva.n.napaadukaana.m nikkhepa.m, disvaana ta.myeva anugamaasi {anugamaa (sii0 syaa0)}. addasaa kho bhagavaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhareyya.m yathaa se.t.thi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinna.m yasa.m kulaputta.m na passeyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharesi. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``api, bhante, bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m passeyyaa''ti? tena hi, gahapati, nisiida, appeva naama idha nisinno idha nisinna.m yasa.m kulaputta.m passeyyaasiiti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati -- idheva kiraaha.m nisinno idha nisinna.m ^a^T1.0032^ea^ yasa.m kulaputta.m ^a^V0.0021^ea^ passissaamiiti ha.t.tho udaggo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho se.t.thissa gahapatissa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m ^a^M0.0023^ea^ pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi se.t.thi.m gahapati.m kallacitta.m, muducitta.m, viniivara.nacitta.m, udaggacitta.m, pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya evameva se.t.thissa gahapatissa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante, seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m {nikujjita.m (ka0)} vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti ^a^T1.0033^ea^. sova loke pa.thama.m upaasako ahosi tevaaciko ^a^P1.0017^ea^.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamaane yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamaane yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m. abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto; ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m pa.tippassambheyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m pa.tippassambhesi. addasaa kho se.t.thi gahapati yasa.m kulaputta.m nisinna.m, disvaana yasa.m kulaputta.m etadavoca -- ``maataa te taata, yasa, parideva {paridevii (ka0)} sokasamaapannaa, dehi maatuyaa jiivita''nti. atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavanta.m ullokesi. atha kho bhagavaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, yassa sekkhena ~naa.nena sekkhena dassanena dhammo di.t.tho vidito seyyathaapi tayaa? tassa yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya ^a^M0.0024^ea^ aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m. bhabbo nu kho so, gahapati, hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasassa kho, gahapati, kulaputtassa sekkhena ~naa.nena sekkhena dassanena ^a^T1.0034^ea^ dhammo di.t.tho vidito seyyathaapi tayaa. tassa yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi ^a^V0.0022^ea^ citta.m vimutta.m. abhabbo kho, gahapati, yaso kulaputto hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto''ti. ``laabhaa, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, suladdha.m, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, yathaa yasassa kulaputtassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m. adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa ajjatanaaya bhatta.m yasena kulaputtena pacchaasama.nenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante se.t.thimhi gahapatimhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, cara brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava ^a^P1.0018^ea^ tassa aayasmato upasampadaa ahosi. tena kho pana samayena satta loke arahanto honti.
[06] yasassa pabbajjaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0035^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa yasena pacchaasama.nena yena se.t.thissa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato yasassa maataa ca puraa.nadutiyikaa ca yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. taasa.m bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa taa bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacittaa, muducittaa, viniivara.nacittaa, udaggacittaa, pasannacittaa, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m ^a^M0.0025^ea^. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva taasa.m tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. taa di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... etaa maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m ^a^T1.0036^ea^ sara.na.m gacchaama, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasikaayo no bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupetaa sara.na.m gataa''ti. taa ca loke pa.thama.m upaasikaa ahesu.m tevaacikaa.

[03]atha kho aayasmato yasassa maataa ca pitaa ca puraa.nadutiyikaa ca bhagavanta~nca aayasmanta~nca yasa.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa, bhagavanta.m ^a^V0.0023^ea^ bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m, ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato yasassa maatara~nca pitara~nca puraa.nadutiyika~nca dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

yattha yaso kulaputto kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti. te {te cattaaro janaa (ka0)} yenaayasmaa yaso tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa [03] 32^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu aamantesi {sa.m0 ni0 1.141 maarasa.myuttepi} -- ``muttaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbapaasehi, ye ^a^V0.0025^ea^ dibbaa ye ca maanusaa. tumhepi, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0021^ea^, muttaa sabbapaasehi, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa. caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. maa ekena dve agamittha. desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m ^a^T1.0040^ea^ sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa ^a^M0.0028^ea^, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro. ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvelaa senaanigamo tenupasa"nkamissaami dhammadesanaayaa''ti.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu naanaadisaa naanaajanapadaa pabbajjaapekkhe ca upasampadaapekkhe ^a^V0.0026^ea^ ca aanenti -- bhagavaa ne pabbaajessati ^a^T1.0041^ea^ upasampaadessatiiti. tattha bhikkhuu ceva kilamanti pabbajjaapekkhaa ca upasampadaapekkhaa ca. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``etarahi kho bhikkhuu naanaadisaa naanaajanapadaa pabbajjaapekkhe ca upasampadaapekkhe ca aanenti -- bhagavaa ne pabbaajessati ^a^M0.0029^ea^ upasampaadessatiiti. tattha bhikkhuu ceva kilamanti pabbajjaapekkhaa ca upasampadaapekkhaa ca. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m anujaaneyya.m -- tumheva daani, bhikkhave, taasu taasu disaasu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbaajetha upasampaadethaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0022^ea^ aamantesi -- ``idha mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `etarahi kho bhikkhuu naanaadisaa naanaajanapadaa pabbajjaapekkhe ca upasampadaapekkhe ca aanenti bhagavaa ne pabbaajessati upasampaadessatiiti, tattha bhikkhuu ceva kilamanti pabbajjaapekkhaa ca upasampadaapekkhaa ca, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m anujaaneyya.m tumheva daani, bhikkhave, taasu taasu disaasu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbaajetha upasampaadethaa'''ti, anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tumheva daani taasu taasu disaasu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbaajetha upasampaadetha. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, pabbaajetabbo upasampaadetabbo --

[03]pa.thama.m kesamassu.m ohaaraapetvaa ^a^T1.0042^ea^ {ohaaretvaa (ka0)}, kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadaapetvaa, eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa, bhikkhuuna.m paade vandaapetvaa, ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa, a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa, eva.m vadehiiti vattabbo -- buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; dutiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; tatiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaamii''ti. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi tiihi sara.nagamanehi pabbajja.m upasampada''nti.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0023^ea^ kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena uruvelaa tena caarika.m pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~nataro vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena ti.msamattaa bhaddavaggiyaa sahaayakaa sapajaapatikaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de paricaarenti. ekassa pajaapati naahosi; tassa atthaaya vesii aaniitaa ahosi. atha kho saa vesii tesu pamattesu paricaarentesu bha.n.da.m aadaaya palaayittha. atha kho te sahaayakaa sahaayakassa veyyaavacca.m karontaa, ta.m itthi.m gavesantaa, ta.m vanasa.n.da.m aahi.n.dantaa addasa.msu bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``api, bhante, bhagavaa eka.m itthi.m passeyyaa''ti? [03] 37^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena uruvelaa tadavasari. tena kho pana samayena uruvelaaya.m tayo ja.tilaa pa.tivasanti -- uruvelakassapo, nadiikassapo, gayaakassapoti. tesu uruvelakassapo ^a^M0.0032^ea^ ja.tilo pa~ncanna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti, vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho. nadiikassapo ja.tilo ti.n.na.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti, vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho. gayaakassapo ja.tilo dvinna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti, vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho. atha kho bhagavaa yena uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, kassapa ^a^V0.0029^ea^, agaru, vaseyyaama ekaratta.m agyaagaare''ti? ``na kho me, mahaasama.na, garu, ca.n.dettha naagaraajaa iddhimaa aasiviso ^a^T1.0046^ea^ ghoraviso, so ta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyaama ekaratta.m agyaagaare''ti? ``na kho me, mahaasama.na, garu, ca.n.dettha naagaraajaa iddhimaa aasiviso ghoraviso, so ta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyaama ekaratta.m agyaagaare''ti? ``na kho me, mahaasama.na, garu, ca.n.dettha naagaraajaa iddhimaa aasiviso ghoraviso, so ta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti. ``appeva ma.m na vihe.theyya, i"ngha tva.m, kassapa, anujaanaahi agyaagaara''nti. ``vihara, mahaasama.na, yathaasukha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa agyaagaara.m pavisitvaa ti.nasanthaaraka.m pa~n~napetvaa nisiidi palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0026^ea^ kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa assamassa aviduure ^a^T1.0049^ea^ a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de vihaasi. atha kho cattaaro mahaaraajaano abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa catuddisaa a.t.tha.msu seyyathaapi mahantaa aggikkhandhaa. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m. ke nu kho te, mahaasama.na, abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena tva.m tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^M0.0035^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m abhivaadetvaa catuddisaa a.t.tha.msu ``seyyathaapi mahantaa aggikkhandhaa''ti. ``ete kho, kassapa, cattaaro mahaaraajaano yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu dhammassavanaayaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cattaaropi mahaaraajaano upasa"nkamissanti dhammassavanaaya, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ atha kho sakko devaanamindo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0050^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho, purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena ^a^V0.0032^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m. ko nu kho so, mahaasama.na, abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena tva.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho, purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``eso kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami dhammassavanaayaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama sakkopi ^a^P1.0027^ea^ devaanamindo upasa"nkamissati dhammassavanaaya, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito hoti, kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya abhikkamitukaamaa honti ^a^V0.0033^ea^. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito, kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya abhikkamissanti. sace mahaasama.no mahaajanakaaye iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati ^a^T1.0052^ea^, mahaasama.nassa laabhasakkaaro abhiva.d.dhissati, mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati. aho nuuna mahaasama.no svaatanaaya naagaccheyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ^a^P1.0028^ea^ ja.tilassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya uttarakuru.m gantvaa tato pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa anotattadahe paribhu~njitvaa tattheva divaavihaara.m akaasi. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa ^a^M0.0037^ea^ rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m. ki.m nu kho, mahaasama.na, hiyyo naagamaasi? api ca maya.m ta.m saraama -- ki.m nu kho mahaasama.no naagacchatiiti? khaadaniiyassa ca bhojaniiyassa ca te pa.tiviiso {pa.tivi.mso (sii0), pa.tiviso (syaa0)} .thapito''ti. nanu te, kassapa, etadahosi -- ```etarahi kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito, kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya abhikkamissanti, sace mahaasama.no mahaajanakaaye iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, mahaasama.nassa laabhasakkaaro abhiva.d.dhissati, mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati, aho nuuna mahaasama.no svaatanaaya naagaccheyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, kassapa, tava cetasaa cetoparivitakka.m a~n~naaya uttarakuru.m gantvaa tato pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa anotattadahe paribhu~njitvaa tattheva divaavihaara.m akaasi''nti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cetasaapi citta.m pajaanissati ^a^T1.0053^ea^, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.
[06] pa~ncama.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pa.msukuula.m uppanna.m hoti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m dhoveyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya paa.ninaa pokkhara.ni.m kha.nitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, bhagavaa pa.msukuula.m dhovatuu''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m parimaddeyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- idha, bhante, bhagavaa pa.msukuula.m parimaddatuuti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m {aha.m pa.msukuula.m (ka0)} aalambitvaa ^a^V0.0034^ea^ uttareyya''nti? atha kho kakudhe adhivatthaa devataa bhagavato ^a^M0.0038^ea^ cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya saakha.m onaamesi -- idha, bhante, bhagavaa aalambitvaa ^a^P1.0029^ea^ uttaratuuti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m vissajjeyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- idha, bhante, bhagavaa pa.msukuula.m vissajjetuuti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo ^a^T1.0054^ea^, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m. ki.m nu kho, mahaasama.na, naaya.m pubbe idha pokkhara.nii, saaya.m idha pokkhara.nii. nayimaa silaa pubbe upanikkhittaa. kenimaa silaa upanikkhittaa? atha kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya paa.ninaa pokkhara.ni.m kha.nitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, bhagavaa pa.msukuula.m dhovatuu''ti. saaya.m kassapa amanussena paa.ninaa kha.nitaa pokkhara.nii. tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m parimaddeyya''nti? atha kho, kassapa, kakudhe adhivatthaa devataa j mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya saakha.m onaamesi -- ``idha, bhante, bhagavaa aalambitvaa uttarajtuu''ti. svaaya.m aaharahattho kakudho. tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m vissajjeyya''nti? [03]atha ^a^M0.0039^ea^ kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato ^a^P1.0030^ea^ kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. ``gaccha tva.m, kassapa, aayaamaha''nti uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa ^a^V0.0035^ea^ `jambudiipo' pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m agyaagaare nisinna.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamena tva.m, mahaasama.na, maggena aagato? aha.m tayaa pa.thamatara.m pakkanto, so tva.m pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno''ti. ``idhaaha.m, kassapa, ta.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa `jambudiipo' pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno. ida.m kho, kassapa, jambuphala.m va.n.nasampanna.m gandhasampanna.m rasasampanna.m. sace aaka"nkhasi paribhu~njaa''ti. ``ala.m, mahaasama.na, tva.myeva ta.m arahasi ^a^T1.0056^ea^, tva.myeva ta.m {tva.myeveta.m aaharasi, tva.myeveta.m (sii0 syaa0)} paribhu~njaahii''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ma.m pa.thamatara.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa `jambudiipo' pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. gaccha tva.m, kassapa, aayaamahanti uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa `jambudiipo' pa~n~naayati, tassaa aviduure ambo...pe0... tassaa aviduure aamalakii...pe0... tassaa aviduure hariitakii...pe0... taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m agyaagaare nisinna.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamena tva.m, mahaasama.na, maggena aagato? aha.m tayaa pa.thamatara.m pakkanto, so tva.m pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno''ti. ``idhaaha.m ^a^M0.0040^ea^, kassapa, ta.m uyyojetvaa taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno. ida.m kho, kassapa, paaricchattakapuppha.m ^a^T1.0057^ea^ va.n.nasampanna.m gandhasampanna.m {sugandhika.m (ka0)}. (sace aaka"nkhasi ga.nhaa''ti. ``ala.m, mahaasama.na, tva.myeva ta.m arahasi, tva.myeva ta.m ga.nhaa''ti) {( ) sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi}. ^a^P1.0031^ea^ atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ma.m pa.thamatara.m uyyojetvaa taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritukaamaa na sakkonti ka.t.thaani phaaletu.m ^a^V0.0036^ea^. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo, yathaa maya.m na sakkoma ka.t.thaani phaaletu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``phaaliyantu, kassapa, ka.t.thaanii''ti. ``phaaliyantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca ka.t.thasataani phaaliyi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ka.t.thaanipi phaaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritukaamaa na sakkonti aggi.m ujjaletu.m {jaaletu.m (sii0), ujjalitu.m (ka0)}. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo, yathaa maya.m na sakkoma aggi.m ^a^T1.0058^ea^ ujjaletu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``ujjaliyantu, kassapa, aggii''ti. ``ujjaliyantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca aggisataani ujjaliyi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama aggiipi ujjaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritvaa na sakkonti aggi.m vijjhaapetu.m. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo, yathaa maya.m na sakkoma aggi.m vijjhaapetu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca ^a^M0.0041^ea^ -- ``vijjhaayantu, kassapa, aggii''ti. ``vijjhaayantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca aggisataani vijjhaayi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama aggiipi vijjhaayissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa siitaasu hemantikaasu rattiisu antara.t.thakaasu himapaatasamaye najjaa nera~njaraaya ummujjantipi, nimujjantipi, ummujjananimujjanampi karonti. atha kho bhagavaa pa~ncamattaani mandaamukhisataani abhinimmini, yattha te ja.tilaa uttaritvaa visibbesu.m ^a^P1.0032^ea^. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho ^a^T1.0059^ea^ mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo, yathayimaa mandaamukhiyo nimmitaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama taava bahuu mandaamukhiyopi abhinimminissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0037^ea^ kho pana samayena mahaa akaalamegho paavassi, mahaa udakavaahako sa~njaayi. yasmi.m padese bhagavaa viharati, so padeso udakena na ottha.to {udakena ottha.to (sii0 syaa0)} hoti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkami. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo -- maaheva kho mahaasama.no udakena vuu.lho ahosiiti naavaaya sambahulehi ja.tilehi saddhi.m yasmi.m padese bhagavaa viharati ta.m padesa.m agamaasi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkamanta.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu tva.m, mahaasama.naa''ti? ``ayamahamasmi {aama ahamasmi (syaa0)}, kassapaa''ti bhagavaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa naavaaya paccu.t.thaasi. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama udakampi na pavaahissati {nappasahissati (sii0)}, na ^a^T1.0060^ea^ tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0042^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa eva.m bhavissati -- `mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha'nti; ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m ja.tila.m sa.mvejeyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``neva ca kho tva.m, kassapa, arahaa, naapi arahattamaggasamaapanno. saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assasi, arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. tva.m khosi, kassapa, pa~ncanna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho. tepi taava apalokehi, yathaa te ma~n~nissanti tathaa te karissantiiti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo yena te ja.tilaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te ja.tile etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m ^a^P1.0033^ea^, bho, mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m caritu.m, yathaa bhavanto ma~n~nanti tathaa karontuu''ti. ``cirapa.tikaa maya.m, bho, mahaasama.ne abhippasannaa, sace bhava.m, mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissati, sabbeva maya.m mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissaamaa''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama ^a^T1.0061^ea^ maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ addasaa ^a^V0.0038^ea^ kho nadiikassapo ja.tilo kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake vuyhamaane, disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``maaheva me bhaatuno upasaggo ahosii''ti. ja.tile paahesi -- gacchatha me bhaatara.m jaanaathaati. saama~nca tiihi ja.tilasatehi saddhi.m yenaayasmaa uruvelakassapo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m uruvelakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu kho, kassapa, seyyo''ti? ``aamaavuso, ida.m seyyo''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa ^a^M0.0043^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho gayaakassapo ja.tilo kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake vuyhamaane, disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``maaheva me bhaatuuna.m upasaggo ahosii''ti. ja.tile paahesi ^a^T1.0062^ea^ -- gacchatha me bhaataro jaanaathaati. saama~nca dviihi ja.tilasatehi saddhi.m yenaayasmaa uruvelakassapo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m uruvelakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu kho, kassapa, seyyo''ti? ``aamaavuso, ida.m seyyo''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu ^a^P1.0034^ea^ sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[02] bhagavato adhi.t.thaanena pa~nca ka.t.thasataani na phaaliyi.msu, phaaliyi.msu; aggii na ujjaliyi.msu, ujjaliyi.msu; na vijjhaayi.msu, vijjhaayi.msu; pa~ncamandaamukhisataani abhinimmini. etena nayena a.d.dhu.d.dhapaa.tihaariyasahassaani honti.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena gayaasiisa.m tena pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva puraa.naja.tilehi. tatra suda.m bhagavaa gayaaya.m viharati gayaasiise saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]{sa.m0 ni0 4.29} ``sabba.m ^a^M0.0044^ea^ ^a^V0.0039^ea^, bhikkhave, aaditta.m. ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m aaditta.m? cakkhu ^a^T1.0063^ea^ aaditta.m, ruupaa aadittaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, cakkhusamphasso aaditto, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami. sota.m aaditta.m, saddaa aadittaa, sotavi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, sotasamphasso aaditto, yamida.m sotasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami. ghaana.m aaditta.m, gandhaa aadittaa, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, ghaanasamphasso aaditto, yamida.m ghaanasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami. jivhaa aadittaa, rasaa aadittaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m jivhaasamphasso aaditto, yamida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami. kaayo aaditto, pho.t.thabbaa aadittaa, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m kaayasamphasso aaditto, yamida.m kaayasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami. mano aaditto, dhammaa aadittaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m manosamphasso aaditto, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami.

[03]``eva.m ^a^M0.0045^ea^ passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, tasmimpi nibbindati. sotasmimpi ^a^T1.0064^ea^ nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati...pe0... ghaanasmimpi nibbindati ^a^P1.0035^ea^ ^a^V0.0040^ea^, gandhesupi nibbindati...pe0... jivhaayapi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati...pe0... kaayasmimpi nibbindati, pho.t.thabbesupi nibbindati...pe0... manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati, nibbinda.m virajjati, viraagaa vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa gayaasiise yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami, mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva puraa.naja.tilehi. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati la.t.thivane {la.t.thivanuyyaane (syaa0)} suppati.t.the cetiye. assosi kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro -- sama.no khalu ^a^T1.0065^ea^ bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito raajagaha.m anuppatto raajagahe viharati la.t.thivane suppati.t.the cetiye. ta.m kho pana bhagavanta.m {bhavanta.m (ka0)} gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa {bhagavaati (ka0)}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m ^a^M0.0046^ea^ sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotiiti.

[03]atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro dvaadasanahutehi {dvaadasaniyutehi (yojanaa)} maagadhikehi braahma.nagahapatikehi ^a^V0.0041^ea^ parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. tepi kho dvaadasanahutaa maagadhikaa braahma.nagahapatikaa ^a^P1.0036^ea^ appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho tesa.m dvaadasanahutaana.m {dvaadasaniyutaana.m (yojanaa)} maagadhikaana.m ^a^T1.0066^ea^ braahma.nagahapatikaana.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho mahaasama.no uruvelakassape brahmacariya.m carati, udaahu uruvelakassapo mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m caratii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa tesa.m dvaadasanahutaana.m maagadhikaana.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya aayasmanta.m uruvelakassapa.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
