[03] 56^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa uruvelakassapo u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhagavato ^a^V0.0042^ea^ paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmi; satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmii''ti. atha kho tesa.m dvaadasanahutaana.m maagadhikaana.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m etadahosi -- ``uruvelakassapo mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m caratii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tesa.m dvaadasanahutaana.m maagadhikaana.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m cetasaa ^a^P1.0037^ea^ cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa te bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitte muducitte viniivara.nacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva ekaadasanahutaana.m maagadhikaana.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m bimbisaarappamukhaana.m tasmi.m yeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. ekanahuta.m upaasakatta.m ^a^T1.0068^ea^ pa.tivedesi.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pubbe me, bhante, kumaarassa sato pa~nca assaasakaa ahesu.m, te me etarahi samiddhaa. pubbe me, bhante, kumaarassa sato etadahosi -- `aho vata ma.m rajje abhisi~nceyyu'nti, aya.m kho me, bhante, pa.thamo assaasako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho. `tassa ca me vijita.m araha.m sammaasambuddho okkameyyaa'ti, aya.m kho me, bhante, dutiyo assaasako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho. `ta~ncaaha.m bhagavanta.m payirupaaseyya'nti, aya.m kho me, bhante, tatiyo ^a^M0.0048^ea^ assaasako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho. `so ca me bhagavaa dhamma.m deseyyaa'ti, aya.m kho me, bhante, catuttho assaasako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho. `tassa caaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m aajaaneyya'nti, aya.m kho me, bhante, pa~ncamo assaasako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho. pubbe me, bhante, kumaarassa sato ime pa~nca assaasakaa ahesu.m, te me etarahi samiddhaa. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante, seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya cakkhumanto ^a^T1.0069^ea^ ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m {ma.m bhante (ka0)}, bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m, adhivaasetu ca me, bhante, bhagavaa ^a^P1.0038^ea^, svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti ^a^V0.0043^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m paavisi mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva puraa.naja.tilehi. tena kho pana samayena sakko devaanamindo maa.navakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa purato purato gacchati imaa gaathaayo gaayamaano --

[03]manussaa ^a^V0.0044^ea^ sakka.m devaanaminda.m passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``abhiruupo vataaya.m maa.navako, dassaniiyo vataaya.m maa.navako, paasaadiko vataaya.m maa.navako. kassa nu kho aya.m maa.navako''ti? eva.m vutte sakko devaanamindo te manusse gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa yena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane ^a^T1.0071^ea^ nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa ^a^P1.0039^ea^ kho ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etadahosi {cuu.lava0 307} -- ``kattha nu kho bhagavaa vihareyya? ya.m assa gaamato neva aviduure na accaasanne, gamanaagamanasampanna.m, atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m abhikkamaniiya.m, divaa appaaki.n.na.m {appaki.n.na.m (sii0 syaa0), abbhoki.n.na.m (ka0)}, ratti.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m vijanavaata.m, manussaraahasseyyaka.m, pa.tisallaanasaaruppa''nti. atha kho ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho amhaaka.m ve.luvana.m uyyaana.m gaamato neva aviduure na accaasanne gamanaagamanasampanna.m ^a^M0.0050^ea^ atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m abhikkamaniiya.m divaa appaaki.n.na.m ratti.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m vijanavaata.m manussaraahasseyyaka.m pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ve.luvana.m uyyaana.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dadeyya''nti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sova.n.namaya.m bhi"nkaara.m gahetvaa bhagavato o.nojesi -- ``etaaha.m, bhante, ve.luvana.m uyyaana.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dammii''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa aaraama.m. atha ^a^T1.0072^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aaraama''nti.
[06] bimbisaarasamaagamakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0045^ea^ kho pana samayena sa~ncayo {sa~njayo (sii0 syaa0)} paribbaajako raajagahe pa.tivasati mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m a.d.dhateyyehi paribbaajakasatehi. tena kho pana samayena saariputtamoggallaanaa sa~ncaye paribbaajake brahmacariya.m caranti. tehi katikaa kataa hoti -- yo pa.thama.m amata.m adhigacchati, so itarassa aarocetuuti. atha kho aayasmaa assaji pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena aalokitena vilokitena sami~njitena pasaaritena, okkhittacakkhu iriyaapathasampanno. addasaa kho saariputto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m assaji.m raajagahe pi.n.daaya caranta.m paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena aalokitena vilokitena sami~njitena pasaaritena okkhittacakkhu.m iriyaapathasampanna.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``ye vata loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa, aya.m tesa.m bhikkhu a~n~nataro. ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^P1.0040^ea^ ima.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M0.0051^ea^ puccheyya.m -- `ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii'''ti? atha ^a^T1.0073^ea^ kho saariputtassa paribbaajakassa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho ima.m bhikkhu.m pucchitu.m, antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho pi.n.daaya carati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m bhikkhu.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandheyya.m, atthikehi upa~n~naata.m magga''nti. atha kho aayasmaa assaji raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya pa.tikkami. atha kho saariputtopi paribbaajako yenaayasmaa assaji tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa assajinaa saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho saariputto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m assaji.m etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii''ti? ``atthaavuso, mahaasama.no sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito, taaha.m bhagavanta.m uddissa pabbajito, so ca me bhagavaa satthaa, tassa caaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m rocemii''ti. ``ki.mvaadii panaayasmato satthaa, kimakkhaayii''ti? ``aha.m kho, aavuso, navo acirapabbajito, adhunaagato ima.m dhammavinaya.m, na taaha.m sakkomi vitthaarena dhamma.m desetu.m, api ca te sa.mkhittena attha.m vakkhaamii''ti. atha kho saariputto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m assaji.m etadavoca -- ``hotu, aavuso --
[21] ``appa.m ^a^T1.0074^ea^ vaa bahu.m vaa bhaasassu, attha.myeva me bruuhi.
[22] attheneva me attho, ki.m kaahasi bya~njana.m bahu''nti..
[03]atha ^a^V0.0046^ea^ kho aayasmaa assaji saariputtassa paribbaajakassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m abhaasi --
[21] {apa0 1.1.286 theraapadaanepi} ``ye dhammaa hetuppabhavaa, tesa.m hetu.m tathaagato aaha.
[22] tesa~nca yo nirodho, eva.mvaadii mahaasama.no''ti..
[03]atha kho saariputtassa paribbaajakassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.
[21] {apa0 1.1.289 theraapadaanepi} eseva ^a^M0.0052^ea^ dhammo yadi taavadeva, paccabyattha padamasoka.m.
[22] adi.t.tha.m abbhatiita.m, bahukehi kappanahutehiiti..

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ atha kho saariputto paribbaajako yena moggallaano paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho moggallaano paribbaajako saariputta.m paribbaajaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana saariputta.m ^a^P1.0041^ea^ paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. kacci nu tva.m, aavuso, amata.m adhigato''ti? ``aamaavuso, amata.m adhigato''ti. ``yathaakatha.m pana tva.m, aavuso, amata.m adhigato''ti? ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, addasa.m assaji.m ^a^T1.0075^ea^ bhikkhu.m raajagahe pi.n.daaya caranta.m paasaadikena abhikkantena pa.tikkantena aalokitena vilokitena sami~njitena pasaaritena okkhittacakkhu.m iriyaapathasampanna.m. disvaana me etadahosi -- `ye vata loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa, aya.m tesa.m bhikkhu a~n~nataro. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccheyya.m -- ka.msi tva.m, aavuso uddissa pabbajito, ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii'''ti. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho ima.m bhikkhu.m pucchitu.m antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho pi.n.daaya carati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m bhikkhu.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandheyya.m atthikehi upa~n~naata.m magga''nti. atha kho, aavuso, assaji bhikkhu raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya pa.tikkami. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami.m, upasa"nkamitvaa assajinaa bhikkhunaa saddhi.m sammodi.m, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.m. ekamanta.m .thito kho aha.m, aavuso, assaji.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. `ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii'''ti? `atthaavuso, mahaasama.no sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito, taaha.m bhagavanta.m uddissa ^a^V0.0047^ea^ pabbajito, so ca me bhagavaa satthaa, tassa caaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m rocemii'ti. `ki.mvaadii panaayasmato satthaa kimakkhaayii'ti ^a^T1.0076^ea^. `aha.m kho, aavuso, navo acirapabbajito adhunaagato ima.m dhammavinaya.m, na taaha.m sakkomi vitthaarena dhamma.m desetu.m, api ca te sa.mkhittena attha.m vakkhaamii'''ti ^a^M0.0053^ea^. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, assaji.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- ``hotu, aavuso,
[21] appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa bhaasassu, attha.myeva me bruuhi.
[22] attheneva me attho, ki.m kaahasi bya~njana.m bahu''nti..
[03]atha kho, aavuso, assaji bhikkhu ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m abhaasi --
[21] ``ye dhammaa hetuppabhavaa, tesa.m hetu.m tathaagato aaha.
[22] tesa~nca yo nirodho, eva.mvaadii mahaasama.no''ti..
[03]atha kho moggallaanassa paribbaajakassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m ^a^P1.0042^ea^ sutvaa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti.
[21] eseva dhammo yadi taavadeva, paccabyattha padamasoka.m.
[22] adi.t.tha.m abbhatiita.m, bahukehi kappanahutehiiti..

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ atha kho moggallaano paribbaajako saariputta.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca ``gacchaama maya.m, aavuso, bhagavato santike, so no bhagavaa satthaa''ti. ``imaani kho, aavuso, a.d.dhateyyaani paribbaajakasataani amhe nissaaya amhe sampassantaa idha viharanti, tepi taava apalokema {apalokaama (ka)}. yathaa te ma~n~nissanti, tathaa te karissantii''ti. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa yena te paribbaajakaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa te ^a^T1.0077^ea^ paribbaajake etadavocu.m -- ``gacchaama maya.m, aavuso, bhagavato santike, so no bhagavaa satthaa''ti. ``maya.m aayasmante nissaaya aayasmante sampassantaa idha viharaama, sace aayasmantaa mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissanti, sabbeva maya.m mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissaamaa''ti. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa yena sa~ncayo paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa sa~ncaya.m paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``gacchaama maya.m, aavuso, bhagavato santike, so no bhagavaa satthaa''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, maa ^a^V0.0048^ea^ agamittha, sabbeva tayo ima.m ga.na.m pariharissaamaa''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho saariputtamoggallaanaa ^a^M0.0054^ea^ sa~ncaya.m paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``gacchaama maya.m, aavuso, bhagavato santike, so no bhagavaa satthaa''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, maa agamittha, sabbeva tayo ima.m ga.na.m pariharissaamaa''ti. atha kho saariputtamoggallaanaa taani a.d.dhateyyaani paribbaajakasataani aadaaya yena ve.luvana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu. sa~ncayassa pana paribbaajakassa tattheva u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato ugga~nchi.

[03]addasaa kho bhagavaa {bhagavaate (ka)} saariputtamoggallaane duuratova aagacchante, disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ete, bhikkhave, dve sahaayakaa aagacchanti, kolito upatisso ca. eta.m me saavakayuga.m bhavissati agga.m bhaddayuga''nti.
[21] gambhiire ^a^T1.0078^ea^ ~naa.navisaye, anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye.
[22] vimutte appatte ve.luvana.m, atha ne satthaa byaakaasi..

[03] bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa maagadhikaa kulaputtaa bhagavati brahmacariya.m caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- aputtakataaya pa.tipanno sama.no gotamo, vedhabyaaya pa.tipanno sama.no gotamo, kulupacchedaaya pa.tipanno sama.no gotamo, idaani anena ja.tilasahassa.m pabbaajita.m, imaani ca a.d.dhateyyaani paribbaajakasataani sa~ncayaani {sa~njeyyaani (sii0), sa~njayaani (syaa0)} pabbaajitaani. ime ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa maagadhikaa ^a^M0.0055^ea^ kulaputtaa sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m carantiiti. apissu bhikkhuu disvaa imaaya gaathaaya codenti --
[21] ``aagato ^a^T1.0079^ea^ ^a^V0.0049^ea^ kho mahaasama.no, maagadhaana.m giribbaja.m.
[22] sabbe sa~ncaye netvaana {sa~njeyyake netvaa (sii0)}, ka.msu daani nayissatii''ti..

[22] dhammena nayamaanaana.m {niiyamaanaana.m (ka0)}, kaa usuuyaa {ussuyaa (ka0)} vijaanata''nti..

[21] ``aagato kho mahaasama.no, maagadhaana.m giribbaja.m.
[22] sabbe sa~ncaye netvaana, ka.msu daani nayissatii''ti..
[03]bhikkhuu te manusse imaaya gaathaaya pa.ticodenti --
[21] ``nayanti ve mahaaviiraa, saddhammena tathaagataa.
[22] dhammena nayamaanaana.m, kaa usuuyaa vijaanata''nti..
[03]manussaa ^a^P1.0044^ea^ dhammena kira sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa nenti ^a^T1.0080^ea^ no adhammenaati sattaahameva so saddo ahosi, sattaahassa accayena antaradhaayi.
[06] saariputtamoggallaanapabbajjaakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] catutthabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0056^ea^ ^a^V0.0050^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu anupajjhaayakaa anaacariyakaa {ida.m pada.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi} anovadiyamaanaa ananusaasiyamaanaa dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya caranti; manussaana.m {te manussaana.m (ka0)} bhu~njamaanaana.m uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparikhaadaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparisaayaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti; saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanti; bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya carissanti; manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparikhaadaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparisaayaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti; saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti; bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharissanti seyyathaapi braahma.naa braahma.nabhojane''ti.

[03]assosu.m ^a^T1.0081^ea^ kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa santu.t.thaa lajjino kukkuccakaa sikkhaakaamaa, te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya carissanti; manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparikhaadaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparisaayaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti; saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti; bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharissantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu...pe0... bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya caranti, manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m upari ^a^P1.0045^ea^ bhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparikhaadaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparisaayaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m ^a^M0.0057^ea^ upanaamenti, saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanti, bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharantii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho ^a^T1.0082^ea^ bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m moghapurisaana.m ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama ^a^V0.0051^ea^ te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya carissanti, manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparikhaadaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparisaayaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti, bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharissanti. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya dupposataaya mahicchataaya asantu.t.thitaaya {asantu.t.thiyaa (sii0), asantu.t.thataaya (syaa)} sa"nga.nikaaya kosajjassa ava.n.na.m bhaasitvaa anekapariyaayena subharataaya suposataaya appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa {viriyaarambhassa (sii0 syaa0)} va.n.na.m bhaasitvaa bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upajjhaaya.m. upajjhaayo, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikamhi puttacitta.m upa.t.thapessati ^a^T1.0083^ea^, saddhivihaariko upajjhaayamhi pitucitta.m upa.t.thapessati. eva.m te a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa sappatissaa sabhaagavuttino viharantaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye vu.d.dhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissanti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, upajjhaayo gahetabbo -- eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `upajjhaayo me, bhante, hohi; upajjhaayo me, bhante, hohi; upajjhaayo me, bhante, hohii'ti. saahuuti vaa lahuuti vaa opaayikanti vaa patiruupanti vaa paasaadikena sampaadehiiti vaa kaayena vi~n~naapeti, vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, kaayena vaacaaya {na vaacaaya (ka0)} vi~n~naapeti, gahito hoti upajjhaayo; na kaayena vi~n~naapeti, na vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti ^a^P1.0046^ea^ ^a^M0.0058^ea^, na kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na gahito hoti upajjhaayo.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 376 aadayo}``saddhivihaarikena, bhikkhave, upajjhaayamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya upaahanaa omu~ncitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena ^a^V0.0052^ea^ dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. upajjhaayamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace upajjhaayo gaama.m pavisitukaamo ^a^T1.0084^ea^ hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto sodako {saudako (ka0)} daatabbo. sace upajjhaayo pacchaasama.na.m aaka"nkhati, tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa patta.m gahetvaa upajjhaayassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m. naatiduure gantabba.m, naaccaasanne gantabba.m, pattapariyaapanna.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. na upajjhaayassa bha.namaanassa antarantaraa kathaa opaatetabbaa. upajjhaayo aapattisaamantaa bha.namaano nivaaretabbo.

[03]``nivattantena pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m; ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m, ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace pi.n.dapaato hoti, upajjhaayo ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato upanaametabbo. upajjhaayo paaniiyena pucchitabbo ^a^T1.0085^ea^. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m ^a^M0.0059^ea^ appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo, na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m ^a^P1.0047^ea^ vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. upajjhaayamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace upajjhaayo nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace ^a^V0.0053^ea^ upajjhaayo jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya upajjhaayassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na ^a^T1.0086^ea^ navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. jantaaghare upajjhaayassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi upajjhaayassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa upajjhaayassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, upajjhaayo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. sace uddisaapetukaamo hoti, uddisitabbo. sace paripucchitukaamo hoti, paripucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m vihaare upajjhaayo viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m ^a^M0.0060^ea^ niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m {bhisibimbohana.m (sii0 syaa0)} niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo. pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena ^a^P1.0048^ea^, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa. khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo. apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa ^a^T1.0087^ea^ niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa ^a^V0.0054^ea^ otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa ^a^T1.0088^ea^ atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ^a^M0.0061^ea^ ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa ^a^P1.0049^ea^ thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa ^a^T1.0089^ea^ udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace upajjhaayassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, saddhivihaarikena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace upajjhaayassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace upajjhaayassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa ^a^V0.0055^ea^. sace upajjhaayo garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace upajjhaayo muulaaya pa.tikassanaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaaya.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace upajjhaayo maanattaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace upajjhaayo abbhaanaaraho hoti, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaaya.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho upajjhaayassa ^a^M0.0062^ea^ kamma.m kattukaamo hoti tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m {niyasa.m (ka0)} vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho upajjhaayassa kamma.m na kareyya lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m ^a^T1.0090^ea^ vaa, saddhivihaarikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayo sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena dhovitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m ^a^P1.0050^ea^ -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena kaatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, saddhivihaarikena pacitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m {rajetabba.m (sii0 syaa0)} hoti, saddhivihaarikena rajitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho upajjhaayassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena {rajentena (sii0 syaa0)} saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m.

[03]``na upajjhaaya.m anaapucchaa ekaccassa patto daatabbo, na ekaccassa patto pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, na ekaccassa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m; na ekaccassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, na ekaccassa parikkhaaro pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa kesaa chedetabbaa {chettabbaa (sii0), cheditabbaa (ka0)}, na ekaccena kesaa chedaapetabbaa; na ekaccassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m, na ekaccena parikamma.m kaaraapetabba.m; na ekaccassa veyyaavacco {veyyaavacca.m (katthaci)} kaatabbo ^a^T1.0091^ea^, na ekaccena veyyaavacco kaaraapetabbo; na ekaccassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m, na ekacco pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo; na ekaccassa pi.n.dapaato niiharitabbo, na ekaccena pi.n.dapaato niiharaapetabbo; na ^a^V0.0056^ea^ upajjhaaya.m anaapucchaa ^a^M0.0063^ea^ gaamo pavisitabbo; na susaana.m gantabba.m; na disaa pakkamitabbaa. sace upajjhaayo gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba''nti.
[06] upajjhaayavatta.m ni.t.thita.m.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 378 aadayo} ``upajjhaayena, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``upajjhaayena, bhikkhave, saddhivihaariko sa"ngahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchaaya ovaadena anusaasaniyaa. sace upajjhaayassa patto hoti, saddhivihaarikassa patto na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa patto daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa patto uppajjiyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa ciivara.m hoti, saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m uppajjiyethaati. sace upajjhaayassa parikkhaaro hoti, saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro na hoti, upajjhaayena saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro ^a^P1.0051^ea^ daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa parikkhaaro uppajjiyethaati.

[03]``sace ^a^T1.0092^ea^ saddhivihaariko gilaano hoti, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. saddhivihaarikamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace saddhivihaariko gaama.m pavisitukaamo hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto sodako daatabbo. ettaavataa nivattissatiiti aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m ^a^M0.0064^ea^ upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m ^a^V0.0057^ea^. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m; ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m, ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace pi.n.dapaato hoti, saddhivihaariko ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato upanaametabbo. saddhivihaariko paaniiyena pucchitabbo. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo, na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m ^a^T1.0093^ea^ nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. saddhivihaarikamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace saddhivihaariko nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m ^a^P1.0052^ea^.

[03]``sace saddhivihaariko jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. jantaaghare saddhivihaarikassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi ^a^M0.0065^ea^ saddhivihaarikassa ^a^T1.0094^ea^ parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa saddhivihaarikassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa. jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. saddhivihaariko paaniiyena pucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m ^a^V0.0058^ea^ vihaare saddhivihaariko viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa ^a^T1.0095^ea^ pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m ^a^M0.0066^ea^ pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato ^a^T1.0096^ea^ anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa ^a^V0.0059^ea^ vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace saddhivihaarikassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, upajjhaayena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace saddhivihaarikassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, upajjhaayena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa ^a^T1.0097^ea^. sace saddhivihaarikassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, upajjhaayena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace saddhivihaariko garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho ^a^M0.0067^ea^ saddhivihaarikassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko muulaaya pa.tikassanaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarika.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko maanattaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace saddhivihaariko ^a^P1.0053^ea^ abbhaanaaraho hoti, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarika.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho saddhivihaarikassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, upajjhaayena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaariko sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m eva.m dhoveyyaasiiti ^a^V0.0060^ea^, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m ^a^T1.0098^ea^ hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m eva.m kareyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace saddhivihaarikassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m eva.m paceyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, upajjhaayena aacikkhitabba.m, eva.m rajeyyaasiiti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho saddhivihaarikassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m. na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m. sace saddhivihaariko gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba''nti.
[06] saddhivihaarikavatta.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0068^ea^ kho pana samayena saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattissantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattantiiti? sacca.m bhagavaati. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikaa upajjhaayesu na sammaa vattissantiiti...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, saddhivihaarikena ^a^P1.0054^ea^ upajjhaayamhi na sammaa vattitabba.m. yo na sammaa vatteyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti ^a^T1.0099^ea^. neva sammaa vattanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, asammaavattanta.m pa.naametu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, pa.naametabbo -- ``pa.naamemi ta''nti vaa, ``maayidha pa.tikkamii''ti vaa, ``niihara te pattaciivara''nti vaa, ``naaha.m tayaa upa.t.thaatabbo''ti vaa, kaayena vi~n~naapeti, vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, pa.naamito hoti saddhivihaariko; na kaayena vi~n~naapeti, na vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na pa.naamito hoti saddhivihaarikoti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena saddhivihaarikaa pa.naamitaa na khamaapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khamaapetunti. neva khamaapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0061^ea^. na, bhikkhave, pa.naamitena na khamaapetabbo. yo na khamaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena upajjhaayaa khamaapiyamaanaa na khamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khamitunti. neva khamanti. saddhivihaarikaa pakkamantipi vibbhamantipi titthiyesupi sa"nkamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, khamaapiyamaanena na khamitabba.m. yo na khameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] tena kho pana samayena upajjhaayaa sammaavattanta.m pa.naamenti, asammaavattanta.m na pa.naamenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sammaavattanto pa.naametabbo. yo pa.naameyya ^a^T1.0100^ea^, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^M0.0069^ea^. na ca, bhikkhave, asammaavattanto na pa.naametabbo. yo na pa.naameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko pa.naametabbo. upajjhaayamhi naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimatto gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko pa.naametabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko na pa.naametabbo. upajjhaayamhi adhimatta.m pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko na pa.naametabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko ala.m pa.naametu.m. upajjhaayamhi ^a^P1.0055^ea^ naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimattaa gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko ala.m pa.naametu.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko naala.m pa.naametu.m. upajjhaayamhi adhimatta.m ^a^V0.0062^ea^ pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato saddhivihaariko naala.m pa.naametu.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^T1.0101^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m saddhivihaarika.m appa.naamento upajjhaayo saatisaaro hoti, pa.naamento anatisaaro hoti. upajjhaayamhi naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimatto gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m ^a^M0.0070^ea^ saddhivihaarika.m appa.naamento upajjhaayo saatisaaro hoti, pa.naamento anatisaaro hoti.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m saddhivihaarika.m pa.naamento upajjhaayo saatisaaro hoti, appa.naamento anatisaaro hoti. upajjhaayamhi adhimatta.m pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m saddhivihaarika.m pa.naamento upajjhaayo saatisaaro hoti, appa.naamento anatisaaro hotii''ti.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro braahma.no bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m bhikkhuu na icchi.msu pabbaajetu.m. so bhikkhuusu pabbajja.m alabhamaano kiso ahosi luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato ^a^T1.0102^ea^ dhamanisanthatagatto. addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m braahma.na.m kisa.m luukha.m dubba.n.na.m uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaata.m dhamanisanthatagatta.m, disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, bhikkhave, braahma.no kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti? eso, bhante, braahma.no bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m bhikkhuu na icchi.msu pabbaajetu.m. so bhikkhuusu pabbajja.m alabhamaano kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagattoti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, tassa braahma.nassa adhikaara.m sarasii''ti? eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, tassa braahma.nassa adhikaara.m saraamii''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, saariputta, tassa braahma.nassa adhikaara.m sarasii''ti? ``idha me, bhante, so braahma.no raajagahe pi.n.daaya carantassa ka.tacchubhikkha.m daapesi. ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, tassa braahma.nassa adhikaara.m ^a^P1.0056^ea^ saraamii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta, kata~n~nuno hi, saariputta, sappurisaa katavedino. tena hi tva.m, saariputta, ta.m braahma.na.m pabbaajehi upasampaadehii''ti ^a^V0.0063^ea^. ``kathaaha.m, bhante ^a^T1.0103^ea^, ta.m braahma.na.m pabbaajemi upasampaademii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- yaa saa, bhikkhave, mayaa tiihi sara.nagamanehi upasampadaa anu~n~naataa, ta.m ajjatagge pa.tikkhipaami. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ~natticatutthena kammena upasampaadetu.m ^a^M0.0071^ea^ {upasampada.m (sii0 syaa0)}. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, upasampaadetabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya itthannaamena upajjhaayena. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya ^a^T1.0104^ea^.

[03]``tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``upasampanno sa"nghena itthannaamo itthannaamena upajjhaayena. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraa anaacaara.m aacarati. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``maavuso, evaruupa.m akaasi, neta.m kappatii''ti. so evamaaha -- ``nevaaha.m aayasmante yaaci.m upasampaadetha manti. kissa ma.m tumhe ayaacitaa upasampaaditthaa''ti? ^a^V0.0064^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^P1.0057^ea^. na, bhikkhave, ayaacitena upasampaadetabbo ^a^M0.0072^ea^. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yaacitena upasampaadetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, yaacitabbo. tena upasampadaapekkhena sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``sa"ngha.m, bhante, upasampada.m yaacaami, ullumpatu ma.m, bhante, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante ^a^T1.0105^ea^, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya itthannaamena upajjhaayena. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0... tatiyampi etamattha.m vadaami...pe0....
[03]``upasampanno sa"nghena itthannaamo itthannaamena upajjhaayena. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena raajagahe pa.niitaana.m bhattaana.m bhattapa.tipaa.ti a.t.thitaa {adhi.t.thitaa (ka0)} hoti. atha kho a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa, subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu sayanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya''nti. atha kho so braahma.no bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m upasampaadesu.m. tasmi.m ^a^T1.0106^ea^ pabbajite bhattapa.tipaa.ti khiiyittha. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``ehi daani, aavuso, pi.n.daaya carissaamaa''ti. so evamaaha -- ``naaha.m, aavuso, eta.mkaara.naa pabbajito pi.n.daaya carissaamiiti. sace me dassatha bhu~njissaami ^a^M0.0073^ea^, no ce me dassatha vibbhamissaamii''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, udarassa kaara.naa pabbajito''ti ^a^P1.0058^ea^ ^a^V0.0065^ea^? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi naama bhikkhu eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye udarassa kaara.naa pabbajissatiiti. te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, udarassa kaara.naa pabbajitoti? sacca.m bhagavaati. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye udarassa kaara.naa pabbajissasi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya''...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upasampaadentena cattaaro nissaye aacikkhitu.m -- pi.n.diyaalopabhojana.m nissaaya pabbajjaa, tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo; atirekalaabho -- sa"nghabhatta.m, uddesabhatta.m, nimantana.m, salaakabhatta.m, pakkhika.m, uposathika.m, paa.tipadika.m. pa.msukuulaciivara.m nissaaya pabbajjaa, tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo; atirekalaabho -- khoma.m, kappaasika.m, koseyya.m, kambala.m, saa.na.m, bha"nga.m. rukkhamuulasenaasana.m nissaaya pabbajjaa, tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo; atirekalaabho -- vihaaro ^a^T1.0107^ea^, a.d.dhayogo, paasaado, hammiya.m, guhaa. puutimuttabhesajja.m nissaaya pabbajjaa, tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo; atirekalaabho -- sappi, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu, phaa.nita''nti.
[06] pa.naamitakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro maa.navako bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. tassa bhikkhuu pa.tikacceva nissaye aacikkhi.msu. so evamaaha -- ``sace me, bhante, pabbajite nissaye aacikkheyyaatha, abhirameyyaamaha.m {abhirameyya~ncaaha.m (sii0), abhirameyya.m svaaha.m (ka0)}. na daanaaha.m, bhante, pabbajissaami; jegucchaa me nissayaa ^a^M0.0074^ea^ pa.tikuulaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, pa.tikacceva nissayaa aacikkhitabbaa. yo aacikkheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upasampannasamanantaraa nissaye aacikkhitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu duvaggenapi tivaggenapi ga.nena upasampaadenti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^V0.0066^ea^ aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, uunadasavaggena ga.nena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasavaggena vaa atirekadasavaggena vaa ga.nena upasampaadetunti ^a^P1.0059^ea^.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0108^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ekavassaapi duvassaapi saddhivihaarika.m upasampaadenti. aayasmaapi upaseno va"ngantaputto ekavasso saddhivihaarika.m upasampaadesi. so vassa.mvu.t.tho duvasso ekavassa.m saddhivihaarika.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upasena.m va"ngantaputta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhikkhu, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci tva.m appakilamathena addhaana.m aagato''ti? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa. appakilamathena maya.m, bhante, addhaana.m aagataa''ti. jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi na pucchanti, kaala.m viditvaa pucchanti, kaala.m viditvaa na pucchanti; atthasa.mhita.m tathaagataa pucchanti; no anatthasa.mhita.m. anatthasa.mhite setughaato tathaagataana.m. dviihi aakaarehi buddhaa bhagavanto bhikkhuu pa.tipucchanti -- dhamma.m vaa desessaama, saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamaati. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upasena.m va"ngantaputta.m etadavoca -- ``kativassosi tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``duvassoha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``aya.m pana bhikkhu kativasso''ti? ``ekavasso, bhagavaa''ti. ``ki.m taaya.m bhikkhu hotii''ti? ``saddhivihaariko me, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi ^a^T1.0109^ea^ naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~nehi ovadiyo anusaasiyo a~n~na.m ovaditu.m anusaasitu.m ma~n~nissasi. atilahu.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, baahullaaya aavatto, yadida.m ga.nabandhika.m. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya pasannaana.m ^a^M0.0075^ea^ vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya''...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, uunadasavassena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasavassena vaa atirekadasavassena vaa upasampaadetu''nti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati -- baalaa abyattaa upasampaadenti. dissanti upajjhaayaa baalaa, saddhivihaarikaa pa.n.ditaa. dissanti upajjhaayaa abyattaa, saddhivihaarikaa byattaa. dissanti upajjhaayaa appassutaa, saddhivihaarikaa bahussutaa. dissanti upajjhaayaa duppa~n~naa, saddhivihaarikaa ^a^P1.0060^ea^ pa~n~navanto. a~n~nataropi a~n~natitthiyapubbo ^a^V0.0067^ea^ upajjhaayena sahadhammika.m vuccamaano upajjhaayassa vaada.m aaropetvaa ta.myeva titthaayatana.m sa"nkami. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu -- dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati -- baalaa abyattaa upasampaadessanti. dissanti upajjhaayaa baalaa saddhivihaarikaa pa.n.ditaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa abyattaa ^a^T1.0110^ea^ saddhivihaarikaa byattaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa appassutaa saddhivihaarikaa bahussutaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa duppa~n~naa, saddhivihaarikaa pa~n~navantoti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu -- dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati -- baalaa abyattaa upasampaadenti. dissanti upajjhaayaa baalaa, saddhivihaarikaa pa.n.ditaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa abyattaa saddhivihaarikaa byattaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa appassutaa, saddhivihaarikaa bahussutaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa duppa~n~naa, saddhivihaarikaa pa~n~navanto''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa -- dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati -- baalaa abyattaa upasampaadessanti. dissanti upajjhaayaa baalaa, saddhivihaarikaa pa.n.ditaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa abyattaa saddhivihaarikaa byattaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa appassutaa, saddhivihaarikaa bahussutaa, dissanti upajjhaayaa duppa~n~naa, saddhivihaarikaa pa~n~navanto. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, baalena abyattena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena dasavassena vaa atirekadasavassena vaa upasampaadetu''nti.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0076^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu upajjhaayesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi ^a^T1.0111^ea^ kaala"nkatesupi pakkhasa"nkantesupi anaacariyakaa anovadiyamaanaa ananusaasiyamaanaa dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya caranti, manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti, uparikhaadaniiyepi -- uparisaayaniiyepi -- uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamenti; saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njanti; bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dunnivatthaa duppaarutaa anaakappasampannaa pi.n.daaya carissanti; manussaana.m bhu~njamaanaana.m uparibhojanepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti, uparikhaadaniiyepi -- uparisaayaniiyepi -- uparipaaniiyepi utti.t.thapatta.m upanaamessanti; saama.m suupampi odanampi vi~n~naapetvaa bhu~njissanti; bhattaggepi uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa viharissanti, seyyathaapi braahma.naa braahma.nabhojane''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m ^a^V0.0068^ea^ ...pe0... atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. sacca.m kira, bhikkhave...pe0... sacca.m, bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa ^a^T1.0112^ea^ dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03]``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aacariya.m. aacariyo, bhikkhave, antevaasikamhi puttacitta.m upa.t.thaapessati, antevaasiko aacariyamhi pitucitta.m upa.t.thaapessati. eva.m te a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa sappatissaa sabhaagavuttino viharantaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissanti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasavassa.m nissaaya vatthu.m, dasavassena nissaya.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, aacariyo gahetabbo. eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aacariyo me, bhante, hohi, aayasmato nissaaya vacchaami; aacariyo me, bhante, hohi, aayasmato nissaaya vacchaami; aacariyo me, bhante, hohi, aayasmato ^a^P1.0061^ea^ nissaaya vacchaamii'ti. `saahuuti' vaa `lahuuti' vaa `opaayika'nti vaa `patiruupa'nti vaa `paasaadikena sampaadehii'ti vaa kaayena vi~n~naapeti, vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, gahito hoti aacariyo; na kaayena vi~n~naapeti, na vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na gahito hoti aacariyo.
[03] 78^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 380 aadayo} ``antevaasikena ^a^M0.0077^ea^, bhikkhave, aacariyamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``kaalasseva u.t.thaaya upaahana.m omu~ncitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m daatabba.m, mukhodaka.m daatabba.m, aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m. sace yaagu hoti, bhaajana.m dhovitvaa yaagu upanaametabbaa ^a^T1.0113^ea^. yaagu.m piitassa udaka.m datvaa bhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. aacariyamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.

[03]``sace aacariyo gaama.m pavisitukaamo hoti, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, kaayabandhana.m daatabba.m, sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo daatabbaa, dhovitvaa patto sodako daatabbo. sace aacariyo pacchaasama.na.m aaka"nkhati, tima.n.dala.m pa.ticchaadentena parima.n.dala.m nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa sagu.na.m katvaa sa"nghaa.tiyo paarupitvaa ga.n.thika.m pa.timu~ncitvaa dhovitvaa ^a^V0.0069^ea^ patta.m gahetvaa aacariyassa pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m. naatiduure gantabba.m, naaccaasanne gantabba.m, pattapariyaapanna.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. na aacariyassa bha.namaanassa antarantaraa kathaa opaatetabbaa. aacariyo aapattisaamantaa bha.namaano nivaaretabbo.

[03]``nivattantena pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m, pa.tinivaasana.m daatabba.m, nivaasana.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace ciivara.m sinna.m hoti, muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabba.m, na ca u.nhe ciivara.m nidahitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m. ciivara.m sa"ngharantena catura"ngula.m ka.n.na.m ussaaretvaa ciivara.m sa"ngharitabba.m -- maa majjhe bha"ngo ahosiiti. obhoge kaayabandhana.m kaatabba.m.

[03]``sace pi.n.dapaato hoti ^a^T1.0114^ea^, aacariyo ca bhu~njitukaamo hoti, udaka.m datvaa pi.n.dapaato upanaametabbo. aacariyo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. bhuttaavissa udaka.m datvaa patta.m pa.tiggahetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena dhovitvaa vodaka.m katvaa muhutta.m u.nhe otaapetabbo, na ca u.nhe patto nidahitabbo. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto ^a^M0.0078^ea^ nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. aacariyamhi vu.t.thite aasana.m uddharitabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m pa.tisaametabba.m. sace so deso uklaapo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
[03]``sace aacariyo nahaayitukaamo hoti, nahaana.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace siitena attho hoti, siita.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m. sace u.nhena attho hoti, u.nha.m pa.tiyaadetabba.m.

[03]``sace aacariyo jantaaghara.m pavisitukaamo hoti, cu.n.na.m sannetabba.m, mattikaa temetabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya aacariyassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gantvaa jantaagharapii.tha.m datvaa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m, cu.n.na.m daatabba.m, mattikaa daatabbaa. sace ussahati, jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. jantaaghara.m pavisantena ^a^T1.0115^ea^ mattikaaya mukha.m makkhetvaa purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaaghara.m pavisitabba.m. na there bhikkhuu anupakhajja nisiiditabba.m. na navaa bhikkhuu aasanena pa.tibaahitabbaa. jantaaghare aacariyassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. jantaagharaa nikkhamantena ^a^V0.0070^ea^ jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya purato ca pacchato ca pa.ticchaadetvaa jantaagharaa nikkhamitabba.m.

[03]``udakepi aacariyassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa aacariyassa gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. aacariyo paaniiyena pucchitabbo. sace uddisaapetukaamo hoti, uddisaapetabbo. sace paripucchitukaamo hoti, paripucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m vihaare aacariyo viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena ^a^M0.0079^ea^ kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo ^a^T1.0116^ea^; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m ohaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako ^a^V0.0071^ea^ otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo ^a^T1.0117^ea^. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa ^a^M0.0080^ea^. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m ^a^T1.0118^ea^. sace aacamanakumbhiya.m udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace aacariyassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, antevaasikena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, antevaasikena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, antevaasikena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace aacariyo garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace aacariyo muulaaya pa.tikassanaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariya.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace aacariyo maanattaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace aacariyo abbhaanaaraho hoti, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariya.m abbheyyaati ^a^V0.0072^ea^. sace sa"ngho aacariyassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho aacariyassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m ^a^M0.0081^ea^ ^a^T1.0119^ea^ vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, antevaasikena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyo sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace aacariyassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena dhovitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, antevaasikena kaatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace aacariyassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena pacitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, antevaasikena rajitabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho aacariyassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m.

[03]``na aacariya.m anaapucchaa ekaccassa patto daatabbo, na ekaccassa patto pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa ciivara.m daatabba.m; na ekaccassa ciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m; na ekaccassa parikkhaaro daatabbo; na ekaccassa parikkhaaro pa.tiggahetabbo; na ekaccassa kesaa chedetabbaa; na ekaccena kesaa chedaapetabbaa; na ekaccassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m; na ekaccena parikamma.m kaaraapetabba.m; na ekaccassa veyyaavacco kaatabbo; na ekaccena veyyaavacco kaaraapetabbo; na ekaccassa pacchaasama.nena ^a^T1.0120^ea^ hotabba.m; na ekacco pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo; na ekaccassa pi.n.dapaato niiharitabbo; na ekaccena pi.n.dapaato niiharaapetabbo. na aacariya.m anaapucchaa gaamo pavisitabbo, na susaana.m gantabba.m, na disaa pakkamitabbaa. sace aacariyo gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba''nti.
[06] aacariyavatta.m ni.t.thita.m.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 381-382} ``aacariyena ^a^V0.0073^ea^, bhikkhave, antevaasikamhi sammaa vattitabba.m. tatraaya.m sammaavattanaa --

[03]``aacariyena ^a^M0.0082^ea^, bhikkhave, antevaasiko sa"ngahetabbo anuggahetabbo uddesena paripucchaaya ovaadena anusaasaniyaa. sace aacariyassa patto hoti, antevaasikassa patto na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa patto daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa patto uppajjiyethaati. sace aacariyassa ciivara.m hoti, antevaasikassa ciivara.m na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa ciivara.m daatabba.m, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m uppajjiyethaati. sace aacariyassa parikkhaaro hoti, antevaasikassa parikkhaaro na hoti, aacariyena antevaasikassa parikkhaaro daatabbo, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa parikkhaaro uppajjiyethaati.
