[03]``udakepi antevaasikassa parikamma.m kaatabba.m. nahaatena pa.thamatara.m uttaritvaa attano gatta.m vodaka.m katvaa nivaasetvaa antevaasikassa ^a^T1.0123^ea^ gattato udaka.m pamajjitabba.m, nivaasana.m daatabba.m, sa"nghaa.ti daatabbaa, jantaagharapii.tha.m aadaaya pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa aasana.m pa~n~napetabba.m, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipitabba.m. antevaasiko paaniiyena pucchitabbo.

[03]``yasmi.m vihaare antevaasiko viharati, sace so vihaaro uklaapo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo. vihaara.m sodhentena pa.thama.m pattaciivara.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhisibibbohana.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m ^a^V0.0075^ea^; ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ma~nco niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; pii.tha.m niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbaa; khe.lamallako niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabbo; apassenaphalaka.m niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m; bhuumatthara.na.m yathaapa~n~natta.m sallakkhetvaa niiharitvaa ekamanta.m nikkhipitabba.m. sace vihaare santaanaka.m hoti, ullokaa pa.thama.m otaaretabba.m, aalokasandhika.n.nabhaagaa pamajjitabbaa. sace gerukaparikammakataa bhitti ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace kaa.lava.n.nakataa bhuumi ka.n.nakitaa hoti, co.laka.m temetvaa pii.letvaa pamajjitabbaa. sace akataa hoti bhuumi, udakena paripphositvaa sammajjitabbaa -- maa vihaaro rajena ^a^T1.0124^ea^ uha~n~niiti. sa"nkaara.m vicinitvaa ekamanta.m cha.d.detabba.m.

[03]``bhuumatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. ma~ncapa.tipaadakaa otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbaa. ma~nco otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabbo. pii.tha.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa niica.m katvaa saadhuka.m appa.tigha.msantena, asa"ngha.t.tentena kavaa.tapi.t.tha.m, atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. bhisibibbohana.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. nisiidanapaccatthara.na.m otaapetvaa sodhetvaa pappho.tetvaa atiharitvaa yathaapa~n~natta.m pa~n~napetabba.m. khe.lamallako otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabbo. apassenaphalaka.m otaapetvaa pamajjitvaa atiharitvaa yathaa.thaane .thapetabba.m. pattaciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m. patta.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena patta.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena he.t.thaama~nca.m vaa he.t.thaapii.tha.m vaa paraamasitvaa patto nikkhipitabbo. na ca anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa patto nikkhipitabbo. ciivara.m nikkhipantena ekena hatthena ciivara.m gahetvaa ekena hatthena ciivarava.msa.m vaa ciivararajju.m vaa pamajjitvaa paarato anta.m orato bhoga.m katvaa ciivara.m nikkhipitabba.m.

[03]``sace ^a^M0.0085^ea^ puratthimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, puratthimaa vaatapaanaa ^a^T1.0125^ea^ thaketabbaa. sace pacchimaa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace uttaraa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, uttaraa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace dakkhi.naa sarajaa vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa. sace siitakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa vivaritabbaa, ratti.m thaketabbaa. sace u.nhakaalo hoti, divaa vaatapaanaa thaketabbaa, ratti.m vivaritabbaa.

[03]``sace ^a^V0.0076^ea^ parive.na.m uklaapa.m hoti, parive.na.m sammajjitabba.m. sace ko.t.thako uklaapo hoti, ko.t.thako sammajjitabbo. sace upa.t.thaanasaalaa uklaapaa hoti, upa.t.thaanasaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace aggisaalaa uklaapaa hoti, aggisaalaa sammajjitabbaa. sace vaccaku.ti uklaapaa hoti, vaccaku.ti sammajjitabbaa. sace paaniiya.m na hoti, paaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace paribhojaniiya.m na hoti, paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetabba.m. sace aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m na hoti, aacamanakumbhiyaa udaka.m aasi~ncitabba.m.

[03]``sace antevaasikassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, aacariyena vuupakaasetabbo, vuupakaasaapetabbo, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasikassa kukkucca.m uppanna.m hoti, aacariyena vinodetabba.m, vinodaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasikassa di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti, aacariyena vivecetabba.m, vivecaapetabba.m, dhammakathaa vaassa kaatabbaa. sace antevaasiko garudhamma.m ajjhaapanno hoti parivaasaaraho, aacariyena ussukka.m ^a^T1.0126^ea^ kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho, antevaasikassa parivaasa.m dadeyyaati. sace antevaasiko muulaaya pa.tikassanaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasika.m muulaaya pa.tikasseyyaati. sace antevaasiko maanattaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasikassa maanatta.m dadeyyaati. sace antevaasiko abbhaanaaraho hoti, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasika.m abbheyyaati. sace sa"ngho antevaasikassa kamma.m kattukaamo hoti, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m ^a^M0.0086^ea^ vaa, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho sa"ngho antevaasikassa kamma.m na kareyya, lahukaaya vaa pari.naameyyaati. kata.m vaa panassa hoti sa"nghena kamma.m, tajjaniiya.m vaa niyassa.m vaa pabbaajaniiya.m vaa pa.tisaara.niiya.m vaa ukkhepaniiya.m vaa, aacariyena ussukka.m kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasiko sammaa vatteyya, loma.m paateyya, netthaara.m vatteyya, sa"ngho ta.m kamma.m pa.tippassambheyyaati.

[03]``sace antevaasikassa ciivara.m dhovitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- `eva.m dhoveyyaasii'ti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m dhoviyethaati. sace antevaasikassa ciivara.m kaatabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- `eva.m kareyyaasii'ti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m kariyethaati. sace ^a^T1.0127^ea^ antevaasikassa rajana.m pacitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- `eva.m paceyyaasii'ti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa rajana.m paciyethaati. sace ^a^V0.0077^ea^ antevaasikassa ciivara.m rajitabba.m hoti, aacariyena aacikkhitabba.m -- `eva.m rajeyyaasii'ti, ussukka.m vaa kaatabba.m -- kinti nu kho antevaasikassa ciivara.m rajiyethaati. ciivara.m rajantena saadhuka.m samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajitabba.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabba.m. sace antevaasiko gilaano hoti, yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo, vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba''nti.
[06] antevaasikavatta.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] cha.t.thabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena antevaasikaa aacariyesu na sammaa vattanti...pe0... bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... na, bhikkhave, antevaasikena aacariyamhi na sammaa vattitabba.m. yo na sammaa vatteyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati. neva sammaa vattanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, asammaavattanta.m pa.naametu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, pa.naametabbo -- pa.naamemi tanti vaa, maayidha pa.tikkamiiti ^a^M0.0087^ea^ vaa, niihara te pattaciivaranti vaa, naaha.m tayaa upa.t.thaatabboti vaa. kaayena vi~n~naapeti, vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, pa.naamito hoti antevaasiko; na kaayena vi~n~naapeti, na vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na pa.naamito hoti antevaasikoti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ^a^T1.0128^ea^ antevaasikaa pa.naamitaa na khamaapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khamaapetunti. neva khamaapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, pa.naamitena na khamaapetabbo. yo na khamaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aacariyaa khamaapiyamaanaa na khamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, khamitunti. neva khamanti. antevaasikaa pakkamantipi vibbhamantipi titthiyesupi sa"nkamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, khamaapiyamaanena na khamitabba.m. yo na khameyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0078^ea^ kho pana samayena aacariyaa sammaavattanta.m pa.naamenti, asammaavattanta.m na pa.naamenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sammaavattanto pa.naametabbo. yo pa.naameyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, asammaavattanto na pa.naametabbo. yo na pa.naameyya, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko pa.naametabbo. aacariyamhi naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimatto gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko pa.naametabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko na pa.naametabbo. aacariyamhi adhimatta.m pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa ^a^T1.0129^ea^ hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko na pa.naametabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0088^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko ala.m pa.naametu.m. aacariyamhi naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimatto gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko ala.m pa.naametu.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko naala.m pa.naametu.m. aacariyamhi adhimatta.m pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato antevaasiko naala.m pa.naametu.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m antevaasika.m appa.naamento aacariyo saatisaaro hoti, pa.naamento anatisaaro hoti. aacariyamhi naadhimatta.m pema.m hoti, naadhimatto pasaado hoti, naadhimattaa hirii hoti, naadhimatto gaaravo hoti, naadhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m antevaasika.m appa.naamento aacariyo saatisaaro hoti, pa.naamento anatisaaro hoti.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^V0.0079^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m antevaasika.m pa.naamento aacariyo saatisaaro hoti, appa.naamento anatisaaro hoti. aacariyamhi adhimatta.m pema.m hoti, adhimatto pasaado hoti, adhimattaa ^a^T1.0130^ea^ hirii hoti, adhimatto gaaravo hoti, adhimattaa bhaavanaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m antevaasika.m pa.naamento aacariyo saatisaaro hoti, appa.naamento anatisaaro hotii''ti.
[06] pa.naamanaa khamaapanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu, dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati, baalaa abyattaa nissaya.m denti. dissanti aacariyaa baalaa, antevaasikaa pa.n.ditaa ^a^M0.0089^ea^. dissanti aacariyaa abyattaa, antevaasikaa byattaa. dissanti aacariyaa appassutaa, antevaasikaa bahussutaa. dissanti aacariyaa duppa~n~naa, antevaasikaa pa~n~navanto. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... ^a^P1.0062^ea^ te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu, dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati, baalaa abyattaa nissaya.m dassanti. dissanti aacariyaa baalaa antevaasikaa pa.n.ditaa, dissanti aacariyaa abyattaa antevaasikaa byattaa, dissanti aacariyaa appassutaa antevaasikaa bahussutaa, dissanti aacariyaa duppa~n~naa antevaasikaa pa~n~navanto''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu, dasavassamhaa dasavassamhaati, baalaa abyattaa nissaya.m denti...pe0... sacca.m, bhagavaati. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, baalena abyattena nissayo daatabbo. yo dadeyya, aapatti ^a^T1.0131^ea^ dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena dasavassena vaa atirekadasavassena vaa nissaya.m daatu''nti.
[06] baalaabyattavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu aacariyupajjhaayesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kaala"nkatesupi ^a^V0.0080^ea^ pakkhasa"nkantesupi nissayapa.tippassaddhiyo na jaananti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, nissayapa.tippassaddhiyo upajjhaayamhaa -- upajjhaayo pakkanto vaa hoti, vibbhanto vaa, kaala"nkato vaa, pakkhasa"nkanto vaa, aa.nattiyeva pa~ncamii. imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca nissayapa.tippassaddhiyo upajjhaayamhaa.

[03]``chayimaa, bhikkhave, nissayapa.tippassaddhiyo aacariyamhaa -- aacariyo pakkanto vaa hoti, vibbhanto vaa, kaala"nkato vaa, pakkhasa"nkanto vaa, aa.nattiyeva pa~ncamii, upajjhaayena vaa samodhaanagato hoti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, cha nissayapa.tippassaddhiyo aacariyamhaa''.
[06] nissapa.tippassaddhikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0090^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. na asekkhena {na asekhena (ka0)} siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^T1.0132^ea^ samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa ^a^P1.0063^ea^ upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo ^a^V0.0081^ea^ daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. attanaa na asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na para.m asekkhe siilakkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa na asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na para.m asekkhe samaadhikkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa na asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na para.m asekkhe pa~n~naakkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na para.m asekkhe vimuttikkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa na asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, na para.m asekkhe vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhe samaadapetaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na ^a^T1.0133^ea^ nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0091^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. attanaa asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, para.m asekkhe siilakkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, para.m asekkhe samaadhikkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, para.m asekkhe pa~n~naakkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, para.m asekkhe vimuttikkhandhe samaadapetaa; attanaa asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, para.m asekkhe vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhe samaadapetaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti, kusiito hoti, mu.t.thassati hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na upasampaadetabba.m, na nissayo daatabbo, na saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo ^a^T1.0134^ea^, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. saddho hoti, hirimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, upa.t.thitassati hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m, nissayo daatabbo, saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0069^ea^ kho pana samayena yo so a~n~natitthiyapubbo {yo so pasuraparibbaajako a~n~natitthiyapubbo (ka0)} pajjhaayena sahadhammika.m vuccamaano upajjhaayassa vaada.m aaropetvaa ta.myeva titthaayatana.m sa"nkami. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaaci. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yo so, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo upajjhaayena sahadhammika.m vuccamaano upajjhaayassa vaada.m aaropetvaa ta.myeva titthaayatana.m ^a^V0.0088^ea^ sa"nkanto, so aagato na upasampaadetabbo. yo so, bhikkhave, a~n~nopi a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, tassa cattaaro maase parivaaso daatabbo. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbo -- pa.thama.m kesamassu.m ohaaraapetvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadaapetvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vandaapetvaa ^a^T1.0144^ea^ ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa eva.m vadehiiti vattabbo -- ``buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; dutiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; tatiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaamii''ti.

[03]tena, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbena sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vanditvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m ^a^M0.0099^ea^ dhammavinaye aaka"nkhaami upasampada.m. soha.m, bhante, sa"ngha.m cattaaro maase parivaasa.m yaacaamii''ti. dutiyampi yaacitabbo. tatiyampi yaacitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati upasampada.m. so sa"ngha.m cattaaro maase parivaasa.m yaacati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho itthannaamassa a~n~natitthiyapubbassa cattaaro maase parivaasa.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati upasampada.m. so sa"ngha.m cattaaro maase parivaasa.m yaacati. sa"ngho itthannaamassa a~n~natitthiyapubbassa cattaaro maase parivaasa.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa a~n~natitthiyapubbassa ^a^T1.0145^ea^ cattaaro maase parivaasassa daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani kara.niiyaani, tattha na dakkho hoti, na analaso, na tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato, na ala.m kaatu.m, na ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo anaaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna ^a^M0.0100^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo na tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchaaya, adhisiile, adhicitte, adhipa~n~naaya. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo anaaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo yassa titthaayatanaa sa"nkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa di.t.thiyaa tassa khantiyaa tassa ruciyaa tassa aadaayassa ^a^T1.0146^ea^ ava.n.ne bha~n~namaane kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vaa dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa ava.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho. yassa vaa pana titthaayatanaa sa"nkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa di.t.thiyaa tassa khantiyaa tassa ruciyaa tassa aadaayassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vaa dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho. ida.m, bhikkhave, sa"nghaatanika.m a~n~natitthiyapubbassa anaaraadhaniiyasmi.m. evampi kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo anaaraadhako hoti. eva.m anaaraadhako kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aagato na upasampaadetabbo.

[03]``katha~nca, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aaraadhako hoti? idha, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo naatikaalena gaama.m pavisati naatidivaa pa.tikkamati. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo na vesiyaagocaro hoti, na vidhavaagocaro hoti, na thullakumaarikaagocaro hoti, na pa.n.dakagocaro hoti, na bhikkhunigocaro hoti. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo ^a^P1.0071^ea^ aaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani kara.niiyaani, tattha dakkho hoti, analaso, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato, ala.m kaatu.m, ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna ^a^V0.0090^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0147^ea^, a~n~natitthiyapubbo tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchaaya, adhisiile, adhicitte, adhipa~n~naaya. evampi, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aaraadhako hoti.

[03]``puna ^a^M0.0101^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo yassa titthaayatanaa sa"nkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa di.t.thiyaa tassa khantiyaa tassa ruciyaa tassa aadaayassa ava.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vaa dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa ava.n.ne bha~n~namaane kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho. yassa vaa pana titthaayatanaa sa"nkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa di.t.thiyaa tassa khantiyaa tassa ruciyaa tassa aadaayassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vaa dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho. ida.m, bhikkhave, sa"nghaatanika.m a~n~natitthiyapubbassa aaraadhaniiyasmi.m. evampi kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aaraadhako hoti. eva.m aaraadhako kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo aagato upasampaadetabbo.

[03]``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyapubbo naggo aagacchati, upajjhaayamuulaka.m ciivara.m pariyesitabba.m. sace acchinnakeso aagacchati, sa"ngho apaloketabbo bha.n.dukammaaya. ye te, bhikkhave, aggikaa ja.tilakaa, te aagataa upasampaadetabbaa, na tesa.m parivaaso daatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? kammavaadino ete, bhikkhave, kiriyavaadino. sace, bhikkhave, jaatiyaa saakiyo a~n~natitthiyapubbo aagacchati ^a^T1.0148^ea^, so aagato upasampaadetabbo, na tassa parivaaso daatabbo. imaaha.m, bhikkhave, ~naatiina.m aave.nika.m parihaara.m dammii''ti.
[06] a~n~natitthiyapubbakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] sattamabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0091^ea^ kho pana samayena magadhesu pa~nca aabaadhaa ussannaa honti -- ku.t.tha.m, ga.n.do, kilaaso, soso, apamaaro. manussaa pa~ncahi aabaadhehi phu.t.thaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadanti -- ``saadhu no, aacariya, tikicchaahii''ti. ``aha.m khvayyo, bahukicco bahukara.niiyo; raajaa ca me maagadho seniyo ^a^P1.0072^ea^ bimbisaaro upa.t.thaatabbo ^a^M0.0102^ea^ itthaagaara~nca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusa"ngho; naaha.m sakkomi tikicchitu''nti. ``sabba.m saapateyya~nca te, aacariya, hotu; maya~nca te daasaa; saadhu, no, aacariya, tikicchaahii''ti. ``aha.m khvayyo, bahukicco bahukara.niiyo raajaa ca me maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro upa.t.thaatabbo itthaagaara~nca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusa"ngho; naaha.m sakkomi tikicchitu''nti. atha kho tesa.m manussaana.m etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa, subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu sayanti. ya.mnuuna maya.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaama. tattha bhikkhuu ceva upa.t.thahissanti, jiivako ca komaarabhacco tikicchissatii''ti ^a^T1.0149^ea^. atha kho te manussaa bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. te bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m, upasampaadesu.m. te bhikkhuu ceva upa.t.thahi.msu jiivako ca komaarabhacco tikicchi. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bahuu gilaane bhikkhuu upa.t.thahantaa yaacanabahulaa vi~n~nattibahulaa viharanti -- gilaanabhatta.m detha, gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m detha, gilaanabhesajja.m dethaati. jiivakopi komaarabhacco bahuu gilaane bhikkhuu tikicchanto a~n~natara.m raajakicca.m parihaapesi.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ a~n~nataropi puriso pa~ncahi aabaadhehi phu.t.tho jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- ``saadhu ma.m, aacariya, tikicchaahii''ti. ``aha.m khvayyo, bahukicco, bahukara.niiyo, raajaa ca me maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro upa.t.thaatabbo itthaagaara~nca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusa"ngho; naaha.m sakkomi tikicchitu''nti. ``sabba.m saapateyya~nca te, aacariya, hotu, aha~nca te daaso; saadhu ma.m, aacariya, tikicchaahii''ti. ``aha.m khvayyo, bahukicco bahukara.niiyo, raajaa ca me maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro upa.t.thaatabbo itthaagaara~nca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusa"ngho, naaha.m sakkomi tikicchitu''nti. atha kho tassa purisassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa, subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu sayanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya.m. tattha bhikkhuu ceva upa.t.thahissanti, jiivako ca komaarabhacco tikicchissati. somhi {soha.m (bahuusu, vimativinodanii.tiikaa oloketabbaa)} arogo vibbhamissaamii''ti ^a^V0.0092^ea^. atha kho so ^a^T1.0150^ea^ puriso bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M0.0103^ea^ pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m, upasampaadesu.m. ta.m bhikkhuu ceva upa.t.thahi.msu, jiivako ca komaarabhacco tikicchi. so arogo vibbhami. addasaa kho jiivako ^a^P1.0073^ea^ komaarabhacco ta.m purisa.m vibbhanta.m, disvaana ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``nanu tva.m, ayyo, bhikkhuusu pabbajito ahosii''ti? ``eva.m, aacariyaa''ti. ``kissa pana tva.m, ayyo, evaruupamakaasii''ti? atha kho so puriso jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etamattha.m aarocesi. jiivako komaarabhacco ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa {bhaddantaa (ka0)} pa~ncahi aabaadhehi phu.t.tha.m pabbaajessantii''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, ayyaa pa~ncahi aabaadhehi phu.t.tha.m na pabbaajeyyu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi aabaadhehi phu.t.tho pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti ^a^T1.0151^ea^ dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] pa~ncaabaadhavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa paccanto kupito hoti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro senaanaayake mahaamatte aa.naapesi -- ``gacchatha, bha.ne, paccanta.m uccinathaa''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho senaanaayakaa mahaamattaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa paccassosu.m. atha kho abhi~n~naataana.m abhi~n~naataana.m yodhaana.m etadahosi -- ``maya.m kho yuddhaabhinandino gacchantaa paapa~nca karoma, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavaama. kena nu kho maya.m upaayena paapaa ca virameyyaama kalyaa.na~nca kareyyaamaa''ti? atha kho tesa.m yodhaana.m etadahosi -- ``ime kho ^a^M0.0104^ea^ sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa. sace kho maya.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaama, eva.m maya.m paapaa ca virameyyaama kalyaa.na~nca kareyyaamaa''ti. atha kho te yodhaa bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. te bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m, upasampaadesu.m. senaanaayakaa mahaamattaa raajabha.te ^a^V0.0093^ea^ pucchi.msu -- ``ki.m nu ^a^P1.0074^ea^ kho, bha.ne, itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca yodhaa na dissantii''ti? ``itthannaamo ca itthannaamo ca, saami, yodhaa bhikkhuusu pabbajitaa''ti. senaanaayakaa mahaamattaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa raajabha.ta.m pabbaajessantii''ti. senaanaayakaa mahaamattaa ra~n~no ^a^T1.0152^ea^ maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro vohaarike mahaamatte pucchi -- ``yo, bha.ne, raajabha.ta.m pabbaajeti, ki.m so pasavatii''ti? ``upajjhaayassa, deva, siisa.m chetabba.m, anussaavakassa {anusaavakassa (ka0)} jivhaa uddharitabbaa, ga.nassa upa.d.dhaphaasukaa bha~njitabbaa''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santi, bhante, raajaano assaddhaa appasannaa. te appamattakenapi bhikkhuu vihe.theyyu.m. saadhu, bhante, ayyaa raajabha.ta.m na pabbaajeyyu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, raajabha.to pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] raajabha.tavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena coro a"ngulimaalo bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. manussaa passitvaa ubbijjantipi, uttasantipi, palaayantipi ^a^T1.0153^ea^, a~n~nenapi gacchanti, a~n~nenapi mukha.m karonti, dvaarampi thakenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^M0.0105^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhajabandha.m cora.m pabbaajessantii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... na, bhikkhave, dhajabandho coro pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] a"ngulimaalacoravatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0094^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena ^a^P1.0075^ea^ anu~n~naata.m hoti -- ``ye sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m; svaakkhaato dhammo, carantu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puriso corika.m katvaa kaaraaya baddho hoti. so kaara.m bhinditvaa palaayitvaa bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. manussaa passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``aya.m so kaarabhedako coro. handa, na.m nemaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``maayyo, eva.m avacuttha. anu~n~naata.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena -- ``ye sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m; svaakkhaato dhammo, carantu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abhayuuvaraa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa, nayime ^a^T1.0154^ea^ labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m. katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa kaarabhedaka.m cora.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, kaarabhedako coro pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] kaarabhedakacoravatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puriso corika.m katvaa palaayitvaa bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. so ca ra~n~no antepure likhito hoti -- yattha passati, tattha hantabboti. manussaa passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``aya.m so likhitako coro. handa, na.m hanaamaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``maayyo, eva.m avacuttha. anu~n~naata.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena ``ye sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m, svaakkhaato dhammo, carantu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abhayuuvaraa ^a^M0.0106^ea^ ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa, nayime labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m. katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa likhitaka.m cora.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, likhitako coro pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] likhitakacoravatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0095^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puriso kasaahato katada.n.dakammo bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa kasaahata.m katada.n.dakamma.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na ^a^T1.0155^ea^, bhikkhave, kasaahato katada.n.dakammo pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] kasaahatavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0076^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puriso lakkha.naahato katada.n.dakammo bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa lakkha.naahata.m katada.n.dakamma.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, lakkha.naahato katada.n.dakammo pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] lakkha.naahatavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puriso i.naayiko palaayitvaa bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. dhaniyaa passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``aya.m so amhaaka.m i.naayiko. handa, na.m nemaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``maayyo, eva.m avacuttha. anu~n~naata.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena -- ``ye sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m; svaakkhaato dhammo, carantu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abhayuuvaraa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa. nayime labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m. katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa i.naayika.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^V0.0096^ea^ aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0107^ea^. na, bhikkhave, i.naayiko pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] i.naayikavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro daaso palaayitvaa bhikkhuusu ^a^T1.0156^ea^ pabbajito hoti. ayyakaa {ayyikaa (ka0), ayirakaa (sii0)} passitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``aya.m so amhaaka.m daaso. handa, na.m nemaa''ti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``maayyo, eva.m avacuttha, anu~n~naata.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena ``ye sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m, svaakkhaato dhammo, carantu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abhayuuvaraa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa, nayime labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m. katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa daasa.m pabbaajessantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, daaso pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] daasavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro kammaarabha.n.du maataapituuhi saddhi.m bha.n.ditvaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. atha kho tassa kammaarabha.n.dussa maataapitaro ta.m kammaarabha.n.du.m vicinantaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuu pucchi.msu -- ``api, bhante, evaruupa.m daaraka.m passeyyaathaa''ti? bhikkhuu ajaana.myeva aaha.msu -- ``na jaanaamaa''ti, apassa.myeva aaha.msu -- ``na passaamaa''ti. atha kho tassa kammaarabha.n.dussa maataapitaro ta.m kammaarabha.n.du.m vicinantaa ^a^P1.0077^ea^ bhikkhuusu pabbajita.m disvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa, dussiilaa musaavaadino. jaana.myeva aaha.msu -- `na jaanaamaa'ti, passa.myeva aaha.msu -- `na passaamaa'ti. aya.m daarako bhikkhuusu ^a^T1.0157^ea^ pabbajito''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tassa kammaarabha.n.dussa maataapituuna.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu ^a^V0.0097^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"ngha.m apaloketu.m bha.n.dukammaayaati.
[06] kammaarabha.n.duvatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaci0 402 aadayo} tena ^a^M0.0108^ea^ kho pana samayena raajagahe sattarasavaggiyaa daarakaa sahaayakaa honti. upaalidaarako tesa.m paamokkho hoti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho upaayena upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti? atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali lekha.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali lekha.m sikkhissati, a"nguliyo dukkhaa bhavissanti. sace kho upaali ga.nana.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali ga.nana.m sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati. sace kho upaali ruupa.m sikkheyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti. atha kho upaalissa maataapituuna.m etadahosi -- ``sace kho upaali ruupa.m sikkhissati, akkhiini dukkhaa bhavissanti. ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa, subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu sayanti ^a^T1.0158^ea^. sace kho upaali sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya, eva.m kho upaali amhaaka.m accayena sukha~nca jiiveyya, na ca kilameyyaa''ti.

[03]assosi kho upaalidaarako maataapituuna.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho upaalidaarako yena te daarakaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te daarake etadavoca -- ``etha maya.m, ayyaa, sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, ayya, pabbajissasi, eva.m mayampi pabbajissaamaa''ti. atha kho te daarakaa ekamekassa maataapitaro upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anaagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. atha kho tesa.m daarakaana.m ^a^P1.0078^ea^ maataapitaro -- ``sabbepime daarakaa samaanacchandaa kalyaa.naadhippaayaa''ti -- anujaani.msu. te bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. te bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m upasampaadesu.m ^a^V0.0098^ea^. te rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya rodanti -- ``yaagu.m detha, bhatta.m detha, khaadaniiya.m dethaa''ti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``aagametha, aavuso, yaava ratti vibhaayati. sace yaagu bhavissati ^a^M0.0109^ea^ pivissatha, sace bhatta.m bhavissati bhu~njissatha, sace khaadaniiya.m bhavissati khaadissatha; no ce bhavissati yaagu vaa bhatta.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa, pi.n.daaya caritvaa bhu~njissathaa''ti. evampi kho te bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi vuccamaanaa rodantiyeva ``yaagu.m detha, bhatta.m detha, khaadaniiya.m dethaa''ti; senaasana.m uhadantipi ummihantipi.

[03]assosi kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m ^a^T1.0159^ea^ paccu.t.thaaya daarakasadda.m. sutvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, daarakasaddo''ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadentii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa jaana.m uunaviisativassa.m puggala.m upasampaadessanti. uunaviisativasso, bhikkhave, puggalo akkhamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m anadhivaasakajaatiko hoti. viisativassova kho, bhikkhave, puggalo khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, jaana.m uunaviisativasso puggalo upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.
[06] upaalidaarakavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natara.m kula.m ahivaatakarogena kaala"nkata.m hoti. tassa pitaaputtakaa sesaa honti. te bhikkhuusu pabbajitvaa ^a^T1.0160^ea^ ekatova pi.n.daaya caranti. atha kho so daarako pituno bhikkhaaya dinnaaya upadhaavitvaa etadavoca -- ``mayhampi, taata, dehi; mayhampi ^a^V0.0099^ea^, taata, dehii''ti. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^P1.0079^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``abrahmacaarino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa. ayampi daarako bhikkhuniyaa jaato''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m ^a^M0.0110^ea^ khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, uunapannarasavasso daarako pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa upa.t.thaakakula.m saddha.m pasanna.m ahivaatakarogena kaala"nkata.m hoti, dve ca daarakaa sesaa honti. te poraa.nakena aaci.n.nakappena bhikkhuu passitvaa upadhaavanti. bhikkhuu apasaadenti. te bhikkhuuhi apasaadiyamaanaa rodanti. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na uunapannarasavasso daarako pabbaajetabbo'ti. ime ca daarakaa uunapannarasavassaa. kena nu kho upaayena ime daarakaa na vinasseyyu''nti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ussahanti pana te, aananda, daarakaa kaake u.d.daapetunti? ussahanti, bhagavaati. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uunapannarasavassa.m daaraka.m kaaku.d.depaka.m pabbaajetu''nti.
[06] ahivaatakarogavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0161^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dve saama.neraa honti -- ka.n.tako ca mahako ca. te a~n~nama~n~na.m duusesu.m. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama saama.neraa evaruupa.m anaacaara.m aacarissantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, ekena dve saama.neraa upa.t.thaapetabbaa. yo upa.t.thaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] ka.n.takavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0100^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavaa tattheva raajagahe vassa.m vasi, tattha hemanta.m, tattha gimha.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``aahundarikaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m disaa andhakaaraa, na imesa.m disaa pakkhaayantii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi ^a^M0.0111^ea^ -- ``gacchaananda, avaapura.na.m {apaapura.na.m (ka0)} aadaaya ^a^P1.0080^ea^ anuparive.niya.m bhikkhuuna.m aarocehi -- ``icchataavuso bhagavaa dakkhi.naagiri.m caarika.m pakkamitu.m. yassaayasmato attho, so aagacchatuu''ti. eva.m, bhante, ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa avaapura.na.m aadaaya anuparive.niya.m bhikkhuuna.m aarocesi -- `icchataavuso bhagavaa dakkhi.naagiri.m caarika.m pakkamitu.m. yassaayasmato attho, so aagacchatuu'''ti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``bhagavataa, aavuso aananda, pa~n~natta.m dasavassaani nissaaya vatthu.m, dasavassena ^a^T1.0162^ea^ nissaya.m daatu.m. tattha ca no gantabba.m bhavissati, nissayo ca gahetabbo bhavissati, ittaro ca vaaso bhavissati, puna ca paccaagantabba.m bhavissati, puna ca nissayo gahetabbo bhavissati. sace amhaaka.m aacariyupajjhaayaa gamissanti, mayampi gamissaama; no ce amhaaka.m aacariyupajjhaayaa gamissanti, mayampi na gamissaama. lahucittakataa no, aavuso aananda, pa~n~naayissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa oga.nena bhikkhusa"nghena dakkhi.naagiri.m caarika.m pakkaami.
[06] aahundarikavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.naagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa punadeva raajagaha.m paccaagacchi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, aananda, tathaagato oga.nena bhikkhusa"nghena dakkhi.naagiri.m caarika.m pakkanto''ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena pa~ncavassaani nissaaya vatthu.m, abyattena yaavajiiva.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^V0.0101^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m. na asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti na asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena, na asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena na asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato ^a^T1.0163^ea^ hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0112^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m. asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena. asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena... asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena... asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m. assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti, kusiito hoti, mu.t.thassati hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m. saddho hoti ^a^P1.0081^ea^, hirimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, upa.t.thitassati hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m. adhisiile siilavipanno hoti, ajjhaacaare aacaaravipanno hoti, atidi.t.thiyaa di.t.thivipanno hoti, appassuto hoti, duppa~n~no hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa ^a^T1.0164^ea^ anissitena vatthabba.m. na adhisiile siilavipanno hoti, na ajjhaacaare aacaaravipanno hoti, na atidi.t.thiyaa di.t.thivipanno hoti, bahussuto hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``aparehipi ^a^V0.0102^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m. aapatti.m na jaanaati, anaapatti.m na jaanaati, lahuka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, garuka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena na svaagataani honti na suvibhattaani na suppavattiini na suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0113^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m. aapatti.m jaanaati, anaapatti.m jaanaati, lahuka.m aapatti.m jaanaati, garuka.m aapatti.m jaanaati, ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``aparehipi, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m. aapatti.m na jaanaati, anaapatti.m na jaanaati, lahuka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, garuka.m aapatti.m na jaanaati, uunapa~ncavasso hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa na anissitena vatthabba.m.

[03]``pa~ncahi ^a^T1.0165^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m. aapatti.m jaanaati, anaapatti.m jaanaati, lahuka.m aapatti.m jaanaati, garuka.m aapatti.m jaanaati, pa~ncavasso vaa hoti atireka pa~ncavasso vaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa anissitena vatthabba.m.

[06] abhayuuvarabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito a.t.thamo.
[06] a.t.thamabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0082^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena kapilavatthu tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kapilavatthu tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena suddhodanassa sakkassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho raahulamaataa devii raahula.m kumaara.m etadavoca -- ``eso te, raahula, pitaa. gacchassu {gacchassa (syaa0)}, daayajja.m yaacaahii''ti. atha kho raahulo kumaaro yena ^a^T1.0168^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato purato, a.t.thaasi -- ``sukhaa te, sama.na, chaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho raahulo kumaaro bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi -- ``daayajja.m me, sama.na, dehi; daayajja.m me, sama.na, dehii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi tva.m, saariputta, raahula.m kumaara.m pabbaajehii''ti. ``kathaaha.m, bhante, raahula.m kumaara.m pabbaajemii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tiihi sara.nagamanehi saama.nerapabbajja.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, pabbaajetabbo -- pa.thama.m kesamassu.m ohaaraapetvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadaapetvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vandaapetvaa ^a^V0.0105^ea^ ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa eva.m vadehiiti vattabbo -- buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; dutiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dutiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaami; tatiyampi buddha.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi ^a^M0.0116^ea^ dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchaami, tatiyampi sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchaamiiti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi tiihi sara.nagamanehi saama.nerapabbajja''nti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto raahula.m kumaara.m pabbaajesi.

[03]atha kho suddhodano sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T1.0169^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho suddhodano sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ekaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m vara.m yaacaamii''ti. ``atikkantavaraa kho, gotama, tathaagataa''ti. ``ya~nca, bhante, kappati, ya~nca anavajja''nti. ``vadehi, gotamaa''ti. ``bhagavati me, bhante, pabbajite anappaka.m dukkha.m ahosi, tathaa nande, adhimatta.m raahule. puttapema.m ^a^P1.0083^ea^, bhante, chavi.m chindati, chavi.m chetvaa camma.m chindati, camma.m chetvaa ma.msa.m chindati, ma.msa.m chetvaa nhaaru.m chindati, nhaaru.m chetvaa a.t.thi.m chindati, a.t.thi.m chetvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m aahacca ti.t.thati. saadhu, bhante, ayyaa ananu~n~naata.m maataapituuhi putta.m na pabbaajeyyu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa suddhodana.m sakka.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho suddhodano sakko bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ananu~n~naato maataapituuhi putto pabbaajetabbo. yo pabbaajeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa kapilavatthusmi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena ^a^T1.0170^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmato saariputtassa upa.t.thaakakula.m aayasmato saariputtassa santike daaraka.m paahesi -- ``ima.m daaraka.m thero pabbaajetuu''ti. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na ekena dve saama.neraa upa.t.thaapetabbaa'ti. aya~nca me raahulo saama.nero. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunaa ^a^V0.0106^ea^ pa.tibalena ekena dve saama.nere upa.t.thaapetu.m, yaavatake ^a^M0.0117^ea^ vaa pana ussahati ovaditu.m anusaasitu.m taavatake upa.t.thaapetunti.
[06] raahulavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ atha kho saama.neraana.m etadahosi -- ``kati nu kho amhaaka.m sikkhaapadaani, kattha ca amhehi sikkhitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saama.neraana.m dasa sikkhaapadaani, tesu ca saama.nerehi sikkhitu.m -- paa.naatipaataa verama.nii {verama.ni, verama.ni.m (ka0)}, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, abrahmacariyaa verama.nii, musaavaadaa verama.nii, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nii, vikaalabhojanaa verama.nii, naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa verama.nii, maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa verama.nii ^a^P1.0084^ea^, uccaasayanamahaasayanaa verama.nii, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa verama.nii. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saama.neraana.m imaani dasa sikkhaapadaani, imesu ca saama.nerehi sikkhitunti.
[06] sikkhaapadakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena saama.neraa bhikkhuusu agaaravaa appatissaa ^a^T1.0171^ea^ asabhaagavuttikaa viharanti. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama saama.neraa bhikkhuusu agaaravaa appatissaa asabhaagavuttikaa viharissantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa saama.nerassa da.n.dakamma.m kaatu.m. bhikkhuuna.m alaabhaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m anatthaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuuna.m avaasaaya parisakkati, bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuuhi bhedeti -- anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa saama.nerassa da.n.dakamma.m kaatunti.
[03]atha ^a^V0.0107^ea^ kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho da.n.dakamma.m kaatabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m kaatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu saama.neraana.m sabba.m sa"nghaaraama.m aavara.na.m karonti. saama.neraa aaraama.m pavisitu.m alabhamaanaa pakkamantipi ^a^M0.0118^ea^, vibbhamantipi, titthiyesupi sa"nkamanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sabbo sa"nghaaraamo aavara.na.m kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yattha vaa vasati, yattha vaa pa.tikkamati, tattha aavara.na.m kaatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu saama.neraana.m mukhadvaarika.m aahaara.m aavara.na.m karonti. manussaa yaagupaanampi sa"nghabhattampi karontaa saama.nere eva.m vadenti -- ``etha, bhante, yaagu.m pivatha; etha, bhante, bhatta.m bhu~njathaa''ti. saama.neraa eva.m ^a^T1.0172^ea^ vadenti -- ``naavuso, labbhaa. bhikkhuuhi aavara.na.m kata''nti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa saama.neraana.m mukhadvaarika.m aahaara.m aavara.na.m karissantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, mukhadvaariko aahaaro aavara.na.m kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] da.n.dakammavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu upajjhaaye ^a^P1.0085^ea^ anaapucchaa saama.neraana.m aavara.na.m karonti. upajjhaayaa gavesanti -- katha.m {kaha.m (ka0)} nu kho amhaaka.m saama.neraa na dissantiiti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``chabbaggiyehi, aavuso, bhikkhuuhi aavara.na.m kata''nti. upajjhaayaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu amhe anaapucchaa amhaaka.m saama.neraana.m aavara.na.m karissantii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, upajjhaaye anaapucchaa aavara.na.m kaatabba.m. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] anaapucchaavara.navatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m saama.nere apalaa.lenti. theraa saama.m dantaka.t.thampi mukhodakampi ga.nhantaa kilamanti ^a^M0.0119^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, a~n~nassa parisaa apalaa.letabbaa. yo apalaa.leyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa ^a^V0.0108^ea^ ti.
[06] apalaa.lanavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa ka.n.tako ^a^T1.0173^ea^ naama saama.nero ka.n.taki.m naama bhikkhuni.m duusesi. bhikkhuu ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama saama.nero evaruupa.m anaacaara.m aacarissatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasaha"ngehi samannaagata.m saama.nera.m naasetu.m. paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, abrahmacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, majjapaayii hoti, buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, bhikkhuniduusako hoti -- anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi dasaha"ngehi samannaagata.m saama.nera.m naasetunti.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro pa.n.dako bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. so dahare dahare bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeti -- ``etha, ma.m aayasmanto duusethaa''ti. bhikkhuu apasaadenti -- ``nassa, pa.n.daka, vinassa, pa.n.daka, ko tayaa attho''ti. so bhikkhuuhi apasaadito mahante mahante mo.ligalle saama.nere upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeti -- ``etha, ma.m aavuso duusethaa''ti. saama.neraa apasaadenti -- ``nassa, pa.n.daka, vinassa, pa.n.daka, ko tayaa attho''ti. so saama.nerehi apasaadito hatthibha.n.de assabha.n.de upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeti -- ``etha, ma.m, aavuso ^a^P1.0086^ea^, duusethaa''ti. hatthibha.n.daa assabha.n.daa duusesu.m. te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``pa.n.dakaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa. yepi imesa.m na pa.n.dakaa, tepi ime pa.n.dake duusenti. eva.m ime sabbeva abrahmacaarino''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m hatthibha.n.daana.m ^a^V0.0109^ea^ assabha.n.daana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. pa.n.dako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0120^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro puraa.nakulaputto khii.nakola~n~no sukhumaalo hoti. atha kho tassa puraa.nakulaputtassa khii.nakola~n~nassa etadahosi -- ``aha.m kho sukhumaalo, na pa.tibalo anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m. kena nu kho aha.m upaayena sukha~nca jiiveyya.m, na ca kilameyya''nti? atha kho tassa puraa.nakulaputtassa khii.nakola~n~nassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhasiilaa sukhasamaacaaraa, subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu sayanesu sayanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m saama.m pattaciivara.m pa.tiyaadetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sa.mvaseyya''nti. atha kho so puraa.nakulaputto khii.nakola~n~no saama.m pattaciivara.m pa.tiyaadetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuu abhivaadeti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kativassosi tva.m, aavuso''ti? ki.m eta.m, aavuso, kativasso naamaati? ko pana te, aavuso, upajjhaayoti? ki.m eta.m ^a^T1.0175^ea^, aavuso, upajjhaayo naamaati? bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadavocu.m -- ``i"nghaavuso upaali, ima.m pabbajita.m anuyu~njaahii''ti. atha kho so puraa.nakulaputto khii.nakola~n~no aayasmataa upaalinaa anuyu~njiyamaano etamattha.m aarocesi. aayasmaa upaali bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. theyyasa.mvaasako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti. titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro naago naagayoniyaa a.t.tiiyati ^a^P1.0087^ea^ haraayati jigucchati. atha kho tassa naagassa etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho aha.m upaayena naagayoniyaa ca parimucceyya.m khippa~nca manussatta.m pa.tilabheyya''nti. atha kho tassa naagassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino ^a^M0.0121^ea^ siilavanto ^a^V0.0110^ea^ kalyaa.nadhammaa. sace kho aha.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya.m, evaaha.m naagayoniyaa ca parimucceyya.m, khippa~nca manussatta.m pa.tilabheyya''nti. atha kho so naago maa.navakava.n.nena bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. ta.m bhikkhuu pabbaajesu.m, upasampaadesu.m. tena kho pana samayena so naago a~n~natarena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m paccantime vihaare pa.tivasati. atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ajjhokaase ca"nkamati. atha kho so ^a^T1.0176^ea^ naago tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissa.t.tho nidda.m okkami. sabbo vihaaro ahinaa pu.n.no, vaatapaanehi bhogaa nikkhantaa honti. atha kho so bhikkhu vihaara.m pavisissaamiiti kavaa.ta.m pa.naamento addasa sabba.m vihaara.m ahinaa pu.n.na.m, vaatapaanehi bhoge nikkhante, disvaana bhiito vissaramakaasi. bhikkhuu upadhaavitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, vissaramakaasii''ti? ``aya.m, aavuso, sabbo vihaaro ahinaa pu.n.no, vaatapaanehi bhogaa nikkhantaa''ti. atha kho so naago tena saddena pa.tibujjhitvaa sake aasane nisiidi. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kosi tva.m, aavuso''ti? ``aha.m, bhante, naago''ti. ``kissa pana tva.m, aavuso, evaruupa.m akaasii''ti? atha kho so naago bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ta.m naaga.m etadavoca -- ``tumhe khottha naagaa aviru.lhidhammaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye. gaccha tva.m, naaga, tattheva caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa uposatha.m upavasa, eva.m tva.m naagayoniyaa ca parimuccissasi, khippa~nca manussatta.m pa.tilabhissasii''ti. atha kho so naago aviru.lhidhammo kiraaha.m imasmi.m dhammavinayeti dukkhii dummano assuuni pavattayamaano vissara.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dveme, bhikkhave, paccayaa naagassa sabhaavapaatukammaaya. yadaa ca sajaatiyaa methuna.m dhamma.m ^a^T1.0177^ea^ pa.tisevati, yadaa ca vissa.t.tho nidda.m okkamati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayaa naagassa sabhaavapaatukammaaya ^a^P1.0088^ea^. tiracchaanagato, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabbo''ti.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro maa.navako maatara.m jiivitaa voropesi. so tena paapakena kammena a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati ^a^M0.0122^ea^. atha kho tassa maa.navakassa etadahosi -- ``kena nu kho aha.m upaayena imassa paapakassa kammassa nikkhanti.m kareyya''nti? atha kho tassa maa.navakassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhammacaarino ^a^V0.0111^ea^ samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa. sace kho aha.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya.m, evaaha.m imassa paapakassa kammassa nikkhanti.m kareyya''nti. atha kho so maa.navako bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadavocu.m -- ``pubbepi kho, aavuso upaali, naago maa.navakava.n.nena bhikkhuusu pabbajito. i"nghaavuso upaali, ima.m maa.navaka.m anuyu~njaahii''ti. atha kho so maa.navako aayasmataa upaalinaa anuyu~njiiyamaano etamattha.m aarocesi. aayasmaa upaali bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... maatughaatako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T1.0178^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro maa.navako pitara.m jiivitaa voropesi. so tena paapakena kammena a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati. atha kho tassa maa.navakassa etadahosi ``kena nu kho aha.m upaayena imassa paapakassa kammassa nikkhanti.m kareyya''nti. atha kho tassa maa.navakassa etadahosi ``ime kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa, sace kho aha.m sama.nesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya.m, evaaha.m imassa paapakassa kammassa nikkhanti.m kareyya''nti. atha kho so maa.navako bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadavocu.m -- ``pubbepi kho, aavuso upaali, naago maa.navakava.n.nena bhikkhuusu pabbajito, i"nghaavuso, upaali, ima.m maa.navaka.m anuyu~njaahii''ti. atha kho so maa.navako aayasmataa upaalinaa anuyu~njiiyamaano etamattha.m aarocesi. aayasmaa upaali bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. pitughaatako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0123^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu saaketaa saavatthi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. antaraamagge coraa nikkhamitvaa ekacce bhikkhuu acchindi.msu, ekacce bhikkhuu hani.msu. saavatthiyaa raajabha.taa nikkhamitvaa ekacce core aggahesu.m, ekacce ^a^T1.0189^ea^ coraa palaayi.msu. ye te palaayi.msu te bhikkhuusu pabbaji.msu, ye te gahitaa te vadhaaya oniyyanti ^a^V0.0112^ea^. addasa.msu kho te palaayitvaa pabbajitaa te core vadhaaya oniyyamaane, disvaana evamaaha.msu -- ``saadhu kho maya.m palaayimhaa, sacaa ca {sace ca, sacajja (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantaraa)} maya.m gayheyyaama {ga.nheyyaama (ka0)}, mayampi evameva ha~n~neyyaamaa''ti ^a^P1.0089^ea^. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, akatthaa''ti? atha kho te pabbajitaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. arahanto ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu. arahantaghaatako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo saaketaa saavatthi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. antaraamagge coraa nikkhamitvaa ekaccaa bhikkhuniyo acchindi.msu, ekaccaa bhikkhuniyo duusesu.m. saavatthiyaa raajabha.taa nikkhamitvaa ekacce core aggahesu.m, ekacce coraa palaayi.msu. ye te palaayi.msu, te bhikkhuusu pabbaji.msu. ye te gahitaa, te vadhaaya oniyyanti. addasa.msu kho te palaayitvaa pabbajitaa te core vadhaaya oniyyamaane, disvaana evamaaha.msu ``saadhu kho maya.m palaayimhaa, sacaa ca maya.m gayheyyaama, mayampi evameva ha~n~neyyaamaa''ti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, akatthaa''ti. atha kho te pabbajitaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuniduusako, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0180^ea^, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti. sa"nghabhedako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti. lohituppaadako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0124^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro ubhatobya~njanako bhikkhuusu pabbajito hoti. so karotipi kaaraapetipi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ubhatobya~njanako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampaadetabbo, upasampanno naasetabboti.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0113^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu anupajjhaayaka.m upasampaadenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, anupajjhaayako upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu sa"nghena upajjhaayena upasampaadenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sa"nghena upajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ga.nena upajjhaayena upasampaadenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, ga.nena upajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pa.n.dakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... theyyasa.mvaasakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... titthiyapakkantakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti ...pe0... tiracchaanagatupajjhaayena ^a^T1.0181^ea^ ^a^P1.0090^ea^ upasampaadenti...pe0... maatughaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... pitughaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... arahantaghaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... bhikkhuniduusakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... sa"nghabhedakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... lohituppaadakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti...pe0... ubhatobya~njanakupajjhaayena upasampaadenti bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, pa.n.dakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, theyyasa.mvaasakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, titthiyapakkantakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagatupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, maatughaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo ...pe0... na, bhikkhave, pitughaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, arahantaghaatakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniduusakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo ^a^M0.0125^ea^...pe0... na, bhikkhave, sa"nghabhedakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, lohituppaadakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo...pe0... na, bhikkhave, ubhatobya~njanakupajjhaayena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0114^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu apattaka.m upasampaadenti. hatthesu pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, apattako upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu aciivaraka.m upasampaadenti ^a^T1.0182^ea^. naggaa pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, aciivarako upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu apattaciivaraka.m upasampaadenti. naggaa hatthesu pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, apattaciivarako upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0126^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu yaacitakena pattaciivarena upasampaadenti. upasampanne pattaciivara.m ^a^P1.0091^ea^ pa.tiharanti. naggaa hatthesu ^a^T1.0183^ea^ pi.n.daaya caranti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti ^a^V0.0115^ea^ -- seyyathaapi titthiyaati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, yaacitakena pattaciivarena upasampaadetabbo. yo upasampaadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
