[03] 120^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu alajjiina.m nissaya.m ^a^T1.0185^ea^ denti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, alajjiina.m nissayo daatabbo. yo dadeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu alajjiina.m nissaaya vasanti. tepi nacirasseva alajjino honti paapakaabhikkhuu. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, alajjiina.m nissaaya vatthabba.m. yo vaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na alajjiina.m nissayo daatabbo, na alajjiina.m nissaaya vatthabba'nti. katha.m nu kho maya.m jaaneyyaama lajji.m vaa alajji.m vaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catuuhapa~ncaaha.m aagametu.m yaava bhikkhusabhaagata.m jaanaamiiti.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0092^ea^ ^a^M0.0128^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na anissitena ^a^V0.0117^ea^ vatthabba'nti. aha~ncamhi nissayakara.niiyo addhaanamaggappa.tipanno, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, addhaanamaggappa.tipannena bhikkhunaa nissaya.m alabhamaanena anissitena vatthunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. te a~n~natara.m aavaasa.m upagacchi.msu. tattha eko bhikkhu gilaano hoti. atha kho tassa gilaanassa bhikkhuno etadahosi ^a^T1.0186^ea^ -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na anissitena vatthabba'nti. aha~ncamhi nissayakara.niiyo gilaano, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa nissaya.m alabhamaanena anissitena vatthunti.

[03]atha kho tassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na anissitena vatthabba'nti. aha~ncamhi nissayakara.niiyo, aya~nca bhikkhu gilaano, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanupa.t.thaakena bhikkhunaa nissaya.m alabhamaanena yaaciyamaanena anissitena vatthunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ara~n~ne viharati. tassa ca tasmi.m senaasane phaasu hoti. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na anissitena vatthabba'nti. aha~ncamhi nissayakara.niiyo ara~n~ne viharaami, mayha~nca imasmi.m senaasane phaasu hoti, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa phaasuvihaara.m sallakkhentena nissaya.m alabhamaanena anissitena vatthu.m -- yadaa patiruupo nissayadaayako aagacchissati, tadaa tassa nissaaya vasissaamiiti.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0129^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmato mahaakassapassa upasampadaapekkho hoti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmato aanandassa santike duuta.m paahesi -- aagacchatu aanando ima.m anussaavessatuuti ^a^T1.0187^ea^ {anussaavessatiiti (syaa0)}. aayasmaa aanando evamaaha -- ``naaha.m ussahaami therassa naama.m ^a^V0.0118^ea^ gahetu.m, garu me thero''ti ^a^P1.0093^ea^. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gottenapi anussaavetunti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmato mahaakassapassa dve upasampadaapekkhaa honti. te vivadanti -- aha.m pa.thama.m upasampajjissaami, aha.m pa.thama.m upasampajjissaamiiti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve ekaanussaavane kaatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaana.m theraana.m upasampadaapekkhaa honti. te vivadanti -- aha.m pa.thama.m upasampajjissaami, aha.m pa.thama.m upasampajjissaamiiti. theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``handa, maya.m, aavuso, sabbeva ekaanussaavane karomaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve tayo ekaanussaavane kaatu.m, ta~nca kho ekena upajjhaayena, na tveva naanupajjhaayenaati.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa kumaarakassapo gabbhaviiso upasampanno ahosi. atha kho aayasmato kumaarakassapassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na uunaviisativasso puggalo upasampaadetabbo'ti. aha~ncamhi gabbhaviiso upasampanno. upasampanno nu khomhi, nanu kho upasampanno''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ya.m, bhikkhave, maatukucchismi.m pa.thama.m citta.m uppanna.m, pa.thama.m vi~n~naa.na.m paatubhuuta.m ^a^T1.0188^ea^, tadupaadaaya saavassa jaati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gabbhaviisa.m upasampaadetunti.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0130^ea^ kho pana samayena upasampannaa dissanti ku.t.thikaapi ga.n.dikaapi kilaasikaapi sosikaapi apamaarikaapi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upasampaadentena terasa {tassa (ka0)} antaraayike dhamme pucchitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, pucchitabbo -- ``santi te evaruupaa aabaadhaa -- ku.t.tha.m, ga.n.do, kilaaso, soso, apamaaro? manussosi ^a^V0.0119^ea^? purisosi? bhujissosi? a.na.nosi? nasi raajabha.to? anu~n~naatosi maataapituuhi? paripu.n.naviisativassosi? paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara.m? ki.mnaamosi? konaamo te upajjhaayo''ti?

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ananusi.t.the upasampadaapekkhe antaraayike dhamme pucchanti. upasampadaapekkhaa vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anusaasitvaa pacchaa antaraayike ^a^P1.0094^ea^ dhamme pucchitunti.

[03]tattheva sa"nghamajjhe anusaasanti. upasampadaapekkhaa tatheva vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekamanta.m anusaasitvaa sa"nghamajjhe antaraayike dhamme pucchitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, anusaasitabbo --

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ pa.thama.m upajjha.m gaahaapetabbo. upajjha.m gaahaapetvaa ^a^T1.0189^ea^ pattaciivara.m aacikkhitabba.m -- aya.m te patto, aya.m sa"nghaa.ti, aya.m uttaraasa"ngo, aya.m antaravaasako. gaccha, amumhi okaase ti.t.thaahiiti.

[03]baalaa abyattaa anusaasanti. duranusi.t.thaa upasampadaapekkhaa vitthaayanti, ma"nkuu honti, na sakkonti vissajjetu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, baalena abyattena anusaasitabbo. yo anusaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena anusaasitunti.

[03]asammataa anusaasanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, asammatena anusaasitabbo. yo anusaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami ^a^M0.0131^ea^, bhikkhave, sammatena anusaasitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo {sammanitabbo (ka0)} -- attanaa vaa {attanaava (syaa0)} attaana.m sammannitabba.m, parena vaa paro sammannitabbo.

[03]katha~nca ^a^V0.0120^ea^ attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m itthannaama.m anusaaseyya''nti. eva.m attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m.

[03]katha~nca pana parena paro sammannitabbo? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamo itthannaama.m anusaaseyyaa''ti ^a^T1.0190^ea^. eva.m parena paro sammannitabbo.

[03]tena sammatena bhikkhunaa upasampadaapekkho upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``su.nasi, itthannaama, aya.m te saccakaalo bhuutakaalo. ya.m jaata.m ta.m sa"nghamajjhe pucchante santa.m atthiiti vattabba.m, asanta.m natthii''ti vattabba.m. maa kho vitthaayi, maa kho ma"nku ahosi. eva.m ta.m pucchissanti -- ``santi te evaruupaa aabaadhaa -- ku.t.tha.m, ga.n.do, kilaaso, soso, apamaaro? manussosi? purisosi? bhujissosi? a.na.nosi? nasi raajabha.to? anu~n~naatosi maataapituuhi? paripu.n.naviisativassosi? paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara.m? ki.mnaamosi? konaamo te upajjhaayo''ti?

[03]ekato aagacchanti. na, bhikkhave, ekato aagantabba.m. anusaasakena pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa sa"ngho ~naapetabbo -- ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho ^a^P1.0095^ea^. anusi.t.tho so mayaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamo aagaccheyyaa''ti. aagacchaahiiti vattabbo.

[03]eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m kaaraapetvaa bhikkhuuna.m paade vandaapetvaa ukku.tika.m nisiidaapetvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhaapetvaa upasampada.m yaacaapetabbo -- ``sa"ngha.m, bhante, upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, bhante, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya. dutiyampi, bhante, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m, bhante, sa"ngho anukampa.m ^a^M0.0132^ea^ upaadaaya. tatiyampi, bhante, sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacaami. ullumpatu ma.m ^a^T1.0191^ea^, bhante, sa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho. yadi ^a^V0.0121^ea^ sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m itthannaama.m antaraayike dhamme puccheyya''nti? su.nasi, itthannaama, aya.m te saccakaalo bhuutakaalo. ya.m jaata.m ta.m pucchaami. santa.m atthiiti vattabba.m, asanta.m natthiiti vattabba.m. santi te evaruupaa aabaadhaa -- ku.t.tha.m ga.n.do kileso soso apamaaro, manussosi, purisosi, bhujissosi, a.na.nosi, nasi raajabha.to, anu~n~naatosi maataapituuhi, paripu.n.naviisativassosi, paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara.m, ki.mnaamosi, konaamo te upajjhaayoti? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho, parisuddho antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeyya itthannaamena upajjhaayena. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho, parisuddho antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena ^a^T1.0192^ea^. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dutiyampi etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho, parisuddho antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``tatiyampi ^a^M0.0133^ea^ etamattha.m vadaami -- su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m itthannaamo itthannaamassa aayasmato upasampadaapekkho, parisuddho antaraayikehi dhammehi, paripu.n.nassa pattaciivara.m. itthannaamo sa"ngha.m upasampada.m yaacati itthannaamena upajjhaayena. sa"ngho itthannaama.m upasampaadeti itthannaamena upajjhaayena. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa upasampadaa itthannaamena upajjhaayena, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``upasampanno ^a^V0.0122^ea^ sa"nghena itthannaamo itthannaamena upajjhaayena. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[06] upasampadaakamma.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ taavadeva chaayaa metabbaa, utuppamaa.na.m aacikkhitabba.m, divasabhaago ^a^T1.0193^ea^ aacikkhitabbo, sa"ngiiti aacikkhitabbaa ^a^P1.0096^ea^, cattaaro nissayaa aacikkhitabbaa {aacikkhitabbaa, cattaari akara.niiyaani aacikkhitabbaani. (ka0)} --

[03]``pi.n.diyaalopabhojana.m nissaaya pabbajjaa. tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo. atirekalaabho -- sa"nghabhatta.m, uddesabhatta.m, nimantana.m, salaakabhatta.m, pakkhika.m, uposathika.m, paa.tipadika.m.
[03]``pa.msukuulaciivara.m nissaaya pabbajjaa. tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo. atirekalaabho -- khoma.m, kappaasika.m, koseyya.m, kambala.m, saa.na.m, bha"nga.m.
[03]``rukkhamuulasenaasana.m nissaaya pabbajjaa. tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo. atirekalaabho -- vihaaro, a.d.dhayogo, paasaado, hammiya.m, guhaa.
[01] ``puutimuttabhesajja.m nissaaya pabbajjaa. tattha te yaavajiiva.m ussaaho kara.niiyo. atirekalaabho -- sappi, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu, phaa.nita''nti.
[06] cattaaro nissayaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0134^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m upasampaadetvaa ekaka.m ohaaya pakkami.msu. so pacchaa ekakova aagacchanto antaraamagge puraa.nadutiyikaaya samaaga~nchi. saa evamaaha -- ``ki.mdaani pabbajitosii''ti? ``aama, pabbajitomhii''ti. ``dullabho kho pabbajitaana.m methuno dhammo; ehi, methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevaa''ti. so tassaa methuna.m dhamma.m ^a^V0.0123^ea^ pa.tisevitvaa cirena agamaasi. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, eva.m cira.m akaasii''ti? atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^T1.0194^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, upasampaadetvaa dutiya.m daatu.m, cattaari ca akara.niiyaani aacikkhitu.m --

[03]``upasampannena bhikkhunaa methuno dhammo na pa.tisevitabbo, antamaso tiracchaanagataayapi. yo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. seyyathaapi naama puriso siisacchinno abhabbo tena sariirabandhanena jiivitu.m, evameva bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. ta.m te yaavajiiva.m akara.niiya.m.

[03]``upasampannena bhikkhunaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m na aadaatabba.m, antamaso ti.nasalaaka.m upaadaaya. yo bhikkhu paada.m vaa paadaaraha.m vaa atirekapaada.m vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. seyyathaapi naama pa.n.dupalaaso bandhanaa pamutto abhabbo haritatthaaya, evameva bhikkhu paada.m vaa paadaaraha.m vaa atirekapaada.m vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyitvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. ta.m te yaavajiiva.m ^a^P1.0097^ea^ akara.niiya.m.

[03]``upasampannena bhikkhunaa sa~ncicca paa.no jiivitaa na voropetabbo, antamaso kunthakipillika.m upaadaaya. yo bhikkhu sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa voropeti, antamaso gabbhapaatana.m upaadaaya, assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. seyyathaapi naama puthusilaa dvedhaa bhinnaa appa.tisandhikaa hoti, evameva bhikkhu sa~ncicca manussaviggaha.m jiivitaa voropetvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo ^a^T1.0195^ea^. ta.m te yaavajiiva.m akara.niiya.m.

[03]``upasampannena ^a^M0.0135^ea^ bhikkhunaa uttarimanussadhammo na ullapitabbo, antamaso `su~n~naagaare abhiramaamii'ti. yo bhikkhu paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapati jhaana.m vaa vimokkha.m vaa samaadhi.m vaa samaapatti.m vaa magga.m vaa phala.m vaa, assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. seyyathaapi naama taalo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viru.lhiyaa, evameva bhikkhu paapiccho icchaapakato asanta.m abhuuta.m uttarimanussadhamma.m ullapitvaa assama.no hoti asakyaputtiyo. ta.m te yaavajiiva.m akara.niiya''nti.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0124^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittako vibbhami. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaaci. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittako vibbhamati. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaacati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``passissasi ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m passissaamiiti, pabbaajetabbo. sacaaha.m na passissaamiiti, na pabbaajetabbo. pabbaajetvaa vattabbo -- ``passissasi ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m passissaamiiti, upasampaadetabbo. sacaaha.m na passissaamiiti, na upasampaadetabbo. upasampaadetvaa vattabbo -- ``passissasi ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m passissaamiiti ^a^T1.0196^ea^, osaaretabbo. sacaaha.m na passissaamiiti, na osaaretabbo. osaaretvaa vattabbo -- ``passasi {passaahi (sii0)} ta.m aapatti''nti? sace passati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce passati, labbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa puna ukkhipitabbo. alabbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa anaapatti sambhoge sa.mvaase.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhittako vibbhamati. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaacati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``pa.tikarissasi ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tikarissaamiiti, pabbaajetabbo ^a^P1.0098^ea^. sacaaha.m na pa.tikarissaamiiti, na pabbaajetabbo. pabbaajetvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tikarissasi ^a^M0.0136^ea^ ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tikarissaamiiti, upasampaadetabbo. sacaaha.m na pa.tikarissaamiiti, na upasampaadetabbo. upasampaadetvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tikarissasi ta.m aapatti''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tikarissaamiiti, osaaretabbo. sacaaha.m na pa.tikarissaamiiti, na osaaretabbo. osaaretvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tikarohi ta.m aapatti''nti. sace pa.tikaroti, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tikaroti labbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa puna ukkhipitabbo. alabbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa anaapatti sambhoge sa.mvaase.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge ukkhittako vibbhamati. so puna paccaagantvaa bhikkhuu upasampada.m yaacati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``pa.tinissajjissasi ta.m paapika.m di.t.thi''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, pabbaajetabbo. sacaaha.m na pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, na pabbaajetabbo. pabbaajetvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tinissajjissasi ^a^V0.0125^ea^ ta.m ^a^T1.0197^ea^ paapika.m di.t.thi''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, upasampaadetabbo. sacaaha.m na pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, na upasampaadetabbo. upasampaadetvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tinissajjissasi ta.m paapika.m di.t.thi''nti? sacaaha.m pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, osaaretabbo. sacaaha.m na pa.tinissajjissaamiiti, na osaaretabbo. osaaretvaa vattabbo -- ``pa.tinissajjehi ta.m paapika.m di.t.thi''nti. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tinissajjati, labbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa puna ukkhipitabbo. alabbhamaanaaya saamaggiyaa anaapatti sambhoge sa.mvaaseti.

labhanti a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pakkha.m. atha kho ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``etarahi kho a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitvaa dhamma.m bhaasanti. te manussaa upasa"nkamanti dhammassavanaaya. te labhanti a~n~natitthiyesu paribbaajakesu pema.m, labhanti pasaada.m, labhanti a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pakkha.m. ya.mnuuna ayyaapi caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipateyyu''nti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi `etarahi kho a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitvaa dhamma.m bhaasanti. te manussaa ^a^T1.0202^ea^ upasa"nkamanti dhammassavanaaya. te labhanti a~n~natitthiyesu paribbaajakesu pema.m, labhanti pasaada.m, labhanti a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pakkha.m. ya.mnuuna ayyaapi caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipateyyu'nti. saadhu, bhante, ayyaapi caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipateyyu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m ^a^V0.0130^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ^a^P1.0102^ea^ padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^M0.0140^ea^ -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa anu~n~naataa caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitunti -- caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitvaa tu.nhii nisiidanti. te manussaa upasa"nkamanti dhammassavanaaya. te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitvaa tu.nhii nisiidissanti, seyyathaapi muugasuukaraa. nanu naama sannipatitehi dhammo bhaasitabbo''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m ^a^T1.0203^ea^ vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa sannipatitvaa dhamma.m bhaasitu''nti.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m yaani mayaa bhikkhuuna.m pa~n~nattaani sikkhaapadaani, taani nesa.m paatimokkhuddesa.m anujaaneyya.m. so nesa.m bhavissati uposathakamma''nti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- idha mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi `ya.mnuunaaha.m yaani mayaa bhikkhuuna.m pa~n~nattaani sikkhaapadaani, taani nesa.m paatimokkhuddesa.m anujaaneyya.m. so nesa.m bhavissati uposathakamma'nti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, uddisitabba.m. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa ^a^T1.0204^ea^ pattakalla.m, sa"ngho uposatha.m kareyya, paatimokkha.m uddiseyya. ki.m sa"nghassa pubbakicca.m? paarisuddhi.m aayasmanto aarocetha ^a^P1.0103^ea^. paatimokkha.m uddisissaami. ta.m sabbeva santaa saadhuka.m su.noma manasi karoma. yassa siyaa aapatti ^a^M0.0141^ea^, so aavikareyya. asantiyaa aapattiyaa tu.nhii bhavitabba.m. tu.nhiibhaavena kho panaayasmante ^a^V0.0131^ea^ parisuddhaati vedissaami. yathaa kho pana paccekapu.t.thassa veyyaakara.na.m hoti, evameva.m {evameva (ka)} evaruupaaya parisaaya yaavatatiya.m anussaavita.m hoti. yo pana bhikkhu yaavatatiya.m anussaaviyamaane saramaano santi.m aapatti.m naavikareyya, sampajaanamusaavaadassa hoti. sampajaanamusaavaado kho panaayasmanto antaraayiko dhammo vutto bhagavataa. tasmaa, saramaanena bhikkhunaa aapannena visuddhaapekkhena santii aapatti aavikaatabbaa; aavikataa hissa phaasu hotii''ti.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ^b^paatimokkha^eb^nti aadimeta.m mukhameta.m pamukhameta.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m. tena vuccati paatimokkhanti. ^b^aayasmanto^eb^ti piyavacanameta.m garuvacanameta.m sagaaravasappatissaadhivacanameta.m aayasmantoti. ^b^uddisissaamii^eb^ti aacikkhissaami desessaami pa~n~napessaami pa.t.thapessaami vivarissaami vibhajissaami ^a^T1.0205^ea^ uttaani.m karissaami {uttaanii karissaami (sii0 syaa0)} pakaasessaami. ^b^ta^eb^nti paatimokkha.m vuccati. ^b^sabbeva santaa^eb^ti yaavatikaa tassaa parisaaya theraa ca navaa ca majjhimaa ca, ete vuccanti sabbeva santaati. ^b^saadhuka.m su.nomaa^eb^ti a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa {sabba.m cetasaa (syaa0 ka0)} samannaaharaama. ^b^manasi karomaa^eb^ti ekaggacittaa avikkhittacittaa avisaaha.tacittaa nisaamema. ^b^yassa siyaa aapattii^eb^ti therassa vaa navassa vaa majjhimassa vaa, pa~ncanna.m vaa aapattikkhandhaana.m a~n~nataraa aapatti, sattanna.m vaa aapattikkhandhaana.m a~n~nataraa aapatti. ^b^so aavikareyyaa^eb^ti so deseyya, so vivareyya, so uttaani.m kareyya, so pakaaseyya sa"nghamajjhe vaa ga.namajjhe vaa ekapuggale vaa. ^b^asantii^eb^ naama ^b^aapatti^eb^ anajjhaapannaa vaa hoti, aapajjitvaa vaa vu.t.thitaa. ^b^tu.nhii bhavitabba^eb^nti adhivaasetabba.m na byaaharitabba.m. ^b^parisuddhaati vedissaamii^eb^ti jaanissaami dhaaressaami. ^b^yathaa kho pana paccekapu.t.thassa veyyaakara.na.m hotii^eb^ti yathaa ekena eko pu.t.tho byaakareyya, evameva tassaa parisaaya jaanitabba.m ma.m pucchatiiti. ^b^evaruupaa^eb^ naama ^b^parisaa^eb^ ^a^T1.0206^ea^ bhikkhuparisaa vuccati. ^b^yaavatatiya.m anussaavita.m hotii^eb^ti sakimpi anussaavita.m hoti, dutiyampi anussaavita.m hoti, tatiyampi anussaavita.m ^a^M0.0142^ea^ hoti. ^b^saramaano^eb^ti jaanamaano sa~njaanamaano. ^b^santii^eb^ naama ^b^aapatti^eb^ ajjhaapannaa vaa hoti, aapajjitvaa vaa avu.t.thitaa. ^b^naavikareyyaa^eb^ti na deseyya, na vivareyya, na uttaani.m kareyya, na pakaaseyya sa"nghamajjhe ^a^P1.0104^ea^ vaa ga.namajjhe vaa ekapuggale vaa. ^b^sampajaanamusaavaadassa hotii^eb^ti. sampajaanamusaavaade ki.m hoti? dukka.ta.m hoti. ^b^antaraayiko dhammo vutto bhagavataa^eb^ti. kissa antaraayiko? pa.thamassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya antaraayiko, dutiyassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya antaraayiko, tatiyassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya antaraayiko, catutthassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya antaraayiko, jhaanaana.m vimokkhaana.m samaadhiina.m samaapattiina.m nekkhammaana.m nissara.naana.m pavivekaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m adhigamaaya ^a^V0.0132^ea^ antaraayiko. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti ta"nkaara.naa. ^b^saramaanenaa^eb^ti jaanamaanena sa~njaanamaanena. ^b^visuddhaapekkhenaa^eb^ti vu.t.thaatukaamena visujjhitukaamena. ^b^santii^eb^ naama ^b^aapatti^eb^ ajjhaapannaa vaa hoti, aapajjitvaa vaa avu.t.thitaa. ^b^aavikaatabbaa^eb^ti aavikaatabbaa sa"nghamajjhe vaa ga.namajjhe vaa ekapuggale vaa. ^b^aavikataa hissa phaasu hotii^eb^ti. kissa phaasu hoti? pa.thamassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya phaasu hoti, dutiyassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya phaasu hoti, tatiyassa jhaanassa ^a^T1.0207^ea^ adhigamaaya phaasu hoti, catutthassa jhaanassa adhigamaaya phaasu hoti, jhaanaana.m vimokkhaana.m samaadhiina.m samaapattiina.m nekkhammaana.m nissara.naana.m pavivekaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m adhigamaaya phaasu hotiiti.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa paatimokkhuddeso anu~n~naatoti -- devasika.m paatimokkha.m uddisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, devasika.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uposathe paatimokkha.m uddisitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa uposathe paatimokkhuddeso anu~n~naatoti -- pakkhassa tikkhattu.m paatimokkha.m uddisanti, caatuddase pannarase a.t.thamiyaa ca pakkhassa. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, pakkhassa tikkhattu.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saki.m pakkhassa caatuddase vaa pannarase vaa paatimokkha.m uddisitunti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0143^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu yathaaparisaaya paatimokkha.m uddisanti sakaaya sakaaya parisaaya. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, yathaaparisaaya ^a^P1.0105^ea^ paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m sakaaya sakaaya parisaaya. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, samaggaana.m uposathakammanti.

[03]atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `samaggaana.m uposathakamma'nti. kittaavataa ^a^T1.0208^ea^ nu kho saamaggii hoti, yaavataa ekaavaaso, udaahu sabbaa pathavii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ettaavataa saamaggii yaavataa ekaavaasoti.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0133^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakappino raajagahe viharati maddakucchimhi migadaaye. atha kho aayasmato mahaakappinassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``gaccheyya.m vaaha.m uposatha.m na vaa gaccheyya.m, gaccheyya.m vaaha.m sa"nghakamma.m na vaa gaccheyya.m, atha khvaaha.m visuddho paramaaya visuddhiyaa''ti? atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato mahaakappinassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- gijjhakuu.te pabbate antarahito maddakucchimhi migadaaye aayasmato mahaakappinassa sammukhe paaturahosi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. aayasmaapi kho mahaakappino bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaakappina.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``nanu te, kappina, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- gaccheyya.m vaaha.m uposatha.m na vaa gaccheyya.m, gaccheyya.m vaaha.m sa"nghakamma.m na vaa gaccheyya.m, atha khvaaha.m visuddho paramaaya visuddhiyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tumhe ce braahma.naa uposatha.m na sakkarissatha na ^a^T1.0209^ea^ garukarissatha {na garu.m karissatha (ka0)} na maanessatha na puujessatha, atha ko carahi uposatha.m sakkarissati garukarissati maanessati puujessati? gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, uposatha.m, maa no agamaasi. gaccha tva.m sa"nghakamma.m, maa no agamaasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa mahaakappino ^a^M0.0144^ea^ bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaakappina.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- maddakucchimhi migadaaye aayasmato mahaakappinassa sammukhe antarahito gijjhakuu.te pabbate paaturahosi.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0106^ea^ kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `ettaavataa saamaggii yaavataa ekaavaaso'ti, kittaavataa nu kho ekaavaaso hotii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, siima.m sammannitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa -- pa.thama.m nimittaa kittetabbaa -- pabbatanimitta.m, paasaa.nanimitta.m, vananimitta.m, rukkhanimitta.m, magganimitta.m, vammikanimitta.m, nadiinimitta.m, udakanimitta.m. nimitte kittetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu ^a^V0.0134^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho ^a^T1.0210^ea^. yaavataa samantaa nimittaa kittitaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho etehi nimittehi siima.m sammanneyya samaanasa.mvaasa.m ekuposatha.m {ekuuposatha.m (ka0)}. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaavataa samantaa nimittaa kittitaa. sa"ngho etehi nimittehi siima.m sammannati samaanasa.mvaasa.m ekuposatha.m. yassaayasmato khamati etehi nimittehi siimaaya sammuti {sammati (syaa0)} samaanasa.mvaasaaya ekuposathaaya, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. sammataa siimaa sa"nghena etehi nimittehi samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa siimaasammuti anu~n~naataati -- atimahatiyo siimaayo sammannanti, catuyojanikaapi pa~ncayojanikaapi chayojanikaapi. bhikkhuu uposatha.m aagacchantaa uddissamaanepi paatimokkhe aagacchanti, uddi.t.thamattepi aagacchanti, antaraapi ^a^M0.0145^ea^ parivasanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, atimahatii siimaa sammannitabbaa, catuyojanikaa vaa pa~ncayojanikaa vaa chayojanikaa vaa. yo sammanneyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tiyojanaparama.m siima.m sammannitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu nadiipaarasiima.m {nadiipaara.m siima.m (sii0 syaa0)} sammannanti. uposatha.m aagacchantaa bhikkhuupi vuyhanti, pattaapi vuyhanti ^a^T1.0211^ea^, ciivaraanipi vuyhanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, nadiipaarasiimaa sammannitabbaa. yo sammanneyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yatthassa dhuvanaavaa vaa dhuvasetu vaa, evaruupa.m nadiipaarasiima.m sammannitunti.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu anuparive.niya.m paatimokkha.m ^a^P1.0107^ea^ uddisanti asa"nketena. aagantukaa bhikkhuu na jaananti -- ``kattha vaa ajjuposatho kariiyissatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, anuparive.niya.m paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m asa"nketena. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uposathaagaara.m sammannitvaa uposatha.m kaatu.m, ya.m sa"ngho aaka"nkhati vihaara.m vaa a.d.dhayoga.m vaa paasaada.m vaa hammiya.m vaa ^a^V0.0135^ea^ guha.m vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabba.m. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m uposathaagaara.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m uposathaagaara.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa vihaarassa uposathaagaarassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo vihaaro uposathaagaara.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena ^a^T1.0212^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase dve uposathaagaaraani sammataani honti. bhikkhuu ubhayattha sannipatanti -- ``idha uposatho kariiyissati, idha uposatho kariiyissatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0146^ea^. na, bhikkhave, ekasmi.m aavaase dve uposathaagaaraani sammannitabbaani. yo sammanneyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m samuuhanitvaa {samuhanitvaa (ka0)} ekattha uposatha.m kaatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samuuhantabba.m. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m uposathaagaara.m samuuhaneyya {samuhaneyya (ka0)}. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m uposathaagaara.m samuuhanati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa uposathaagaarassa samugghaato, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. samuuhata.m sa"nghena itthannaama.m uposathaagaara.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase atikhuddaka.m uposathaagaara.m sammata.m hoti, tadahuposathe mahaabhikkhusa"ngho sannipatito hoti. bhikkhuu asammataaya bhuumiyaa nisinnaa paatimokkha.m ^a^V0.0136^ea^ assosu.m. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `uposathaagaara.m sammannitvaa ^a^P1.0108^ea^ uposatho kaatabbo'ti, maya~ncamhaa asammataaya bhuumiyaa nisinno paatimokkha.m assumhaa, kato nu kho amhaaka.m uposatho, akato ^a^T1.0213^ea^ nu kho''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. sammataaya vaa, bhikkhave, bhuumiyaa nisinnaa asammataaya vaa yato paatimokkha.m su.naati, katovassa uposatho. tena hi, bhikkhave, sa"ngho yaava mahanta.m uposathappamukha.m {uposathamukha.m (syaa0)} aaka"nkhati, taava mahanta.m uposathappamukha.m sammannatu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabba.m. pa.thama.m nimittaa kittetabbaa. nimitte kittetvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaavataa samantaa nimittaa kittitaa. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho etehi nimittehi uposathappamukha.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaavataa samantaa nimittaa kittitaa. sa"ngho etehi nimittehi uposathappamukha.m sammannati. yassaayasmato ^a^M0.0147^ea^ khamati etehi nimittehi uposathappamukhassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. sammata.m sa"nghena etehi nimittehi uposathappamukha.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe navakaa bhikkhuu pa.thamatara.m sannipatitvaa -- ``na taava theraa aagacchantii''ti -- pakkami.msu. uposatho vikaale ahosi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe therehi bhikkhuuhi pa.thamatara.m sannipatitunti.

[03]tena ^a^T1.0214^ea^ kho pana samayena raajagahe sambahulaa aavaasaa samaanasiimaa honti. tattha bhikkhuu vivadanti -- ``amhaaka.m aavaase uposatho kariiyatu, amhaaka.m aavaase uposatho kariiyatuu''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, sambahulaa aavaasaa samaanasiimaa honti. tattha bhikkhuu vivadanti -- ``amhaaka.m aavaase uposatho kariiyatu, amhaaka.m aavaase uposatho kariiyatuu''ti. tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi sabbeheva ekajjha.m sannipatitvaa uposatho kaatabbo. yattha vaa pana thero bhikkhu viharati, tattha sannipatitvaa uposatho kaatabbo, na tveva vaggena sa"nghena uposatho kaatabbo. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0109^ea^ ^a^V0.0137^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakassapo andhakavindaa raajagaha.m uposatha.m aagacchanto antaraamagge nadi.m taranto mana.m vuu.lho ahosi, ciivaraanissa {tena ciivaraanissa (ka0)} allaani. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa te, aavuso, ciivaraani allaanii''ti? ``idhaaha.m, aavuso, andhakavindaa raajagaha.m uposatha.m aagacchanto antaraamagge nadi.m taranto manamhi vuu.lho. tena me ciivaraani allaanii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yaa saa, bhikkhave, sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammannatu. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. byattena ^a^T1.0215^ea^ bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0148^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati etissaa siimaaya ticiivarena avippavaasaaya {avippavaasassa (syaa0)} sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. sammataa saa siimaa sa"nghena ticiivarena avippavaasaa {avippavaaso (syaa0)}. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu bhagavataa ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti anu~n~naataati antaraghare ciivaraani nikkhipanti. taani ciivaraani nassantipi .dayhantipi unduurehipi khajjanti. bhikkhuu ducco.laa honti luukhaciivaraa. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tumhe, aavuso, ducco.laa luukhaciivaraa''ti? ``idha maya.m, aavuso, bhagavataa ticiivarena avippavaasasammuti anu~n~naataati antaraghare ciivaraani nikkhipimhaa ^a^T1.0216^ea^. taani ciivaraani na.t.thaanipi da.d.dhaanipi, unduurehipi khaayitaani, tena maya.m ducco.laa luukhaciivaraa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yaa saa, bhikkhave, sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammannatu, .thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu ^a^V0.0138^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammanneyya, .thapetvaa gaama~nca ^a^P1.0110^ea^ gaamuupacaara~nca. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m sammannati, .thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca. yassaayasmato khamati etissaa siimaaya ticiivarena avippavaasaaya {avippavaasassa (syaa0)} sammuti, .thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. sammataa saa ^a^M0.0149^ea^ siimaa sa"nghena ticiivarena avippavaasaa {avippavaaso (syaa0)}, .thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]``siima.m, bhikkhave, sammannantena pa.thama.m samaanasa.mvaasasiimaa {samaanasa.mvaasaa siimaa (syaa0)} sammannitabbaa ^a^T1.0217^ea^, pacchaa ticiivarena avippavaaso sammannitabbo. siima.m, bhikkhave, samuuhanantena pa.thama.m ticiivarena avippavaaso samuuhantabbo, pacchaa samaanasa.mvaasasiimaa samuuhantabbaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, ticiivarena avippavaaso samuuhantabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yo so sa"nghena ticiivarena avippavaaso sammato, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m samuuhaneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yo so sa"nghena ticiivarena avippavaaso sammato, sa"ngho ta.m ticiivarena avippavaasa.m samuuhanati. yassaayasmato khamati etassa ticiivarena avippavaasassa samugghaato, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. samuuhato so sa"nghena ticiivarena avippavaaso. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[03]eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, siimaa {samaanasa.mvaasaa siimaa (syaa0)}. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa ^a^V0.0139^ea^, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ta.m siima.m samuuhaneyya samaanasa.mvaasa.m ekuposatha.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yaa saa sa"nghena siimaa sammataa samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa, sa"ngho ta.m ^a^T1.0218^ea^ siima.m samuuhanati samaanasa.mvaasa.m ekuposatha.m. yassaayasmato khamati etissaa siimaaya samaanasa.mvaasaaya ekuposathaaya samugghaato, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya. samuuhataa saa siimaa sa"nghena samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ asammataaya ^a^M0.0150^ea^, bhikkhave, siimaaya a.t.thapitaaya, ya.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati, yaa tassa vaa gaamassa gaamasiimaa, nigamassa ^a^T1.0219^ea^ vaa nigamasiimaa, aya.m tattha samaanasa.mvaasaa ^a^P1.0111^ea^ ekuposathaa. agaamake ce, bhikkhave, ara~n~ne samantaa sattabbhantaraa, aya.m tattha samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaa. sabbaa, bhikkhave, nadii asiimaa; sabbo samuddo asiimo; sabbo jaatassaro asiimo. nadiyaa vaa, bhikkhave, samudde vaa jaatassare vaa ya.m majjhimassa purisassa samantaa udakukkhepaa, aya.m tattha samaanasa.mvaasaa ekuposathaati.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu siimaaya siima.m sambhindanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yesa.m, bhikkhave, siimaa pa.thama.m sammataa tesa.m ta.m kamma.m dhammika.m akuppa.m .thaanaaraha.m. yesa.m, bhikkhave, siimaa pacchaa sammataa tesa.m ta.m kamma.m adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m. na, bhikkhave, siimaaya siimaa sambhinditabbaa. yo sambhindeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu siimaaya siima.m ajjhottharanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yesa.m, bhikkhave, siimaa pa.thama.m sammataa tesa.m ta.m kamma.m dhammika.m akuppa.m .thaanaaraha.m. yesa.m, bhikkhave, siimaa pacchaa sammataa tesa.m ta.m kamma.m adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m. na, bhikkhave, siimaaya siimaa ajjhottharitabbaa. yo ajjhotthareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, siima.m sammannantena siimantarika.m .thapetvaa siima.m sammannitunti.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0140^ea^ kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kati nu kho uposathaa''ti? bhagavato ^a^T1.0220^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. dveme, bhikkhave, uposathaa -- caatuddasiko ca pannarasiko ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve uposathaati.

[03]atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kati nu kho uposathakammaanii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, uposathakammaani ^a^M0.0151^ea^ -- adhammena vagga.m uposathakamma.m, adhammena samagga.m uposathakamma.m, dhammena vagga.m uposathakamma.m, dhammena samagga.m uposathakammanti. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m adhammena vagga.m uposathakamma.m, na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m, kaatabba.m. na ca mayaa evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m adhammena samagga.m uposathakamma.m, na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m ^a^P1.0112^ea^ uposathakamma.m kaatabba.m. na ca mayaa evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m dhammena vagga.m uposathakamma.m, na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m kaatabba.m. na ca mayaa evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m dhammena samagga.m uposathakamma.m, evaruupa.m, bhikkhave, uposathakamma.m kaatabba.m, evaruupa~nca mayaa uposathakamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m uposathakamma.m karissaama yadida.m dhammena samagganti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbanti.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kati nu kho paatimokkhuddesaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. pa~ncime, bhikkhave, paatimokkhuddesaa -- nidaana.m uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m. aya.m ^a^T1.0221^ea^ pa.thamo paatimokkhuddeso. nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m. aya.m dutiyo paatimokkhuddeso. nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m. aya.m tatiyo paatimokkhuddeso. nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa dve aniyate uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m. aya.m catuttho paatimokkhuddeso. vitthaareneva pa~ncamo. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca paatimokkhuddesaati.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0141^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa sa.mkhittena paatimokkhuddeso anu~n~naatoti -- sabbakaala.m sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0152^ea^ kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe savarabhaya.m {sa.mcarabhaya.m (syaa0)} ahosi. bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu vitthaarena paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sati antaraaye sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ^a^T1.0222^ea^ asatipi antaraaye sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, asati antaraaye sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. yo uddiseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sati antaraaye sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m. tatrime antaraayaa -- raajantaraayo, corantaraayo, agyantaraayo, udakantaraayo, manussantaraayo, amanussantaraayo ^a^P1.0113^ea^, vaa.lantaraayo, sariisapantaraayo, jiivitantaraayo, brahmacariyantaraayoti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupesu antaraayesu sa.mkhittena paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m, asati antaraaye vitthaarenaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe anajjhi.t.thaa dhamma.m bhaasanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe anajjhi.t.thena dhammo bhaasitabbo. yo bhaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunaa saama.m vaa dhamma.m bhaasitu.m para.m vaa ajjhesitunti.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe asammataa vinaya.m pucchanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe asammatena vinayo pucchitabbo. yo puccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe sammatena vinaya.m pucchitu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo -- attanaa vaa {attanaava (syaa0)} attaana.m sammannitabba.m, parena vaa paro sammannitabbo. katha~nca ^a^T1.0223^ea^ attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0153^ea^ ^a^V0.0142^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m itthannaama.m vinaya.m puccheyya''nti. eva.m attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m.
[03]katha~nca parena paro sammannitabbo? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamo itthannaama.m vinaya.m puccheyyaa''ti. eva.m parena paro sammannitabboti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena pesalaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe sammataa vinaya.m pucchanti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu labhanti aaghaata.m, labhanti appaccaya.m, vadhena tajjenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe sammatenapi parisa.m oloketvaa puggala.m tulayitvaa vinaya.m pucchitunti.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe asammataa vinaya.m vissajjenti {vissajjanti (ka0)}. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe asammatena vinayo vissajjetabbo. yo vissajjeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe sammatena vinaya.m vissajjetu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabba.m. attanaa vaa {attanaava (syaa0)} attaana.m sammannitabba.m, parena vaa paro sammannitabbo. katha~nca ^a^P1.0114^ea^ attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, aha.m ^a^T1.0224^ea^ itthannaamena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti. eva.m attanaava attaana.m sammannitabba.m.
[03]katha~nca parena paro sammannitabbo? byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, itthannaamo itthannaamena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyyaa''ti. eva.m parena paro sammannitabboti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0154^ea^ ^a^V0.0143^ea^ kho pana samayena pesalaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe sammataa vinaya.m vissajjenti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu labhanti aaghaata.m, labhanti appaccaya.m, vadhena tajjenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe sammatenapi parisa.m oloketvaa puggala.m tulayitvaa vinaya.m vissajjetunti.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu anokaasakata.m bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa codenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, anokaasakato bhikkhu aapattiyaa codetabbo. yo codeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa aapattiyaa codetu.m -- karotu aayasmaa okaasa.m, aha.m ta.m vattukaamoti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena pesalaa bhikkhuu chabbaggiye bhikkhuu okaasa.m kaaraapetvaa aapattiyaa codenti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu labhanti aaghaata.m, labhanti appaccaya.m, vadhena tajjenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, katepi okaase puggala.m tulayitvaa aapattiyaa codetunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa ^a^T1.0225^ea^ bhikkhuu -- puramhaaka.m pesalaa bhikkhuu okaasa.m kaaraapentiiti -- pa.tikacceva suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne okaasa.m kaaraapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, suddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m anaapattikaana.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne okaaso kaaraapetabbo. yo kaaraapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puggala.m tulayitvaa okaasa.m kaatu {kaaraapetu.m (syaa0)} nti.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe adhammakamma.m karonti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, adhammakamma.m kaatabba.m. yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati. karontiyeva adhammakamma.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^P1.0115^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, adhammakamme kayiramaane pa.tikkositunti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0155^ea^ ^a^V0.0144^ea^ kho pana samayena pesalaa bhikkhuu chabbaggiyehi bhikkhuuhi adhammakamme kayiramaane pa.tikkosanti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu labhanti aaghaata.m, labhanti appaccaya.m, vadhena tajjenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, di.t.thimpi aavikaatunti. tesa.myeva santike di.t.thi.m aavikaronti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu labhanti aaghaata.m, labhanti appaccaya.m, vadhena tajjenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catuuhi pa~ncahi pa.tikkositu.m, dviihi tiihi di.t.thi.m aavikaatu.m, ekena adhi.t.thaatu.m -- `na meta.m khamatii'ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe paatimokkha.m ^a^T1.0226^ea^ uddisamaanaa sa~ncicca na saaventi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, paatimokkhuddesakena sa~ncicca na saavetabba.m. yo na saaveyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]paarisuddhihaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinnaaya paarisuddhiyaa sa"nghappatto sutto na aaroceti, pamatto na aaroceti, samaapanno na aaroceti, aaha.taa hoti paarisuddhi. paarisuddhihaarakassa anaapatti.
[03]paarisuddhihaarako ce, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0237^ea^, dinnaaya paarisuddhiyaa sa"nghappatto sa~ncicca na aaroceti, aaha.taa hoti paarisuddhi. paarisuddhihaarakassa aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0163^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sannipatatha, bhikkhave, sa"ngho kamma.m karissatii''ti ^a^V0.0152^ea^. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi, bhante, bhikkhu gilaano, so anaagato''ti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa chanda.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbo. tena gilaanena bhikkhunaa eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``chanda.m dammi, chanda.m me hara, chanda.m me aarocehii''ti. kaayena vi~n~naapeti, vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, dinno hoti chando. na kaayena vi~n~naapeti, na vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na kaayena vaacaaya vi~n~naapeti, na dinno hoti chando. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, so, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0122^ea^, gilaano bhikkhu ma~ncena vaa pii.thena vaa sa"nghamajjhe aanetvaa kamma.m kaatabba.m. sace, bhikkhave, gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- ``sace kho maya.m gilaana.m .thaanaa caavessaama, aabaadho vaa abhiva.d.dhissati kaala.mkiriyaa vaa bhavissatii''ti, na, bhikkhave, gilaano bhikkhu .thaanaa caavetabbo. sa"nghena tattha gantvaa kamma.m kaatabba.m. na tveva vaggena sa"nghena kamma.m kaatabba.m. kareyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]chandahaarako ^a^T1.0238^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande tattheva pakkamati, a~n~nassa daatabbo chando. chandahaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande tattheva vibbhamati...pe0... kaala.mkaroti -- saama.nero pa.tijaanaati -- sikkha.m paccakkhaatako pa.tijaanaati -- antimavatthu.m ajjhaapannako pa.tijaanaati -- ummattako pa.tijaanaati -- khittacitto pa.tijaanaati -- vedanaa.t.to pa.tijaanaati -- aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati -- aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati -- paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge ukkhittako pa.tijaanaati -- pa.n.dako pa.tijaanaati -- theyyasa.mvaasako pa.tijaanaati -- titthiyapakkantako pa.tijaanaati -- tiracchaanagato pa.tijaanaati -- maatughaatako pa.tijaanaati -- pitughaatako pa.tijaanaati -- arahantaghaatako pa.tijaanaati -- bhikkhuniduusako pa.tijaanaati -- sa"nghabhedako pa.tijaanaati -- lohituppaadako pa.tijaanaati -- ubhatobya~njanako pa.tijaanaati, a~n~nassa daatabbo chando.

[03]chandahaarako ^a^M0.0164^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande antaraamagge pakkamati, anaaha.to hoti chando. chandahaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande antaraamagge vibbhamati...pe0... ubhatobya~njanako pa.tijaanaati, anaaha.to hoti chando.

[03]chandahaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande sa"nghappatto pakkamati, aaha.to hoti chando. chandahaarako ^a^V0.0153^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande sa"nghappatto vibbhamati...pe0... ubhatobya~njanako pa.tijaanaati, aaha.to hoti chando.
[03]chandahaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinne ^a^T1.0239^ea^ chande sa"nghappatto sutto na aaroceti, pamatto na aaroceti, samaapanno na aaroceti, aaha.to hoti chando. chandahaarakassa anaapatti.

[03]chandahaarako ce, bhikkhave, dinne chande sa"nghappatto sa~ncicca na aaroceti, aaha.to hoti chando. chandahaarakassa aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe paarisuddhi.m dentena chandampi daatu.m, santi sa"nghassa kara.niiyanti.
[03] 166^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m tadahuposathe ~naatakaa ga.nhi.msu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m tadahuposathe ~naatakaa ga.nhanti. te ~naatakaa bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto ima.m bhikkhu.m muhutta.m mu~ncatha, yaavaaya.m bhikkhu uposatha.m karotii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, te ~naatakaa bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto muhutta.m ekamanta.m hotha, yaavaaya.m bhikkhu paarisuddhi.m detii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, te ~naatakaa bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto ima.m bhikkhu.m muhutta.m nissiima.m netha, yaava sa"ngho uposatha.m karotii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, na tveva vaggena sa"nghena uposatho kaatabbo. kareyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]idha ^a^M0.0165^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m tadahuposathe raajaano ga.nhanti,...pe0... coraa ga.nhanti -- dhuttaa ^a^T1.0240^ea^ ga.nhanti -- bhikkhupaccatthikaa ga.nhanti, te bhikkhupaccatthikaa bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto ima.m bhikkhu.m muhutta.m mu~ncatha, yaavaaya.m bhikkhu uposatha.m karotii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, te bhikkhupaccatthikaa bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto muhutta.m ekamanta.m hotha, yaavaaya.m bhikkhu paarisuddhi.m detii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, te bhikkhupaccatthikaa ^a^V0.0154^ea^ bhikkhuuhi evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``i"ngha, tumhe aayasmanto ima.m bhikkhu.m muhutta.m nissiima.m netha, yaava sa"ngho uposatha.m karotii''ti. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, na tveva vaggena sa"nghena uposatho kaatabbo. kareyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0123^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sannipatatha, bhikkhave, atthi sa"nghassa kara.niiya''nti. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi, bhante, gaggo naama bhikkhu ummattako, so anaagato''ti.

[03]``dveme, bhikkhave, ummattakaa -- atthi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ummattako saratipi uposatha.m napi sarati, saratipi sa"nghakamma.m napi sarati, atthi neva sarati; aagacchatipi uposatha.m napi aagacchati, aagacchatipi sa"nghakamma.m napi aagacchati, atthi neva aagacchati. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m ummattako saratipi uposatha.m napi sarati, saratipi sa"nghakamma.m napi sarati, aagacchatipi uposatha.m napi aagacchati, aagacchatipi sa"nghakamma.m ^a^T1.0241^ea^ napi aagacchati, anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupassa ummattakassa ummattakasammutti.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. gaggo bhikkhu ummattako -- saratipi uposatha.m napi sarati, saratipi sa"nghakamma.m napi sarati, aagacchatipi uposatha.m napi aagacchati, aagacchatipi sa"nghakamma.m napi aagacchati. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammuti.m ^a^M0.0166^ea^ dadeyya. sareyya vaa gaggo bhikkhu uposatha.m na vaa sareyya, sareyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa sareyya, aagaccheyya vaa uposatha.m na vaa aagaccheyya, aagaccheyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa aagaccheyya, sa"ngho saha vaa gaggena vinaa vaa gaggena uposatha.m kareyya, sa"nghakamma.m kareyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. gaggo bhikkhu ummattako -- saratipi uposatha.m napi sarati, saratipi sa"nghakamma.m napi sarati, aagacchatipi uposatha.m napi aagacchati, aagacchatipi sa"nghakamma.m napi aagacchati. sa"ngho gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammuti.m ^a^V0.0155^ea^ deti. sareyya vaa gaggo bhikkhu uposatha.m na vaa sareyya, sareyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa sareyya.m, aagaccheyya vaa uposatha.m na vaa aagaccheyya, aagaccheyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa aagaccheyya, sa"ngho saha vaa gaggena, vinaa vaa gaggena uposatha.m karissati, sa"nghakamma.m karissati. yassaayasmato khamati gaggassa bhikkhuno ^a^T1.0242^ea^ ummattakassa ummattakasammutiyaa daana.m -- sareyya vaa gaggo bhikkhu uposatha.m na vaa sareyya, sareyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa sareyya, aagaccheyya vaa uposatha.m na vaa aagaccheyya, aagaccheyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa aagaccheyya, sa"ngho saha vaa gaggena, vinaa vaa gaggena uposatha.m karissati, sa"nghakamma.m karissati, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[03]``dinnaa sa"nghena gaggassa bhikkhuno ummattakassa ummattakasammuti. sareyya vaa gaggo bhikkhu uposatha.m na vaa sareyya, sareyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa sareyya, aagaccheyya vaa uposatha.m na vaa aagaccheyya, aagaccheyya vaa sa"nghakamma.m na vaa aagaccheyya, sa"ngho saha vaa gaggena vinaa vaa gaggena uposatha.m karissati, sa"nghakamma.m karissati. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0124^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe cattaaro bhikkhuu viharanti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `uposatho kaatabbo'ti, maya~ncamhaa cattaaro janaa, katha.m nu kho amhehi uposatho kaatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0167^ea^ aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catunna.m paatimokkha.m uddisitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe tayo bhikkhuu viharanti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m catunna.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m, maya~ncamhaa tayo ^a^T1.0243^ea^ janaa, katha.m nu kho amhehi uposatho kaatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kaatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena te bhikkhuu ~naapetabbaa --
[03]``su.nantu me aayasmantaa. ajjuposatho pannaraso. yadaayasmantaana.m pattakalla.m, maya.m a~n~nama~n~na.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kareyyaamaa''ti.

[03]therena ^a^V0.0156^ea^ bhikkhunaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa te bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaarethaa''ti.

[03]navakena bhikkhunaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa te bhikkhuu evamassu vacaniiyaa -- ``parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaarethaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe dve bhikkhuu viharanti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m catunna.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m, ti.n.nanna.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kaatu.m. maya~ncamhaa dve janaa. katha.m nu kho amhehi uposatho kaatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dvinna.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kaatu.m ^a^T1.0244^ea^. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kaatabbo. therena bhikkhunaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa navo bhikkhu evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaarehi. parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ^a^P1.0125^ea^ ma.m dhaarehi. parisuddho aha.m, aavuso; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaarehii''ti.

[03]navakena ^a^M0.0168^ea^ bhikkhunaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa thero bhikkhu evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaaretha. parisuddho aha.m, bhante; parisuddhoti ma.m dhaarethaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe eko bhikkhu viharati. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m catunna.m paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m, ti.n.nanna.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kaatu.m, dvinna.m paarisuddhiuposatha.m kaatu.m. aha~ncamhi ekako. katha.m nu kho mayaa uposatho kaatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe eko bhikkhu viharati. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa yattha bhikkhuu pa.tikkamanti upa.t.thaanasaalaaya vaa, ma.n.dape vaa, rukkhamuule vaa, so deso sammajjitvaa ^a^V0.0157^ea^ paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapetvaa aasana.m ^a^T1.0245^ea^ pa~n~napetvaa padiipa.m katvaa nisiiditabba.m. sace a~n~ne bhikkhuu aagacchanti, tehi saddhi.m uposatho kaatabbo. no ce aagacchanti, ajja me uposathoti adhi.t.thaatabbo. no ce adhi.t.thaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]tatra, bhikkhave, yattha cattaaro bhikkhuu viharanti, na ekassa paarisuddhi.m aaharitvaa tiihi paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m. uddiseyyu.m ce, aapatti dukka.tassa. tatra, bhikkhave, yattha tayo bhikkhuu viharanti, na ekassa paarisuddhi.m aaharitvaa dviihi paarisuddhiuposatho kaatabbo. kareyyu.m ce, aapatti dukka.tassa. tatra, bhikkhave, yattha dve bhikkhuu viharanti, na ekassa paarisuddhi.m aaharitvaa ekena adhi.t.thaatabbo. adhi.t.thaheyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu tadahuposathe aapatti.m aapanno hoti. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na saapattikena uposatho kaatabbo'ti. aha~ncamhi aapatti.m aapanno. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tadahuposathe aapatti.m aapanno hoti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa ^a^P1.0126^ea^ a~njali.m paggahetvaa ^a^M0.0169^ea^ evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, aavuso, itthannaama.m aapatti.m aapanno, ta.m pa.tidesemii''ti. tena vattabbo -- ``passasii''ti. ``aama ^a^T1.0246^ea^ passaamii''ti. ``aayati.m sa.mvareyyaasii''ti.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tadahuposathe aapattiyaa vematiko hoti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa ukku.tika.m nisiiditvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, aavuso, itthannaamaaya aapattiyaa vematiko; yadaa nibbematiko bhavissaami, tadaa ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamii''ti vatvaa uposatho kaatabbo, paatimokkha.m sotabba.m, na tveva tappaccayaa uposathassa antaraayo kaatabboti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sabhaaga.m aapatti.m desenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sabhaagaa aapatti desetabbaa. yo deseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0158^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sabhaaga.m aapatti.m pa.tigga.nhanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sabhaagaa aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa. yo pa.tigga.nheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu paatimokkhe uddissamaane aapatti.m sarati. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na saapattikena uposatho kaatabbo'ti. aha~ncamhi aapatti.m aapanno. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paatimokkhe uddissamaane ^a^T1.0247^ea^ aapatti.m sarati. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa saamanto bhikkhu evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aha.m, aavuso, itthannaama.m aapatti.m aapanno. ito vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamii''ti vatvaa uposatho kaatabbo, paatimokkha.m sotabba.m, na tveva tappaccayaa uposathassa antaraayo kaatabbo.

[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paatimokkhe uddissamaane aapattiyaa vematiko hoti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa saamanto bhikkhu evamassa vacaniiyo ^a^M0.0170^ea^ -- ``aha.m, aavuso, itthannaamaaya aapattiyaa vematiko. yadaa nibbematiko bhavissaami, tadaa ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamii''ti vatvaa uposatho kaatabbo, paatimokkha.m sotabba.m; na tveva tappaccayaa uposathassa antaraayo kaatabboti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe sabbo sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `na sabhaagaa aapatti desetabbaa, na sabhaagaa aapatti pa.tiggahetabbaa'ti ^a^P1.0127^ea^. aya~nca sabbo sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno. katha.m nu kho amhehi pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]idha ^a^V0.0159^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe sabbo sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti. tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi eko bhikkhu saamantaa aavaasaa sajjuka.m paahetabbo -- gacchaavuso, ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikaritvaa ^a^T1.0248^ea^ aagaccha; maya.m te santike aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamaati. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m sabbo sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno. yadaa a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m suddha.m anaapattika.m passissati, tadaa tassa santike ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissatii''ti vatvaa uposatho kaatabbo, paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m, na tveva tappaccayaa uposathassa antaraayo kaatabbo.
[03]idha pana, bhikkhave, a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase tadahuposathe sabbo sa"ngho sabhaagaaya aapattiyaa vematiko hoti. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. aya.m sabbo sa"ngho sabhaagaaya aapattiyaa vematiko. yadaa nibbematiko bhavissati, tadaa ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissatii''ti vatvaa uposatho kaatabbo, paatimokkha.m uddisitabba.m; na tveva tappaccayaa uposathassa antaraayo kaatabbo.

[03]idha ^a^M0.0171^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase vassuupagato sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti. tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi eko bhikkhu saamantaa aavaasaa sajjuka.m paahetabbo -- gacchaavuso, ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikaritvaa aagaccha; maya.m te santike ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamaati. eva~nceta.m labhetha, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhetha, eko bhikkhu sattaahakaalika.m paahetabbo -- gacchaavuso, ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikaritvaa aagaccha; maya.m te santike ta.m ^a^T1.0249^ea^ aapatti.m pa.tikarissaamaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarasmi.m aavaase sabbo sa"ngho sabhaaga.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti. so na jaanaati tassaa aapattiyaa naamagotta.m. tattha a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii lajjii kukkuccako sikkhaakaamo. tamena.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``yo nu kho, aavuso, eva~nceva~nca karoti, ki.m naama ^a^V0.0160^ea^ so aapatti.m aapajjatii''ti? so evamaaha -- ``yo kho, aavuso, eva~nceva~nca karoti, ima.m naama so aapatti.m aapajjati. ima.m naama tva.m, aavuso, aapatti.m aapanno; pa.tikarohi ta.m aapatti''nti. so evamaaha -- ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, ekova ima.m aapatti.m aapanno; aya.m sabbo ^a^P1.0128^ea^ sa"ngho ima.m aapatti.m aapanno''ti. so evamaaha -- ``ki.m te, aavuso, karissati paro aapanno vaa anaapanno vaa. i"ngha, tva.m, aavuso, sakaaya aapattiyaa vu.t.thaahii''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno vacanena ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikaritvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``yo kira, aavuso, eva~nceva~nca karoti, ima.m naama so aapatti.m aapajjati. ima.m naama tumhe, aavuso, aapatti.m aapannaa; pa.tikarotha ta.m aapatti''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu na icchi.msu tassa bhikkhuno vacanena ^a^T1.0250^ea^ ta.m aapatti.m pa.tikaatu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0139^ea^ ^a^V0.0183^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi ^a^M0.0194^ea^ ^a^T1.0274^ea^ tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade udenena upaasakena sa"ngha.m uddissa vihaaro kaaraapito hoti. so bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchantu bhadantaa, icchaami daana~nca daatu.m, dhamma~nca sotu.m, bhikkhuu ca passitu''nti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``bhagavataa, aavuso, pa~n~natta.m `na vassa.m upagantvaa purima.m vaa temaasa.m pacchima.m vaa temaasa.m avasitvaa caarikaa pakkamitabbaa'ti. aagametu udeno upaasako, yaava bhikkhuu vassa.m vasanti. vassa.mvu.t.thaa aagamissanti. sace panassa accaayika.m kara.niiya.m, tattheva aavaasikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m santike vihaara.m pati.t.thaapetuu''ti. udeno upaasako ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa mayaa pahite na aagacchissanti. aha~nhi daayako kaarako sa"nghupa.t.thaako''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu udenassa upaasakassa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sattanna.m sattaahakara.niiyena pahite gantu.m, na tveva appahite. bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyaa, sikkhamaanaaya, saama.nerassa, saama.neriyaa, upaasakassa, upaasikaaya -- anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imesa.m sattanna.m sattaahakara.niiyena pahite gantu.m, na tveva appahite. sattaaha.m sannivatto kaatabbo''.
