[06] pavaara.naakkhandhako ni.t.thito.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0001^ea^ ^a^P1.0179^ea^ ^a^M0.0265^ea^ ^a^V0.0251^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro asiitiyaa gaamasahassesu issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareti. tena kho pana samayena campaaya.m so.no naama ko.liviso {ko.liviiso (sii0)} se.t.thiputto sukhumaalo hoti. tassa paadatalesu lomaani jaataani honti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani sannipaataapetvaa kenacideva kara.niiyena so.nassa ko.livisassa santike duuta.m paahesi -- aagacchatu so.no, icchaami so.nassa aagatanti. atha kho so.nassa ko.livisassa maataapitaro so.na.m ko.livisa.m etadavocu.m -- ``raajaa te, taata so.na, paade dakkhitukaamo. maa kho tva.m, taata so.na, yena raajaa tena paade abhippasaareyyaasi. ra~n~no purato palla"nkena nisiida. nisinnassa te raajaa paade dakkhissatii''ti. atha kho so.na.m ko.livisa.m sivikaaya aanesu.m. atha kho so.no ko.liviso yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m abhivaadetvaa ra~n~no purato palla"nkena nisiidi. addasaa ^a^T2.0002^ea^ kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro so.nassa ko.livisassa paadatalesu lomaani jaataani. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani di.t.thadhammike atthe anusaasitvaa uyyojesi -- ``tumhe khvattha, bha.ne, mayaa di.t.thadhammike atthe anusaasitaa; gacchatha, ta.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasatha; so no bhagavaa samparaayike atthe anusaasissatii''ti.

[03]atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani yena gijjhakuu.to pabbato tenupasa"nkami.msu. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saagato bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani yenaayasmaa saagato tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^M0.0266^ea^ saagata.m etadavocu.m ^a^P1.0180^ea^ ^a^V0.0252^ea^ -- ``imaani, bhante, asiiti gaamikasahassaani idhuupasa"nkantaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya; saadhu maya.m, bhante, labheyyaama bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``tena hi tumhe aayasmanto muhutta.m idheva taava hotha, yaavaaha.m bhagavanta.m pa.tivedemii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saagato tesa.m asiitiyaa gaamikasahassaana.m purato pekkhamaanaana.m paa.tikaaya nimujjitvaa bhagavato purato ummujjitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaani, bhante, asiiti gaamikasahassaani idhuupasa"nkantaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya; yassa daani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, saagata, vihaarapacchaayaaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa saagato ^a^T2.0003^ea^ bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa pii.tha.m gahetvaa bhagavato purato nimujjitvaa tesa.m asiitiyaa gaamikasahassaana.m purato pekkhamaanaana.m paa.tikaaya ummujjitvaa vihaarapacchaayaaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napeti. atha kho bhagavaa vihaaraa nikkhamitvaa vihaarapacchaayaaya.m pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani aayasmanta.myeva saagata.m samannaaharanti, no tathaa bhagavanta.m. atha kho bhagavaa tesa.m asiitiyaa gaamikasahassaana.m cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya aayasmanta.m saagata.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi tva.m, saagata, bhiyyosomattaaya uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa saagato bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe ca"nkamatipi, ti.t.thatipi, nisiidatipi, seyyampi kappeti, dhuumaayatipi {dhuupaayatipi (sii0), padhuupaayatipi (syaa0)} pajjalatipi, antaradhaayatipi. atha kho aayasmaa saagato aakaase antalikkhe anekavihita.m uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa; saavakohamasmi. satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa; saavakohamasmii''ti. atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani ``acchariya.m vata bho! abbhuta.m vata bho! saavakopi naama eva.m mahiddhiko bhavissati, eva.m mahaanubhaavo, aho nuuna satthaa''ti bhagavanta.myeva samannaaharanti, no ^a^T2.0004^ea^ tathaa aayasmanta.m saagata.m.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0267^ea^ kho bhagavaa tesa.m asiitiyaa gaamikasahassaana.m cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m ^a^P1.0181^ea^, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa te bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitte, muducitte, viniivara.nacitte, udaggacitte, pasannacitte, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva.m tesa.m asiitiyaa gaamikasahassaana.m tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m ^a^V0.0253^ea^ viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.mki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. te di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- ``cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii''ti, evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaama. dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nassa ko.livisassa etadahosi ``yathaa yathaa kho aha.m ^a^T2.0005^ea^ bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m; ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya''nti. atha kho taani asiiti gaamikasahassaani bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkamisu.m. atha kho so.no ko.liviso acirapakkantesu tesu asiitiyaa gaamikasahassesu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so.no ko.liviso bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa yathaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m, bhante, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa ^a^M0.0268^ea^ kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. pabbaajetu ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa''ti. alattha kho so.no ko.liviso bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. acirupasampanno ca ^a^P1.0182^ea^ panaayasmaa so.no siitavane viharati. tassa accaaraddhaviiriyassa ca"nkamato paadaa bhijji.msu. ca"nkamo lohitena phu.to hoti, seyyathaapi gavaaghaatana.m. {ito para.m yaava imassa vatthussa avasaana.m taava paa.tho a0 ni0 6.55 aadayo} atha kho aayasmato so.nassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ye ^a^T2.0006^ea^ kho keci bhagavato saavakaa aaraddhaviiriyaa viharanti, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro. atha ca pana me naanupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogaa; sakkaa bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m, pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njeyya.m, pu~n~naani ca kareyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato so.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi ^a^V0.0254^ea^ naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- gijjhakuu.te pabbate antarahito siitavane paaturahosi. atha kho bhagavaa sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto yenaayasmato so.nassa ca"nkamo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmato so.nassa ca"nkama.m lohitena phu.ta.m, disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kassa nvaaya.m, bhikkhave, ca"nkamo lohitena phu.to, seyyathaapi gavaaghaatana''nti? ``aayasmato, bhante, so.nassa accaaraddhaviiriyassa ca"nkamato paadaa bhijji.msu. tassaaya.m ca"nkamo lohitena phu.to, seyyathaapi gavaaghaatana''nti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa yenaayasmato so.nassa vihaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho so.no bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m so.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``nanu te, so.na, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `ye kho keci bhagavato saavakaa aaraddhaviiriyaa viharanti, aha.m ^a^T2.0007^ea^ tesa.m a~n~nataro. atha ca pana me naanupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati. sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogaa; sakkaa bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m, pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njeyya.m, pu~n~naani ca kareyya'''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti ^a^M0.0269^ea^. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, kusalo tva.m pubbe agaarikabhuuto vii.naaya tantissare''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, yadaa te vii.naaya tantiyo accaayataa honti, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti, kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, yadaa te vii.naaya tantiyo atisithilaa honti, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti, kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, yadaa te vii.naaya tantiyo neva accaayataa honti naatisithilaa, same gu.ne pati.t.thitaa, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti, kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, so.na, accaaraddhaviiriya.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvattati ^a^P1.0183^ea^, atiliinaviiriya.m kosajjaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaatiha tva.m, so.na, viiriyasamata.m adhi.t.thaha, indriyaana~nca samata.m pa.tivijjha, tattha ca nimitta.m ga.nhaahii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa so.no bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso ^a^T2.0008^ea^ sammi~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- siitavane aayasmato so.nassa sammukhe antarahito gijjhakuu.te pabbate paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa so.no aparena samayena viiriyasamata.m adhi.t.thaasi, indriyaana~nca samata.m pa.tivijjhi, tattha ca nimitta.m ^a^V0.0255^ea^ aggahesi. atha kho aayasmaa so.no, eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto, na cirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti -- tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abhi~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa so.no arahata.m ahosi.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato so.nassa arahattappattassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavato santike a~n~na.m byaakareyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa so.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa so.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa~n~nojano ^a^M0.0270^ea^ sammada~n~naa vimutto, so cha.t.thaanaani adhimutto hoti -- nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, pavivekaadhimutto hoti, abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti, upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, ta.nhakkhayaadhimutto hoti ^a^T2.0009^ea^, asammohaadhimutto hoti.

[03]``siyaa kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `kevala.m saddhaamattaka.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa nissaaya nekkhammaadhimutto'ti, na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu, vusitavaa, katakara.niiyo, kara.niiyamattaana.m asamanupassanto katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti.

[03]``siyaa kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa nikaamayamaano ^a^P1.0184^ea^ pavivekaadhimutto'ti. na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu, vusitavaa, katakara.niiyo, kara.niiyamattaana.m {kara.niiya.m attano (a"nguttarapaa.liya.m)} asamanupassanto katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m, khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti.

[03]``siyaa kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `siilabbataparaamaasa.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa saarato paccaagacchanto abyaapajjaadhimutto'ti. na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu, vusitavaa, katakara.niiyo, kara.niiyamattaana.m asamanupassanto ^a^V0.0256^ea^ katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m, khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto ^a^T2.0010^ea^ hoti.
[03]``khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti.
[03]``khayaa ^a^M0.0271^ea^ raagassa viitaraagattaa ta.nhakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa ta.nhakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa ta.nhakkhayaadhimutto hoti.
[03]``khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa asammohaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa asammohaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa asammohaadhimutto hoti.

[03]``eva.m sammaa vimuttacittassa, bhante, bhikkhuno bhusaa cepi cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa cakkhussa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti. amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti, .thita.m, aane~njappatta.m, vaya~ncassaanupassati. bhusaa cepi sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa manassa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti; amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti, .thita.m, aane~njappatta.m, vaya~ncassaanupassati. seyyathaapi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano, puratthimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva na.m sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya; pacchimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa ^a^T2.0011^ea^ vaatavu.t.thi...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva na.m sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya, evameva kho, bhante, eva.m sammaa vimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusaa cepi cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa cakkhussa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti; amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti, .thita.m, aane~njappatta.m, vaya~ncassaanupassati. bhusaa cepi sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa manassa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti; amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti, .thita.m, aane~njappatta.m, vaya~ncassaanupassatii''ti.
[21] nekkhamma.m ^a^V0.0257^ea^ adhimuttassa, paviveka~nca cetaso.
[22] abyaapajjaadhimuttassa, upaadaanakkhayassa ca..
[21] ta.nhakkhayaadhimuttassa ^a^P1.0185^ea^, asammoha~nca cetaso.
[22] disvaa aayatanuppaada.m, sammaa citta.m vimuccati..
[21] tassa ^a^M0.0272^ea^ sammaavimuttassa, santacittassa bhikkhuno.
[22] katassa pa.ticayo natthi, kara.niiya.m na vijjati..
[21] selo yathaa ekagghano, vaatena na samiirati.
[22] eva.m ruupaa rasaa saddaa, gandhaa phassaa ca kevalaa..
[21] i.t.thaa dhammaa ani.t.thaa ca, na pavedhenti taadino.
[22] .thita.m ^a^T2.0012^ea^ citta.m vippamutta.m, vaya~ncassaanupassatiiti..
[06] so.nako.livisavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``eva.m kho, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa a~n~na.m byaakaronti, attho ca vutto, attaa ca anupaniito. atha ca, panidhekacce moghapurisaa hasamaanaka.m, ma~n~ne, a~n~na.m byaakaronti, te pacchaa vighaata.m aapajjantii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m aamantesi -- ``tva.m khosi, so.na, sukhumaalo. anujaanaami te, so.na, ekapalaasika.m upaahana''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, asiitisaka.tavaahe hira~n~na.m ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, sattahatthika~nca aniika.m. athaaha.m bhante ekapalaasika.m ce upaahana.m pariharissaami, tassa me bhavissanti vattaaro `so.no ko.liviso asiitisaka.tavaahe hira~n~na.m ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, sattahatthika~nca aniika.m. so daanaaya.m ekapalaasikaasu upaahanaasu satto'ti. sace bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghassa anujaanissati ahampi paribhu~njissaami; no ce bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghassa anujaanissati, ahampi na paribhu~njissaamii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu ^a^V0.0258^ea^ aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ekapalaasika.m upaahana.m. na, bhikkhave, digu.naa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. na tigu.naa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. na gu.na"ngu.nuupaahanaa {ga.na"nga.nuupaahanaa (bahuusu)} dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] digu.naadiupaahanapa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sabbaniilikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti...pe0... sabbapiitikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti... sabbalohitikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti... sabbama~nji.t.thikaa ^a^T2.0013^ea^ {sabbama~nje.t.thikaa (ka0)} upaahanaayo dhaarenti ^a^M0.0273^ea^... sabbaka.nhaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti... sabbamahaara"ngarattaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti... sabbamahaanaamarattaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sabbaniilikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa...pe0... na sabbapiitikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na sabbalohitikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na sabbama~nji.t.thikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na sabbaka.nhaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na sabbamahaara"ngarattaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na sabbamahaanaamarattaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa ^a^P1.0186^ea^ bhikkhuu niilakavaddhikaa {va.t.tikaa (sii0)} upaahanaayo dhaarenti, piitakavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, lohitakavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, ma~nji.t.thikavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, ka.nhavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, mahaara"ngarattavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, mahaanaamarattavaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, niilakavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa...pe0... na piitakavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na lohitakavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na ma~nji.t.thikavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na ^a^T2.0014^ea^ ka.nhavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na mahaara"ngarattavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na mahaanaamarattavaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu khallakabaddhaa {...bandhaa (ka0)} upaahanaayo dhaarenti...pe0... pu.tabaddhaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, paaligu.n.thimaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, tuulapu.n.nikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti ^a^V0.0259^ea^, tittirapattikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, me.n.davisaa.navaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, ajavisaa.navaddhikaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, vicchikaa.likaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, morapi~ncha {morapi~nja (sii0 syaa0)} parisibbitaa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, citraa upaahanaayo dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0274^ea^, khallakabaddhaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa...pe0... na pu.tabaddhaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na paaligu.n.thimaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na tuulapu.n.nikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na tittirapattikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na me.n.davisaa.navaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na ajavisaa.navaddhikaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na vicchikaa.likaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na morapi~nchaparisibbitaa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na citraa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu siihacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti...pe0... byagghacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo ^a^T2.0015^ea^ dhaarenti, diipicammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, ajinacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, uddacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, majjaaracammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, kaa.lakacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaayo dhaarenti, luvakacammaparikkha.taa {uluukacammaparikkha.taa (yojanaa)} upaahanaayo dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, siihacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa...pe0... na byagghacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na diipicammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na ajinacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na uddacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na majjaaracammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na kaa.lakacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa, na luvakacammaparikkha.taa upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] sabbaniilikaadipa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi, a~n~natarena bhikkhunaa pacchaasama.nena. atha kho so bhikkhu kha~njamaano bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. addasaa kho a~n~nataro upaasako gu.na"ngu.nuupaahanaa aarohitvaa bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaa upaahanaa aarohitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^V0.0260^ea^ abhivaadetvaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T2.0016^ea^ etadavoca -- ``kissa, bhante, ayyo kha~njatii''ti ^a^M0.0275^ea^? ``paadaa me, aavuso, phalitaa''ti {phaalitaati (ka0)}. ``handa, bhante, upaahanaayo''ti. ``ala.m ^a^P1.0187^ea^, aavuso, pa.tikkhittaa bhagavataa gu.na"ngu.nuupaahanaa''ti. ``ga.nhaahetaa, bhikkhu, upaahanaayo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, omukka.m gu.na"ngu.nuupaahana.m. na, bhikkhave, navaa gu.na"ngu.nuupaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] omukkagu.na"ngu.nuupaahanaanujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa ajjhokaase anupaahano ca"nkamati. satthaa anupaahano ca"nkamatiiti, theraapi bhikkhuu anupaahanaa ca"nkamanti. chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu, satthari anupaahane ca"nkamamaane, theresupi bhikkhuusu anupaahanesu ca"nkamamaanesu, saupaahanaa ca"nkamanti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu, satthari anupaahane ca"nkamamaane, theresupi bhikkhuusu anupaahanesu ca"nkamamaanesu, saupaahanaa ca"nkamissantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu, satthari anupaahane ca"nkamamaane, theresupi bhikkhuusu anupaahanesu ca"nkamamaanesu, saupaahanaa ca"nkamantii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa, satthari anupaahane ca"nkamamaane, theresupi bhikkhuusu anupaahanesu ca"nkamamaanesu, saupaahanaa ca"nkamissanti. ime hi naama, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0017^ea^, gihii odaatavatthavasanakaa abhijiivanikassa sippassa kaara.naa aacariyesu sagaaravaa sappatissaa sabhaagavuttikaa viharissanti. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sobhetha, ya.m tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa aacariyesu aacariyamattesu upajjhaayesu upajjhaayamattesu agaaravaa appatissaa asabhaagavuttikaa {sagaaravaa saggatissaa sabhaagavuttikaa (ka0)} vihareyyaatha. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, aacariyesu aacariyamattesu upajjhaayesu upajjhaayamattesu anupaahanesu ca"nkamamaanesu saupaahanena ca"nkamitabba.m. yo ca"nkameyya, aapatti dukka.tassa ^a^V0.0261^ea^. na ca, bhikkhave, ajjhaaraame upaahanaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0276^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno paadakhilaabaadho hoti. ta.m bhikkhuu pariggahetvaa uccaarampi passaavampi nikkhaamenti. addasaa kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto te bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhu.m pariggahetvaa uccaarampi ^a^P1.0188^ea^ passaavampi nikkhaamente, disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``ki.m imassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aabaadho''ti? ``imassa, bhante, aayasmato paadakhilaabaadho; ima.m maya.m pariggahetvaa uccaarampi passaavampi nikkhaamemaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m ^a^T2.0018^ea^ katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yassa paadaa vaa dukkhaa, paadaa vaa phalitaa, paadakhilo vaa aabaadho {paadakhilaabaadho vaa (syaa0)} upaahana.m dhaaretu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu adhotehi paadehi ma~ncampi pii.thampi abhiruhanti; ciivarampi senaasanampi dussati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, `idaani ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa abhiruhissaamii''ti upaahana.m dhaaretunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu rattiyaa uposathaggampi sannisajjampi gacchantaa andhakaare khaa.numpi ka.n.takampi akkamanti; paadaa dukkhaa honti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ajjhaaraame upaahana.m dhaaretu.m, ukka.m, padiipa.m, kattarada.n.danti.
[06] ajjhaaraame upaahanapa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ka.t.thapaadukaayo abhiruhitvaa ajjhokaase ca"nkamanti, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa kha.takha.tasaddaa, anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentaa, seyyathida.m {imaa tiracchaanakathaayo paaci0 508; dii0 ni0 1.7; ma0 ni0 2.223; sa.m0 ni0 5.1080; a0 ni0 10.69 aadayo} -- raajakatha.m, corakatha.m, mahaamattakatha.m, senaakatha.m, bhayakatha.m, yuddhakatha.m, annakatha.m, paanakatha.m, vatthakatha.m, sayanakatha.m, maalaakatha.m, gandhakatha.m, ~naatikatha.m, yaanakatha.m, gaamakatha.m, nigamakatha.m, nagarakatha.m, janapadakatha.m, itthikatha.m {itthikatha.m purisakatha.m (ka0)}, suurakatha.m, visikhaakatha.m, kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m ^a^V0.0262^ea^, pubbapetakatha.m, naanattakatha.m, lokakkhaayika.m, samuddakkhaayika.m, itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa; kii.takampi akkamitvaa maarenti, bhikkhuupi samaadhimhaa caaventi. ye ^a^M0.0277^ea^ te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu rattiyaa ^a^T2.0019^ea^ paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ka.t.thapaadukaayo abhiruhitvaa ajjhokaase ca"nkamissanti, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa kha.takha.tasaddaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m, corakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa, kii.takampi akkamitvaa maaressanti, bhikkhuupi samaadhimhaa caavessantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ka.t.thapaadukaayo abhiruhitvaa ajjhokaase ca"nkamanti, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa kha.takha.tasaddaa, anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentaa, seyyathida.m, -- raajakatha.m, corakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa, kii.takampi akkamitvaa maarenti, bhikkhuupi samaadhimhaa ^a^P1.0189^ea^ caaventii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ka.t.thapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa ka.t.thapaadukaa pa.tikkhittaati -- taalataru.ne chedaapetvaa taalapattapaadukaayo dhaarenti; taani taalataru.naani chinnaani milaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ^a^T2.0020^ea^ taalataru.ne chedaapetvaa taalapattapaadukaayo dhaaressanti; taani taalataru.naani chinnaani milaayanti; ekindriya.m sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jiiva.m vihe.thentii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu taalataru.ne chedaapetvaa taalapattapaadukaayo dhaarenti; taani taalataru.naani chinnaani milaayantii''ti? sacca.m bhagavaati. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa taalataru.ne chedaapetvaa taalapattapaadukaayo dhaaressanti; taani taalataru.naani chinnaani milaayanti. jiivasa~n~nino hi, bhikkhave, manussaa rukkhasmi.m. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m ^a^M0.0278^ea^ vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, taalapattapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0263^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu `bhagavataa taalapattapaadukaa pa.tikkhittaa'ti ve.lutaru.ne chedaapetvaa ve.lupattapaadukaayo dhaarenti. taani ve.lutaru.naani chinnaani milaayanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ve.lutaru.ne chedaapetvaa ve.lupattapaadukaayo dhaaressanti. taani ve.lutaru.naani chinnaani milaayanti. ekindriya.m sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jiiva.m vihe.thentii''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m ^a^T2.0021^ea^ vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... jiivasa~n~nino hi, bhikkhave, manussaa rukkhasmi.m...pe0... na, bhikkhave, ve.lupattapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena bhaddiya.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena bhaddiya.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa bhaddiye viharati jaatiyaa vane. tena kho ^a^P1.0190^ea^ pana samayena bhaddiyaa bhikkhuu anekavihita.m paadukama.n.danaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, ti.napaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, mu~njapaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, pabbajapaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, hintaalapaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, kamalapaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, kambalapaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi, ri~ncanti uddesa.m paripuccha.m adhisiila.m adhicitta.m adhipa~n~na.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhaddiyaa bhikkhuu anekavihita.m paadukama.n.danaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharissanti, ti.napaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, mu~njapaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, pabbajapaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, hintaalapaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, kamalapaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, kambalapaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi, ri~ncissanti uddesa.m paripuccha.m adhisiila.m adhicitta.m adhipa~n~na''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato ^a^T2.0022^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhaddiyaa bhikkhuu anekavihita.m paadukama.n.danaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, ti.napaaduka.m karontipi kaaraapentipi...pe0... ri~ncanti uddesa.m paripuccha.m adhisiila.m adhicitta.m ^a^M0.0279^ea^ adhipa~n~na''nti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... ``katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa anekavihita.m paadukama.n.danaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharissanti, ti.napaaduka.m karissantipi kaaraapessantipi...pe0... ri~ncissanti uddesa.m paripuccha.m adhisiila.m adhicitta.m adhipa~n~na.m. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ti.napaadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na mu~njapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na pabbajapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na hintaalapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na kamalapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa ^a^V0.0264^ea^, na kambalapaadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na sova.n.namayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na ruupiyamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na ma.nimayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na ve.luriyamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na ^a^T2.0023^ea^ phalikamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na ka.msamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na kaacamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na tipumayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na siisamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa, na tambalohamayaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, kaaci sa"nkamaniyaa paadukaa dhaaretabbaa. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tisso paadukaa dhuva.t.thaaniyaa asa"nkamaniyaayo -- vaccapaaduka.m, passaavapaaduka.m, aacamanapaaduka''nti.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhaddiye yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0191^ea^ aciravatiyaa nadiyaa gaaviina.m tarantiina.m visaa.nesupi ga.nhanti, ka.n.nesupi ga.nhanti, giivaayapi ga.nhanti, cheppaapi ga.nhanti, pi.t.thimpi abhiruhanti, rattacittaapi a"ngajaata.m chupanti, vacchatarimpi ogaahetvaa maarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa gaaviina.m tarantiina.m visaa.nesupi gahessanti...pe0... seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m ^a^T2.0024^ea^ vipaacentaana.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave,...pe0... sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, gaaviina.m visaa.nesu gahetabba.m, na ka.n.nesu gahetabba.m, na giivaaya gahetabba.m, na cheppaaya gahetabba.m, na pi.t.thi abhiruhitabbaa ^a^M0.0280^ea^. yo abhiruheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena a"ngajaata.m chupitabba.m. yo chupeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. na vacchatarii maaretabbaa. yo maareyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.
[06] ka.t.thapaadukaadipa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu yaanena yaayanti, itthiyuttenapi purisantarena, purisayuttenapi itthantarena. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``seyyathaapi ga"ngaamahiyaayaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, yaanena yaayitabba.m ^a^V0.0265^ea^. yo yaayeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchanto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya antaraamagge gilaano hoti. atha kho so bhikkhu maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. manussaa ta.m bhikkhu.m disvaa etadavocu.m -- ``kaha.m, bhante, ayyo gamissatii''ti? ``saavatthi.m kho aha.m, aavuso, gamissaami bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``ehi, bhante, gamissaamaa''ti. ``naaha.m, aavuso, sakkomi, gilaanomhii''ti. ``ehi, bhante, yaana.m abhiruhaa''ti. ``ala.m, aavuso, pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa yaana''nti kukkuccaayanto yaana.m naabhiruhi. atha kho so bhikkhu saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T2.0025^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa yaananti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``itthiyutta.m nu kho purisayutta.m nu kho''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami ^a^P1.0192^ea^, bhikkhave, purisayutta.m hatthava.t.takanti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno yaanugghaatena baa.lhatara.m aphaasu ahosi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sivika.m paa.ta"nkinti.
[06] yaanaadipa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu uccaasayanamahaasayanaani dhaarenti, seyyathida.m -- aasandi.m, palla"nka.m, gonaka.m, cittaka.m, pa.tika.m, pa.talika.m, tuulika.m, vikatika.m, uddhalomi.m {undalomi.m (ka0), uddalomi.m (ka0)}, ekantalomi.m, ka.t.tissa.m, koseyya.m ^a^M0.0281^ea^, kuttaka.m, hatthatthara.m, assatthara.m, rathatthara.m, ajinapave.ni.m, kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m, sauttaracchada.m, ubhatolohitakuupadhaananti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, uccaasayanamahaasayanaani dhaaretabbaani, seyyathida.m -- aasandi, palla"nko, gonako, cittako, pa.tikaa, pa.talikaa, tuulikaa, vikatikaa, uddhalomi, ekantalomi, ka.t.tissa.m, koseyya.m, kuttaka.m, hatthatthara.m, assatthara.m, rathatthara.m, ajinapave.ni, kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m, sauttaracchada.m, ubhatolohitakuupadhaana.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] uccaasayanamahaasayanapa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0026^ea^ ^a^V0.0266^ea^ kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa uccaasayanamahaasayanaani pa.tikkhittaaniiti -- mahaacammaani dhaarenti, siihacamma.m byagghacamma.m diipicamma.m. taani ma~ncappamaa.nenapi chinnaani honti, pii.thappamaa.nenapi chinnaani honti, antopi ma~nce pa~n~nattaani honti, bahipi ma~nce pa~n~nattaani honti, antopi pii.the pa~n~nattaani honti, bahipi pii.the pa~n~nattaani honti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, mahaacammaani dhaaretabbaani, siihacamma.m byagghacamma.m diipicamma.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa mahaacammaani pa.tikkhittaaniiti -- gocammaani dhaarenti. taani ma~ncappamaa.nenapi chinnaani honti, pii.thappamaa.nenapi chinnaani honti, antopi ma~nce pa~n~nattaani honti, bahipi ma~nce pa~n~nattaani honti, antopi pii.the pa~n~nattaani honti, bahipi pii.the pa~n~nattaani honti. a~n~nataropi paapabhikkhu a~n~natarassa paapupaasakassa kuluupako hoti. atha kho so paapabhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa paapupaasakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho so ^a^P1.0193^ea^ paapupaasako yena so paapabhikkhu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m paapabhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T2.0027^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena tassa paapupaasakassa vacchako hoti taru.nako abhiruupo dassaniiyo ^a^M0.0282^ea^ paasaadiko citro, seyyathaapi diipicchaapo. atha kho so paapabhikkhu ta.m vacchaka.m sakkacca.m upanijjhaayati. atha kho so paapupaasako ta.m paapabhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kissa, bhante, ayyo ima.m vacchaka.m sakkacca.m upanijjhaayatii''ti? ``attho me, aavuso, imassa vacchakassa cammenaa''ti. atha kho so paapupaasako ta.m vacchaka.m vadhitvaa camma.m vidhunitvaa tassa paapabhikkhuno paadaasi. atha kho so paapabhikkhu ta.m camma.m sa"nghaa.tiyaa pa.ticchaadetvaa agamaasi. atha kho saa gaavii vacchagiddhinii ta.m paapabhikkhu.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tyaaya.m, aavuso, gaavii pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhii''ti? ``ahampi kho, aavuso, na jaanaami kena {kenaci (ka0)} myaaya.m gaavii pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhii''ti. tena kho pana samayena tassa paapabhikkhuno sa"nghaa.ti lohitena makkhitaa hoti. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``aya.m pana te, aavuso, sa"nghaa.ti ki.m kataa''ti? atha kho so paapabhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m ^a^V0.0267^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso, paa.naatipaate samaadapesii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhu paa.naatipaate samaadapessati, nanu bhagavataa anekapariyaayena paa.naatipaato garahito, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii pasatthaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]atha ^a^T2.0028^ea^ kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ta.m paapabhikkhu.m pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhikkhu, paa.naatipaate samaadapesii''ti? sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, paa.naatipaate samaadapessasi, nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena paa.naatipaato garahito, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii pasatthaa. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, paa.naatipaate samaadapetabba.m. yo samaadapeyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo. na, bhikkhave, gocamma.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, ki~nci camma.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] sabbacammapa.tikkhepo ni.t.thito.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0194^ea^ ^a^M0.0283^ea^ kho pana samayena manussaana.m ma~ncampi pii.thampi cammonaddhaani honti, cammavinaddhaani. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naabhinisiidanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gihivikata.m abhinisiiditu.m, na tveva abhinipajjitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena vihaaraa cammavaddhehi ogumphiyanti {ogumbhiyanti (ka0)}. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa naabhinisiidanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bandhanamatta.m abhinisiiditunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu saupaahanaa gaama.m pavisanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0268^ea^. na, bhikkhave, saupaahanena ^a^T2.0029^ea^ gaamo pavisitabbo. yo paviseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti, na sakkoti vinaa upaahanena gaama.m pavisitu.m. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanena bhikkhunaa saupaahanena gaama.m pavisitunti.
[06] gihivikataanu~n~naataadi ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ {udaa0 46 sokasuttena sa.msanditvaa passitabba.m} tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakaccaano avantiisu viharati kuraraghare {kururaghare (ka0)} papatake {papaate (sii0 syaa0) pavatthe (udaa0 46)} pabbate. tena kho pana samayena so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa yathaaha.m, bhante, ayyena mahaakaccaanena dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m, bhante, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m ^a^M0.0284^ea^. pabbaajetu ma.m, bhante, ayyo mahaakaccaano''ti. ( ) {(eva.m vutte aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano so.na.m upaasaka.m ku.tika.n.na.m etadavoca) (syaa0 udaa0 46)} ``dukkara.m kho, so.na, yaavajiiva.m ekaseyya.m ekabhatta.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. i"ngha, tva.m, so.na ^a^T2.0030^ea^, tattheva agaarikabhuuto buddhaana.m saasana.m anuyu~nja, kaalayutta.m ekaseyya.m ekabhatta.m brahmacariya''nti. atha kho so.nassa upaasakassa ku.tika.n.nassa yo ahosi pabbajjaabhisa"nkhaaro so pa.tippassambhi. dutiyampi kho so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no ^a^P1.0195^ea^...pe0... tatiyampi kho so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so.no upaasako ku.tika.n.no aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa yathaaha.m, bhante, ayyena mahaakaccaanena dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m, bhante, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. pabbaajetu ma.m, bhante, ayyo mahaakaccaano''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^V0.0269^ea^ mahaakaccaano so.na.m upaasaka.m ku.tika.n.na.m pabbaajesi. tena kho pana samayena avantidakkhi.naapatho appabhikkhuko hoti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano ti.n.na.m vassaana.m accayena kicchena kasirena tato tato dasavagga.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m upasampaadesi.
[06] so.naku.tika.n.navatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03]atha kho aayasmato so.nassa vassa.mvu.t.thassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``sutoyeva kho me so bhagavaa ediso ca ediso caati, na ca mayaa sammukhaa ^a^T2.0031^ea^ di.t.tho, gaccheyyaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m, sace ma.m upajjhaayo anujaaneyyaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa so.no saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa so.no aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa ^a^M0.0285^ea^ pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `suto yeva kho me so bhagavaa ediso ca ediso caati, na ca mayaa sammukhaa di.t.tho, gaccheyyaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m, sace ma.m upajjhaayo anujaaneyyaa'ti; gaccheyyaaha.m, bhante, ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m, sace ma.m upajjhaayo anujaanaatii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, so.na. gaccha tva.m, so.na, ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m. dakkhissasi tva.m, so.na, ta.m bhagavanta.m paasaadika.m pasaadaniiya.m santindriya.m santamaanasa.m uttamadamathasamatha.m amanuppatta.m danta.m gutta.m yatindriya.m naaga.m. tena hi tva.m, so.na, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vanda -- `upajjhaayo me, bhante, aayasmaa mahaakaccaano bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'''ti. eva~nca vadehi -- ``avantidakkhi.naapatho, bhante, appabhikkhuko, ti.n.na.m me vassaana.m accayena kicchena kasirena tato tato dasavagga.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa upasampada.m alattha.m; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe ^a^T2.0032^ea^ appatarena ga.nena upasampada.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, ka.nhuttaraa bhuumi kharaa goka.n.takahataa; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe ^a^P1.0196^ea^ gu.na"ngu.nuupaahana.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, nahaanagarukaa manussaa udakasuddhikaa; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe dhuvanahaana.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ^a^V0.0270^ea^ ajacamma.m migacamma.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, majjhimesu janapadesu eraguu moraguu majjaaruu {majjhaaruu (ka0)} jantuu, evameva kho, bhante, avantidakkhi.naapathe cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe cammaani atthara.naani anujaaneyya, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m. etarahi, bhante, manussaa nissiimagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivara.m denti -- `ima.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa demaa'''ti. te aagantvaa aarocenti -- `itthannaamehi te, aavuso, manussehi ciivara.m dinna'nti te kukkuccaayantaa na saadiyanti -- `maa no nissaggiya.m ahosii'ti; appeva naama bhagavaa ciivare pariyaaya.m aacikkheyyaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa so.no aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^M0.0286^ea^ yena saavatthi tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^T2.0033^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``imassa, aananda, aagantukassa bhikkhuno senaasana.m pa~n~naapehii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando -- ``yassa kho ma.m bhagavaa aa.naapeti, `imassa, aananda, aagantukassa bhikkhuno senaasana.m pa~n~naapehii'ti, icchati bhagavaa tena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m ekavihaare vatthu.m, icchati bhagavaa aayasmataa so.nena saddhi.m ekavihaare vatthu''nti -- yasmi.m vihaare bhagavaa viharati tasmi.m vihaare aayasmato so.nassa senaasana.m pa~n~naapesi.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m ajjhokaase viitinaametvaa vihaara.m paavisi. aayasmaapi kho so.no bahudeva ratti.m ajjhokaase viitinaametvaa vihaara.m paavisi. atha kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya aayasmanta.m so.na.m ajjhesi -- ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, bhikkhu, dhammo bhaasitu''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa so.no bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa sabbaaneva a.t.thakavaggikaani sarena abhaasi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato so.nassa sarabha~n~napariyosaane abbhaanumodi -- ``saadhu, saadhu, bhikkhu. suggahitaani kho te, bhikkhu, a.t.thakavaggikaani ^a^P1.0197^ea^, sumanasikataani suupadhaaritaani. kalyaa.niyaapi vaacaaya samannaagato, vissa.t.thaaya, anelagalaaya {ane.lagalaaya (ka0)}, atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa. kativassosi tva.m, bhikkhuu''ti? ``ekavassoha.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``kissa pana tva.m, bhikkhu, eva.m cira.m akaasii''ti? ``cira.m di.t.tho me, bhante, kaamesu aadiinavo, api ca sambaadhaa ^a^T2.0034^ea^ gharaavaasaa bahukiccaa bahukara.niiyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] {udaa0 46 udaanepi} ``disvaa ^a^V0.0271^ea^ aadiinava.m loke, ~natvaa dhamma.m niruupadhi.m.
[22] ariyo na ramatii paape, paape na ramatii sucii''ti..

[03]atha kho aayasmaa so.no -- pa.tisammodati kho ma.m bhagavaa, aya.m khvassa kaalo ya.m me upajjhaayo paridassiiti -- u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^M0.0287^ea^ etadavoca -- ``upajjhaayo me, bhante, aayasmaa mahaakaccaano bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti avantidakkhi.naapatho, bhante, appabhikkhuko. ti.n.na.m me vassaana.m accayena kicchena kasirena tato tato dasavagga.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa upasampada.m alattha.m, appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe appatarena ga.nena upasampada.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, ka.nhuttaraa bhuumi kharaa goka.n.takahataa; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe gu.na"ngu.nuupaahana.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, nahaanagarukaa manussaa udakasuddhikaa, appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe dhuvanahaana.m anujaaneyya. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhante, cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, majjhimesu janapadesu eraguu moraguu majjaaruu jantuu ^a^T2.0035^ea^, evameva kho, bhante, avantidakkhi.naapathe cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m; appeva naama bhagavaa avantidakkhi.naapathe cammaani atthara.naani anujaaneyya, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m. etarahi, bhante, manussaa nissiimagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivara.m denti -- `ima.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa demaa'ti. te aagantvaa aarocenti -- `itthannaamehi te, aavuso, manussehi ciivara.m dinna'nti. te kukkuccaayantaa na saadiyanti -- `maa no nissaggiya.m ahosii'ti; appeva naama bhagavaa ciivare pariyaaya.m aacikkheyyaa''ti.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``avantidakkhi.naapatho, bhikkhave, appabhikkhuko. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapa~ncamena ga.nena upasampada.m. tatrime paccantimaa janapadaa -- puratthimaaya disaaya gaja"ngala.m {kaja"ngala.m (sii0 syaa0)} naama nigamo, tassa parena mahaasaalaa, tato paraa paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe; puratthimadakkhi.naaya disaaya sallavatii {salalavatii (sii0)} naama nadii, tato paraa paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe; dakkhi.naaya disaaya setaka.n.nika.m naama nigamo, tato paraa paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe; pacchimaaya disaaya thuu.na.m naama braahma.nagaamo, tato paraa paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe; uttaraaya ^a^M0.0288^ea^ disaaya usiiraddhajo naama pabbato, tato paraa paccantimaa janapadaa, orato majjhe ^a^T2.0036^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, evaruupesu paccantimesu ^a^V0.0272^ea^ janapadesu vinayadharapa~ncamena ga.nena upasampada.m. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhikkhave, ka.nhuttaraa bhuumi kharaa goka.n.takahataa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu gu.na"ngu.nuupaahana.m. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhikkhave, nahaanagarukaa manussaa udakasuddhikaa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu dhuvanahaana.m. avantidakkhi.naapathe, bhikkhave, cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m ^a^P1.0198^ea^ migacamma.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, majjhimesu janapadesu eraguu moraguu majjaaruu jantuu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, avantidakkhi.naapathe cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammaani atthara.naani, e.lakacamma.m ajacamma.m migacamma.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, manussaa nissiimagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivara.m denti -- `ima.m ciivara.m itthannaamassa demaa'ti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saaditu.m, na taava ta.m ga.nanuupaga.m yaava na hattha.m gacchatii''ti.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0199^ea^ ^a^M0.0290^ea^ ^a^V0.0274^ea^ ^a^T2.0038^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m saaradikena aabaadhena phu.t.thaana.m yaagupi piitaa uggacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m uggacchati. te tena kisaa honti, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa. addasaa kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu kise luukhe dubba.n.ne uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaate dhamanisanthatagatte, disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, aananda, etarahi bhikkhuu kisaa, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa''ti? ``etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuuna.m saaradikena aabaadhena phu.t.thaana.m yaagupi piitaa uggacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m uggacchati. te tena kisaa honti, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa''ti. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``etarahi kho bhikkhuuna.m saaradikena aabaadhena phu.t.thaana.m yaagupi piitaa uggacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m uggacchati. te tena kisaa honti, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa. ki.m nu kho aha.m bhikkhuuna.m bhesajja.m anujaaneyya.m, ya.m bhesajja~nceva assa bhesajjasammata~nca lokassa, aahaarattha~nca phareyya, na ca o.laariko aahaaro pa~n~naayeyyaa''ti? atha kho bhagavato ^a^T2.0039^ea^ etadahosi -- ``imaani kho pa~nca bhesajjaani, seyyathida.m -- sappi, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu, phaa.nita.m; bhesajjaani ceva bhesajjasammataani ca lokassa, aahaarattha~nca pharanti, na ca o.laariko aahaaro pa~n~naayati. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m imaani pa~nca bhesajjaani anujaaneyya.m, kaale pa.tiggahetvaa kaale paribhu~njitu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idha mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `etarahi kho bhikkhuuna.m saaradikena aabaadhena ^a^V0.0275^ea^ phu.t.thaana.m yaagupi piitaa uggacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m uggacchati. te tena kisaa honti, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa. ki.m nu kho aha.m bhikkhuuna.m bhesajja.m anujaaneyya.m, ya.m bhesajja~nceva assa bhesajjasammata~nca lokassa, aahaarattha~nca ^a^M0.0291^ea^ phareyya, na ca o.laariko aahaaro pa~n~naayeyyaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi `imaani kho pa~nca bhesajjaani ^a^P1.0200^ea^, seyyathida.m -- sappi, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu, phaa.nita.m; bhesajjaani ceva bhesajjasammataani ca lokassa, aahaarattha~nca pharanti, na ca o.laariko aahaaro pa~n~naayati. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m imaani pa~nca bhesajjaani anujaaneyya.m, kaale pa.tiggahetvaa kaale paribhu~njitu'nti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, taani pa~nca bhesajjaani kaale pa.tiggahetvaa kaale paribhu~njitu''nti.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0040^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu taani pa~nca bhesajjaani kaale pa.tiggahetvaa kaale paribhu~njanti. tesa.m yaanipi taani paakatikaani luukhaani bhojanaani taanipi nacchaadenti, pageva senesitaani {senesikaani (sii0 syaa0), senehikaani (yojanaa)}. te tena ceva saaradikena aabaadhena phu.t.thaa, iminaa ca bhattaacchaadakena {bhattaacchannakena (ka0)}, tadubhayena bhiyyosomattaaya kisaa honti, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa. addasaa kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu bhiyyosomattaaya kise luukhe dubba.n.ne uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaate dhamanisanthatagatte, disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, aananda, etarahi bhikkhuu bhiyyosomattaaya kisaa, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa''ti? ``etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu taani ca pa~nca bhesajjaani kaale pa.tiggahetvaa kaale paribhu~njanti. tesa.m yaanipi taani paakatikaani luukhaani bhojanaani taanipi nacchaadenti, pageva senesikaani. te tena ceva saaradikena aabaadhena phu.t.thaa, iminaa ca bhattaacchaadakena, tadubhayena bhiyyosomattaaya kisaa, luukhaa, dubba.n.naa, uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa, dhamanisanthatagattaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, taani pa~nca bhesajjaani pa.tiggahetvaa kaalepi vikaalepi paribhu~njitu''nti.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0041^ea^ kho pana samayena gilaanaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vasehi bhesajjehi attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vasaani bhesajjaani -- acchavasa.m, macchavasa.m, susukaavasa.m ^a^M0.0292^ea^, suukaravasa.m, gadrabhavasa.m -- kaale pa.tiggahita.m kaale nippakka.m {nipakka.m (ka0)} kaale sa.msa.t.tha.m telaparibhogena paribhu~njitu.m. vikaale ce, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahita.m vikaale nippakka.m vikaale sa.msa.t.tha.m, ta.m ce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti ti.n.na.m dukka.taana.m. kaale ce, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahita.m vikaale nippakka.m vikaale sa.msa.t.tha.m, ta.m ce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m. kaale ce, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahita.m ^a^V0.0276^ea^ kaale nippakka.m vikaale sa.msa.t.tha.m, ta.m ce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. kaale ce, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahita.m kaale nippakka.m kaale sa.msa.t.tha.m, ta.m ce paribhu~njeyya, anaapattiiti.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa upajjhaayassa ^a^T2.0044^ea^ aayasmato bela.t.thasiisassa thullakacchaabaadho hoti. tassa lasikaaya ciivaraani kaaye lagganti, taani bhikkhuu udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhanti. addasaa kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto te bhikkhuu taani ciivaraani udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhante, disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``ki.m imassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aabaadho''ti? ``imassa, bhante, aayasmato thullakacchaabaadho, lasikaaya ciivaraani kaaye lagganti, taani maya.m udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhaamaa''ti ^a^M0.0294^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yassa ka.n.du vaa, pi.lakaa vaa, assaavo vaa, thullakacchu vaa aabaadho, kaayo vaa duggandho, cu.n.naani bhesajjaani; agilaanassa chaka.na.m mattika.m rajananippakka.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udukkhala.m musala''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno pa.n.durogaabaadho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^T2.0052^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, muttahariitaka.m paayetunti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno chavidosaabaadho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gandhaalepa.m kaatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu abhisannakaayo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0283^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, virecana.m paatunti. acchaka~njiyaa attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, acchaka~njinti. aka.tayuusena attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aka.tayuusanti. ka.taaka.tena attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ka.taaka.tanti. pa.ticchaadaniiyena attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.ticchaadaniiyanti.
[06] muulaadibhesajjakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ {ida.m vatthu paaraa0 618 aadayo} tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa pilindavaccho raajagahe pabbhaara.m sodhaapeti le.na.m kattukaamo. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo ^a^M0.0300^ea^ bimbisaaro yenaayasmaa pilindavaccho tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m ^a^P1.0207^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m, bhante, thero kaaraapetii''ti? ``pabbhaara.m, mahaaraaja, sodhaapemi, le.na.m kattukaamo''ti. ``attho, bhante, ayyassa ^a^T2.0053^ea^ aaraamikenaa''ti? ``na kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa aaraamiko anu~n~naato''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, bhagavanta.m pa.tipucchitvaa mama aaroceyyaathaa''ti. `eva.m, mahaaraajaa'ti kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi, samaadapesi, samuttejesi, sampaha.msesi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmataa pilindavacchena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho bhagavato santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``raajaa, bhante, maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aaraamika.m daatukaamo. katha.m nu kho, bhante, mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aaraamika''nti. dutiyampi kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro yenaayasmaa pilindavaccho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m ^a^V0.0284^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m etadavoca -- ``anu~n~naato, bhante, bhagavataa aaraamiko''ti? ``eva.m, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, ayyassa aaraamika.m dammii''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro ^a^T2.0054^ea^ aayasmato pilindavacchassa aaraamika.m pa.tissutvaa, vissaritvaa, cirena sati.m pa.tilabhitvaa, a~n~natara.m sabbatthaka.m mahaamatta.m aamantesi -- ``yo mayaa, bha.ne, ayyassa aaraamiko pa.tissuto, dinno so aaraamiko''ti? ``na kho, deva, ayyassa aaraamiko dinno''ti. ``kiiva cira.m nu kho, bha.ne, ito {ito ratti (syaa0)} hi ta.m hotii''ti? atha kho so ^a^M0.0301^ea^ mahaamatto rattiyo ga.netvaa {viga.netvaa (sii0)} raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m etadavoca -- ``pa~nca, deva, rattisataanii''ti. tena hi, bha.ne, ayyassa pa~nca aaraamikasataani dehiiti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho so mahaamatto ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissutvaa aayasmato pilindavacchassa pa~nca aaraamikasataani paadaasi, paa.tiyekko gaamo nivisi. `aaraamikagaamakoti'pi na.m aaha.msu ^a^P1.0208^ea^, `pilindagaamako'tipi na.m aaha.msu.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa pilindavaccho tasmi.m gaamake kuluupako hoti. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya pilindagaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena tasmi.m gaamake ussavo hoti. daarakaa ala"nkataa maalaakitaa kii.lanti. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho pilindagaamake ^a^T2.0055^ea^ sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena a~n~natarassa aaraamikassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. tena kho pana samayena tassaa aaraamikiniyaa dhiitaa a~n~ne daarake ala"nkate maalaakite passitvaa rodati -- `maala.m me detha, ala"nkaara.m me dethaa'ti. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho ta.m aaraamikini.m etadavoca -- ``kissaaya.m daarikaa rodatii''ti? ``aya.m, bhante, daarikaa a~n~ne daarake ala"nkate maalaakite passitvaa rodati -- `maala.m me detha, ala"nkaara.m me dethaa'ti. kuto amhaaka.m duggataana.m maalaa, kuto ala"nkaaro''ti? atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho a~n~natara.m ti.na.n.dupaka.m gahetvaa ta.m aaraamikini.m etadavoca -- ``handima.m ti.na.n.dupaka.m tassaa daarikaaya siise pa.timu~ncaa''ti. atha kho saa aaraamikinii ta.m ti.na.n.dupaka.m gahetvaa tassaa daarikaaya siise pa.timu~nci. saa ahosi suva.n.namaalaa abhiruupaa, dassaniiyaa, paasaadikaa; natthi taadisaa ra~n~nopi antepure suva.n.namaalaa. manussaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa aarocesu.m -- ``amukassa, deva, aaraamikassa ghare suva.n.namaalaa abhiruupaa, dassaniiyaa, paasaadikaa; natthi taadisaa devassapi ^a^V0.0285^ea^ antepure suva.n.namaalaa; kuto tassa duggatassa? nissa.msaya.m corikaaya aabhataa''ti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0302^ea^ kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro ta.m aaraamikakula.m bandhaapesi. dutiyampi ^a^T2.0056^ea^ kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya pilindagaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. pilindagaamake sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena tassa aaraamikassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa.tivissake pucchi -- ``kaha.m ima.m aaraamikakula.m gata''nti? ``etissaa, bhante, suva.n.namaalaaya kaara.naa ra~n~naa bandhaapita''nti. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho yena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro yenaayasmaa pilindavaccho tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ^a^P1.0209^ea^ raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m aayasmaa pilindavaccho etadavoca -- ``kissa, mahaaraaja, aaraamikakula.m bandhaapita''nti? ``tassa, bhante, aaraamikassa ghare suva.n.namaalaa abhiruupaa, dassaniiyaa, paasaadikaa; natthi taadisaa amhaakampi antepure suva.n.namaalaa; kuto tassa duggatassa? nissa.msaya.m corikaaya aabhataa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa paasaada.m suva.n.nanti adhimucci; so ahosi sabbasova.n.namayo. ``ida.m pana te, mahaaraaja, taava bahu.m suva.n.na.m kuto''ti? `a~n~naata.m, bhante, ayyasseveso ^a^T2.0057^ea^ iddhaanubhaavo'ti ta.m aaraamikakula.m mu~ncaapesi.

[03]manussaa ``ayyena kira pilindavacchena saraajikaaya parisaaya uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassita''nti attamanaa abhippasannaa aayasmato pilindavacchassa pa~nca bhesajjaani abhihari.msu, seyyathida.m -- sappi.m, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu.m {sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu (ka0)}, phaa.nita.m. pakatiyaapi ca aayasmaa pilindavaccho laabhii hoti pa~ncanna.m bhesajjaana.m; laddha.m laddha.m parisaaya vissajjeti. parisaa cassa hoti baahullikaa; laddha.m laddha.m kolambepi {ko.lumbepi (ka0)}, gha.tepi, puuretvaa pa.tisaameti; parissaavanaanipi, thavikaayopi, puuretvaa vaatapaanesu laggeti. taani oliinaviliinaani ti.t.thanti. unduurehipi vihaaraa oki.n.naviki.n.naa honti. manussaa vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa passitvaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``antoko.t.thaagaarikaa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ^a^M0.0303^ea^, seyyathaapi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro''ti. assosu.m kho bhikkhuu tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa, te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti ^a^V0.0286^ea^ vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuu evaruupaaya baahullaaya cetessantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu te anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu evaruupaaya baahullaaya cetentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaati...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yaani kho pana taani gilaanaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T2.0058^ea^ pa.tisaayaniiyaani bhesajjaani, seyyathida.m -- sappi, navaniita.m, tela.m, madhu, phaa.nita.m, taani pa.tiggahetvaa sattaahaparama.m sannidhikaaraka.m paribhu~njitabbaani. ta.m atikkaamayato yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.
[06] pilindavacchavatthu ni.t.thita.m.
[06] bhesajjaanu~n~naatabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito pa.thamo.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa ^a^P1.0210^ea^ yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. addasaa kho aayasmaa ka"nkhaarevato antaraamagge gu.lakara.na.m, okkamitvaa gu.le pi.t.thampi chaarikampi pakkhipante, disvaana ``akappiyo gu.lo saamiso, na kappati gu.lo vikaale paribhu~njitu''nti kukkuccaayanto sapariso gu.la.m na paribhu~njati. yepissa sotabba.m ma~n~nanti, tepi gu.la.m na paribhu~njanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. kimatthaaya {kimatthiyaa (ka0)}, bhikkhave, gu.le pi.t.thampi chaarikampi pakkhipantiiti? thaddhatthaaya {bandhanatthaaya (sii0 syaa0)} bhagavaati. sace, bhikkhave, thaddhatthaaya gu.le pi.t.thampi chaarikampi pakkhipanti, so ca gu.lotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yathaasukha.m gu.la.m paribhu~njitunti.

[03]addasaa kho aayasmaa ka"nkhaarevato antaraamagge vacce mugga.m jaata.m, passitvaa ``akappiyaa muggaa; pakkaapi muggaa jaayantiiti'' kukkuccaayanto sapariso mugga.m na paribhu~njati. yepissa sotabba.m ma~n~nanti, tepi mugga.m na paribhu~njanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. sace {sacepi (?)}, bhikkhave, pakkaapi muggaa jaayanti ^a^T2.0059^ea^, anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yathaasukha.m mugga.m paribhu~njitunti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0304^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno udaravaataabaadho hoti. so lo.nasoviiraka.m apaayi. tassa so udaravaataabaadho pa.tippassambhi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^V0.0287^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa lo.nasoviiraka.m; agilaanassa udakasambhinna.m paanaparibhogena paribhu~njitunti.
[06] gu.laadianujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhagavato udaravaataabaadho hoti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando -- `pubbepi bhagavato udaravaataabaadho teka.tulayaaguyaa phaasu hotii'ti -- saama.m tilampi, ta.n.dulampi, muggampi vi~n~naapetvaa, anto vaasetvaa, anto saama.m pacitvaa bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``pivatu bhagavaa teka.tulayaagu''nti. jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi na pucchanti; kaala.m viditvaa pucchanti, kaala.m viditvaa na pucchanti; atthasa.mhita.m tathaagataa pucchanti, no anatthasa.mhita.m. anatthasa.mhite setughaato tathaagataana.m. dviihi aakaarehi buddhaa bhagavanto bhikkhuu pa.tipucchanti -- dhamma.m vaa desessaama, saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamaati. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P1.0211^ea^ aananda.m aamantesi -- ``kutaaya.m, aananda ^a^T2.0060^ea^, yaaguu''ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- `ananucchavika.m, aananda, ananulomika.m, appatiruupa.m, assaama.naka.m, akappiya.m, akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, aananda, evaruupaaya baahullaaya cetessasi. yadapi, aananda, anto vu.t.tha.m {vuttha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} tadapi akappiya.m; yadapi anto pakka.m tadapi akappiya.m; yadapi saama.m pakka.m, tadapi akappiya.m. neta.m, aananda, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, anto vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, saama.m pakka.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anto ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, saama.m pakka.m ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti ti.n.na.m dukka.taana.m. anto ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, a~n~nehi pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m. anto ^a^M0.0305^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, bahi pakka.m, saama.m pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m. bahi ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, saama.m pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dvinna.m dukka.taana.m. anto ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, bahi pakka.m, a~n~nehi pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. bahi ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, a~n~nehi pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. bahi ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, bahi pakka.m, saama.m pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. bahi ce, bhikkhave, vu.t.tha.m, bahi pakka.m ^a^V0.0288^ea^ ^a^T2.0061^ea^, a~n~nehi pakka.m, ta~nce paribhu~njeyya, anaapattii'''ti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu ``bhagavataa saama.mpaako pa.tikkhitto''ti puna paake kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, puna paaka.m pacitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena raajagaha.m dubbhikkha.m hoti. manussaa lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi aaraama.m aaharanti. taani bhikkhuu bahi vaasenti; ukkapi.n.dakaapi khaadanti, coraapi haranti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anto vaasetunti. anto vaasetvaa bahi paacenti. damakaa parivaarenti. bhikkhuu avissa.t.thaa paribhu~njanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anto pacitunti. dubbhikkhe kappiyakaarakaa bahutara.m haranti, appatara.m bhikkhuuna.m denti. bhagavato ^a^P1.0212^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saama.m pacitu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anto vu.t.tha.m, anto pakka.m, saama.m pakkanti.
[06] antovu.t.thaadipa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kaasiisu vassa.mvu.t.thaa raajagaha.m gacchantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya antaraamagge na labhi.msu luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m; bahu~nca phalakhaadaniiya.m ^a^T2.0062^ea^ ahosi; kappiyakaarako ca na ahosi. atha kho te bhikkhuu kilantaruupaa yena raajagaha.m ve.luvana.m kalandakanivaapo, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kacci ^a^M0.0306^ea^, bhikkhave, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kaccittha appakilamathena addhaana.m aagataa; kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, aagacchathaa''ti? ``khamaniiya.m bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m bhagavaa. idha maya.m, bhante, kaasiisu vassa.mvu.t.thaa raajagaha.m aagacchantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya antaraamagge na labhimhaa luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m; bahu~nca phalakhaadaniiya.m ^a^V0.0289^ea^ ahosi; kappiyakaarako ca na ahosi; tena maya.m kilantaruupaa addhaana.m aagataa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yattha phalakhaadaniiya.m passati, kappiyakaarako ca na hoti, saama.m gahetvaa, haritvaa, kappiyakaarake passitvaa, bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa, pa.tiggahaapetvaa paribhu~njitu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uggahita.m pa.tiggahitu''nti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa navaa ca tilaa nava~nca madhu uppannaa honti. atha kho tassa braahma.nassa etadahosi ^a^T2.0063^ea^ -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m nave ca tile nava~nca madhu.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dadeyya''nti. atha kho so braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m pa.tisammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m, saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena ^a^P1.0213^ea^. atha kho so braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa pakkaami. atha kho so braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi, saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho so braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa, samaadapetvaa, samuttejetvaa, sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0307^ea^ kho tassa braahma.nassa acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- ``yesa.m kho mayaa atthaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito, `nave ca tile nava~nca madhu.m dassaamii'ti ^a^T2.0064^ea^, te mayaa pamu.t.thaa daatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m nave ca tile nava~nca madhu.m kolambehi ca gha.tehi ca aaraama.m haraapeyya''nti. atha kho so braahma.no nave ca tile nava~nca madhu.m kolambehi ca gha.tehi ca aaraama.m haraapetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yesa.m kho mayaa, bho gotama, atthaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito, `nave ca tile nava~nca madhu.m dassaamii'ti, te mayaa pamu.t.thaa daatu.m. pa.tigga.nhaatu me bhava.m gotamo nave ca tile nava~nca madhu''nti. tena hi, braahma.na, bhikkhuuna.m dehiiti ^a^V0.0290^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavaarenti, pa.tisa"nkhaapi pa.tikkhipanti, sabbo ca sa"ngho pavaarito hoti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti. pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njatha. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tato niiha.ta.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paribhu~njitunti.
[06] uggahitapa.tiggaha.naa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 295} tena kho pana samayena aayasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upa.t.thaakakula.m sa"nghassatthaaya khaadaniiya.m paahesi -- ayyassa upanandassa dassetvaa sa"nghassa daatabbanti. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto ^a^P1.0214^ea^ gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho hoti ^a^T2.0065^ea^. atha kho te manussaa aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuu pucchi.msu -- ``kaha.m, bhante, ayyo upanando''ti? ``esaavuso, aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho''ti. ``ida.m, bhante, khaadaniiya.m ayyassa upanandassa dassetvaa sa"nghassa daatabba''nti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. tena hi, bhikkhave, pa.tiggahetvaa nikkhipatha yaava upanando aagacchatiiti. atha kho aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto purebhatta.m kulaani payirupaasitvaa divaa aagacchati. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavaarenti, pa.tisa"nkhaapi pa.tikkhipanti, sabbo ca sa"ngho pavaarito hoti, bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti. pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njatha. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, purebhatta.m pa.tiggahita.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paribhu~njitunti.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0308^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato saariputtassa kaaya.daahaabaadho hoti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``pubbe te, aavuso saariputta, kaaya.daahaabaadho kena phaasu hotii''ti? ``bhisehi ca me, aavuso ^a^T2.0066^ea^, mu.laalikaahi caa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sammi~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito mandaakiniyaa pokkhara.niyaa tiire paaturahosi. addasaa kho a~n~nataro naago aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m duuratova ^a^V0.0291^ea^ aagacchanta.m, disvaana aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, ayyo mahaamoggallaano. svaagata.m, bhante, ayyassa mahaamoggallaanassa. kena, bhante, ayyassa attho; ki.m dammii''ti?
