``bhisehi ca me, aavuso, attho, mu.laalikaahi caa''ti. atha kho so naago a~n~natara.m naaga.m aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi, bha.ne, ayyassa bhise ca mu.laalikaayo ca yaavadattha.m dehii''ti. atha kho so naago mandaakini.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa, so.n.daaya bhisa~nca mu.laalika~nca abbaahitvaa, suvikkhaalita.m ^a^P1.0215^ea^ vikkhaaletvaa, bha.n.dika.m bandhitvaa yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- mandaakiniyaa pokkhara.niyaa tiire antarahito jetavane paaturahosi. sopi kho naago mandaakiniyaa pokkhara.niyaa tiire antarahito jetavane paaturahosi. atha kho so naago aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhise ca mu.laalikaayo ^a^T2.0067^ea^ ca pa.tiggahaapetvaa jetavane antarahito mandaakiniyaa pokkhara.niyaa tiire paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmato saariputtassa bhise ca mu.laalikaayo ca upanaamesi. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa bhise ca mu.laalikaayo ca bhuttassa kaaya.daahaabaadho pa.tippassambhi. bahuu bhisaa ca ^a^M0.0309^ea^ mu.laalikaayo ca avasi.t.thaa honti. tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavaarenti, pa.tisa"nkhaapi pa.tikkhipanti, sabbo ca sa"ngho pavaarito hoti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti. pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njatha. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vana.t.tha.m pokkhara.t.tha.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paribhu~njitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m bahu.m phalakhaadaniiya.m uppanna.m hoti, kappiyakaarako ca na hoti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa phala.m na paribhu~njanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, abiija.m nibbattabiija.m {nibba.t.tabiija.m (sii0), nibba.tabiija.m (syaa0), nippa.t.tabiija.m (ka0)} akatakappa.m phala.m paribhu~njitunti.
[06] pa.tiggahitaadi anujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno bhagandalaabaadho ^a^V0.0292^ea^ hoti. aakaasagotto vejjo satthakamma.m ^a^T2.0068^ea^ karoti. atha kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto yena tassa bhikkhuno vihaaro tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aakaasagotto vejjo bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aagacchatu bhava.m gotamo, imassa bhikkhuno vaccamagga.m passatu, seyyathaapi godhaamukha''nti ^a^P1.0216^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa -- ``so ma.m khvaaya.m moghapuriso uppa.n.detii''ti -- tatova pa.tinivattitvaa, etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa, bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``atthi kira, bhikkhave, amukasmi.m vihaare bhikkhu gilaano''ti? ``atthi bhagavaa''ti. ``ki.m tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aabaadho''ti? ``tassa, bhante, aayasmato bhagandalaabaadho, aakaasagotto vejjo satthakamma.m karotii''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa, ananulomika.m, appatiruupa.m, assaama.naka.m, akappiya.m, akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso sambaadhe satthakamma.m kaaraapessati. sambaadhe, bhikkhave, sukhumaa chavi, duropayo va.no ^a^M0.0310^ea^, dupparihaara.m sattha.m. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, sambaadhe satthakamma.m kaaraapetabba.m. yo kaaraapeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu -- bhagavataa satthakamma.m pa.tikkhittanti -- vatthikamma.m kaaraapenti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa, te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ^a^T2.0069^ea^ chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vatthikamma.m kaaraapessantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu vatthikamma.m kaaraapentii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, sambaadhassa saamantaa dva"ngulaa satthakamma.m vaa vatthikamma.m vaa kaaraapetabba.m. yo kaaraapeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.
[06] satthakammapa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena baaraa.nasiya.m suppiyo ca upaasako suppiyaa ^a^V0.0293^ea^ ca upaasikaa ubhatopasannaa honti, daayakaa, kaarakaa, sa"nghupa.t.thaakaa. atha kho suppiyaa upaasikaa aaraama.m gantvaa vihaarena vihaara.m parive.nena parive.na.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuu pucchati -- ``ko, bhante, gilaano, kassa ki.m aahariyatuu''ti? tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarena bhikkhunaa virecana.m ^a^P1.0217^ea^ piita.m hoti. atha kho so bhikkhu suppiya.m upaasika.m etadavoca -- ``mayaa kho, bhagini, virecana.m piita.m. attho me pa.ticchaadaniiyenaa''ti. ``su.t.thu, ayya, aahariyissatii''ti ghara.m gantvaa antevaasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne, pavattama.msa.m jaanaahii''ti. eva.m, ayyeti kho so puriso suppiyaaya ^a^T2.0070^ea^ upaasikaaya pa.tissu.nitvaa kevalakappa.m baaraa.nasi.m aahi.n.danto na addasa pavattama.msa.m. atha kho so puriso yena suppiyaa upaasikaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa suppiya.m upaasika.m etadavoca -- ``natthayye pavattama.msa.m. maaghaato ajjaa''ti. atha kho suppiyaaya upaasikaaya etadahosi -- ``tassa kho gilaanassa bhikkhuno pa.ticchaadaniiya.m alabhantassa aabaadho vaa abhiva.d.dhissati, kaala"nkiriyaa ^a^M0.0311^ea^ vaa bhavissati. na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yaaha.m pa.tissu.nitvaa na haraapeyya''nti. potthanika.m gahetvaa uuruma.msa.m ukkantitvaa daasiyaa adaasi -- ``handa, je, ima.m ma.msa.m sampaadetvaa amukasmi.m vihaare bhikkhu gilaano, tassa dajjaahi. yo ca ma.m pucchati, `gilaanaa'ti pa.tivedehii''ti. uttaraasa"ngena uuru.m ve.thetvaa ovaraka.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nipajji. atha kho suppiyo upaasako ghara.m gantvaa daasi.m pucchi -- ``kaha.m suppiyaa''ti? ``esaayya ovarake nipannaa''ti. atha kho suppiyo upaasako yena suppiyaa upaasikaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa suppiya.m upaasika.m etadavoca -- ``kissa nipannaasii''ti? ``gilaanaamhii''ti. ``ki.m te aabaadho''ti? atha kho suppiyaa upaasikaa suppiyassa upaasakassa etamattha.m aarocesi. atha kho suppiyo upaasako -- acchariya.m vata bho! abbhuta.m vata bho! yaava saddhaaya.m suppiyaa pasannaa, yatra hi naama attanopi ma.msaani pariccattaani! kimpimaaya {ki.m panimaaya (sii0 syaa0)} a~n~na.m ki~nci ^a^T2.0071^ea^ adeyya.m bhavissatiiti -- ha.t.tho udaggo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho suppiyo upaasako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m, saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho suppiyo upaasako bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho suppiyo upaasako tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena suppiyassa ^a^P1.0218^ea^ upaasakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi, saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena ^a^V0.0294^ea^. atha kho suppiyo upaasako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho suppiya.m upaasaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kaha.m suppiyaa''ti? ``gilaanaa bhagavaa''ti. ``tena hi aagacchatuu''ti. ``na bhagavaa ussahatii''ti. ``tena hi pariggahetvaapi aanethaa''ti. atha kho suppiyo upaasako suppiya.m upaasika.m pariggahetvaa ^a^M0.0312^ea^ aanesi. tassaa, saha dassanena bhagavato, taava mahaava.no ru.laho ahosi, succhavilomajaato. atha kho suppiyo ca upaasako suppiyaa ca upaasikaa -- ``acchariya.m vata bho! abbhuta.m vata bho! tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa ^a^T2.0072^ea^ mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama saha dassanena bhagavato taava mahaava.no ru.laho bhavissati, succhavilomajaato''ti -- ha.t.thaa udaggaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. atha kho bhagavaa suppiya~nca upaasaka.m suppiya~nca upaasika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.
[06] atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu

[03] pa.tipucchi -- ``ko, bhikkhave, suppiya.m upaasika.m ma.msa.m vi~n~naapesii''ti? eva.m vutte so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, suppiya.m upaasika.m ma.msa.m vi~n~naapesi''nti. ``aahariyittha bhikkhuu''ti? ``aahariyittha bhagavaa''ti. ``paribhu~nji tva.m bhikkhuu''ti? ``paribhu~njaamaha.m bhagavaa''ti. ``pa.tivekkhi tva.m bhikkhuu''ti? ``naaha.m bhagavaa pa.tivekkhi''nti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, appa.tivekkhitvaa ma.msa.m paribhu~njissasi. manussama.msa.m kho tayaa, moghapurisa, paribhutta.m. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``santi, bhikkhave, manussaa saddhaa pasannaa, tehi attanopi ma.msaani pariccattaani. na, bhikkhave, manussama.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti thullaccayassa. na ca, bhikkhave, appa.tivekkhitvaa ma.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo ^a^T2.0073^ea^ paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] manussama.msapa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no hatthii maranti ^a^P1.0219^ea^. manussaa dubbhikkhe hatthima.msa.m paribhu~njanti ^a^V0.0295^ea^, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya carantaana.m hatthima.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu hatthima.msa.m paribhu~njanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa hatthima.msa.m paribhu~njissanti. raaja"nga.m hatthii, sace raajaa jaaneyya, na nesa.m attamano assaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m ^a^M0.0313^ea^ aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, hatthima.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no assaa maranti. manussaa dubbhikkhe assama.msa.m paribhu~njanti, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya carantaana.m assama.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu assama.msa.m paribhu~njanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa assama.msa.m paribhu~njissanti. raaja"nga.m assaa, sace raajaa jaaneyya, na nesa.m attamano assaa''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, assama.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa dubbhikkhe sunakhama.msa.m paribhu~njanti, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya carantaana.m sunakhama.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu sunakhama.msa.m paribhu~njanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sunakhama.msa.m paribhu~njissanti, jeguccho ^a^T2.0074^ea^ sunakho pa.tikuulo''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, sunakhama.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa dubbhikkhe ahima.msa.m paribhu~njanti, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya carantaana.m ahima.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu ahima.msa.m paribhu~njanti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ahima.msa.m paribhu~njissanti, jeguccho ahi pa.tikuulo''ti. supassopi {suphasso (sii0)} naagaraajaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho supasso naagaraajaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santi, bhante, naagaa assaddhaa appasannaa. te appamattakehipi bhikkhuu vihe.theyyu.m. saadhu, bhante, ayyaa ahima.msa.m na paribhu~njeyyu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa supassa.m naagaraajaana.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi...pe0... padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m ^a^P1.0220^ea^ katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ahima.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena ^a^M0.0314^ea^ ^a^V0.0296^ea^ kho pana samayena luddakaa siiha.m hantvaa siihama.msa.m {ma.msa.m (ka0)} paribhu~njanti, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya ^a^T2.0075^ea^ carantaana.m siihama.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu siihama.msa.m paribhu~njitvaa ara~n~ne viharanti. siihaa siihama.msagandhena bhikkhuu paripaatenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, siihama.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena luddakaa byaggha.m hantvaa...pe0... diipi.m hantvaa...pe0... accha.m hantvaa...pe0... taraccha.m hantvaa taracchama.msa.m paribhu~njanti, bhikkhuuna.m pi.n.daaya carantaana.m ^a^T2.0076^ea^ taracchama.msa.m denti. bhikkhuu taracchama.msa.m paribhu~njitvaa ara~n~ne viharanti. taracchaa taracchama.msagandhena bhikkhuu paripaatenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, taracchama.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] hatthima.msaadipa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] suppiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito dutiyo.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena andhakavinda.m tena caarika.m pakkaami, mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m, a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. tena kho pana samayena jaanapadaa manussaa bahu.m lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi saka.tesu aaropetvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhaa honti -- yadaa pa.tipaa.ti.m labhissaama tadaa bhatta.m karissaamaati, pa~ncamattaani ca vighaasaadasataani. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena andhakavinda.m tadavasari. atha kho a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa pa.tipaa.ti.m alabhantassa etadahosi -- ``atiitaani {adhikaani (sii0 syaa0)} kho me dve maasaani buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anubandhantassa `yadaa pa.tipaa.ti.m labhissaami tadaa bhatta.m karissaamii'ti, na ca me pa.tipaa.ti labbhati, aha~ncamhi ekattako {ekato (sii0 syaa0)}, bahu ca me gharaavaasattho haayati. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhattagga.m olokeyya.m; ya.m bhattagge naassa, ta.m pa.tiyaadeyya''nti. atha kho so braahma.no bhattagga.m olokento dve naaddasa -- yaagu~nca ^a^M0.0315^ea^ madhugo.laka~nca ^a^T2.0077^ea^. atha kho so braahma.no yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``idha me, bho aananda, pa.tipaa.ti.m alabhantassa etadahosi `atiitaani kho me ^a^P1.0221^ea^ dve maasaani buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anubandhantassa, yadaa pa.tipaa.ti.m labhissaami tadaa bhatta.m karissaamiiti. na ca me pa.tipaa.ti labbhati ^a^V0.0297^ea^, aha~ncamhi ekattako, bahu ca me gharaavaasattho haayati. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhattagga.m olokeyya.m; ya.m bhattagge naassa, ta.m pa.tiyaadeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bho aananda, bhattagga.m olokento dve naaddasa.m -- yaagu~nca madhugo.laka~nca. sacaaha.m, bho aananda, pa.tiyaadeyya.m yaagu~nca madhugo.laka~nca, pa.tigga.nheyya me bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``tena hi, braahma.na, bhagavanta.m pa.tipucchissaamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. tena haananda, pa.tiyaadetuuti. tena hi, braahma.na, pa.tiyaadehiiti. atha kho so braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena pahuuta.m yaagu~nca madhugo.laka~nca pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato upanaamesi -- pa.tigga.nhaatu me bhava.m gotamo yaagu~nca madhugo.laka~ncaati. tena hi, braahma.na, bhikkhuuna.m dehiiti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti. pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njathaati. atha kho so braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pahuutaaya yaaguyaa ca madhugo.lakena ca sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m dhotahattha.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m braahma.na.m ^a^T2.0078^ea^ bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03]``dasayime, braahma.na, aanisa.msaa yaaguyaa. katame dasa? yaagu.m dento aayu.m deti, va.n.na.m deti, sukha.m deti, bala.m deti, pa.tibhaana.m deti, yaagu piitaa khudda.m {khuda.m (sii0 syaa0)} pa.tihanati, pipaasa.m vineti, vaata.m anulometi, vatthi.m sodheti, aamaavasesa.m paaceti -- ime kho, braahma.na, dasaanisa.msaa yaaguyaa''ti {pacchimaa pa~nca aanisa.msaa a0 ni0 5.207}.
[21] {a0 ni0 4.58-59 thoka.m visadisa.m} yo sa~n~nataana.m paradattabhojina.m.
[27] kaalena sakkacca dadaati yaagu.m.
[26] dasassa .thaanaani anuppavecchati.
[22] aayu~nca va.n.na~nca sukha.m bala~nca..
[21] pa.tibhaanamassa ^a^M0.0316^ea^ upajaayate tato.
[27] khudda.m pipaasa~nca byapaneti vaata.m.
[21] sodheti vatthi.m pari.naameti bhutta.m.
[22] bhesajjameta.m sugatena va.n.nita.m..
[26] tasmaa hi yaagu.m alameva daatu.m.
[27] nicca.m manussena sukhatthikena.
[21] dibbaani ^a^V0.0298^ea^ vaa patthayataa sukhaani.
[22] manussasobhagyatamicchataa vaati..

[03]atha ^a^P1.0222^ea^ kho bhagavaa ta.m braahma.na.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne ^a^T2.0079^ea^ dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yaagu~nca madhugo.laka~ncaa''ti.
[06] yaagumadhugo.lakaanujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ assosu.m kho manussaa bhagavataa kira yaagu anu~n~naataa madhugo.laka~ncaati. te kaalasseva, bhojjayaagu.m pa.tiyaadenti madhugo.laka~nca. bhikkhuu kaalasseva bhojjayaaguyaa dhaataa madhugo.lakena ca bhattagge na cittaruupa.m paribhu~njanti. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarena taru.napasannena mahaamattena svaatanaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito hoti. atha kho tassa taru.napasannassa mahaamattassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m a.d.dhatelasanna.m bhikkhusataana.m a.d.dhatelasaani ma.msapaatisataani pa.tiyaadeyya.m, ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekameka.m ma.msapaati.m upanaameyya''nti. atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa a.d.dhatelasaani ca ma.msapaatisataani, bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa taru.napasannassa mahaamattassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi, saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto bhattagge bhikkhuu parivisati. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``thoka.m, aavuso, dehi; thoka.m, aavuso, dehii''ti. ``maa kho tumhe, bhante, -- `aya.m taru.napasanno mahaamatto'ti ^a^M0.0317^ea^ ^a^T2.0080^ea^ -- thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhatha. bahu.m me khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m, a.d.dhatelasaani ca ma.msapaatisataani. ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekameka.m ma.msapaati.m upanaamessaamiiti. pa.tigga.nhatha, bhante, yaavadattha''nti. ``na kho maya.m, aavuso, eta.mkaara.naa thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhaama, api ca maya.m kaalasseva bhojjayaaguyaa dhaataa madhugo.lakena ca. tena maya.m thoka.m thoka.m pa.tigga.nhaamaa''ti. atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhadantaa mayaa nimantitaa a~n~nassa bhojjayaagu.m paribhu~njissanti, na caaha.m pa.tibalo yaavadattha.m daatu''nti ^a^V0.0299^ea^ kupito anattamano aasaadanaapekkho bhikkhuuna.m patte puurento agamaasi -- bhu~njatha vaa haratha vaati. atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena ^a^P1.0223^ea^ khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m taru.napasanna.m mahaamatta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho tassa taru.napasannassa mahaamattassa acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkucca.m, ahu vippa.tisaaro -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yoha.m kupito anattamano aasaadanaapekkho bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T2.0081^ea^ patte puurento agamaasi.m -- `bhu~njatha vaa haratha vaa'ti. ki.m nu kho mayaa bahu.m pasuta.m pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa''ti? atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkucca.m, ahu vippa.tisaaro `alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yoha.m kupito anattamano aasaadanaapekkho bhikkhuuna.m patte puurento agamaasi.m -- bhu~njatha vaa haratha vaati. ki.m nu kho mayaa bahu.m pasuta.m, pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa'ti. ki.m nu kho mayaa, bhante, bahu.m pasuta.m, pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa''ti? ``yadaggena tayaa, aavuso, svaatanaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito tadaggena te bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasuta.m. yadaggena te ^a^M0.0318^ea^ ekamekena bhikkhunaa ekameka.m sittha.m pa.tiggahita.m tadaggena te bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasuta.m, saggaa te aaraddhaa''ti. atha kho so taru.napasanno mahaamatto -- ``laabhaa kira me, suladdha.m kira me, bahu.m kira mayaa pu~n~na.m pasuta.m, saggaa kira me aaraddhaa''ti -- ha.t.tho udaggo u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0082^ea^ pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu a~n~natra nimantitaa a~n~nassa bhojjayaagu.m paribhu~njantii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa a~n~natra nimantitaa a~n~nassa bhojjayaagu.m paribhu~njissanti. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^P1.0224^ea^ -- ``na, bhikkhave, a~n~natra nimantitena a~n~nassa bhojjayaagu paribhu~njitabbaa. yo paribhu~njeyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.
[06] taru.napasannamahaamattavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0300^ea^ kho bhagavaa andhakavinde yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami, mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m, a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. tena kho pana samayena bela.t.tho kaccaano raajagahaa andhakavinda.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti, pa~ncamattehi saka.tasatehi, sabbeheva gu.lakumbhapuurehi. addasaa kho bhagavaa bela.t.tha.m kaccaana.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. atha kho bela.t.tho kaccaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekameka.m gu.lakumbha.m daatu''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, eka.myeva gu.lakumbha.m ^a^T2.0083^ea^ aaharaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa eka.myeva gu.lakumbha.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aabhato {aaha.to (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, bhante, gu.lakumbho; kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, bhikkhuuna.m gu.la.m dehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa ^a^M0.0319^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m gu.la.m datvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dinno, bhante, bhikkhuuna.m gu.lo, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, bhikkhuuna.m gu.la.m yaavadattha.m dehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa bhikkhuuna.m gu.la.m yaavadattha.m datvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dinno, bhante, bhikkhuuna.m gu.lo yaavadattho, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, bhikkhuu gu.lehi santappehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa bhikkhuu gu.lehi santappesi. ekacce bhikkhuu pattepi puuresu.m parissaavanaanipi thavikaayopi puuresu.m. atha kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhikkhuu gu.lehi santappetvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santappitaa, bhante, bhikkhuu gu.lehi, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi ^a^P1.0225^ea^ tva.m, kaccaana, vighaasaadaana.m gu.la.m dehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa vighaasaadaana.m gu.la.m datvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dinno, bhante ^a^T2.0084^ea^, vighaasaadaana.m gu.lo, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, vighaasaadaana.m gu.la.m yaavadattha.m dehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa vighaasaadaana.m gu.la.m yaavadattha.m datvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dinno, bhante, vighaasaadaana.m gu.lo yaavadattho, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, vighaasaade gu.lehi santappehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti ^a^V0.0301^ea^ kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa vighaasaade gu.lehi santappesi. ekacce vighaasaadaa kolambepi gha.tepi puuresu.m, pi.takaanipi uccha"ngepi puuresu.m. atha kho bela.t.tho kaccaano vighaasaade gu.lehi santappetvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santappitaa, bhante, vighaasaadaa gu.lehi, bahu caaya.m gu.lo avasi.t.tho. kathaaha.m, bhante, pa.tipajjaamii''ti? ``naaha.m ta.m, kaccaana, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yassa so gu.lo paribhutto sammaa pari.naama.m gaccheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa. tena hi tva.m, kaccaana, ta.m gu.la.m appaharite vaa cha.d.dehi, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bela.t.tho kaccaano bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa ta.m gu.la.m appaa.nake udake ^a^M0.0320^ea^ opilaapeti. atha kho so gu.lo udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati padhuupaayati ^a^T2.0085^ea^ {sandhuupaayati (sii0 syaa0)} sampadhuupaayati. seyyathaapi naama phaalo divasa.msantatto udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati padhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati, evameva so gu.lo udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati padhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati.

[03]atha kho bela.t.tho kaccaano sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho bela.t.thassa kaccaanassa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- ``daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m, kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi bela.t.tha.m kaccaana.m kallacitta.m, muducitta.m, viniivara.nacitta.m, udaggacitta.m, pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi...pe0... evameva bela.t.thassa ^a^P1.0226^ea^ kaccaanassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti. atha kho bela.t.tho kaccaano di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante. abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya...pe0... ^a^T2.0086^ea^ evameva.m kho bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.nagata''nti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena raajagahe gu.lo ussanno hoti. bhikkhuu -- gilaanasseva bhagavataa gu.lo anu~n~naato, no agilaanassaati -- kukkuccaayantaa ^a^V0.0302^ea^ gu.la.m na bhu~njanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanassa gu.la.m, agilaanassa gu.lodakanti.
[06] bela.t.thakaccaanavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ {ito para.m mahaava0 286-287 `ti.n.naa medhaavino janaa'ti paa.tho dii0 ni0 2.148; udaa0 76 aadayo} atha ^a^M0.0321^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena paa.taligaamo tena caarika.m pakkaami, mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m, a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena paa.taligaamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa -- ``bhagavaa kira paa.taligaama.m anuppatto''ti. atha kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho paa.taligaamike upaasake bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi, samaadapesi, samuttejesi, sampaha.msesi. atha kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa bhagavataa dhammiyaa ^a^T2.0087^ea^ kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``adhivaasetu no, bhante, bhagavaa aavasathaagaara.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m ^a^P1.0227^ea^ katvaa yena aavasathaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa sabbasanthari.m aavasathaagaara.m santharitvaa, aasanaani pa~n~napetvaa, udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapetvaa, telapadiipa.m aaropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sabbasantharisanthata.m, bhante, aavasathaagaara.m. aasanaani pa~n~nattaani. udakama.niko pati.t.thaapito. telapadiipo aaropito. yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena aavasathaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa majjhima.m thambha.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi. bhikkhusa"nghopi kho paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa pacchima.m bhitti.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi, bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. paa.taligaamikaapi kho upaasakaa paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa puratthima.m bhitti.m nissaaya pacchimaabhimukhaa ^a^T2.0088^ea^ ^a^V0.0303^ea^ nisiidi.msu, bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. atha kho bhagavaa paa.taligaamike upaasake aamantesi --

[03] ^a^M0.0322^ea^ {dii0 ni0 3.316; a0 ni0 5.213 aadayo}, gahapatayo, aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. katame pa~nca? idha, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno pamaadaadhikara.na.m mahati.m bhogajaani.m nigacchati. aya.m pa.thamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilassa siilavipannassa paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m dutiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati, yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m, avisaarado upasa"nkamati ma"nkubhuuto. aya.m tatiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno sammuu.lho kaala.mkaroti. aya.m catuttho aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. aya.m pa~ncamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. ime kho, gahapatayo, pa~nca aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] {dii0 ni0 3.316; a0 ni0 5.213 aadayo} ``pa~ncime, gahapatayo, aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaaya. katame ^a^P1.0228^ea^ pa~nca? idha, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno appamaadaadhikara.na.m mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati. aya.m pa.thamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya ^a^T2.0089^ea^. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavato siilasampannassa kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m dutiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati, yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m, visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto. aya.m tatiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno asammuu.lho kaala.mkaroti. aya.m catuttho aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. aya.m pa~ncamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. ime kho, gahapatayo, pa~nca aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaayaati.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa paa.taligaamike upaasake bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa uyyojesi ^a^M0.0323^ea^ -- ``abhikkantaa kho, gahapatayo, ratti. yassadaani tumhe kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti, kho paa.taligaamikaa upaasakaa bhagavato ^a^V0.0304^ea^ pa.tissu.nitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantesu paa.taligaamikesu upaasakesu su~n~naagaara.m paavisi.
[06] paa.taligaamavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0090^ea^ kho pana samayena sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaaya. addasaa kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sambahulaa devataayo paa.taligaame vatthuuni parigga.nhantiyo. yasmi.m padese mahesakkhaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, mahesakkhaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese majjhimaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, majjhimaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese niicaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, niicaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ke nu kho te, aananda, paa.taligaame nagara.m maapentii''ti? ``sunidhavassakaaraa ^a^P1.0229^ea^, bhante, magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaayaa''ti. seyyathaapi, aananda, devehi taavati.msehi saddhi.m mantetvaa, evameva kho, aananda, sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaaya. idhaaha.m, aananda, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya addasa.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sambahulaa devataayo paa.taligaame vatthuuni parigga.nhantiyo. yasmi.m padese mahesakkhaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, mahesakkhaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m ^a^T2.0091^ea^ padese majjhimaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, majjhimaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese niicaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, niicaana.m tattha raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yaavataa, aananda, ariya.m aayatana.m, yaavataa va.nippatho, ida.m agganagara.m bhavissati paa.taliputta.m pu.tabhedana.m. paa.taliputtassa kho, aananda, tayo antaraayaa ^a^M0.0324^ea^ bhavissanti -- aggito vaa udakato vaa abbhantarato vaa mithubhedaati.

[03]atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa ^a^V0.0305^ea^ saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``adhivaasetu no bhava.m gotamo ajjatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesu.m -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sunidhavassakaaraana.m magadhamahaamattaana.m parivesanaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena ^a^T2.0092^ea^. atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho sunidhavassakaare magadhamahaamatte bhagavaa imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``yasmi.m padese kappeti, vaasa.m pa.n.ditajaatiyo.
[22] siilavantettha bhojetvaa, sa~n~nate brahmacaarayo {brahmacaarino (syaa0)}..
[21] ``yaa tattha devataa aasu.m, taasa.m dakkhi.namaadise.
[22] taa puujitaa puujayanti, maanitaa maanayanti na.m..
[21] ``tato ^a^P1.0230^ea^ na.m anukampanti, maataa putta.mva orasa.m.
[22] devataanukampito poso, sadaa bhadraani passatii''ti..

[03]atha kho bhagavaa sunidhavassakaare magadhamahaamatte imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. tena kho pana samayena sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhaa honti, ``yenajja sama.no gotamo dvaarena nikkhamissati, ta.m gotamadvaara.m naama bhavissati ^a^M0.0325^ea^; yena titthena ga"nga.m nadi.m uttarissati, ta.m gotamatittha.m naama bhavissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa yena dvaarena nikkhami, ta.m gotamadvaara.m naama ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa yena ga"ngaa nadii tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena ga"ngaa nadii puuraa hoti samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. manussaa a~n~ne naava.m pariyesanti ^a^T2.0093^ea^, a~n~ne u.lumpa.m pariyesanti, a~n~ne kulla.m bandhanti oraa paara.m gantukaamaa. addasaa kho bhagavaa te manusse a~n~ne naava.m pariyesante, a~n~ne u.lumpa.m pariyesante, a~n~ne kulla.m bandhante oraa paara.m gantukaame, disvaana seyyathaapi ^a^V0.0306^ea^ naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva kho ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orimatiire antarahito paarimatiire paccu.t.thaasi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ye taranti a.n.nava.m sara.m.
[27] setu.m katvaana visajja pallalaani.
[26] kulla~nhi jano bandhati.
[22] ti.n.naa medhaavino janaa''ti..
[06] sunidhavassakaaravatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa yena ko.tigaamo tenupasa"nkami. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ko.tigaame viharati. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- {dii0 ni0 2.155} ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa ^a^T2.0094^ea^ ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. tayida.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m ^a^P1.0231^ea^ anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0)} ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0)} ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, ucchinnaa bhavata.nhaa, khii.naa bhavanetti, natthidaani punabbhavo''ti.
[21] catunna.m ^a^M0.0326^ea^ ariyasaccaana.m, yathaabhuuta.m adassanaa.
[22] sa.msita.m diighamaddhaana.m, taasu taasveva jaatisu..
[21] taani ^a^V0.0307^ea^ etaani di.t.thaani, bhavanetti samuuhataa.
[22] ucchinna.m muula.m dukkhassa, natthidaani punabbhavoti..
[06] ko.tigaame saccakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 2.161 aadayo} assosi kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa -- bhagavaa kira ko.tigaama.m anuppattoti. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadra.m bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi vesaaliyaa niyyaasi bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa, yaanaa paccorohitvaa, pattikaava yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ambapaali.m ga.nika.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya ^a^T2.0095^ea^ sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.
[06] ambapaaliivatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 2.161 aadayo} assosu.m kho vesaalikaa licchavii -- bhagavaa kira ko.tigaama.m anuppattoti. atha kho vesaalikaa licchavii bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadra.m bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi vesaaliyaa niyyaasu.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. appekacce licchavii niilaa honti niilava.n.naa niilavatthaa niilaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii piitaa honti piitava.n.naa piitavatthaa piitaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii lohitaa honti lohitava.n.naa lohitavatthaa lohitaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii odaataa honti odaatava.n.naa odaatavatthaa odaataala"nkaaraa. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa daharaana.m daharaana.m licchaviina.m iisaaya iisa.m yugena yuga.m cakkena cakka.m akkhena akkha.m pa.tiva.t.tesi {pa.tivattesi (ka0)}. atha ^a^P1.0232^ea^ ^a^M0.0327^ea^ kho te licchavii ambapaali.m ga.nika.m ^a^V0.0308^ea^ etadavocu.m -- ``kissa, je ambapaali, daharaana.m daharaana.m {amhaaka.m daharaana.m daharaana.m (sii0 syaa0)} licchaviina.m iisaaya iisa.m yugena yuga.m cakkena cakka.m akkhena akkha.m pa.tiva.t.tesii''ti? ``tathaa hi pana ^a^T2.0096^ea^ mayaa, ayyaputtaa, svaatanaaya buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho nimantito''ti. ``dehi, je ambapaali, amhaaka.m eta.m bhatta.m satasahassenaa''ti. ``sacepi me, ayyaputtaa, vesaali.m saahaara.m dajjeyyaatha, neva dajjaaha.m ta.m bhatta''nti. atha kho te licchavii a"nguli.m pho.tesu.m -- ``jitamhaa vata, bho, ambakaaya, paraajitamha vata, bho, ambakaayaa''ti. atha kho te licchavii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho bhagavaa te licchavii duuratova aagacchante, disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi devaa taavati.msaa adi.t.thapubbaa, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviiparisa.m; apaloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviiparisa.m; upasa.mharatha, bhikkhave, licchaviiparisa.m taavati.msaparisa''nti. atha kho te licchavii yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikaava yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te licchavii bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho te licchavii, bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``adhivaasetu no, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. ``adhivu.t.thomhi, licchavii, svaatanaaya ambapaaliyaa ga.nikaaya bhatta''nti. atha kho te licchavii a"nguli.m pho.tesu.m -- ``jitamha vata, bho, ambakaaya, paraajitamha vata ^a^T2.0097^ea^, bho, ambakaayaa''ti. atha kho te licchavii bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa ko.tigaame yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa {mahaaparinibbaanasutte anusandhi a~n~nathaa aagato} yena naatikaa {naadikaa (sii0 syaa0)} tenupasa"nkami. tatra suda.m bhagavaa naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake aaraame pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^M0.0328^ea^ nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena ambapaaliyaa ga.nikaaya parivesanaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena ^a^P1.0233^ea^. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaaha.m, bhante, ambavana.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dammii''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa aaraama.m. atha kho bhagavaa ambapaali.m ga.nika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya ^a^V0.0309^ea^ sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m.
[06] licchaviivatthu ni.t.thita.m.
[06] licchavibhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito tatiyo.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.12 aadayo} tena ^a^T2.0098^ea^ kho pana samayena abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii sandhaagaare {santhaagaare (sii0 syaa0)} sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. tena kho pana samayena siiho senaapati niga.n.thasaavako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho siihassa senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii santhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. atha kho siiho senaapati yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, siiha, kiriyavaado samaano akiriyavaada.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi? sama.no hi, siiha, gotamo akiriyavaado akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti. atha kho siihassa senaapatissa yo ahosi gamikaabhisa"nkhaaro bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, so ^a^M0.0329^ea^ pa.tippassambhi. dutiyampi kho abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii sandhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaanena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. dutiyampi kho siihassa senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii sandhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. dutiyampi kho siiho senaapati yena ^a^P1.0234^ea^ niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, siiha, kiriyavaado samaano akiriyavaada.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi? sama.no hi, siiha, gotamo akiriyavaado akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti ^a^V0.0310^ea^, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti. dutiyampi kho siihassa senaapatissa yo ahosi gamikaabhisa"nkhaaro bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, so pa.tippassambhi. tatiyampi kho abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa ^a^T2.0099^ea^ licchavii sandhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. tatiyampi kho siihassa senaapatissa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, tathaa hime abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii sandhaagaare sannisinnaa sannipatitaa anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. ki~nhi me karissanti niga.n.thaa apalokitaa vaa anapalokitaa vaa? ya.mnuunaaha.m anapaloketvaava niga.n.the ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti.

[03]atha kho siiho senaapati pa~ncahi rathasatehi divaa divassa vesaaliyaa niyyaasi bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m me ta.m, bhante, `akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu `akiriyavaado sama.no ^a^M0.0330^ea^ gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii'ti. kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado ^a^T2.0100^ea^ gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati? anabbhakkhaatukaamaa hi maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta''nti.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- tapassii sama.no gotamo, tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ^a^V0.0311^ea^ ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- apagabbho sama.no gotamo, apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti. atthi, siiha ^a^T2.0101^ea^, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- assattho sama.no gotamo, assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti ^a^P1.0235^ea^, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, akiriya.m vadaami kaayaduccaritassa vaciiduccaritassa manoduccaritassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m akiriya.m vadaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo ^a^M0.0331^ea^, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- akiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, kiriya.m vadaami kaayasucaritassa vaciisucaritassa manosucaritassa, anekavihitaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m kiriya.m vadaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- kiriyavaado sama.no gotamo, kiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo, ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, uccheda.m vadaami raagassa dosassa mohassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m uccheda.m vadaami. aya.m kho ^a^T2.0102^ea^, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ucchedavaado sama.no gotamo ucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, jigucchaami kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa jigucchaami. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena ^a^V0.0312^ea^ sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- jegucchii sama.no gotamo, jegucchitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi raagassa dosassa mohassa; anekavihitaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m ^a^M0.0332^ea^ dhammaana.m vinayaaya dhamma.m desemi. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- venayiko sama.no gotamo, vinayaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- tapassii sama.no gotamo, tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? tapaniiyaaha.m, siiha, paapake akusale dhamme vadaami -- kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. yassa kho, siiha, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa ^a^T2.0103^ea^ pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, tamaha.m tapassiiti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, siiha, tapaniiyaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchiinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya ``tapassii sama.no gotamo ^a^P1.0236^ea^ tapassitaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- apagabbho sama.no gotamo apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? yassa kho, siiha, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, tamaha.m apagabbhoti vadaami. tathaagatassa kho, siiha, aayati.m gabbhaseyyaa punabbhavaabhinibbatti pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- apagabbho sama.no gotamo, apagabbhataaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti.

[03]``katamo ca, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- assattho sama.no gotamo assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetiiti? aha~nhi, siiha, assattho ^a^V0.0313^ea^ paramena assaasena, assaasaaya dhamma.m desemi, tena ca saavake vinemi. aya.m kho, siiha, pariyaayo, yena ma.m pariyaayena sammaa ^a^T2.0104^ea^ vadamaano vadeyya -- assattho sama.no gotamo assaasaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0333^ea^ vutte siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. ``anuviccakaara.m {anuvijjakaara.m (ka0)} kho, siiha, karohi; anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii''ti. ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho, ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m kho, siiha, karohi; anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. mama~nhi, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa saavaka.m labhitvaa kevalakappa.m vesaali.m pa.taaka.m parihareyyu.m -- `siiho kho amhaaka.m senaapati saavakatta.m upagato'ti. atha ca pana ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m kho, siiha, karohi; anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. esaaha.m, bhante, dutiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa ^a^T2.0105^ea^ dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. ``diigharatta.m kho te, siiha, niga.n.thaana.m opaanabhuuta.m kula.m, yena nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii''ti. ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho, ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `diigharatta.m kho te, siiha, niga.n.thaana.m opaanabhuuta.m kula.m, yena nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii'ti. suta.m me ta.m, bhante, sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- `mayhameva daana.m daatabba.m, na a~n~nesa.m daana.m daatabba.m; mayhameva saavakaana.m daana.m daatabba.m, na a~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m daana.m daatabba.m ^a^P1.0237^ea^; mayhameva dinna.m mahapphala.m, na a~n~nesa.m dinna.m mahapphala.m; mayhameva saavakaana.m dinna.m mahapphala.m, na a~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m dinna.m mahapphala'nti. atha ca pana ma.m bhagavaa niga.n.thesupi daane samaadapeti. api ca, bhante, mayamettha kaala.m jaanissaama. esaaha.m, bhante, tatiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa siihassa senaapatissa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0106^ea^ aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha ^a^M0.0334^ea^ kho siiho senaapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0314^ea^ kho siiho senaapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne, pavattama.msa.m jaanaahii''ti. atha kho siiho senaapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena siihassa senaapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa niga.n.thaa vesaaliya.m rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m baahaa paggayha kandanti -- ``ajja siihena senaapatinaa thuula.m pasu.m vadhitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa bhatta.m kata.m, ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m ^a^T2.0107^ea^ uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma''nti. atha kho a~n~nataro puriso yena siiho senaapati tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa siihassa senaapatissa upaka.n.nake aarocesi ``yagghe, bhante, jaaneyyaasi, ete sambahulaa niga.n.thaa vesaaliya.m rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m baahaa paggayha kandanti -- `ajja siihena senaapatinaa thuula.m pasu.m vadhitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa bhatta.m kata.m, ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma'''nti. ``ala.m ayyo, diigharattampi te aayasmantaa ava.n.nakaamaa buddhassa, ava.n.nakaamaa dhammassa, ava.n.nakaamaa sa"nghassa; na ca pana te aayasmantaa jiridanti ta.m bhagavanta.m asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhantaa; na ca maya.m jiivitahetupi sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropeyyaamaa''ti. atha kho siiho senaapati buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa ^a^P1.0238^ea^ sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho siiha.m senaapati.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, jaa na.m uddissakata.m ^a^T2.0108^ea^ ma.msa.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo ^a^M0.0335^ea^ paribhu~njeyya aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tiko.tiparisuddha.m macchama.msa.m -- adi.t.tha.m assuta.m aparisa"nkita''nti.
[06] siihasenaapativatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0315^ea^ kho pana samayena vesaalii subhikkhaa hoti susassaa sulabhapi.n.daa, sukaraa u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``yaani taani mayaa bhikkhuuna.m anu~n~naataani dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapi.n.de anto vu.t.tha.m anto pakka.m saama.m pakka.m uggahitapa.tiggahitaka.m tato niiha.ta.m purebhatta.m pa.tiggahita.m vana.t.tha.m pokkhara.t.tha.m, ajjaapi nu kho taani bhikkhuu paribhu~njantii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``yaani taani, aananda, mayaa bhikkhuuna.m anu~n~naataani dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapi.n.de anto vu.t.tha.m anto pakka.m saama.m pakka.m uggahitapa.tiggahitaka.m tato niiha.ta.m purebhatta.m pa.tiggahita.m vana.t.tha.m pokkhara.t.tha.m, ajjaapi nu kho taani bhikkhuu paribhu~njantii''ti? ``paribhu~njanti bhagavaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yaani taani, bhikkhave, mayaa bhikkhuuna.m anu~n~naataani dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapi.n.de anto vu.t.tha.m anto pakka.m saama.m pakka.m uggahitapa.tiggahitaka.m tato niiha.ta.m purebhatta.m pa.tiggahita.m vana.t.tha.m pokkhara.t.tha.m, taanaaha.m ajjatagge pa.tikkhipaami. na, bhikkhave, anto vu.t.tha.m anto pakka.m saama.m pakka.m ^a^T2.0109^ea^ uggahitapa.tiggahitaka.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, tato niiha.ta.m purebhatta.m pa.tiggahita.m vana.t.tha.m pokkhara.t.tha.m bhuttaavinaa pavaaritena anatiritta.m paribhu~njitabba.m. yo paribhu~njeyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena jaanapadaa manussaa bahu.m lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi saka.tesu aaropetvaa bahaaraamako.t.thake saka.tapariva.t.ta.m karitvaa acchanti -- yadaa pa.tipaa.ti.m labhissaama, tadaa bhatta.m karissaamaati. mahaa ca megho ^a^P1.0239^ea^ uggato hoti. atha kho te manussaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante aananda, bahu.m lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi saka.tesu aaropitaa ti.t.thanti, mahaa ca megho uggato ^a^M0.0336^ea^; katha.m nu kho, bhante aananda, pa.tipajjitabba''nti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``tena haananda, sa"ngho paccantima.m vihaara.m kappiyabhuumi.m sammannitvaa tattha vaasetu, ya.m sa"ngho aaka"nkhati vihaara.m vaa a.d.dhayoga.m vaa paasaada.m vaa hammiya.m vaa guha.m vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0316^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m kappiyabhuumi.m sammanneyya, esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m kappiyabhuumi.m sammannati ^a^T2.0110^ea^. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa vihaarassa kappiyabhuumiyaa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo vihaaro kappiyabhuumi. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena manussaa tattheva sammutiyaa {sammatikaaya (syaa0)} kappiyabhuumiyaa yaaguyo pacanti, bhattaani pacanti, suupaani sampaadenti, ma.msaani ko.t.tenti, ka.t.thaani phaalenti. assosi kho bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya uccaasadda.m mahaasadda.m kaakoravasadda.m, sutvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho so, aananda, uccaasaddo mahaasaddo kaakoravasaddo''ti? ``etarahi, bhante, manussaa tattheva sammutiyaa kappiyabhuumiyaa yaaguyo pacanti, bhattaani pacanti, suupaani sampaadenti, ma.msaani ko.t.tenti, ka.t.thaani phaalenti. so eso, bhagavaa, uccaasaddo mahaasaddo kaakoravasaddo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, sammuti {sammatikaa (syaa0)} kappiyabhuumi paribhu~njitabbaa. yo paribhu~njeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tisso kappiyabhuumiyo -- ussaavanantika.m gonisaadika.m gahapati''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa yasojo gilaano hoti. tassatthaaya bhesajjaani aahariyanti. taani bhikkhuu bahi vaasenti. ukkapi.n.dikaapi ^a^T2.0111^ea^ khaadanti, coraapi haranti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami ^a^M0.0337^ea^, bhikkhave, sammuti.m kappiyabhuumi.m paribhu~njitu.m ^a^P1.0240^ea^. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, catasso kappiyabhuumiyo -- ussaavanantika.m gonisaadika.m gahapati.m sammutinti.
[06] kappiyabhuumianujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] siihabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito catuttho.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0317^ea^ kho pana samayena bhaddiyanagare me.n.dako gahapati pa.tivasati. tassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo hoti -- siisa.m nahaayitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m sammajjaapetvaa bahidvaare nisiidati, antalikkhaa dha~n~nassa dhaaraa opatitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m puureti. bhariyaaya evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo hoti -- eka.myeva aa.lhakathaalika.m upanisiiditvaa eka~nca suupabhi~njanaka.m {suupabhi~njaraka.m (sii0)} daasakammakaraporisa.m bhattena parivisati, na taava ta.m khiyyati {khiiyati (sii0 syaa0)} yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. puttassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo hoti -- eka.myeva sahassathavika.m gahetvaa daasakammakaraporisassa chamaasika.m vetana.m deti, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaavassa hatthagataa. su.nisaaya evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo hoti -- eka.myeva catudo.nika.m pi.taka.m upanisiiditvaa daasakammakaraporisassa chamaasika.m bhatta.m deti, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. daasassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo hoti -- ekena na"ngalena kasantassa satta siitaayo gacchanti.

[03]assosi kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro -- ``amhaaka.m ^a^T2.0112^ea^ kira vijite bhaddiyanagare me.n.dako gahapati pa.tivasati. tassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo -- siisa.m nahaayitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m sammajjaapetvaa bahidvaare nisiidati, antalikkhaa dha~n~nassa dhaaraa opatitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m puureti. bhariyaaya evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo -- eka.myeva aa.lhakathaalika.m upanisiiditvaa eka~nca suupabhi~njanaka.m daasakammakaraporisa.m bhattena parivisati, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. puttassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo -- eka.myeva sahassathavika.m gahetvaa daasakammakaraporisassa chamaasika.m vetana.m deti, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaavassa hatthagataa. su.nisaaya evaruupo ^a^M0.0338^ea^ iddhaanubhaavo -- eka.myeva catudo.nika.m pi.taka.m upanisiiditvaa daasakammakaraporisassa chamaasika.m bhatta.m deti, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. daasassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo -- ekena na"ngalena kasantassa satta siitaayo gacchantii''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro a~n~natara.m sabbatthaka.m mahaamatta.m aamantesi -- ``amhaaka.m kira, bha.ne, vijite bhaddiyanagare me.n.dako gahapati pa.tivasati. tassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo ^a^P1.0241^ea^ -- siisa.m nahaayitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m sammajjaapetvaa bahidvaare nisiidati, antalikkhaa dha~n~nassa dhaaraa opatitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m puureti. bhariyaaya...pe0... puttassa... su.nisaaya... daasassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo, ekena na"ngalena kasantassa satta siitaayo gacchantiiti. gaccha, bha.ne, jaanaahi. yathaa mayaa saama.m di.t.tho, eva.m tava di.t.tho bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0318^ea^, devaati ^a^T2.0113^ea^ kho so mahaamatto ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissu.nitvaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya yena bhaddiya.m tena paayaasi. anupubbena yena bhaddiya.m yena me.n.dako gahapati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa me.n.daka.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, gahapati, ra~n~naa aa.natto `amhaaka.m kira, bha.ne, vijite bhaddiyanagare me.n.dako gahapati pa.tivasati, tassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo, siisa.m nahaayitvaa...pe0... bhariyaaya... puttassa... su.nisaaya... daasassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo, ekena na"ngalena kasantassa satta siitaayo gacchantii'ti, gaccha, bha.ne, jaanaahi. yathaa mayaa saama.m di.t.tho, eva.m tava di.t.tho bhavissatii'ti. passaama te, gahapati, iddhaanubhaava''nti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati siisa.m nahaayitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m sammajjaapetvaa bahidvaare nisiidi, antalikkhaa dha~n~nassa dhaaraa opatitvaa dha~n~naagaara.m puuresi. ``di.t.tho te, gahapati, iddhaanubhaavo. bhariyaaya te iddhaanubhaava.m ^a^T2.0114^ea^ passissaamaa''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati bhariya.m aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi catura"ngini.m sena.m bhattena parivisaa''ti. atha kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa bhariyaa eka.myeva aa.lhakathaalika.m upanisiiditvaa eka~nca suupabhi~njanaka.m catura"ngini.m sena.m bhattena parivisi, na taava ta.m khiyyati, yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. ``di.t.tho te, gahapati, bhariyaayapi iddhaanubhaavo. puttassa te iddhaanubhaava.m passissaamaa''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati putta.m aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi catura"nginiyaa senaaya chamaasika.m vetana.m dehii''ti ^a^M0.0339^ea^. atha kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa putto eka.myeva sahassathavika.m gahetvaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya chamaasika.m vetana.m adaasi, na taava ta.m khiyyati, yaavassa hatthagataa. ``di.t.tho te, gahapati, puttassapi iddhaanubhaavo. su.nisaaya te iddhaanubhaava.m passissaamaa''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati su.nisa.m aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi catura"nginiyaa senaaya chamaasika.m bhatta.m dehii''ti. atha kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa su.nisaa eka.myeva catudo.nika.m pi.taka.m upanisiiditvaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya chamaasika.m bhatta.m adaasi, na taava ta.m khiyyati yaava saa na vu.t.thaati. ``di.t.tho te, gahapati, su.nisaayapi iddhaanubhaavo. daasassa te iddhaanubhaava.m passissaamaa''ti. ``mayha.m kho, saami, daasassa iddhaanubhaavo khette passitabbo''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati, di.t.tho te daasassapi iddhaanubhaavo''ti. atha kho so mahaamatto catura"nginiyaa senaaya punadeva raajagaha.m paccaaga~nchi. yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etamattha.m aarocesi.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0242^ea^ kho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena bhaddiya.m tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m ^a^V0.0319^ea^ caramaano yena ^a^T2.0115^ea^ bhaddiya.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa bhaddiye viharati jaatiyaa vane. assosi kho me.n.dako gahapati -- ``sama.no khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito bhaddiya.m anuppatto bhaddiye viharati jaatiyaa vane. ta.m kho pana bhagavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa' {bhagavaati (ka0)}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadra.m bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi ^a^M0.0340^ea^ bhaddiyaa niyyaasi bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. addasa.msu kho sambahulaa titthiyaa me.n.daka.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana me.n.daka.m gahapati.m etadavocu.m -- ``kaha.m tva.m, gahapati, gacchasii''ti? ``gacchaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m {ida.m pada.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi} sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, gahapati, kiriyavaado samaano akiriyavaada.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissasi? sama.no hi, gahapati, gotamo akiriyavaado akiriyaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena ca saavake vinetii''ti. atha kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa ^a^T2.0116^ea^ etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m, kho so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhavissati, yathayime titthiyaa usuuyantii''ti. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m...pe0... aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ^a^T2.0117^ea^ upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m ^a^P1.0243^ea^. adhivaasetu ca me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]atha kho me.n.dako gahapati tassaa rattiyaa accayena pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena me.n.dakassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho me.n.dakassa gahapatissa bhariyaa ca putto ca su.nisaa ca daaso ca yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^V0.0320^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tesa.m bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0118^ea^ aparappaccayaa satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m ^a^M0.0341^ea^ gate''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho me.n.dako gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yaava, bhante, bhagavaa bhaddiye viharati taava aha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dhuvabhattenaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa me.n.daka.m gahapati.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.
[06] me.n.dakagahapativattha ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhaddiye yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa me.n.daka.m gahapati.m anaapucchaa yena a"nguttaraapo tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. assosi kho ^a^T2.0119^ea^ me.n.dako gahapati -- ``bhagavaa kira yena a"nguttaraapo tena caarika.m pakkanto mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehii''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati daase ca kammakare ca aa.naapesi -- ``tena hi, bha.ne, bahu.m lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi saka.tesu aaropetvaa aagacchatha, a.d.dhatelasaani ca gopaalakasataani a.d.dhatelasaani ca dhenusataani aadaaya aagacchantu, yattha bhagavanta.m passissaama tattha taru.nena {dhaaru.nhena (sii0 syaa0)} khiirena bhojessaamaa''ti. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati ^a^P1.0244^ea^ bhagavanta.m antaraamagge kantaare sambhaavesi. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho me.n.dako gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho me.n.dako gahapati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.
