[03] 301^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0247^ea^ ^a^M0.0345^ea^ kho bhagavaa aapa.ne yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena kusinaaraa tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. assosu.m kho kosinaarakaa mallaa -- ``bhagavaa kira kusinaara.m aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehii''ti. te sa"ngara.m {sa"nkara.m (ka0)} aka.msu -- ``yo bhagavato paccuggamana.m na ^a^T2.0125^ea^ karissati, pa~ncasataanissa da.n.do''ti. tena kho pana samayena rojo mallo aayasmato aanandassa sahaayo hoti. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kusinaaraa tadavasari. atha kho kosinaarakaa mallaa bhagavato paccuggamana.m aka.msu. atha kho rojo mallo ^a^V0.0324^ea^ bhagavato paccuggamana.m karitvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho roja.m malla.m aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``u.laara.m kho te ida.m, aavuso roja, ya.m tva.m bhagavato paccuggamana.m akaasii''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante aananda, bahukato buddhe vaa dhamme vaa sa"nghe vaa; api ca ~naatiihi sa"ngaro kato -- `yo bhagavato paccuggamana.m na karissati, pa~ncasataanissa da.n.do'''ti; so kho aha.m, bhante aananda, ~naatiina.m da.n.dabhayaa evaaha.m bhagavato paccuggamana.m akaasinti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando anattamano ahosi' katha~nhi naama rojo mallo eva.m vakkhatii'ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, rojo mallo abhi~n~naato ~naatamanusso. mahatthiko kho pana evaruupaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m imasmi.m dhammavinaye pasaado. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa ^a^T2.0126^ea^ karotu, yathaa rojo mallo imasmi.m dhammavinaye pasiideyyaa''ti. ``na kho ta.m, aananda, dukkara.m tathaagatena, yathaa rojo mallo imasmi.m dhammavinaye pasiideyyaa''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa roja.m malla.m mettena cittena pharitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi. atha kho rojo mallo bhagavato mettena cittena phu.t.tho, seyyathaapi naama gaavi.m taru.navaccho, evameva, vihaarena ^a^M0.0346^ea^ vihaara.m parive.nena parive.na.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuu pucchati -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante, etarahi so bhagavaa viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``esaavuso roja, vihaaro ^a^P1.0248^ea^ sa.mvutadvaaro, tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tehi, vivarissati te bhagavaa dvaara''nti. atha kho rojo mallo yena so vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro, tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi. vivari bhagavaa dvaara.m. atha kho rojo mallo vihaara.m pavisitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho rojassa mallassa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0127^ea^ aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu, bhante, ayyaa mama~n~neva pa.tigga.nheyyu.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, no a~n~nesa''nti. ``yesa.m kho, roja, sekkhena ~naa.nena sekkhena dassanena dhammo di.t.tho seyyathaapi tayaa, tesampi eva.m hoti -- `aho nuuna ayyaa amhaaka~n~neva pa.tigga.nheyyu.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, no a~n~nesa'nti. tena hi, roja, tava ceva pa.tiggahissanti a~n~nesa~ncaa''ti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0325^ea^ kho pana samayena kusinaaraaya.m pa.niitaana.m bhattaana.m bhattapa.tipaa.ti a.t.thitaa hoti. atha kho rojassa mallassa pa.tipaa.ti.m alabhantassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m bhattagga.m olokeyya.m, ya.m bhattagge naassa, ta.m pa.tiyaadeyya''nti. atha kho rojo mallo bhattagga.m olokento dve naaddasa -- .daaka~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya~nca. atha kho rojo mallo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m ^a^T2.0128^ea^ etadavoca -- ``idha me, bhante aananda, pa.tipaa.ti.m alabhantassa etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m bhattagga.m olokeyya.m, ya.m bhattagge naassa, ta.m pa.tiyaadeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhante aananda, bhattagga.m olokento dve naaddasa.m -- .daaka~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya~nca. sacaaha.m, bhante aananda, pa.tiyaadeyya.m .daaka~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya~nca, pa.tigga.nheyya me bhagavaa''ti? ``tena hi, roja, bhagavanta.m pa.tipucchissaamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``tena haananda, pa.tiyaadetuu''ti. ``tena hi, roja, pa.tiyaadehii''ti. atha kho rojo mallo tassaa rattiyaa accayena ^a^M0.0347^ea^ pahuuta.m .daaka~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya~nca pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato upanaamesi ``pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa .daaka~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya~ncaa''ti. ``tena hi, roja, bhikkhuuna.m dehii''ti. atha kho rojo mallo bhikkhuuna.m deti. bhikkhuu kukkuccaayantaa na pa.tigga.nhanti ^a^P1.0249^ea^. ``pa.tigga.nhatha, bhikkhave, paribhu~njathaa''ti. atha kho rojo mallo buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pahuutehi .daakehi ca pi.t.thakhaadaniiyehi ca sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m dhotahattha.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho roja.m malla.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabba~nca .daaka.m sabba~nca pi.t.thakhaadaniiya''nti.
[06] rojamallavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0129^ea^ kho bhagavaa kusinaaraaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena aatumaa tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro vu.d.dhapabbajito aatumaaya.m pa.tivasati nahaapitapubbo. tassa dve daarakaa honti, ma~njukaa pa.tibhaaneyyakaa, dakkhaa pariyodaatasippaa sake aacariyake nahaapitakamme. assosi kho so vu.d.dhapabbajito -- ``bhagavaa kira aatuma.m aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi ^a^V0.0326^ea^ bhikkhusatehii''ti. atha kho so vu.d.dhapabbajito te daarake etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa kira, taataa, aatuma.m aagacchati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. gacchatha tumhe, taataa, khurabha.n.da.m aadaaya naa.liyaavaapakena anugharaka.m anugharaka.m aahi.n.datha, lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi sa.mharatha, bhagavato aagatassa yaagupaana.m karissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, taataa''ti kho te daarakaa tassa vu.d.dhapabbajitassa pa.tissu.nitvaa khurabha.n.da.m aadaaya naa.liyaavaapakena anugharaka.m anugharaka.m aahi.n.danti, lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi sa.mharantaa. manussaa te daarake ma~njuke pa.tibhaaneyyake passitvaa yepi na kaaraapetukaamaa tepi kaaraapenti, kaaraapetvaapi bahu.m denti. atha kho te daarakaa bahu.m lo.nampi, telampi, ta.n.dulampi, khaadaniiyampi sa.mhari.msu.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0348^ea^ kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena ^a^T2.0130^ea^ aatumaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa aatumaaya.m viharati bhusaagaare. atha kho so vu.d.dhapabbajito tassaa rattiyaa accayena pahuuta.m yaagu.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa yaagu''nti. jaanantaapi ^a^P1.0250^ea^ tathaagataa pucchanti...pe0... saavakaana.m vaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamaati. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m vu.d.dhapabbajita.m etadavoca -- ``kutaaya.m, bhikkhu yaaguu''ti? atha kho so vu.d.dhapabbajito bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa, ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, pabbajito akappiye samaadapessasi {samaadapesi (ka0)}. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi `na, bhikkhave, pabbajitena akappiye samaadapetabba.m, yo samaadapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassa. na ca, bhikkhave, nahaapitapubbena khurabha.n.da.m pariharitabba.m. yo parihareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa'''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa aatumaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi ^a^T2.0131^ea^ tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m bahu.m phalakhaadaniiya.m uppanna.m hoti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho bhagavataa phalakhaadaniiya.m anu~n~naata.m, ki.m ananu~n~naata''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sabba.m phalakhaadaniiya''nti.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0327^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghikaani biijaani puggalikaaya bhuumiyaa ropiyanti, puggalikaani biijaani sa"nghikaaya bhuumiyaa ropiyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. sa"nghikaani, bhikkhave, biijaani puggalikaaya bhuumiyaa ropitaani bhaaga.m datvaa paribhu~njitabbaani. puggalikaani biijaani sa"nghikaaya bhuumiyaa ropitaani bhaaga.m datvaa paribhu~njitabbaaniiti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m kismi~nci kismi~nci .thaane kukkucca.m uppajjati -- ``ki.m nu kho bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m, ki.m ananu~n~naata''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m na kappatii'ti appa.tikkhitta.m ta~nce ^a^M0.0349^ea^ akappiya.m anulometi, kappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo na kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m na kappatii'ti appa.tikkhitta.m ^a^P1.0251^ea^ ta~nce kappiya.m anulometi, akappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m kappatii'ti ananu~n~naata.m ta~nce akappiya.m anulometi, kappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo ^a^T2.0132^ea^ na kappati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mayaa `ida.m kappatii'ti ananu~n~naata.m, ta~nce kappiya.m anulometi, akappiya.m pa.tibaahati, ta.m vo kappatii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kappati nu kho yaavakaalikena yaamakaalika.m, na nu kho kappati? kappati nu kho yaavakaalikena sattaahakaalika.m, na nu kho kappati? kappati nu kho yaavakaalikena yaavajiivika.m, na nu kho kappati? kappati nu kho yaamakaalikena sattaahakaalika.m, na nu kho kappati? kappati nu kho yaamakaalikena yaavajiivika.m, na nu kho kappati? kappati nu kho sattaahakaalikena yaavajiivika.m, na nu kho kappatii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``yaavakaalikena, bhikkhave, yaamakaalika.m, tadahu pa.tiggahita.m kaale kappati, vikaale na kappati. yaavakaalikena, bhikkhave, sattaahakaalika.m, tadahu pa.tiggahita.m kaale kappati, vikaale na kappati. yaavakaalikena, bhikkhave, yaavajiivika.m, tadahu pa.tiggahita.m kaale kappati, vikaale na kappati. yaamakaalikena, bhikkhave, sattaahakaalika.m, tadahu pa.tiggahita.m yaame kappati, yaamaatikkante na kappati. yaamakaalikena, bhikkhave, yaavajiivika.m, tadahu pa.tiggahita.m yaame kappati, yaamaatikkante ^a^V0.0328^ea^ na kappati. sattaahakaalikena, bhikkhave, yaavajiivika.m pa.tiggahita.m, sattaaha.m kappati, sattaahaatikkante na kappatii''ti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0253^ea^ ^a^M0.0351^ea^ ^a^V0.0330^ea^ ^a^T2.0135^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ti.msamattaa paaveyyakaa {paa.theyyakaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhikkhuu, sabbe aara~n~nikaa sabbe pi.n.dapaatikaa sabbe pa.msukuulikaa sabbe teciivarikaa saavatthi.m aagacchantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upaka.t.thaaya vassuupanaayikaaya naasakkhi.msu saavatthiya.m vassuupanaayika.m sambhaavetu.m; antaraamagge saakete vassa.m upagacchi.msu. te ukka.n.thitaruupaa vassa.m vasi.msu -- aasanneva no bhagavaa viharati ito chasu yojanesu, na ca maya.m labhaama bhagavanta.m dassanaayaati. atha kho te bhikkhuu vassa.mvu.t.thaa, temaasaccayena kataaya pavaara.naaya, deve vassante, udakasa"ngahe udakacikkhalle okapu.n.nehi ciivarehi kilantaruupaa yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa phaasuka.m vassa.m vasittha, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamitthaa''ti? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa; yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa; samaggaa ca maya.m, bhante, sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa vassa.m vasimhaa, na ca pi.n.dakena kilamimhaa ^a^T2.0136^ea^. idha maya.m, bhante, ti.msamattaa paaveyyakaa bhikkhuu saavatthi.m aagacchantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upaka.t.thaaya vassuupanaayikaaya naasakkhimhaa saavatthiya.m vassuupanaayika.m sambhaavetu.m, antaraamagge saakete vassa.m upagacchimhaa. te maya.m, bhante, ukka.n.thitaruupaa vassa.m vasimhaa ^a^P1.0254^ea^ -- `aasanneva no bhagavaa viharati ito chasu yojanesu, na ca maya.m labhaama bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, vassa.mvu.t.thaa, temaasaccayena kataaya pavaara.naaya, deve vassante, udakasa"ngahe udakacikkhalle okapu.n.nehi ciivarehi kilantaruupaa addhaana.m aagataati. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m ^a^V0.0331^ea^ nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vassa.mvu.t.thaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^M0.0352^ea^ kathina.m {ka.thina.m (sii0 syaa0)} attharitu.m. atthatakathinaana.m vo, bhikkhave, pa~nca kappissanti -- anaamantacaaro, asamaadaanacaaro, ga.nabhojana.m, yaavadatthaciivara.m, yo ca tattha ciivaruppaado so nesa.m bhavissatiiti. atthatakathinaana.m vo, bhikkhave, imaani pa~nca kappissanti. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, kathina.m attharitabba.m. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m sa"nghassa kathinadussa.m uppanna.m. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m kathinadussa.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathina.m attharitu.m. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. ida.m sa"nghassa kathinadussa.m uppanna.m. sa"ngho ima.m kathinadussa.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno deti kathina.m ^a^T2.0137^ea^ attharitu.m. yassaayasmato khamati imassa kathinadussassa itthannaamassa bhikkhuno daana.m kathina.m attharitu.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinna.m ida.m sa"nghena kathinadussa.m itthannaamassa bhikkhuno kathina.m attharitu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atthata.m hoti kathina.m, eva.m anatthata.m. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave, anatthata.m hoti kathina.m? na ullikhitamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na dhovanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ciivaravicaara.namattena {na ga.n.tusakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na chedanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na bandhanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ova.t.tiyakara.namattena {na ova.t.teyyakara.namattena (sii0 syaa0), na ovadeyyakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ka.n.dusakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na da.lhiikammakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na anuvaatakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na paribha.n.dakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ovaddheyyakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na kambalamaddanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na nimittakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na parikathaakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na kukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na sannidhikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na nissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na akappakatena atthata.m ^a^M0.0353^ea^ hoti kathina.m ^a^T2.0138^ea^, na a~n~natra sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ^a^P1.0255^ea^ a~n~natra uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra pa~ncakena vaa atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena ^a^V0.0332^ea^ atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m hoti kathina.m; sammaa ceva atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ta~nce nissiima.t.tho anumodati, evampi anatthata.m hoti kathina.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, atthata.m hoti kathina.m? ahatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ahatakappena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pilotikaaya atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa.msukuulena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, paapa.nikena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, animittakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, aparikathaakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, akukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, asannidhikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, anissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, kappakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa~ncakena vaa atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m hoti kathina.m; sammaa ce atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ta~nce siima.t.tho anumodati, evampi atthata.m hoti kathina.m ^a^T2.0139^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ubbhata.m hoti kathina.m? a.t.thimaa, bhikkhave, maatikaa kathinassa ubbhaaraaya -- pakkamanantikaa, ni.t.thaanantikaa, sanni.t.thaanantikaa, naasanantikaa, savanantikaa, aasaavacchedikaa, siimaatikkantikaa, sahubbhaaraa''ti {saubbhaaraati (ka0)}.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ dveme ^a^T2.0164^ea^, bhikkhave, kathinassa palibodhaa, dve apalibodhaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa palibodhaa? aavaasapalibodho ca ciivarapalibodho ca. katha~nca, bhikkhave, aavaasapalibodho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vasati vaa tasmi.m aavaase, saapekkho vaa pakkamati ``paccessa''nti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, aavaasapalibodho hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, ciivarapalibodho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ciivara.m akata.m vaa hoti vippakata.m vaa, ciivaraasaa vaa anupacchinnaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ciivarapalibodho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa palibodhaa.

[03]katame ca, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa apalibodhaa? aavaasaapalibodho ca ciivaraapalibodho ca. katha~nca, bhikkhave, aavaasaapalibodho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pakkamati tamhaa aavaasaa cattena vantena muttena anapekkho {anapekkhena (ka0)} ``na paccessa''nti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, aavaasaapalibodho hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, ciivaraapalibodho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ciivara.m kata.m vaa hoti, na.t.tha.m vaa vina.t.tha.m vaa da.d.dha.m ^a^M0.0374^ea^ vaa, ciivaraasaa vaa upacchinnaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ciivaraapalibodho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa apalibodhaati.
[06] palibodhaapalibodhakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0268^ea^ ^a^M0.0377^ea^ ^a^V0.0356^ea^ ^a^T2.0168^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena vesaalii iddhaa ceva hoti phitaa {phiitaa (bahuusu)} ca bahujanaa ca aaki.n.namanussaa ca subhikkhaa ca; satta ca paasaadasahassaani satta ca paasaadasataani satta ca paasaadaa; satta ca kuu.taagaarasahassaani satta ca kuu.taagaarasataani satta ca kuu.taagaaraani; satta ca aaraamasahassaani satta ca aaraamasataani satta ca aaraamaa; satta ca pokkhara.niisahassaani satta ca pokkhara.niisataani satta ca pokkhara.niyo; ambapaalii ca ga.nikaa abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa, padakkhi.naa {padakkhaa (syaa0)} nacce ca giite ca vaadite ca, abhisa.taa atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m pa~n~naasaaya ca ratti.m gacchati; taaya ca vesaalii bhiyyosomattaaya upasobhati. atha kho raajagahako negamo vesaali.m agamaasi kenacideva kara.niiyena. addasaa kho raajagahako negamo vesaali.m iddha~nceva phita~nca bahujana~nca aaki.n.namanussa~nca subhikkha~nca; satta ca paasaadasahassaani satta ca paasaadasataani satta ca paasaade; satta ca kuu.taagaarasahassaani satta ca kuu.taagaarasataani satta ca kuu.taagaaraani; satta ca aaraamasahassaani satta ca aaraamasataani satta ca aaraame; satta ca pokkhara.niisahassaani satta ca pokkhara.niisataani satta ca pokkhara.niyo ^a^T2.0169^ea^; ambapaali~nca ga.nika.m abhiruupa.m dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagata.m, padakkhi.na.m {padakkha.m (syaa0)} nacce ca giite ca vaadite ca, abhisa.ta.m atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m pa~n~naasaaya ca ratti.m gacchanti.m, taaya ca vesaali.m bhiyyosomattaaya upasobhanti.m.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajagahako negamo vesaaliya.m ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa punadeva raajagaha.m paccaaga~nchi. yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m ^a^V0.0357^ea^ seniya.m bimbisaara.m ^a^M0.0378^ea^ etadavoca -- ``vesaalii, deva, iddhaa ceva phitaa ca bahujanaa ca aaki.n.namanussaa ca subhikkhaa ca; satta ca paasaadasahassaani...pe0... taaya ca vesaalii bhiyyosomattaaya upasobhati. saadhu, deva, mayampi ga.nika.m vu.t.thaapessaamaa''ti {vu.t.thaapeyyaama (ka0)}. ``tena hi, bha.ne, taadisi.m kumaari.m jaanaatha ya.m tumhe ga.nika.m vu.t.thaapeyyaathaa''ti. tena kho pana samayena raajagahe saalavatii naama ^a^T2.0170^ea^ kumaarii abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa. atha kho raajagahako negamo saalavati.m kumaari.m ga.nika.m ^a^P1.0269^ea^ vu.t.thaapesi. atha kho saalavatii ga.nikaa nacirasseva padakkhi.naa ahosi nacce ca giite ca vaadite ca, abhisa.taa atthikaana.m atthikaana.m manussaana.m pa.tisatena ca ratti.m gacchati. atha kho saalavatii ga.nikaa nacirasseva gabbhinii ahosi. atha kho saalavatiyaa ga.nikaaya etadahosi -- ``itthii kho gabbhinii purisaana.m amanaapaa. sace ma.m koci jaanissati saalavatii ga.nikaa gabbhiniiti, sabbo me sakkaaro bha~njissati { parihaayissati (sii0 syaa0)}. ya.mnuunaaha.m gilaana.m pa.tivedeyya''nti. atha kho saalavatii ga.nikaa dovaarika.m aa.naapesi -- ``maa, bha.ne dovaarika, koci puriso paavisi. yo ca ma.m pucchati, `gilaanaa'ti pa.tivedehii''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho so dovaariko saalavatiyaa ga.nikaaya paccassosi. atha kho saalavatii ga.nikaa tassa gabbhassa paripaakamanvaaya putta.m vijaayi. atha kho saalavatii ga.nikaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``handa, je, ima.m daaraka.m kattarasuppe pakkhipitvaa niiharitvaa sa"nkaarakuu.te cha.d.dehii''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho saa daasii saalavatiyaa ga.nikaaya pa.tissutvaa ta.m daaraka.m kattarasuppe pakkhipitvaa niiharitvaa sa"nkaarakuu.te cha.d.desi.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena abhayo naama raajakumaaro kaalasseva raajupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto addasa ta.m daaraka.m kaakehi sampariki.n.na.m ^a^T2.0171^ea^, disvaana manusse pucchi -- ``ki.m eta.m, bha.ne, kaakehi sampariki.n.na''nti? ``daarako, devaa''ti. ``jiivati, bha.ne''ti? ``jiivati, devaa''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne, ta.m daaraka.m amhaaka.m antepura.m netvaa dhaatiina.m detha posetu''nti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho te manussaa abhayassa raajakumaarassa pa.tissutvaa ta.m ^a^M0.0379^ea^ daaraka.m abhayassa raajakumaarassa antepura.m netvaa dhaatiina.m ada.msu -- ``posethaa''ti. tassa jiivatiiti `jiivako'ti naama.m aka.msu. kumaarena posaapitoti `komaarabhacco'ti naama.m aka.msu. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco nacirasseva vi~n~nuta.m paapu.ni. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena abhayo raajakumaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa abhaya.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``kaa me, deva, maataa, ko pitaa''ti? ``ahampi kho te, bha.ne jiivaka, maatara.m na jaanaami; api caaha.m te pitaa; mayaasi {mayaapi (ka0)} posaapito''ti. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``imaani ^a^V0.0358^ea^ kho raajakulaani na sukaraani asippena upajiivitu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m sippa.m sikkheyya''nti.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena takkasilaaya.m {takkasiilaaya.m (ka0)} disaapaamokkho vejjo pa.tivasati. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco abhaya.m raajakumaara.m anaapucchaa yena takkasilaa tena ^a^P1.0270^ea^ pakkaami. anupubbena yena takkasilaa, yena vejjo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vejja.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, aacariya, sippa.m sikkhitu''nti. ``tena hi, bha.ne ^a^T2.0172^ea^ jiivaka, sikkhassuu''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bahu~nca ga.nhaati lahu~nca ga.nhaati su.t.thu ca upadhaareti, gahita~ncassa na sammussati {na pamussati (sii0 syaa0)}. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa sattanna.m vassaana.m accayena etadahosi -- ``aha.m, kho bahu~nca ga.nhaami lahu~nca ga.nhaami su.t.thu ca upadhaaremi, gahita~nca me na sammussati, satta ca me vassaani adhiiyantassa, nayimassa sippassa anto pa~n~naayati. kadaa imassa sippassa anto pa~n~naayissatii''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena so vejjo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vejja.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, aacariya, bahu~nca ga.nhaami lahu~nca ga.nhaami su.t.thu ca upadhaaremi, gahita~nca me na sammussati, satta ca me vassaani adhiiyantassa, nayimassa sippassa anto pa~n~naayati. kadaa imassa sippassa anto pa~n~naayissatii''ti? ``tena hi, bha.ne jiivaka, kha.nitti.m aadaaya takkasilaaya samantaa yojana.m aahi.n.ditvaa ya.m ki~nci abhesajja.m passeyyaasi ta.m aaharaa''ti. ``eva.m, aacariyaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco tassa vejjassa pa.tissutvaa kha.nitti.m aadaaya takkasilaaya ^a^M0.0380^ea^ samantaa yojana.m aahi.n.danto na ki~nci abhesajja.m addasa. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena so vejjo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vejja.m etadavoca -- ``aahi.n.dantomhi, aacariya, takkasilaaya samantaa yojana.m, na ki~nci {aahi.n.tanto na ki~nci (ka0)} abhesajja.m addasa''nti. ``susikkhitosi ^a^T2.0173^ea^, bha.ne jiivaka. ala.m te ettaka.m jiivikaayaa''ti jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa paritta.m paatheyya.m paadaasi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ta.m paritta.m paatheyya.m aadaaya yena raajagaha.m tena pakkaami. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa ta.m paritta.m paatheyya.m antaraamagge saakete parikkhaya.m agamaasi. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho maggaa kantaaraa appodakaa appabhakkhaa, na sukaraa apaatheyyena gantu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m paatheyya.m pariyeseyya''nti.
[06] jiivakavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0359^ea^ kho pana samayena saakete se.t.thibhariyaaya sattavassiko siisaabaadho hoti. bahuu mahantaa mahantaa disaapaamokkhaa vejjaa aagantvaa naasakkhi.msu aroga.m kaatu.m. bahu.m hira~n~na.m aadaaya agama.msu. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco saaketa.m pavisitvaa manusse pucchi -- ``ko, bha.ne, gilaano, ka.m tikicchaamii''ti? ``etissaa, aacariya, se.t.thibhariyaaya sattavassiko ^a^P1.0271^ea^ siisaabaadho; gaccha, aacariya, se.t.thibhariya.m tikicchaahii''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena se.t.thissa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa dovaarika.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne dovaarika, se.t.thibhariyaaya paavada -- `vejjo, ayye, aagato, so ta.m da.t.thukaamo'''ti. ``eva.m, aacariyaa''ti kho so dovaariko jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa pa.tissutvaa yena se.t.thibhariyaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thibhariya.m etadavoca -- ``vejjo ^a^T2.0174^ea^, ayye, aagato; so ta.m da.t.thukaamo''ti. ``kiidiso, bha.ne dovaarika, vejjo''ti? ``daharako, ayye''ti. ``ala.m, bha.ne dovaarika, ki.m me daharako vejjo karissati? bahuu mahantaa mahantaa disaapaamokkhaa vejjaa aagantvaa ^a^M0.0381^ea^ naasakkhi.msu aroga.m kaatu.m. bahu.m hira~n~na.m aadaaya agama.msuu''ti. atha kho so dovaariko yena jiivako komaarabhacco tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``se.t.thibhariyaa, aacariya, evamaaha -- `ala.m, bha.ne dovaarika, ki.m me daharako vejjo karissati? bahuu mahantaa mahantaa disaapaamokkhaa vejjaa aagantvaa naasakkhi.msu aroga.m kaatu.m. bahu.m hira~n~na.m aadaaya agama.msuu'''ti. ``gaccha, bha.ne dovaarika, se.t.thibhariyaaya paavada -- `vejjo, ayye, evamaaha -- maa kira, ayye, pure ki~nci adaasi. yadaa arogaa ahosi tadaa ya.m iccheyyaasi ta.m dajjeyyaasii'''ti. ``eva.m, aacariyaa''ti kho so dovaariko jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa pa.tissutvaa yena se.t.thibhariyaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thibhariya.m etadavoca -- ``vejjo, ayye, evamaaha -- `maa kira, ayye, pure ki~nci adaasi. yadaa arogaa ahosi tadaa ya.m iccheyyaasi ta.m dajjeyyaasii'''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne dovaarika, vejjo aagacchatuu''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho so dovaariko se.t.thibhariyaaya pa.tissutvaa yena jiivako komaarabhacco tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``se.t.thibhariyaa ta.m, aacariya, pakkosatii''ti ^a^T2.0175^ea^.

[03]atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena se.t.thibhariyaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thibhariyaaya vikaara.m sallakkhetvaa se.t.thibhariya.m etadavoca -- ``pasatena, ayye, sappinaa attho''ti ^a^V0.0360^ea^. atha kho se.t.thibhariyaa jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa pasata.m sappi.m daapesi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ta.m pasata.m sappi.m naanaabhesajjehi nippacitvaa se.t.thibhariya.m ma~ncake uttaana.m nipaatetvaa {nipajjaapetvaa (sii0 syaa0)} natthuto adaasi. atha kho ta.m sappi.m natthuto dinna.m mukhato ugga~nchi. atha kho se.t.thibhariyaa pa.tiggahe ni.t.thubhitvaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``handa, je, ima.m sappi.m picunaa ga.nhaahii''ti. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m {acchariya.m vata bho (syaa0)} yaava luukhaaya.m ghara.nii, yatra hi naama ima.m cha.d.daniiyadhamma.m sappi.m picunaa gaahaapessati. bahukaani ^a^P1.0272^ea^ ca me mahagghaani {mahagghaani mahagghaani (sii0 syaa0)} bhesajjaani upagataani. kimpi maaya.m ki~nci {ka~nci (syaa0)} deyyadhamma.m dassatii''ti. atha kho se.t.thibhariyaa jiivakassa ^a^M0.0382^ea^ komaarabhaccassa vikaara.m sallakkhetvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``kissa tva.m, aacariya, vimanosii''ti? idha me etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m yaava luukhaaya.m dhara.nii, yatra hi naama ima.m cha.d.daniiyadhamma.m sappi.m picunaa gaahaapessati. bahukaani ca me mahagghaani sajjaani upagataani. kimpi maaya.m ki~nci deyyadhamma.m dassatii''ti. ``maya.m ^a^T2.0176^ea^ kho, aacariya, aagaarikaa naama upajaanaametassa sa.myamassa. varameta.m sappi daasaana.m vaa kammakaraana.m vaa paadabbha~njana.m vaa padiipakara.ne vaa aasitta.m. maa kho tva.m, aacariya, vimano ahosi. na te deyyadhammo haayissatii''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco se.t.thibhariyaaya sattavassika.m siisaabaadha.m ekeneva natthukammena apaka.d.dhi. atha kho se.t.thibhariyaa arogaa samaanaa jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa cattaari sahassaani paadaasi. putto -- maataa me arogaa .thitaati cattaari sahassaani paadaasi. su.nisaa -- sassu me arogaa .thitaati cattaari sahassaani paadaasi. se.t.thi gahapati -- bhariyaa me arogaa .thitaati cattaari sahassaani paadaasi daasa~nca daasi~nca assaratha~nca.

[03]atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco taani so.lasasahassaani aadaaya daasa~nca daasi~nca assaratha~nca yena raajagaha.m tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena raajagaha.m yena abhayo raajakumaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa abhaya.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m me, deva, pa.thamakamma.m so.lasasahassaani daaso ca daasii ca assaratho ca. pa.tigga.nhaatu me devo posaavanika''nti. ``ala.m, bha.ne jiivaka; tuyhameva hotu. amhaaka~n~neva antepure nivesana.m maapehii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco abhayassa raajakumaarassa pa.tissutvaa abhayassa raajakumaarassa antepure nivesana.m maapesi.
[06] se.t.thibhariyaavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0177^ea^ ^a^V0.0361^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa bhagandalaabaadho hoti. saa.takaa lohitena makkhiyanti. deviyo disvaa uppa.n.denti -- ``utunii daani devo, puppha.m devassa uppanna.m, na cira.m {nacirasseva (syaa0)} devo vijaayissatii''ti. tena raajaa ma"nku hoti ^a^M0.0383^ea^. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro abhaya.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bha.ne abhaya, taadiso aabaadho, saa.takaa lohitena makkhiyanti, deviyo ma.m disvaa uppa.n.denti -- `utunii daani devo, puppha.m devassa uppanna.m, na cira.m devo vijaayissatii'ti. i"ngha, bha.ne abhaya, taadisa.m vejja.m jaanaahi yo ma.m tikiccheyyaa''ti. ``aya.m, deva, amhaaka.m jiivako vejjo taru.no bhadrako. so deva.m tikicchissatii''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne abhaya, jiivaka.m ^a^P1.0273^ea^ vejja.m aa.naapehi; so ma.m tikicchissatii''ti. atha kho abhayo raajakumaaro jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne jiivaka, raajaana.m tikicchaahii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco abhayassa raajakumaarassa pa.tissutvaa nakhena bhesajja.m aadaaya yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m etadavoca -- ``aabaadha.m te, deva, passaamaa''ti {passaamiiti (syaa0)}. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa bhagandalaabaadha.m ekeneva aalepena apaka.d.dhi. atha kho raajaa maagadho ^a^T2.0178^ea^ seniyo bimbisaaro arogo samaano pa~nca itthisataani sabbaala"nkaara.m bhuusaapetvaa omu~ncaapetvaa pu~nja.m kaaraapetvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``eta.m, bha.ne jiivaka, pa~ncanna.m itthisataana.m sabbaala"nkaara.m tuyha.m hotuu''ti. ``ala.m, deva, adhikaara.m me devo saratuu''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne jiivaka, ma.m upa.t.thaha, itthaagaara~nca, buddhappamukha~nca bhikkhusa"ngha''nti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa paccassosi.
[06] bimbisaararaajavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena raajagahakassa se.t.thissa sattavassiko siisaabaadho hoti. bahuu mahantaa mahantaa disaapaamokkhaa vejjaa aagantvaa naasakkhi.msu aroga.m kaatu.m. bahu.m hira~n~na.m aadaaya agama.msu. api ca, vejjehi paccakkhaato hoti. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu -- ``pa~ncama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatii''ti. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu ^a^V0.0362^ea^ -- ``sattama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatii''ti. atha ^a^M0.0384^ea^ kho raajagahakassa negamassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho se.t.thi gahapati bahuupakaaro ra~n~no ceva negamassa ca. api ca, vejjehi paccakkhaato. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu -- `pa~ncama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatii'ti. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu -- `sattama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatii'ti. aya~nca ra~n~no jiivako vejjo taru.no bhadrako. ya.mnuuna maya.m raajaana.m jiivaka.m vejja.m yaaceyyaama se.t.thi.m gahapati.m ^a^T2.0179^ea^ tikicchitu''nti. atha kho raajagahako negamo yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, deva, se.t.thi gahapati bahuupakaaro devassa ceva negamassa ca; api ca, vejjehi paccakkhaato. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu -- pa~ncama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatiiti. ekacce vejjaa evamaaha.msu -- sattama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatiiti. saadhu devo jiivaka.m vejja.m aa.naapetu se.t.thi.m gahapati.m tikicchitu''nti ^a^P1.0274^ea^.

[03]atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne jiivaka, se.t.thi.m gahapati.m tikicchaahii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissutvaa yena se.t.thi gahapati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thissa gahapatissa vikaara.m sallakkhetvaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``sace tva.m, gahapati, arogo bhaveyyaasi {sacaaha.m ta.m gahapati arogaapeyya.m (sii0), sacaaha.m ta.m gahapati aroga.m kareyya.m (syaa0)} ki.m me assa deyyadhammo''ti? ``sabba.m saapateyya~nca te, aacariya, hotu, aha~nca te daaso''ti. ``sakkhissasi pana tva.m, gahapati, ekena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti? ``sakkomaha.m, aacariya, ekena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``sakkhissasi pana tva.m, gahapati, dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti? ``sakkomaha.m, aacariya, dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti ^a^T2.0180^ea^. ``sakkhissasi pana tva.m, gahapati, uttaano sattamaase nipajjitu''nti? ``sakkomaha.m, aacariya, uttaano sattamaase nipajjitu''nti.

[03]atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco se.t.thi.m gahapati.m ma~ncake nipaatetvaa {nipajjaapetvaa (sii0 syaa0)} ma~ncake {ma~ncakena (sii0)} sambandhitvaa siisacchavi.m uppaa.tetvaa {phaaletvaa (sii0)} sibbini.m vinaametvaa dve ^a^M0.0385^ea^ paa.nake niiharitvaa mahaajanassa dassesi -- ``passathayye {passesyaatha (sii0), passatha (syaa0), passathayyo (ka0)}, ime dve paa.nake, eka.m khuddaka.m eka.m mahallaka.m. ye te aacariyaa evamaaha.msu -- pa~ncama.m divasa.m se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatiiti -- tehaaya.m mahallako paa.nako di.t.tho. pa~ncama.m divasa.m se.t.thissa gahapatissa matthalu"nga.m pariyaadiyissati. matthalu"ngassa pariyaadaanaa se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissati. sudi.t.tho tehi aacariyehi. ye te aacariyaa evamaaha.msu -- sattama.m divasa.m ^a^V0.0363^ea^ se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissatiiti -- tehaaya.m khuddako paa.nako di.t.tho. sattama.m divasa.m se.t.thissa gahapatissa matthalu"nga.m pariyaadiyissati. matthalu"ngassa pariyaadaanaa se.t.thi gahapati kaala.m karissati. sudi.t.tho tehi aacariyehii''ti. sibbini.m sampa.tipaa.tetvaa siisacchavi.m sibbitvaa aalepa.m adaasi. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati sattaahassa accayena jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``naaha.m, aacariya, sakkomi ekena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``nanu me tva.m, gahapati, pa.tissu.ni -- sakkomaha.m, aacariya, ekena passena sattamaase ^a^T2.0181^ea^ nipajjitu''nti? ``saccaaha.m, aacariya, pa.tissu.ni.m, apaaha.m marissaami, naaha.m sakkomi ekena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, gahapati, dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjaahii''ti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati sattaahassa accayena jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca ^a^P1.0275^ea^ -- ``naaha.m, aacariya, sakkomi dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``nanu me tva.m, gahapati, pa.tissu.ni -- sakkomaha.m, aacariya, dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti? ``saccaaha.m, aacariya, pa.tissu.ni.m, apaaha.m marissaami, naaha.m, aacariya, sakkomi dutiyena passena sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, gahapati, uttaano sattamaase nipajjaahii''ti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati sattaahassa accayena jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``naaha.m, aacariya, sakkomi uttaano sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``nanu me tva.m, gahapati, pa.tissu.ni -- sakkomaha.m, aacariya, uttaano sattamaase nipajjitu''nti? ``saccaaha.m, aacariya, pa.tissu.ni.m, apaaha.m marissaami, naaha.m sakkomi uttaano sattamaase nipajjitu''nti. ``aha.m ce ta.m, gahapati, na vadeyya.m, ettakampi tva.m na nipajjeyyaasi, api ca pa.tikacceva mayaa ~naato -- tiihi sattaahehi se.t.thi gahapati arogo bhavissatiiti. u.t.thehi ^a^M0.0386^ea^, gahapati, arogosi. jaanaasi ki.m me deyyadhammo''ti? ``sabba.m saapateyya~nca te, aacariya, hotu, aha~nca te daaso''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati, maa me ^a^T2.0182^ea^ tva.m sabba.m saapateyya.m adaasi, maa ca me daaso. ra~n~no satasahassa.m dehi, mayha.m satasahassa''nti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati arogo samaano ra~n~no satasahassa.m adaasi, jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa satasahassa.m.
[06] raajagahase.t.thivatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena baaraa.naseyyakassa se.t.thiputtassa mokkhacikaaya kii.lantassa antaga.n.thaabaadho hoti, yena yaagupi piitaa na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m na sammaa ^a^V0.0364^ea^ pari.naama.m gacchati, uccaaropi passaavopi na pagu.no. so tena kiso hoti luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. atha kho baaraa.naseyyakassa se.t.thissa etadahosi -- ``mayha.m kho puttassa taadiso aabaadho, yena yaagupi piitaa na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, uccaaropi passaavopi na pagu.no. so tena kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. ya.mnuunaaha.m raajagaha.m gantvaa raajaana.m jiivaka.m vejja.m yaaceyya.m putta.m me tikicchitu''nti. atha kho baaraa.naseyyako se.t.thi raajagaha.m gantvaa yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m maagadha.m seniya.m bimbisaara.m etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, deva, puttassa taadiso aabaadho, yena yaagupi piitaa na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, uccaaropi passaavopi na pagu.no. so tena kiso luukho ^a^T2.0183^ea^ dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto. saadhu devo jiivaka.m vejja.m ^a^P1.0276^ea^ aa.naapetu putta.m me tikicchitu''nti.

[03]atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne jiivaka, baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa baaraa.naseyyaka.m se.t.thiputta.m tikicchaahii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissutvaa baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa yena baaraa.naseyyako se.t.thiputto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa baaraa.naseyyakassa se.t.thiputtassa vikaara.m sallakkhetvaa jana.m ussaaretvaa ^a^M0.0387^ea^ tirokara.niya.m parikkhipitvaa thambhe ubbandhitvaa {upanibandhitvaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhariya.m purato .thapetvaa udaracchavi.m uppaa.tetvaa antaga.n.thi.m niiharitvaa bhariyaaya dassesi -- ``passa te saamikassa aabaadha.m, iminaa yaagupi piitaa na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, bhattampi bhutta.m na sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, uccaaropi passaavopi na pagu.no; iminaaya.m kiso luukho dubba.n.no uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato dhamanisanthatagatto''ti. antaga.n.thi.m vinive.thetvaa antaani pa.tipavesetvaa udaracchavi.m sibbitvaa aalepa.m adaasi. atha kho baaraa.naseyyako se.t.thiputto nacirasseva arogo ahosi. atha kho baaraa.naseyyako se.t.thi `putto me arogo .thito'ti {arogaapitoti (sii0)} jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa so.lasasahassaani paadaasi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco taani so.lasasahassaani aadaaya punadeva raajagaha.m paccaaga~nchi ^a^T2.0184^ea^.
[06] se.t.thiputtavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0365^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~no {ujjeniya.m ra~n~no (syaa0)} pajjotassa pa.n.durogaabaadho hoti. bahuu mahantaa mahantaa disaapaamokkhaa vejjaa aagantvaa naasakkhi.msu aroga.m kaatu.m. bahu.m hira~n~na.m aadaaya agama.msu. atha kho raajaa pajjoto ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``mayha.m kho taadiso aabaadho, saadhu devo jiivaka.m vejja.m aa.naapetu, so ma.m tikicchissatii''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne jiivaka; ujjeni.m gantvaa raajaana.m pajjota.m tikicchaahii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa pa.tissutvaa ujjeni.m gantvaa yena raajaa pajjoto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no pajjotassa vikaara.m sallakkhetvaa raajaana.m pajjota.m etadavoca -- ``sappi.m dehi {ida.m padadvaya.m sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi}, sappi.m deva, nippacissaami. ta.m devo pivissatii''ti. ``ala.m, bha.ne jiivaka, ya.m te sakkaa vinaa sappinaa aroga.m kaatu.m ta.m karohi. jeguccha.m me sappi, pa.tikuula''nti. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi ^a^P1.0277^ea^ -- ``imassa kho ra~n~no taadiso aabaadho ^a^M0.0388^ea^, na sakkaa vinaa sappinaa aroga.m kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m sappi.m nippaceyya.m ^a^T2.0185^ea^ kasaavava.n.na.m kasaavagandha.m kasaavarasa''nti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco naanaabhesajjehi sappi.m nippaci kasaavava.n.na.m kasaavagandha.m kasaavarasa.m. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``imassa kho ra~n~no sappi piita.m pari.naamenta.m uddeka.m dassati. ca.n.doya.m raajaa ghaataapeyyaapi ma.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m pa.tikacceva aapuccheyya''nti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena raajaa pajjoto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m pajjota.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m kho, deva, vejjaa naama taadisena muhuttena muulaani uddharaama bhesajjaani sa.mharaama. saadhu devo vaahanaagaaresu ca dvaaresu ca aa.naapetu -- yena vaahanena jiivako icchati tena vaahanena gacchatu, yena dvaarena icchati tena dvaarena gacchatu, ya.m kaala.m icchati ta.m kaala.m gacchatu, ya.m kaala.m icchati ta.m kaala.m pavisatuu''ti. atha kho raajaa pajjoto vaahanaagaaresu ca dvaaresu ca aa.naapesi -- ``yena vaahanena jiivako icchati tena vaahanena gacchatu, yena dvaarena icchati tena dvaarena gacchatu, ya.m kaala.m icchati ta.m kaala.m gacchatu, ya.m kaala.m icchati ta.m kaala.m pavisatuu''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no pajjotassa bhaddavatikaa naama hatthinikaa pa~n~naasayojanikaa hoti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ra~n~no pajjotassa sappi.m {ta.m sappi.m (syaa0)} upanaamesi ^a^V0.0366^ea^ -- ``kasaava.m devo pivatuu''ti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco raajaana.m pajjota.m sappi.m paayetvaa hatthisaala.m gantvaa bhaddavatikaaya hatthinikaaya nagaramhaa nippati ^a^T2.0186^ea^.

[03]atha kho ra~n~no pajjotassa ta.m sappi piita.m pari.naamenta.m uddeka.m adaasi. atha kho raajaa pajjoto manusse etadavoca -- ``du.t.thena, bha.ne, jiivakena sappi.m paayitomhi. tena hi, bha.ne, jiivaka.m vejja.m vicinathaa''ti. ``bhaddavatikaaya, deva, hatthinikaaya nagaramhaa nippatito''ti. tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no pajjotassa kaako naama daaso sa.t.thiyojaniko hoti, amanussena pa.ticca jaato. atha kho raajaa pajjoto kaaka.m daasa.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne kaaka, jiivaka.m vejja.m ^a^M0.0389^ea^ nivattehi -- raajaa ta.m, aacariya, nivattaapetiiti. ete kho, bha.ne kaaka, vejjaa naama bahumaayaa. maa cassa ki~nci pa.tiggahesii''ti.
[06] atha kho kaako daaso jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m antaraamagge kosambiya.m sambhaavesi

[03] paataraasa.m karonta.m. atha kho kaako daaso jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca ^a^P1.0278^ea^ -- ``raajaa ta.m, aacariya, nivattaapetii''ti. ``aagamehi, bha.ne kaaka, yaava bhu~njaama {bhu~njaami (sii0 syaa0)}. handa, bha.ne kaaka, bhu~njassuu''ti. ``ala.m, aacariya, ra~n~naamhi aa.natto -- ete kho, bha.ne kaaka, vejjaa naama bahumaayaa, maa cassa ki~nci pa.tiggahesii''ti. tena kho pana samayena jiivako komaarabhacco nakhena bhesajja.m olumpetvaa aamalaka~nca khaadati paaniiya~nca pivati. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco kaaka.m daasa.m etadavoca -- ``handa, bha.ne kaaka, aamalaka~nca khaada paaniiya~nca pivassuu''ti. atha kho kaako daaso -- aya.m kho vejjo aamalaka~nca ^a^T2.0187^ea^ khaadati paaniiya~nca pivati, na arahati ki~nci paapaka.m hotunti -- upa.d.dhaamalaka~nca khaadi paaniiya~nca apaayi. tassa ta.m upa.d.dhaamalaka.m khaadita.m tattheva nicchaaresi. atha kho kaako daaso jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``atthi me, aacariya, jiivita''nti? ``maa, bha.ne kaaka, bhaayi, tva.m ceva arogo bhavissasi raajaa ca. ca.n.do so raajaa ghaataapeyyaapi ma.m, tenaaha.m na nivattaamii''ti bhaddavatika.m hatthinika.m kaakassa niyyaadetvaa yena raajagaha.m tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa etamattha.m aarocesi. ``su.t.thu, bha.ne jiivaka, akaasi yampi na nivatto, ca.n.do so raajaa ghaataapeyyaapi ta''nti. atha kho raajaa pajjoto arogo samaano jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa santike duuta.m paahesi -- ``aagacchatu jiivako, vara.m dassaamii''ti. ``ala.m, ayyo {deva (syaa0)}, adhikaara.m me devo saratuu''ti.
[06] pajjotaraajavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0367^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~no pajjotassa siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m uppanna.m hoti -- bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0)} dussaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasataana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasahassaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasatasahassaana.m ^a^M0.0390^ea^ agga~nca se.t.tha~nca mokkha~nca uttama~nca pavara~nca. atha kho raajaa pajjoto ta.m siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa paahesi. atha kho jiivakassa ^a^T2.0188^ea^ komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho me siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m ra~n~naa pajjotena pahita.m -- bahuuna.m dussaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasataana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasahassaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasatasahassaana.m agga~nca se.t.tha~nca mokkha~nca uttama~nca pavara~nca. nayida.m a~n~no koci paccaarahati a~n~natra tena bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena, ra~n~naa vaa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarenaa''ti.
[06] siveyyakadussayugakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhagavato kaayo dosaabhisanno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``dosaabhisanno ^a^P1.0279^ea^ kho, aananda, tathaagatassa kaayo. icchati tathaagato virecana.m paatu''nti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena jiivako komaarabhacco tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``dosaabhisanno kho, aavuso jiivaka, tathaagatassa kaayo. icchati tathaagato virecana.m paatu''nti. ``tena hi, bhante aananda, bhagavato kaaya.m katipaaha.m sinehethaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato kaaya.m katipaaha.m sinehetvaa yena jiivako komaarabhacco tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m etadavoca -- ``siniddho kho, aavuso jiivaka, tathaagatassa kaayo. yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa etadahosi -- ``na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m bhagavato o.laarika.m virecana.m dadeyya''nti. tii.ni uppalahatthaani naanaabhesajjehi paribhaavetvaa yena ^a^T2.0189^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa eka.m uppalahattha.m bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``ima.m, bhante, bhagavaa pa.thama.m uppalahattha.m upasi"nghatu. ida.m bhagavanta.m dasakkhattu.m virecessatii''ti. dutiya.m uppalahattha.m bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``ima.m, bhante, bhagavaa dutiya.m uppalahattha.m upasi"nghatu. ida.m bhagavanta.m dasakkhattu.m virecessatii''ti. tatiya.m uppalahattha.m bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``ima.m, bhante ^a^V0.0368^ea^, bhagavaa tatiya.m uppalahattha.m upasi"nghatu. ida.m bhagavanta.m dasakkhattu.m virecessatii''ti ^a^M0.0391^ea^. eva.m bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m bhavissatiiti. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m datvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa bahi dvaarako.t.thakaa nikkhantassa etadahosi -- ``mayaa kho bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m dinna.m. dosaabhisanno tathaagatassa kaayo ^a^T2.0190^ea^. na bhagavanta.m samatti.msakkhattu.m virecessati, ekuunatti.msakkhattu.m bhagavanta.m virecessati. api ca, bhagavaa viritto nahaayissati. nahaata.m bhagavanta.m saki.m virecessati. eva.m bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03]atha kho bhagavaa jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``idhaananda, jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa bahi dvaarako.t.thakaa nikkhantassa etadahosi -- `mayaa kho bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m dinna.m. dosaabhisanno tathaagatassa kaayo. na bhagavanta.m samati.msakkhattu.m virecessati, ekuunati.msakkhattu.m bhagavanta.m virecessati. api ca, bhagavaa viritto nahaayissati. nahaata.m bhagavanta.m saki.m virecessati. eva.m bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m bhavissatii'ti. tena haananda, u.nhodaka.m pa.tiyaadehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa u.nhodaka.m ^a^P1.0280^ea^ pa.tiyaadesi.

[03]atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``viritto, bhante, bhagavaa''ti? ``virittomhi, jiivakaa''ti. idha mayha.m, bhante, bahi dvaarako.t.thakaa nikkhantassa etadahosi -- ``mayaa kho bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m dinna.m. dosaabhisanno tathaagatassa kaayo. na bhagavanta.m samatti.msakkhattu.m virecessati, ekuunatti.msakkhattu.m bhagavanta.m virecessati. api ca, bhagavaa viritto nahaayissati. nahaata.m bhagavanta.m saki.m virecessati. eva.m bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m bhavissatii''ti. nahaayatu, bhante, bhagavaa, nahaayatu sugatoti. atha kho bhagavaa u.nhodaka.m nahaayi. nahaata.m bhagavanta.m saki.m virecesi. eva.m bhagavato samatti.msaaya virecana.m ahosi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m ^a^M0.0392^ea^ etadavoca -- ``yaava, bhante, bhagavato kaayo pakatatto hoti, ala.m {aha.m taava yuusapi.n.tapaatenaati (sii0), ala.m yuusapi.n.takenaati (syaa0)} yuusapi.n.dapaatenaa''ti.
[06] samatti.msavirecanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0369^ea^ kho bhagavato kaayo nacirasseva pakatatto ahosi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ta.m siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T2.0191^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ekaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m vara.m yaacaamii''ti. ``atikkantavaraa kho, jiivaka, tathaagataa''ti. ``ya~nca, bhante, kappati ya~nca anavajja''nti. ``vadehi, jiivakaa''ti. ``bhagavaa, bhante, pa.msukuuliko, bhikkhusa"ngho ca. ida.m me, bhante, siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m ra~n~naa pajjotena pahita.m -- bahuuna.m dussaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasataana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasahassaana.m bahuuna.m dussayugasatasahassaana.m agga~nca se.t.tha~nca mokkha~nca uttama~nca pavara~nca. pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m; bhikkhusa"nghassa ca gahapaticiivara.m anujaanaatuu''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa siveyyaka.m dussayuga.m. atha kho bhagavaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gahapaticiivara.m. yo icchati, pa.msukuuliko hotu. yo icchati, gahapaticiivara.m saadiyatu. itariitarenapaaha.m {paha.m (sii0), caaha.m (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, santu.t.thi.m va.n.nemii''ti.

[03]assosu.m kho raajagahe manussaa -- ``bhagavataa kira ^a^P1.0281^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m gahapaticiivara.m ^a^T2.0192^ea^ anu~n~naata''nti. te ca manussaa ha.t.thaa ahesu.m udaggaa ``idaani kho maya.m daanaani dassaama pu~n~naani karissaama, yato bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m gahapaticiivara.m anu~n~naata''nti. ekaaheneva raajagahe bahuuni ciivarasahassaani uppajji.msu.

[03]assosu.m ^a^M0.0393^ea^ kho jaanapadaa manussaa -- ``bhagavataa kira bhikkhuuna.m gahapaticiivara.m anu~n~naata''nti. te ca manussaa ha.t.thaa ahesu.m udaggaa -- ``idaani kho maya.m daanaani dassaama pu~n~naani karissaama, yato bhagavataa bhikkhuuna.m gahapaticiivara.m anu~n~naata''nti. janapadepi ekaaheneva bahuuni ciivarasahassaani uppajji.msu.
[03]tena ^a^V0.0370^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghassa paavaaro uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, paavaaranti.
[03]koseyyapaavaaro uppanno hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, koseyyapaavaaranti.
[03]kojava.m uppanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kojavanti.
[06] varayaacanaakathaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena kaasiraajaa jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa a.d.dhakaasika.m kambala.m paahesi upa.d.dhakaasina.m khamamaana.m. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco ta.m a.d.dhakaasika.m kambala.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0193^ea^ etadavoca -- ``aya.m me, bhante, a.d.dhakaasiko kambalo kaasira~n~naa pahito upa.d.dhakaasina.m khamamaano. pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa kambala.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa kambala.m. atha kho bhagavaa jiivaka.m komaarabhacca.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi...pe0... padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kambala''nti.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa uccaavacaani ciivaraani uppannaani honti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho bhagavataa ciivara.m anu~n~naata.m ^a^M0.0394^ea^, ki.m ananu~n~naata''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, cha ciivaraani -- khoma.m kappaasika.m koseyya.m kambala.m saa.na.m bha"nganti.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ye te bhikkhuu gahapaticiivara.m ^a^P1.0282^ea^ saadiyanti te kukkuccaayantaa ^a^V0.0371^ea^ pa.msukuula.m na saadiyanti -- eka.myeva bhagavataa ciivara.m anu~n~naata.m, na dveti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gahapaticiivara.m saadiyantena pa.msukuulampi saadiyitu.m; tadubhayenapaaha.m, bhikkhave, santu.t.thi.m va.n.nemiiti.
[06] kambalaanujaananaadikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade ^a^T2.0194^ea^ addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. ekacce bhikkhuu susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya, ekacce bhikkhuu naagamesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya te pa.msukuulaani labhi.msu. ye te bhikkhuu naagamesu.m te evamaaha.msu -- ``amhaakampi, aavuso, bhaaga.m dethaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, tumhaaka.m bhaaga.m dassaama. kissa tumhe naagamitthaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, naagamentaana.m naakaamaa bhaaga.m daatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. ekacce bhikkhuu susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya, ekacce bhikkhuu aagamesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya te pa.msukuulaani labhi.msu. ye te bhikkhuu aagamesu.m te evamaaha.msu -- ``amhaakampi, aavuso, bhaaga.m dethaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, tumhaaka.m bhaaga.m dassaama. kissa tumhe na okkamitthaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aagamentaana.m akaamaa bhaaga.m daatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. ekacce bhikkhuu pa.thama.m susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya, ekacce bhikkhuu pacchaa okkami.msu. ye te bhikkhuu pa.thama.m susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya te pa.msukuulaani labhi.msu. ye te bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0395^ea^ pacchaa okkami.msu te na labhi.msu. te evamaaha.msu -- ``amhaakampi, aavuso ^a^T2.0195^ea^, bhaaga.m dethaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, tumhaaka.m bhaaga.m dassaama. kissa tumhe pacchaa okkamitthaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pacchaa okkantaana.m naakaamaa bhaaga.m daatunti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0372^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. te sadisaa susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya. ekacce bhikkhuu pa.msukuulaani labhi.msu, ekacce bhikkhuu na labhi.msu ^a^P1.0283^ea^. ye te bhikkhuu na labhi.msu, te evamaaha.msu -- ``amhaakampi, aavuso, bhaaga.m dethaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, tumhaaka.m bhaaga.m dassaama. kissa tumhe na labhitthaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sadisaana.m okkantaana.m akaamaa bhaaga.m daatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. te katika.m katvaa susaana.m okkami.msu pa.msukuulaaya. ekacce bhikkhuu pa.msukuulaani labhi.msu, ekacce bhikkhuu na labhi.msu. ye te bhikkhuu na labhi.msu te evamaaha.msu -- ``amhaakampi, aavuso, bhaaga.m dethaa''ti. te evamaaha.msu -- ``na maya.m, aavuso, tumhaaka.m bhaaga.m dassaama. kissa tumhe na labhitthaa''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, katika.m katvaa okkantaana.m akaamaa bhaaga.m daatunti.
[06] pa.msukuulapariyesanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena manussaa ciivara.m aadaaya aaraama.m aagacchanti. te pa.tiggaahaka.m alabhamaanaa pa.tiharanti. ciivara.m paritta.m ^a^T2.0196^ea^ uppajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m ciivarapa.tiggaahaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, gahitaagahita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo; yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivarapa.tiggaahaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0396^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivarapa.tiggaahaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato ^a^V0.0373^ea^ khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ciivarapa.tiggaahakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu ciivarapa.tiggaahako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena ciivarapa.tiggaahakaa bhikkhuu ciivara.m pa.tiggahetvaa tattheva ujjhitvaa pakkamanti. ciivara.m nassati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0284^ea^, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m ciivaranidahaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, nihitaanihita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo; yaacitvaa byattena ^a^T2.0197^ea^ bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivaranidahaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti. ``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivaranidahaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ciivaranidahakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu ciivaranidahako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.
[06] ciivarapa.tiggaahakasammutikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ciivaranidahako bhikkhu ma.n.dapepi rukkhamuulepi nibbakosepi ciivara.m nidahati, unduurehipi upacikaahipi khajjanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, bha.n.daagaara.m sammannitu.m, ya.m sa"ngho aaka"nkhati vihaara.m vaa a.d.dhayoga.m vaa paasaada.m vaa hammiya.m vaa guha.m vaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0374^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m bha.n.daagaara.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m vihaara.m bha.n.daagaara.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa vihaarassa bha.n.daagaarassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa ^a^M0.0397^ea^ nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo vihaaro bha.n.daagaara.m. khamati sa"nghassa ^a^T2.0198^ea^, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"nghassa bha.n.daagaare ciivara.m agutta.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m bha.n.daagaarika.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, guttaagutta~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo; yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bha.n.daagaarika.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m bha.n.daagaarika.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno bha.n.daagaarikassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu bha.n.daagaariko. khamati ^a^P1.0285^ea^ sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bha.n.daagaarika.m vu.t.thaapenti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, bha.n.daagaariko vu.t.thaapetabbo. yo vu.t.thaapeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0375^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghassa bha.n.daagaare ciivara.m ussanna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0199^ea^, sammukhiibhuutena sa"nghena bhaajetunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena sa"ngho ciivara.m bhaajento kolaahala.m akaasi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m bhikkhu.m ciivarabhaajaka.m sammannitu.m -- yo na chandaagati.m gaccheyya, na dosaagati.m gaccheyya, na mohaagati.m gaccheyya, na bhayaagati.m gaccheyya, bhaajitaabhaajita~nca jaaneyya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbo. pa.thama.m bhikkhu yaacitabbo; yaacitvaa byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[03]``su.naatu ^a^M0.0398^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivarabhaajaka.m sammanneyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhu.m ciivarabhaajaka.m sammannati. yassaayasmato khamati itthannaamassa bhikkhuno ciivarabhaajakassa sammuti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``sammato sa"nghena itthannaamo bhikkhu ciivarabhaajako. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03]atha kho ciivarabhaajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho ciivara.m bhaajetabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m uccinitvaa tulayitvaa va.n.naava.n.na.m katvaa bhikkhuu ga.netvaa vagga.m bandhitvaa ciivarapa.tiviisa.m .thapetunti.

[03]atha kho ciivarabhaajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho saama.neraana.m ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, saama.neraana.m upa.d.dhapa.tiviisa.m ^a^T2.0200^ea^ daatunti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu sakena bhaagena uttaritukaamo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uttarantassa saka.m bhaaga.m daatunti.
[03]tena ^a^V0.0376^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu atirekabhaagena uttaritukaamo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anukkhepe dinne atirekabhaaga.m daatunti.

[03]atha kho ciivarabhaajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabbo, aagatapa.tipaa.tiyaa {aagataagatapa.tipaa.tiyaa (ka0)} nu kho udaahu yathaavu.d.dha''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vikalake tosetvaa kusapaata.m kaatunti.
[06] bha.n.daagaarasammutiaadikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu chaka.nenapi pa.n.dumattikaayapi ^a^P1.0286^ea^ ciivara.m rajanti. ciivara.m dubba.n.na.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami ^a^M0.0399^ea^, bhikkhave, cha rajanaani -- muularajana.m, khandharajana.m, tacarajana.m, pattarajana.m, puppharajana.m, phalarajananti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu siitudakaaya {siitundikaaya (sii0), siituudakaaya (syaa0)} ciivara.m rajanti. ciivara.m duggandha.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, rajana.m pacitu.m culla.m rajanakumbhinti. rajana.m uttariyati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, uttaraa.lumpa.m {uttaraa.lupa.m (yojanaa), uttaraa.lupa.m (syaa0)} bandhitunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu na jaananti rajana.m pakka.m vaa apakka.m vaa. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udake vaa nakhapi.t.thikaaya vaa thevaka.m ^a^T2.0201^ea^ daatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu rajana.m oropentaa kumbhi.m aavi~nchanti {aavi~njanti (sii0), aava.t.tanti (syaa0)}. kumbhii bhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, rajanu.lu"nka.m {rajanaa.lu"nka.m (yojanaa)} da.n.dakathaalakanti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m rajanabhaajana.m na sa.mvijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, rajanakolamba.m rajanagha.tanti.
[03]tena ^a^V0.0377^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu paatiyaapi pattepi ciivara.m omaddanti. ciivara.m paribhijjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, rajanado.nikanti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu chamaaya ciivara.m pattharanti. ciivara.m pa.msukita.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ti.nasanthaarakanti.
[03]ti.nasanthaarako upacikaahi khajjati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ciivarava.msa.m ciivararajjunti.
[03]majjhena laggenti. rajana.m ubhato galati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ka.n.ne bandhitunti.
[03]ka.n.no ^a^M0.0400^ea^ jiirati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ka.n.nasuttakanti.
[03]rajana.m ekato galati. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m rajetu.m, na ca acchinne theve pakkamitunti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena ciivara.m patthinna.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, udake osaaretunti.
[03]tena kho pana samayena ciivara.m pharusa.m hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami ^a^T2.0202^ea^, bhikkhave, paa.ninaa aako.tetunti ^a^P1.0287^ea^.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuu acchinnakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti dantakaasaavaani. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- seyyathaapi naama {seyyathaapi (?)} gihii kaamabhoginoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, acchinnakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] ciivararajanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0378^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena dakkhi.naagiri tena caarika.m pakkaami. addasaa kho bhagavaa magadhakhetta.m acchibaddha.m {accibaddha.m (sii0 syaa0), acchibandha.m (ka0)} paa.libaddha.m mariyaadabaddha.m si"nghaa.takabaddha.m, disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, aananda, magadhakhetta.m acchibaddha.m paa.libaddha.m mariyaadabaddha.m si"nghaa.takabaddha''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``ussahasi tva.m, aananda, bhikkhuuna.m evaruupaani ciivaraani sa.mvidahitu''nti? ``ussahaami, bhagavaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.naagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa punadeva raajagaha.m paccaaga~nchi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivaraani sa.mvidahitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``passatu me {passatha tumhe (ka0)}, bhante, bhagavaa ciivaraani sa.mvidahitaanii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne ^a^T2.0203^ea^ dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, aanando; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, aanando; yatra hi naama mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanissati, kusimpi naama karissati, a.d.dhakusimpi naama karissati, ma.n.dalampi naama karissati ^a^M0.0401^ea^, a.d.dhama.n.dalampi naama karissati, viva.t.tampi naama karissati, anuviva.t.tampi naama karissati, giiveyyakampi naama karissati, ja"ngheyyakampi naama karissati, baahantampi naama karissati, chinnaka.m bhavissati, satthaluukha.m sama.nasaaruppa.m paccatthikaana~nca anabhicchita.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, chinnaka.m sa"nghaa.ti.m chinnaka.m uttaraasa"nga.m chinnaka.m antaravaasaka''nti.
[06] chinnakaciivaraanujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. addasa kho bhagavaa antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca vesaali.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno sambahule bhikkhuu ciivarehi ubbha.n.dite {ubbha.n.diikate (syaa0)} siisepi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa khandhepi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa ka.tiyaapi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa aagacchante, disvaana bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atilahu.m kho ime moghapurisaa ciivare baahullaaya aavattaa ^a^P1.0288^ea^. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivare siima.m bandheyya.m, mariyaada.m .thapeyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati gotamake cetiye. tena kho pana samayena ^a^V0.0379^ea^ bhagavaa siitaasu hemantikaasu rattiisu antara.t.thakaasu himapaatasamaye ratti.m ajjhokaase ekaciivaro nisiidi. na bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0204^ea^ siita.m ahosi. nikkhante pa.thame yaame siita.m bhagavanta.m ahosi. dutiya.m bhagavaa ciivara.m paarupi. na bhagavanta.m siita.m ahosi. nikkhante majjhime yaame siita.m bhagavanta.m ahosi. tatiya.m bhagavaa ciivara.m paarupi. na bhagavanta.m siita.m ahosi. nikkhante pacchime yaame uddhaste aru.ne nandimukhiyaa rattiyaa siita.m bhagavanta.m ahosi. catuttha.m bhagavaa ciivara.m paarupi. na bhagavanta.m siita.m ahosi. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``yepi kho te kulaputtaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye siitaalukaa siitabhiirukaa tepi sakkonti ticiivarena yaapetu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivare siima.m bandheyya.m, mariyaada.m .thapeyya.m, ticiivara.m anujaaneyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca vesaali.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno addasa.m sambahule bhikkhuu ^a^M0.0402^ea^ ciivarehi ubbha.n.dite siisepi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa khandhepi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa ka.tiyaapi ciivarabhisi.m karitvaa aagacchante, disvaana me etadahosi -- `atilahu.m kho ime moghapurisaa ciivare baahullaaya aavattaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivare siima.m bandheyya.m, mariyaada.m .thapeyya'nti. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, siitaasu hemantikaasu rattiisu antara.t.thakaasu himapaatasamaye ratti.m ajjhokaase ekaciivaro nisiidi.m. na ma.m siita.m ahosi. nikkhante pa.thame yaame siita.m ma.m ahosi. dutiyaaha.m ciivara.m paarupi.m. na ma.m siita.m ^a^T2.0205^ea^ ahosi. nikkhante majjhime yaame siita.m ma.m ahosi. tatiyaaha.m ciivara.m paarupi.m. na ma.m siita.m ahosi. nikkhante pacchime yaame uddhaste aru.ne nandimukhiyaa rattiyaa siita.m ma.m ahosi. catutthaaha.m ciivara.m paarupi.m. na ma.m siita.m ahosi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- ``yepi kho te kulaputtaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye siitaalukaa siitabhiirukaa tepi sakkonti ticiivarena yaapetu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuuna.m ciivare siima.m bandheyya.m, mariyaada.m .thapeyya.m ^a^P1.0289^ea^, ticiivara.m anujaaneyya'nti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ticiivara.m -- digu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m, ekacciya.m uttaraasa"nga.m, ekacciya.m antaravaasaka''nti.
[06] ticiivaraanujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ {paaraa0 461} tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavataa ticiivara.m anu~n~naatanti a~n~neneva ticiivarena gaama.m pavisanti, a~n~nena ticiivarena aaraame acchanti, a~n~nena ticiivarena ^a^V0.0380^ea^ nahaana.m otaranti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu atirekaciivara.m dhaaressantii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, atirekaciivara.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti.

[03]{paaraa0 461} tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa atirekaciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. aayasmaa ca aanando ta.m ciivara.m aayasmato saariputtassa daatukaamo hoti. aayasmaa ca ^a^T2.0206^ea^ saariputto saakete viharati. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m `na atirekaciivara.m dhaaretabba'nti. ida~nca me atirekaciivara.m uppanna.m ^a^M0.0403^ea^. aha~ncima.m ciivara.m aayasmato saariputtassa daatukaamo. aayasmaa ca saariputto saakete viharati. katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``kiivacira.m panaananda, saariputto aagacchissatii''ti? ``navama.m vaa, bhagavaa, divasa.m, dasama.m vaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dasaahaparama.m atirekaciivara.m dhaaretu''nti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m atirekaciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho amhehi atirekaciivare pa.tipajjitabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, atirekaciivara.m vikappetunti.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa vesaaliya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno antaravaasako chiddo hoti. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa ticiivara.m anu~n~naata.m -- digu.naa sa"nghaa.ti, ekacciyo uttaraasa"ngo ^a^P1.0290^ea^ ^a^T2.0207^ea^, ekacciyo antaravaasako. aya~nca me antaravaasako chiddo. ya.mnuunaaha.m agga.la.m acchupeyya.m, samantato dupa.t.ta.m bhavissati, majjhe ekacciya''nti. atha kho so bhikkhu agga.la.m acchupesi. addasaa kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto ta.m bhikkhu.m agga.la.m acchupenta.m {acchupanta.m (ka0)}, disvaana yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m tva.m, bhikkhu, karosii''ti? ``agga.la.m, bhagavaa, acchupemii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu; saadhu kho tva.m, bhikkhu, agga.la.m acchupesii''ti ^a^V0.0381^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ahataana.m dussaana.m ahatakappaana.m digu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m, ekacciya.m uttaraasa"nga.m, ekacciya.m antaravaasaka.m; utuddha.taana.m dussaana.m catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m, digu.na.m uttaraasa"nga.m, digu.na.m ^a^M0.0404^ea^ antaravaasaka.m; pa.msukuule yaavadattha.m; paapa.nike ussaaho kara.niiyo. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, agga.la.m tunna.m ova.t.tika.m ka.n.dusaka.m da.lhiikamma''nti.
[06] atirekaciivarakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m bhagavaa ^a^T2.0208^ea^ dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa, bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa, bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03]tena kho pana samayena tassaa rattiyaa accayena caatuddiipiko mahaamegho paavassi. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yathaa, bhikkhave, jetavane vassati eva.m catuusu diipesu vassati. ovassaapetha, bhikkhave, kaaya.m. aya.m pacchimako caatuddiipiko mahaamegho''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa ^a^P1.0291^ea^ nikkhittaciivaraa kaaya.m ovassaapenti. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, je. aaraama.m gantvaa kaala.m aarocehi -- kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho saa daasii visaakhaaya migaaramaatuyaa pa.tissu.nitvaa aaraama.m gantvaa addasa bhikkhuu nikkhittaciivare kaaya.m ovassaapente, disvaana `natthi aaraame bhikkhuu, aajiivakaa kaaya.m ovassaapentii'ti yena visaakhaa migaaramaataa tenupasa"nkami ^a^V0.0382^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m etadavoca -- ``natthayye, aaraame bhikkhuu, aajiivakaa kaaya.m ovassaapentii''ti. atha kho visaakhaaya migaaramaatuyaa ^a^T2.0209^ea^ pa.n.ditaaya viyattaaya medhaaviniyaa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho ayyaa nikkhittaciivaraa kaaya.m ovassaapenti. saaya.m ^a^M0.0405^ea^ baalaa ma~n~nittha -- natthi aaraame bhikkhuu, aajiivakaa kaaya.m ovassaapentii''ti, puna daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, je. aaraama.m gantvaa kaala.m aarocehi -- kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu gattaani siiti.m karitvaa {siitiikaritvaa (syaa0)} kallakaayaa ciivaraani gahetvaa yathaavihaara.m pavisi.msu. atha kho saa daasii aaraama.m gantvaa bhikkhuu apassantii `natthi aaraame bhikkhuu, su~n~no aaraamo'ti yena visaakhaa migaaramaataa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m etadavoca -- ``natthayye, aaraame bhikkhuu, su~n~no aaraamo''ti. atha kho visaakhaaya migaaramaatuyaa pa.n.ditaaya viyattaaya medhaaviniyaa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho ayyaa gattaani siiti.m karitvaa kallakaayaa ciivaraani gahetvaa yathaavihaara.m pavi.t.thaa. saaya.m baalaa ma~n~nittha -- natthi aaraame bhikkhuu, su~n~no aaraamo''ti, puna daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, je. aaraama.m gantvaa kaala.m aarocehi -- kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.
