[03] 350^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sandahatha {sannahatha (sii0 syaa0)}, bhikkhave, pattaciivara.m; kaalo bhattassaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sammi~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- jetavane antarahito visaakhaaya migaaramaatuyaa ko.t.thake ^a^T2.0210^ea^ paaturahosi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa -- ``acchariya.m vata bho! abbhuta.m vata bho! tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama ja.n.nukamattesupi oghesu pavattamaanesu, ka.timattesupi oghesu pavattamaanesu, na hi naama ^a^P1.0292^ea^ ekabhikkhussapi {pavattamaanesu na ekabhikkhussapi (?)} paadaa vaa ciivaraani vaa allaani bhavissantii''ti -- ha.t.thaa udaggaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``a.t.thaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m varaani yaacaamii''ti. ``atikkantavaraa kho, visaakhe, tathaagataa''ti. ``yaani ca, bhante, kappiyaani ^a^M0.0406^ea^ yaani ca anavajjaanii''ti. ``vadehi, visaakhe''ti. ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m vassikasaa.tika.m daatu.m, aagantukabhatta.m daatu.m, gamikabhatta.m daatu.m, gilaanabhatta.m daatu.m, gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m daatu.m, gilaanabhesajja.m daatu.m, dhuvayaagu.m daatu.m, bhikkhunisa"nghassa ^a^V0.0383^ea^ udakasaa.tika.m daatu''nti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, visaakhe, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa tathaagata.m a.t.tha varaani yaacasii''ti?

[03]``idhaaha.m, bhante, daasi.m aa.naapesi.m -- `gaccha, je. aaraama.m gantvaa kaala.m aarocehi -- kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta'''nti. atha kho saa, bhante, daasii aaraama.m gantvaa addasa bhikkhuu nikkhittaciivare kaaya.m ovassaapente, disvaana ^a^T2.0211^ea^ ``natthi aaraame bhikkhuu, aajiivakaa kaaya.m ovassaapentii''ti yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- ``natthayye, aaraame bhikkhuu, aajiivakaa kaaya.m ovassaapentii''ti. asuci, bhante, naggiya.m jeguccha.m pa.tikuula.m. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m vassikasaa.tika.m daatu.m.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhante, aagantuko bhikkhu na viithikusalo na gocarakusalo kilanto pi.n.daaya carati. so me aagantukabhatta.m bhu~njitvaa viithikusalo gocarakusalo akilanto pi.n.daaya carissati. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m aagantukabhatta.m daatu.m.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhante, gamiko bhikkhu attano bhatta.m pariyesamaano satthaa vaa vihaayissati, yattha vaa vaasa.m gantukaamo bhavissati tattha vikaale upagacchissati, kilanto addhaana.m gamissati. so me gamikabhatta.m bhu~njitvaa satthaa na vihaayissati, yattha vaasa.m gantukaamo bhavissati tattha kaale upagacchissati, akilanto addhaana.m gamissati. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m gamikabhatta.m daatu.m.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhante, gilaanassa bhikkhuno sappaayaani bhojanaani alabhantassa aabaadho vaa abhiva.d.dhissati, kaala.mkiriyaa vaa bhavissati. tassa me gilaanabhatta.m bhuttassa aabaadho ^a^P1.0293^ea^ na abhiva.d.dhissati, kaala.mkiriyaa na bhavissati. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m gilaanabhatta.m daatu.m ^a^T2.0212^ea^. ``puna ^a^M0.0407^ea^ capara.m, bhante, gilaanupa.t.thaako bhikkhu attano bhatta.m pariyesamaano gilaanassa ussuure bhatta.m niiharissati, bhattaccheda.m karissati. so me gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m bhu~njitvaa gilaanassa ^a^V0.0384^ea^ kaalena bhatta.m niiharissati, bhattaccheda.m na karissati. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m daatu.m.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhante, gilaanassa bhikkhuno sappaayaani bhesajjaani alabhantassa aabaadho vaa abhiva.d.dhissati, kaala.mkiriyaa vaa bhavissati. tassa me gilaanabhesajja.m paribhuttassa aabaadho na abhiva.d.dhissati, kaala.mkiriyaa na bhavissati. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m gilaanabhesajja.m daatu.m.

[03]``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavataa andhakavinde dasaanisa.mse sampassamaanena yaagu anu~n~naataa. tyaaha.m, bhante, aanisa.mse sampassamaanaa icchaami sa"nghassa yaavajiiva.m dhuvayaagu.m daatu.m.

[03]``idha, bhante, bhikkhuniyo aciravatiyaa nadiyaa vesiyaahi saddhi.m naggaa ekatitthe nahaayanti. taa, bhante, vesiyaa bhikkhuniyo uppa.n.desu.m -- `ki.m nu kho naama tumhaaka.m, ayye, daharaana.m {daharaana.m daharaana.m (sii0)} brahmacariya.m ci.n.nena, nanu naama kaamaa paribhu~njitabbaa; yadaa ji.n.naa bhavissatha tadaa brahmacariya.m carissatha. eva.m tumhaaka.m ubho atthaa pariggahitaa bhavissantii'ti. taa, bhante, bhikkhuniyo vesiyaahi uppa.n.diyamaanaa ma"nkuu ahesu.m. asuci, bhante, maatugaamassa naggiya.m jeguccha.m pa.tikuula.m. imaaha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa icchaami bhikkhunisa"nghassa ^a^T2.0213^ea^ yaavajiiva.m udakasaa.tika.m daatu''nti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana tva.m, visaakhe, aanisa.msa.m sampassamaanaa tathaagata.m a.t.tha varaani yaacasii''ti? ``idha, bhante, disaasu vassa.mvu.t.thaa bhikkhuu saavatthi.m aagacchissanti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissanti -- `itthannaamo, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato, tassa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo'ti? ta.m bhagavaa byaakarissati sotaapattiphale vaa sakadaagaamiphale vaa anaagaamiphale vaa arahatte vaa. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaami -- `aagatapubbaa nu kho, bhante, tena ayyena saavatthii'ti? sace me ^a^M0.0408^ea^ vakkhanti -- `aagatapubbaa tena bhikkhunaa saavatthii'ti ni.t.thamettha ^a^P1.0294^ea^ gacchissaami -- nissa.msaya.m me paribhutta.m tena ayyena vassikasaa.tikaa vaa aagantukabhatta.m vaa gamikabhatta.m vaa gilaanabhatta.m vaa gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m vaa gilaanabhesajja.m vaa dhuvayaagu vaati. tassaa me tadanussarantiyaa paamujja.m jaayissati, pamuditaaya piiti jaayissati, piitimanaaya kaayo passambhissati, passaddhakaayaa sukha.m ^a^V0.0385^ea^ vediyissaami, sukhiniyaa citta.m samaadhiyissati. saa me bhavissati indriyabhaavanaa balabhaavanaa bojjha"ngabhaavanaa. imaaha.m, bhante, aanisa.msa.m sampassamaanaa tathaagata.m a.t.tha varaani yaacaamii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, visaakhe; saadhu kho tva.m, visaakhe, ima.m aanisa.msa.m sampassamaanaa tathaagata.m a.t.tha varaani yaacasi. anujaanaami te, visaakhe, a.t.tha varaanii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m imaahi ^a^T2.0214^ea^ gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``yaa annapaana.m dadatippamoditaa.
[27] siiluupapannaa sugatassa saavikaa.
[26] dadaati daana.m abhibhuyya macchara.m.
[22] sovaggika.m sokanuda.m sukhaavaha.m..
[21] ``dibba.m saa labhate aayu.m {dibba.m bala.m saa labhate ca aayu.m (sii0 syaa0)}.
[27] aagamma magga.m viraja.m ana"nga.na.m.
[26] saa pu~n~nakaamaa sukhinii anaamayaa.
[22] saggamhi kaayamhi cira.m pamodatii''ti..

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vassikasaa.tika.m, aagantukabhatta.m, gamikabhatta.m, gilaanabhatta.m, gilaanupa.t.thaakabhatta.m, gilaanabhesajja.m, dhuvayaagu.m, bhikkhunisa"nghassa udakasaa.tika''nti.
[06] visaakhaavatthu ni.t.thita.m.
[06] visaakhaabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0409^ea^ kho pana samayena bhikkhuu pa.niitaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti. tesa.m mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena asuci muccati, senaasana.m asucinaa makkhiyati. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto addasa senaasana.m ^a^T2.0215^ea^ asucinaa makkhita.m, disvaana ^a^V0.0386^ea^ aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m eta.m, aananda, senaasana.m makkhita''nti? ``etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu pa.niitaani bhojanaani ^a^P1.0295^ea^ bhu~njitvaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti. tesa.m mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena asuci muccati; tayida.m, bhagavaa, senaasana.m asucinaa makkhita''nti. ``evameta.m, aananda, evameta.m, aananda. muccati hi, aananda, mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena asuci. ye te, aananda, bhikkhuu upa.t.thitassatii sampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti, tesa.m asuci na muccati. yepi te, aananda, puthujjanaa kaamesu viitaraagaa, tesampi asuci na muccati. a.t.thaanameta.m, aananda, anavakaaso ya.m arahato asuci mucceyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, aanandena pacchaasama.nena senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto addasa.m senaasana.m asucinaa makkhita.m, disvaana aananda.m aamantesi.m `ki.m eta.m, aananda, senaasana.m makkhita'nti? `etarahi, bhante, bhikkhuu pa.niitaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti. tesa.m mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena asuci muccati; tayida.m, bhagavaa, senaasana.m asucinaa makkhita'nti. `evameta.m, aananda, evameta.m, aananda, muccati hi, aananda, mu.t.thassatiina.m asampajaanaana.m nidda.m okkamantaana.m supinantena ^a^T2.0216^ea^ asuci. ye te, aananda, bhikkhuu upa.t.thitassatii sampajaanaa nidda.m okkamanti, tesa.m asuci na muccati. yepi te, aananda, puthujjanaa kaamesu viitaraagaa tesampi asuci na muccati. a.t.thaanameta.m, aananda, anavakaaso ya.m arahato asuci mucceyyaa'''ti.

[03]``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato -- dukkha.m supati, dukkha.m pa.tibujjhati, paapaka.m supina.m passati, devataa na rakkhanti, asuci muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato.

[03]``pa~ncime ^a^M0.0410^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato -- sukha.m supati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhati, na paapaka.m supina.m passati, devataa rakkhanti, asuci na muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamato.
[03]``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, kaayaguttiyaa ciivaraguttiyaa senaasanaguttiyaa nisiidana''nti.

[03]tena ^a^V0.0387^ea^ kho pana samayena atikhuddaka.m nisiidana.m na sabba.m senaasana.m sa.mgopeti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yaavamahanta.m paccatthara.na.m aaka"nkhati taavamahanta.m paccatthara.na.m kaatunti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmato aanandassa upajjhaayassa aayasmato bela.t.thasiisassa thullakacchaabaadho hoti. tassa lasikaaya ciivaraani kaaye lagganti. taani bhikkhuu udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhanti. addasaa kho bhagavaa senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto te ^a^T2.0217^ea^ bhikkhuu taani ciivaraani udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhante, disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami, upa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``ki.m imassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aabaadho''ti? ``imassa, bhante, aayasmato ^a^P1.0296^ea^ thullakacchaabaadho. lasikaaya ciivaraani kaaye lagganti. taani maya.m udakena temetvaa temetvaa apaka.d.dhaamaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, yassa ka.n.du vaa pi.lakaa vaa assaavo vaa thullakacchu vaa aabaadho ka.n.duppa.ticchaadi''nti.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa mukhapu~nchanaco.la.m {mukhapu~njanaco.la.m (ka0)} aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tigga.nhaatu me, bhante, bhagavaa mukhapu~nchanaco.la.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa mukhapu~nchanaco.la.m. atha kho bhagavaa visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa bhagavataa dhammiyaa ^a^M0.0411^ea^ kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, mukhapu~nchanaco.laka''nti {mukhapu~nchanacolanti (syaa0)}.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T2.0218^ea^ kho pana samayena rojo mallo aayasmato aanandassa sahaayo hoti. rojassa mallassa khomapilotikaa aayasmato aanandassa hatthe nikkhittaa hoti. aayasmato ca aanandassa khomapilotikaaya attho hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa vissaasa.m gahetu.m -- sandi.t.tho ca hoti, sambhatto ca, aalapito ^a^V0.0388^ea^ ca, jiivati ca, jaanaati ca, gahite me attamano bhavissatiiti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imehi pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa vissaasa.m gahetunti.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuuna.m paripu.n.na.m hoti ticiivara.m. attho ca hoti parissaavanehipi thavikaahipi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, parikkhaaraco.lakanti.
[06] nisiidanaadianujaananaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``yaani taani bhagavataa anu~n~naataani ticiivaranti vaa vassikasaa.tikaati vaa nisiidananti vaa paccatthara.nanti vaa ka.n.duppa.ticchaadiiti ^a^P1.0297^ea^ vaa mukhapu~nchanaco.lanti vaa parikkhaaraco.lanti vaa, sabbaani taani adhi.t.thaatabbaani nu kho, udaahu, vikappetabbaanii''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, ticiivara.m adhi.t.thaatu.m na vikappetu.m; vassikasaa.tika.m vassaana.m caatumaasa.m adhi.t.thaatu.m, tato para.m vikappetu.m; nisiidana.m adhi.t.thaatu.m na vikappetu.m; paccatthara.na.m adhi.t.thaatu.m ^a^T2.0219^ea^ na vikappetu.m; ka.n.duppa.ticchaadi.m yaavaaabaadhaa adhi.t.thaatu.m tato para.m vikappetu.m; mukhapu~nchanaco.la.m adhi.t.thaatu.m na vikappetu.m; parikkhaaraco.la.m adhi.t.thaatu.m na vikappetunti.

[03]atha ^a^M0.0412^ea^ kho bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kittaka.m pacchima.m nu kho ciivara.m vikappetabba''nti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aayaamena a.t.tha"ngula.m sugata"ngulena catura"ngulavitthata.m pacchima.m ciivara.m vikappetunti.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmato mahaakassapassa pa.msukuulakato garuko hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, suttaluukha.m kaatunti. vika.n.no hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vika.n.na.m uddharitunti. suttaa okiriyanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anuvaata.m paribha.n.da.m aaropetunti.
[03]tena ^a^V0.0389^ea^ kho pana samayena sa"nghaa.tiyaa pattaa lujjanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, a.t.thapadaka.m kaatunti.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno ticiivare kayiramaane sabba.m chinnaka.m nappahoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve chinnakaani eka.m acchinnakanti.
[03]dve chinnakaani eka.m acchinnaka.m nappahoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve acchinnakaani eka.m chinnakanti.

[03]dve acchinnakaani ^a^T2.0220^ea^ eka.m chinnaka.m nappahoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, anvaadhikampi aaropetu.m, na ca, bhikkhave, sabba.m acchinnaka.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno bahu.m ciivara.m uppanna.m hoti. so ca ta.m ciivara.m maataapituuna.m daatukaamo hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. maataapitaroti {maataapituuna.m kho (sii0)} kho, bhikkhave, dadamaane {vadamaano (ka0), vadamaane (?)} ki.m vadeyyaama? anujaanaami ^a^P1.0298^ea^, bhikkhave, maataapituuna.m daatu.m. na ca, bhikkhave, saddhaadeyya.m vinipaatetabba.m. yo vinipaateyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0413^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu andhavane ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. coraa ta.m ciivara.m avahari.msu. so bhikkhu ducco.lo hoti luukhaciivaro. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``kissa tva.m, aavuso, ducco.lo luukhaciivarosii''ti? ``idhaaha.m {so aha.m (katthaci)}, aavuso, andhavane ciivara.m nikkhipitvaa santaruttarena gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. coraa ta.m ciivara.m avahari.msu. tenaaha.m ducco.lo luukhaciivaro''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. na, bhikkhave, santaruttarena gaamo pavisitabbo. yo paviseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando assatiyaa santaruttarena gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m -- ``nanu ^a^T2.0221^ea^, aavuso aananda, bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- `na santaruttarena gaamo pavisitabbo'ti? kissa tva.m, aavuso aananda, santaruttarena ^a^V0.0390^ea^ gaama.m pavi.t.tho''ti? ``sacca.m, aavuso, bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m -- `na santaruttarena gaamo pavisitabbo'ti. api caaha.m assatiyaa pavi.t.tho''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m.

[03]pa~ncime, bhikkhave, paccayaa sa"nghaa.tiyaa nikkhepaaya -- gilaano vaa hoti, vassikasa"nketa.m vaa hoti, nadiipaara.m gantu.m vaa hoti, agga.laguttivihaaro vaa hoti, atthatakathina.m vaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca paccayaa sa"nghaa.tiyaa nikkhepaaya.

[03]pa~ncime, bhikkhave, paccayaa uttaraasa"ngassa nikkhepaaya...pe0... antaravaasakassa nikkhepaaya -- gilaano vaa hoti, vassikasa"nketa.m vaa hoti, nadiipaara.m gantu.m vaa hoti, agga.laguttivihaaro vaa hoti, atthatakathina.m vaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca paccayaa uttaraasa"ngassa antaravaasakassa nikkhepaaya.

[03]pa~ncime, bhikkhave, paccayaa vassikasaa.tikaaya nikkhepaaya -- gilaano vaa hoti, nissiima.m gantu.m vaa hoti, nadiipaara.m gantu.m vaa hoti, agga.laguttivihaaro vaa hoti, vassikasaa.tikaa akataa vaa hoti vippakataa ^a^T2.0222^ea^ vaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca paccayaa vassikasaa.tikaaya nikkhepaayaati.
[06] pacchimavikappanupagaciivaraadikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0414^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu eko vassa.m vasi. tattha manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani ada.msu. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `catuvaggo pacchimo sa"ngho'ti. aha~ncamhi ekako. ime ca manussaa ^a^P1.0299^ea^ sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani ada.msu. ya.mnuunaaha.m imaani sa"nghikaani ciivaraani saavatthi.m hareyya''nti. atha kho so bhikkhu taani ciivaraani aadaaya saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi. ``tuyheva, bhikkhu, taani ciivaraani yaava kathinassa ubbhaaraayaa''ti. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eko vassa.m vasati. tattha manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani denti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tasseva taani ciivaraani yaava kathinassa ubbhaaraayaati.

[01] tena ^a^V0.0391^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu utukaala.m eko vasi. tattha manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani ada.msu. atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m `catuvaggo pacchimo sa"ngho'ti. aha~ncamhi ekako. ime ca manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani ada.msu. ya.mnuunaaha.m imaani sa"nghikaani ciivaraani saavatthi.m hareyya''nti. atha kho so bhikkhu taani ciivaraani aadaaya saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0223^ea^, sammukhiibhuutena sa"nghena bhaajetu.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu utukaala.m eko vasati. tattha manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani denti. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, tena bhikkhunaa taani ciivaraani adhi.t.thaatu.m -- ``mayhimaani ciivaraanii''ti. tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.m ciivara.m anadhi.t.thite a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati, samako daatabbo bhaago. tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi ta.m ciivara.m bhaajiyamaane, apaatite kuse, a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati, samako daatabbo bhaago. tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuhi ta.m ciivara.m bhaajiyamaane, paatite kuse, a~n~no bhikkhu aagacchati, naakaamaa daatabbo bhaagoti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena dve bhaatikaa theraa, aayasmaa ca isidaaso aayasmaa ca isibha.to, saavatthiya.m vassa.mvu.t.thaa a~n~natara.m gaamakaavaasa.m agama.msu. manussaa cirassaapi theraa aagataati saciivaraani bhattaani ^a^M0.0415^ea^ ada.msu. aavaasikaa bhikkhuu there pucchi.msu -- ``imaani, bhante, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani there aagamma uppannaani, saadiyissanti theraa bhaaga''nti. theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``yathaa kho maya.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama, tumhaaka.myeva taani ciivaraani yaava kathinassa ubbhaaraayaa''ti.
[06] tena kho pana samayena tayo bhikkhuu raajagahe vassa.m vasanti. tattha manussaa sa"nghassa

[03] demaati ciivaraani denti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m ^a^P1.0300^ea^ `catuvaggo pacchimo sa"ngho'ti. maya~ncamhaa tayo janaa. ime ca manussaa sa"nghassa demaati ciivaraani ^a^T2.0224^ea^ denti. katha.m nu kho amhehi pa.tipajjitabba''nti? tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa theraa, aayasmaa ca nilavaasii aayasmaa ca saa.navaasii aayasmaa ca gotako aayasmaa ca bhagu aayasmaa ca pha.likasantaano, paa.taliputte viharanti kukku.taaraame. atha kho te bhikkhuu paa.taliputta.m gantvaa there pucchi.msu. theraa evamaaha.msu -- ``yathaa kho maya.m aavuso bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama, tumhaaka.myeva taani ciivaraani yaava kathinassa ubbhaaraayaa''ti.
[06] sa"nghikaciivaruppaadakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0392^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto saavatthiya.m vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natara.m gaamakaavaasa.m agamaasi. tattha ca bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. te evamaaha.msu -- ``imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga''nti? ``aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii''ti. tato ciivarabhaaga.m gahetvaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi. tatthapi bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. tepi evamaaha.msu -- ``imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga''nti? ``aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii''ti. tatopi ciivarabhaaga.m gahetvaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi. tatthapi bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. tepi evamaaha.msu -- ``imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga''nti? ``aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii''ti. tatopi ciivarabhaaga.m gahetvaa mahanta.m ciivarabha.n.dika.m aadaaya punadeva saavatthi.m paccaaga~nchi. bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- ``mahaapu~n~nosi tva.m ^a^T2.0225^ea^, aavuso upananda, bahu.m te ciivara.m uppanna''nti. ``kuto me ^a^M0.0416^ea^, aavuso, pu~n~na.m? idhaaha.m, aavuso, saavatthiya.m vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natara.m gaamakaavaasa.m agamaasi.m. tattha bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. te ma.m evamaaha.msu -- `imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga'nti? `aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii'ti. tato ciivarabhaaga.m gahetvaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi.m. tatthapi bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. tepi ma.m evamaaha.msu -- `imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga'''nti? `aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii'ti. tatopi ciivarabhaaga.m gahetvaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m ^a^P1.0301^ea^ agamaasi.m. tatthapi bhikkhuu ciivara.m bhaajetukaamaa sannipati.msu. tepi ma.m evamaaha.msu -- `imaani kho, aavuso, sa"nghikaani ciivaraani bhaajiyissanti, saadiyissasi bhaaga'nti? `aamaavuso, saadiyissaamii'ti. tatopi ciivarabhaaga.m aggahesi.m. eva.m me bahu.m ciivara.m uppannanti. ``ki.m pana tva.m, aavuso upananda, a~n~natra vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natra ciivarabhaaga.m saadiyii''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto a~n~natra vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natra ciivarabhaaga.m saadiyissatii''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira tva.m, upananda, a~n~natra vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natra ciivarabhaaga.m saadiyii''ti? ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, a~n~natra vassa.mvu.t.tho a~n~natra ^a^T2.0226^ea^ ciivarabhaaga.m saadiyissasi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m ^a^V0.0393^ea^ katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, a~n~natra vassa.mvu.t.thena a~n~natra ciivarabhaago saaditabbo. yo saadiyeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upanando sakyaputto eko dviisu aavaasesu vassa.m vasi -- ``eva.m me bahu.m ciivara.m uppajjissatii''ti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katha.m nu kho aayasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabbo''ti? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. detha, bhikkhave, moghapurisassa ekaadhippaaya.m. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eko dviisu aavaasesu vassa.m vasati -- ``eva.m me bahu.m ciivara.m uppajjissatii''ti. sace amutra upa.d.dha.m amutra upa.d.dha.m vasati, amutra upa.d.dho amutra upa.d.dho ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabbo. yattha vaa pana bahutara.m vasati, tato ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabboti.
[06] upanandasakyaputtavatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0417^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikaaraabaadho hoti. so sake muttakariise palipanno seti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena senaasanacaarika.m aahi.n.danto yena tassa bhikkhuno vihaaro tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sake muttakariise palipanna.m sayamaana.m, disvaana yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m te, bhikkhu, aabaadho''ti? ``kucchivikaaro me, bhagavaa''ti. ``atthi ^a^T2.0227^ea^ pana te, bhikkhu, upa.t.thaako''ti? ``natthi, bhagavaa''ti ^a^P1.0302^ea^. ``kissa ta.m bhikkhuu na upa.t.thentii''ti? ``aha.m kho, bhante, bhikkhuuna.m akaarako; tena ma.m bhikkhuu na upa.t.thentii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``gacchaananda, udaka.m aahara, ima.m bhikkhu.m nahaapessaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa udaka.m aahari. bhagavaa udaka.m aasi~nci. aayasmaa aanando paridhovi. bhagavaa siisato aggahesi. aayasmaa aanando paadato uccaaretvaa ma~ncake nipaatesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``atthi, bhikkhave, amukasmi.m vihaare bhikkhu gilaano''ti? ``atthi, bhagavaa''ti. ``ki.m tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aabaadho''ti? ``tassa, bhante, aayasmato kucchivikaaraabaadho''ti. ``atthi pana, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno upa.t.thaako''ti? ``natthi, bhagavaa''ti ^a^V0.0394^ea^. ``kissa ta.m bhikkhuu na upa.t.thentii''ti? ``eso, bhante, bhikkhu bhikkhuuna.m akaarako; tena ta.m bhikkhuu na upa.t.thentii''ti. ``natthi vo, bhikkhave, maataa, natthi pitaa, ye vo upa.t.thaheyyu.m. tumhe ce, bhikkhave, a~n~nama~n~na.m na upa.t.thahissatha, atha ko carahi upa.t.thahissati? yo, bhikkhave, ma.m upa.t.thaheyya so gilaana.m upa.t.thaheyya. sace upajjhaayo hoti, upajjhaayena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace aacariyo hoti, aacariyena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace saddhivihaariko hoti ^a^T2.0228^ea^, saddhivihaarikena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace antevaasiko hoti, antevaasikena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace samaanupajjhaayako hoti, samaanupajjhaayakena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo ^a^M0.0418^ea^; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace samaanaacariyako hoti, samaanaacariyakena yaavajiiva.m upa.t.thaatabbo; vu.t.thaanamassa aagametabba.m. sace na hoti upajjhaayo vaa aacariyo vaa saddhivihaariko vaa antevaasiko vaa samaanupajjhaayako vaa samaanaacariyako vaa sa"nghena upa.t.thaatabbo. no ce upa.t.thaheyya, aapatti dukka.tassa''.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato gilaano duupa.t.tho hoti -- asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati, bhesajja.m na pa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m naavikattaa hoti `abhikkamanta.m vaa abhikkamatiiti, pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti, .thita.m vaa .thito'ti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m anadhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato gilaano duupa.t.tho hoti.

[03]pa~ncahi, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0303^ea^, a"ngehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.tho hoti -- sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m jaanaati, bhesajja.m pa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m aavikattaa hoti `abhikkamanta.m vaa abhikkamatiiti, pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti, .thita.m ^a^T2.0229^ea^ vaa .thito'ti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.tho hoti.

[03]pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m -- na pa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m sa.mvidhaatu.m, sappaayaasappaaya.m na jaanaati, asappaaya.m upanaameti sappaaya.m apanaameti, aamisantaro gilaana.m upa.t.thaati no mettacitto, jegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m ^a^V0.0395^ea^ vaa khe.la.m vaa vanta.m vaa niihaatu.m, na pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m.

[03]pa~ncahi ^a^M0.0419^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m -- pa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m sa.mvidhaatu.m, sappaayaasappaaya.m jaanaati, asappaaya.m apanaameti sappaaya.m upanaameti, mettacitto gilaana.m upa.t.thaati no aamisantaro, ajegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa vanta.m vaa niihaatu.m, pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatunti.
[06] gilaanavatthukathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuu kosalesu janapade addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. te a~n~natara.m aavaasa.m upagacchi.msu. tattha ^a^T2.0230^ea^ a~n~nataro bhikkhu gilaano hoti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhagavataa kho, aavuso, gilaanupa.t.thaana.m va.n.nita.m. handa, maya.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m upa.t.thahemaa''ti. te ta.m upa.t.thahi.msu. so tehi upa.t.thahiyamaano kaalamakaasi. atha kho te bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ``bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, kaala"nkate sa"ngho saamii pattaciivare, apica gilaanupa.t.thaakaa bahuupakaaraa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghena ticiivara~nca ^a^P1.0304^ea^ patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabba.m. tena gilaanupa.t.thaakena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `itthannaamo, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato. ida.m tassa ticiivara~nca patto caa'''ti. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo bhikkhu kaala"nkato. ida.m tassa ticiivara~nca patto ca. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m ticiivara~nca patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu ^a^V0.0396^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo bhikkhu kaala"nkato. ida.m tassa ticiivara~nca patto ca. sa"ngho ima.m ticiivara~nca patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati imassa ticiivarassa ca pattassa ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinna.m ^a^M0.0420^ea^ ida.m sa"nghena ticiivara~nca patto ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti ^a^T2.0231^ea^.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro saama.nero kaala"nkato hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. saama.nerassa, bhikkhave, kaala"nkate sa"ngho saamii pattaciivare, api ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaa bahuupakaaraa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghena ciivara~nca patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m daatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, daatabba.m. tena gilaanupa.t.thaakena bhikkhunaa sa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``itthannaamo, bhante, saama.nero kaala"nkato, ida.m tassa ciivara~nca patto caa''ti. byattena bhikkhunaa pa.tibalena sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo saama.nero kaala"nkato. ida.m tassa ciivara~nca patto ca. yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho ima.m ciivara~nca patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m dadeyya. esaa ~natti.

[03]``su.naatu me, bhante, sa"ngho. itthannaamo saama.nero kaala"nkato. ida.m tassa ciivara~nca patto ca. sa"ngho ima.m ciivara~nca patta~nca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m deti. yassaayasmato khamati imassa ciivarassa ca pattassa ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m daana.m, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.
[03]``dinna.m ida.m sa"nghena ciivara~nca patto ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu ca saama.nero ca gilaana.m upa.t.thahi.msu. so tehi upa.t.thahiyamaano kaalamakaasi. atha kho tassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa bhikkhuno etadahosi ^a^P1.0305^ea^ -- ``katha.m nu kho gilaanupa.t.thaakassa ^a^T2.0232^ea^ saama.nerassa ciivarapa.tiviiso daatabbo''ti ^a^V0.0397^ea^? bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanupa.t.thaakassa saama.nerassa samaka.m pa.tiviisa.m daatunti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu bahubha.n.do bahuparikkhaaro kaala"nkato hoti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, kaala"nkate sa"ngho saamii pattaciivare, api ca gilaanupa.t.thaakaa bahuupakaaraa. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, sa"nghena ticiivara~nca patta~nca ^a^M0.0421^ea^ gilaanupa.t.thaakaana.m daatu.m. ya.m tattha lahubha.n.da.m lahuparikkhaara.m ta.m sammukhiibhuutena sa"nghena bhaajetu.m. ya.m tattha garubha.n.da.m garuparikkhaara.m ta.m aagataanaagatassa caatuddisassa sa"nghassa avissajjika.m avebha"ngikanti.
[06] matasantakakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu naggo hutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. ida.m, bhante, naggiya.m anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thitaaya sallekhaaya dhutataaya {dhutattaaya (ka0)} paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattati. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m naggiya.m anujaanaatuu''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, naggiya.m titthiyasamaadaana.m samaadiyissasi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0...'' vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, naggiya.m ^a^T2.0233^ea^ titthiyasamaadaana.m samaadiyitabba.m. yo samaadiyeyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.
[06] naggiyapa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu kusaciira.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... vaakaciira.m ^a^V0.0398^ea^ nivaasetvaa...pe0... phalakaciira.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... kesakambala.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... vaa.lakambala.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... uluukapakkha.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... ajinakkhipa.m nivaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.navaadii. ida.m, bhante, ajinakkhipa.m anekapariyaayena appicchataaya santu.t.thitaaya sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattati. saadhu, bhante ^a^P1.0306^ea^, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m ajinakkhipa.m anujaanaatuu''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m ^a^M0.0422^ea^ akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, ajinakkhipa.m titthiyadhaja.m dhaaressasi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, ajinakkhipa.m titthiyadhaja.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu akkanaa.la.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... potthaka.m nivaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhagavaa, bhante, anekapariyaayena appicchassa santu.t.thassa sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa, va.n.navaadii. aya.m, bhante, potthako anekapariyaayena appicchataaya ^a^T2.0234^ea^ santu.t.thitaaya sallekhaaya dhutataaya paasaadikataaya apacayaaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattati. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m potthaka.m anujaanaatuu''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisa, ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tva.m, moghapurisa, potthaka.m nivaasessasi. neta.m, moghapurisa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, potthako nivaasetabbo. yo nivaaseyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.
[06] kusaciiraadipa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu sabbaniilakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... sabbapiitakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... sabbalohitakaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... sabbama~nji.t.thakaani {sabbama~nje.t.thakaani (sii0 syaa0)} ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... sabbaka.nhaani ciivaraani dhaarenti ^a^V0.0399^ea^ ...pe0... sabbamahaara"ngarattaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... sabbamahaanaamarattaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... acchinnadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... diighadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... pupphadasaani ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... pha.nadasaani {phaladasaani (ka0)} ciivaraani dhaarenti...pe0... ka~ncuka.m dhaarenti...pe0... tirii.taka.m dhaarenti...pe0... ve.thana.m dhaarenti. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ve.thana.m dhaaressanti, seyyathaapi gihii kaamabhogino''ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m ^a^M0.0423^ea^. na, bhikkhave, sabbaniilakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na sabbapiitakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na sabbalohitakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na sabbama~nji.t.thakaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na sabbaka.nhaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na sabbamahaara"ngarattaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na ^a^T2.0235^ea^ sabbamahaanaamarattaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na acchinnadasaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na diighadasaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na pupphadasaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na pha.nadasaani ciivaraani dhaaretabbaani, na ka~ncuka.m dhaaretabba.m, na tirii.taka.m dhaaretabba.m, na ve.thana.m dhaaretabba.m. yo dhaareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaati.
[06] sabbaniilakaadipa.tikkhepakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0312^ea^ ^a^M0.0430^ea^ ^a^V0.0407^ea^ ^a^T2.0244^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. tena kho pana samayena kaasiisu janapade vaasabhagaamo naama hoti. tattha kassapagotto naama bhikkhu aavaasiko hoti tantibaddho ussukka.m aapanno -- kinti anaagataa ca pesalaa bhikkhuu aagaccheyyu.m, aagataa ca pesalaa bhikkhuu phaasu vihareyyu.m, aya~nca aavaaso vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyyaati. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu kaasiisu caarika.m caramaanaa yena vaasabhagaamo tadavasaru.m. addasaa kho kassapagotto bhikkhu te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante, disvaana aasana.m pa~n~napesi, paadodaka.m paadapii.tha.m paadakathalika.m upanikkhipi, paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, paaniiyena aapucchi, nahaane ussukka.m akaasi, ussukkampi akaasi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. atha kho tesa.m aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``bhaddako kho aya.m, aavuso, aavaasiko bhikkhu nahaane ussukka.m karoti, ussukkampi karoti yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. handa, maya.m, aavuso, idheva vaasabhagaame nivaasa.m kappemaa''ti. atha kho te aagantukaa bhikkhuu tattheva vaasabhagaame nivaasa.m kappesu.m.

[03]atha kho kassapagottassa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- ``yo kho imesa.m ^a^T2.0245^ea^ aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aagantukakilamatho so pa.tippassaddho. yepime gocare appakata~n~nuno tedaanime gocare pakata~n~nuno. dukkara.m kho pana parakulesu yaavajiiva.m ussukka.m kaatu.m, vi~n~natti ca manussaana.m amanaapaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m na ussukka.m kareyya.m yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi''nti. so na ussukka.m akaasi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. atha kho tesa.m aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P1.0313^ea^ etadahosi -- ``pubbe khvaaya.m, aavuso, aavaasiko bhikkhu nahaane ussukka.m akaasi, ussukkampi akaasi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. sodaanaaya.m na ussukka.m karoti yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. du.t.thodaanaaya.m, aavuso, aavaasiko bhikkhu. handa, maya.m, aavuso, aavaasika.m ^a^V0.0408^ea^ {ima.m aavaasika.m (syaa0)} bhikkhu.m ukkhipaamaa''ti. atha kho te ^a^M0.0431^ea^ aagantukaa bhikkhuu sannipatitvaa kassapagotta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``pubbe kho tva.m, aavuso, nahaane ussukka.m karosi, ussukkampi karosi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. sodaani tva.m na ussukka.m karosi yaaguyaa khaadaniiye bhattasmi.m. aapatti.m tva.m, aavuso, aapanno. passaseta.m aapatti''nti? ``natthi me, aavuso, aapatti, yamaha.m passeyya''nti. atha kho te aagantukaa bhikkhuu kassapagotta.m bhikkhu.m aapattiyaa adassane ukkhipi.msu.

``eva.m, bhante''ti kho kassapagotto bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissu.nitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena vaasabhagaamo tena pakkaami.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0433^ea^ kho tesa.m aagantukaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ahudeva kukkucca.m, ahu vippa.tisaaro -- ``alaabhaa vata no, na vata no laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata no, na vata no suladdha.m, ye maya.m suddha.m bhikkhu.m anaapattika.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ukkhipimhaa. handa, maya.m, aavuso, campa.m gantvaa bhagavato santike accaya.m accayato desemaa''ti. atha kho te aagantukaa bhikkhuu senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena campaa tena pakkami.msu. anupubbena ^a^T2.0249^ea^ yena campaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammoditu.m. atha kho bhagavaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kaccittha appakilamathena addhaana.m aagataa, kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, aagacchathaa''ti ^a^V0.0410^ea^? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa; yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa; appakilamathena ca maya.m, bhante, addhaana.m aagataa. atthi, bhante, kaasiisu janapade vaasabhagaamo naama. tato maya.m, bhagavaa, aagacchaamaa''ti. ``tumhe, bhikkhave, aavaasika.m bhikkhu.m ukkhipitthaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``kismi.m, bhikkhave, vatthusmi.m kaara.ne''ti? ``avatthusmi.m, bhagavaa, akaara.ne''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, moghapurisaa, ananulomika.m ^a^P1.0315^ea^ appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama tumhe, moghapurisaa, suddha.m bhikkhu.m anaapattika.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ukkhipissatha. neta.m, moghapurisaa, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0...'' vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``na, bhikkhave, suddho bhikkhu anaapattiko avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ukkhipitabbo. yo ukkhipeyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti.

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``accayo no, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaale yathaamuu.lhe ^a^T2.0250^ea^ yathaaakusale, ye maya.m suddha.m bhikkhu.m anaapattika.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ukkhipimhaa. tesa.m no, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha, tumhe, bhikkhave, accayo accagamaa yathaabaale yathaamuu.lhe yathaaakusale, ye tumhe suddha.m bhikkhu.m anaapattika.m avatthusmi.m akaara.ne ukkhipittha. yato ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarotha, ta.m vo maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhihesaa ^a^M0.0434^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m {aayati.m ca (sii0)} sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti.
[06] kassapagottabhikkhuvatthu ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena campaaya.m bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karonti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karonti, adhammena samaggakamma.m karonti; dhammena vaggakamma.m karonti, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m karonti; dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m karonti; ekopi eka.m ukkhipati, ekopi dve ukkhipati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipati, ekopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipati; dvepi eka.m ukkhipanti, dvepi dve ukkhipanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti, dvepi sa"ngha.m ukkhipanti ^a^V0.0411^ea^; sambahulaapi ^a^T2.0251^ea^ eka.m ukkhipanti; sambahulaapi dve ukkhipanti, sambahulaapi sambahule ukkhipanti, sambahulaapi sa"ngha.m ukkhipanti; sa"nghopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipati. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama campaaya.m bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karissanti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karissanti, adhammena samaggakamma.m karissanti, dhammena vaggakamma.m karissanti, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m karissanti, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m karissanti, ekopi eka.m ukkhipissati, ekopi dve ukkhipissati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipissati, ekopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipissati, dvepi eka.m ukkhipissanti, dvepi dve ukkhipissanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipissanti, dvepi sa"ngha.m ukkhipissanti, sambahulaapi eka.m ukkhipissanti, sambahulaapi dve ukkhipissanti, sambahulaapi sambahule ukkhipissanti, sambahulaapi sa"ngha.m ukkhipissanti, sa"nghopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipissatii''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, campaaya.m bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karonti -- adhammena ^a^P1.0316^ea^ vaggakamma.m karonti...pe0... sa"nghopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipatii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m moghapurisaana.m ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama te, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa evaruupaani kammaani karissanti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karissanti...pe0... sa"nghopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipissati. neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... vigarahitvaa...pe0... dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ``adhammena ^a^M0.0435^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, adhammena {adhammena ce bhikkhave (syaa0)} samaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, dhammena vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; ekopi eka.m ukkhipati akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, ekopi dve ukkhipati akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, ekopi sambahule ukkhipati akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, ekopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipati akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; dvepi eka.m ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, dvepi dve ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, dvepi ^a^T2.0252^ea^ sa"ngha.m ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; sambahulaapi eka.m ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, sambahulaapi dve ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, sambahulaapi sambahule ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m, sambahulaapi sa"ngha.m ukkhipanti akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; sa"nghopi sa"ngha.m ukkhipati akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V0.0412^ea^, bhikkhave, kammaani -- adhammena vaggakamma.m, adhammena samaggakamma.m, dhammena vaggakamma.m, dhammena samaggakamma.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m adhammena vaggakamma.m, ida.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m adhammattaa vaggattaa kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m; na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m kamma.m kaatabba.m, na ca mayaa evaruupa.m kamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m adhammena samaggakamma.m, ida.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m adhammattaa kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m; na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m kamma.m kaatabba.m, na ca mayaa evaruupa.m kamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m dhammena vaggakamma.m, ida.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m vaggattaa kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m; na, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m kamma.m kaatabba.m, na ca mayaa evaruupa.m kamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tatra, bhikkhave, yadida.m dhammena samaggakamma.m, ida.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m dhammattaa samaggattaa akuppa.m .thaanaaraha.m; evaruupa.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m kaatabba.m, evaruupa~nca mayaa kamma.m anu~n~naata.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, evaruupa.m kamma.m karissaama yadida.m dhammena samagganti -- eva~nhi ^a^T2.0253^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti.
[06] adhammena vaggaadikammakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karonti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karonti, adhammena samaggakamma.m karonti; dhammena vaggakamma.m ^a^M0.0436^ea^ karonti, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m karonti, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m karonti; ~nattivipannampi kamma.m karonti anussaavanasampanna.m, anussaavanavipannampi kamma.m karonti ~nattisampanna.m, ~nattivipannampi ^a^P1.0317^ea^ anussaavanavipannampi kamma.m karonti; a~n~natraapi dhammaa kamma.m karonti, a~n~natraapi vinayaa kamma.m karonti, a~n~natraapi satthusaasanaa kamma.m karonti; pa.tiku.t.thakatampi kamma.m karonti adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa...pe0... te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karissanti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karissanti, adhammena samaggakamma.m karissanti; dhammena vaggakamma.m karissanti, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m karissanti, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m karissanti; ~nattivipannampi kamma.m karissanti anussaavanasampanna.m, anussaavanavipannampi kamma.m karissanti ~nattisampanna.m, ~nattivipannampi anussaavanavipannampi kamma.m karissanti; a~n~natraapi dhammaa kamma.m karissanti, a~n~natraapi vinayaa kamma.m karissanti, a~n~natraapi satthusaasanaa kamma.m karissanti; pa.tiku.t.thakatampi kamma.m karissanti adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu ^a^V0.0413^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyaa bhikkhuu evaruupaani kammaani karonti -- adhammena vaggakamma.m karonti...pe0... pa.tiku.t.thakatampi kamma.m karonti adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha''nti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... vigarahitvaa dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ ``adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m ^a^T2.0254^ea^; adhammena samaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; dhammena vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m. ~nattivipanna~nce, bhikkhave, kamma.m anussaavanasampanna.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; anussaavanavipanna~nce, bhikkhave, kamma.m ~nattisampanna.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; ~nattivipanna~nce, bhikkhave, kamma.m anussaavanavipanna.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; a~n~natraapi dhammaa kamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; a~n~natraapi vinayaa kamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; a~n~natraapi satthusaasanaa kamma.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m; pa.tiku.t.thakata~nce, bhikkhave, kamma.m adhammika.m kuppa.m a.t.thaanaaraha.m akamma.m na ca kara.niiya.m.
[03] 387^b^.^eb^ chayimaani, bhikkhave, kammaani -- adhammakamma.m, vaggakamma.m, samaggakamma.m, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m, dhammena samaggakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca ^a^M0.0437^ea^, bhikkhave, adhammakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekaaya ~nattiyaa kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dviihi ~nattiihi kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekaaya kammavaacaaya kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti ^a^T2.0255^ea^ -- adhammakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dviihi kammavaacaahi kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekaaya ~nattiyaa kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m ^a^P1.0318^ea^. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dviihi ~nattiihi kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tiihi ~nattiihi kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catuuhi ~nattiihi kamma.m karoti, na ca kammavaaca.m anussaaveti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekaaya kammavaacaaya kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dviihi kammavaacaahi ^a^V0.0414^ea^ kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tiihi kammavaacaahi kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti -- adhammakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catuuhi kammavaacaahi kamma.m karoti, na ca ~natti.m .thapeti -- adhammakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhammakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca, bhikkhave, vaggakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa ^a^T2.0256^ea^ te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa ^a^M0.0438^ea^ pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- vaggakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vaggakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca, bhikkhave, samaggakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- samaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- samaggakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaggakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0415^ea^, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m ^a^T2.0257^ea^ anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa ^a^P1.0319^ea^ pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te anaagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando anaaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti ^a^M0.0439^ea^, sammukhiibhuutaa pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammapatiruupakena vaggakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m ^a^T2.0258^ea^ .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m kammavaaca.m anussaaveti, pacchaa ~natti.m .thapeti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammapatiruupakena samaggakamma.m.

[03]katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammena samaggakamma.m? ~nattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m ~natti.m .thapeti, pacchaa ekaaya kammavaacaaya kamma.m karoti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti -- dhammena samaggakamma.m. ~natticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme pa.thama.m ~natti.m .thapeti, pacchaa tiihi kammavaacaahi kamma.m karoti, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu kammappattaa, te aagataa honti, chandaarahaana.m chando aaha.to hoti, sammukhiibhuutaa na pa.tikkosanti, dhammena samaggakamma.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammena samaggakamma.m.
[06] ~nattivipannakammaadikathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ pa~nca ^a^V0.0416^ea^ sa"nghaa -- catuvaggo bhikkhusa"ngho pa~ncavaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, dasavaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, viisativaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, atirekaviisativaggo bhikkhusa"ngho. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m catuvaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, .thapetvaa tii.ni kammaani -- upasampada.m pavaara.na.m abbhaana.m, dhammena samaggo ^a^T2.0259^ea^ sabbakammesu kammappatto. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m pa~ncavaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, .thapetvaa dve kammaani -- majjhimesu janapadesu upasampada.m abbhaana.m, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m dasavaggo bhikkhusa"ngho, .thapetvaa eka.m kamma.m -- abbhaana.m, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m viisativaggo bhikkhusa"ngho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu ^a^M0.0440^ea^ kammappatto. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m atirekaviisativaggo bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^P1.0320^ea^ dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ekaccassa, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa ruhati, ekaccassa na ruhati. kassa ca, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa na ruhati? bhikkhuniyaa, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa na ruhati. sikkhamaanaaya, bhikkhave...pe0... saama.nerassa, bhikkhave... saama.neriyaa, bhikkhave... sikkhaapaccakkhaatakassa bhikkhave... antimavatthu.m ajjhaapannakassa, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0419^ea^ ... ummattakassa, bhikkhave... khittacittassa, bhikkhave... vedanaa.t.tassa, bhikkhave... aapattiyaa adassane ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave... aapattiyaa appa.tikamme ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave... paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge ^a^T2.0263^ea^ ukkhittakassa, bhikkhave... pa.n.dakassa, bhikkhave... theyyasa.mvaasakassa, bhikkhave... titthiyapakkantakassa, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0443^ea^... tiracchaanagatassa bhikkhave... maatughaatakassa, bhikkhave... pitughaatakassa, bhikkhave... arahantaghaatakassa, bhikkhave... bhikkhuniduusakassa, bhikkhave... sa"nghabhedakassa, bhikkhave... lohituppaadakassa, bhikkhave... ubhatobya~njanakassa, bhikkhave... naanaasa.mvaasakassa, bhikkhave... naanaasiimaaya .thitassa, bhikkhave... iddhiyaa vehaase .thitassa, bhikkhave, yassa sa"ngho kamma.m karoti, tassa ca {tassa (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa na ruhati. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa na ruhati.

[03] samaanasa.mvaasakassa samaanasiimaaya .thitassa antamaso aanantarikassaapi {anantarikassaapi (syaa0)} bhikkhuno vi~n~naapentassa sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa ruhati. imassa kho, bhikkhave, sa"nghamajjhe pa.tikkosanaa ruhati.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ dvemaa, bhikkhave, nissaara.naa. atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissaara.na.m. ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti, ekacco sunissaarito, ekacco dunnissaarito. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissaara.na.m, ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- dunnissaarito? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suddho hoti anaapattiko. ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- dunnissaarito. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissaara.na.m, ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- dunnissaarito.

[03]katamo ^a^T2.0264^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissaara.na.m, ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- sunissaarito? idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu baalo hoti abyatto aapattibahulo anapadaano, gihisa.msa.t.tho ^a^P1.0322^ea^ viharati ananulomikehi gihisa.msaggehi, ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- sunissaarito. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissaara.na.m, ta~nce sa"ngho nissaareti -- sunissaarito.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ idha ^a^M0.0445^ea^ ^a^V0.0421^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti aapatti da.t.thabbaa. tamena.m codeti sa"ngho vaa sambahulaa vaa ekapuggalo vaa -- ``aapatti.m tva.m, aavuso, aapanno, passaseta.m aapatti''nti? so eva.m vadeti -- ``natthi me, aavuso, aapatti, yamaha.m passeyya''nti. ta.m ^a^P1.0323^ea^ sa"ngho aapattiyaa adassane ukkhipati -- adhammakamma.m.
